on init

    set_script_title("Drum Mik'a")
    set_ui_height_px(532)
    message("")
    make_perfview
    set_control_par_str($INST_ICON_ID,$CONTROL_PAR_PICTURE,"icon")

    declare $i
    declare $played_note_id
    pgs_create_key(KEY_VELOCITY,129)
    pgs_create_key(MAPPINGS,1)
    pgs_create_key(playnoteflag,1)
    pgs_create_key(MICS,12)


    {
    Originally script used two instances of Transient Master to implement missing $ENGINE_PAR_TR_SMOOTH parameter
    in some cases it didn't work properly: GUI could show "soft" status of other mixer channel than selected
    Transient Master $ENGINE_PAR_TR_SMOOTH parameter became available in Kontakt version 5.7.0 and now can be handled
    using set_engine_par()
    Redundant Transient Master in slot 3 is bypassed and instance in slot 2 used for all settings
    }
    $i := 0
    while ($i<9)
        set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_EFFECT_BYPASS,0,-1,2,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+$i)
        set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_EFFECT_BYPASS,1,-1,3,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+$i)
        inc($i)
    end while
    set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_EFFECT_BYPASS,0,-1,2,-1)
    set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_EFFECT_BYPASS,1,-1,3,-1)


    declare $wire_purge_status := 0

    declare %wire_groups[38] := (3, 5 , 7, 9, 11, 57, 59, 61, 63, 97, 98, 19, 21, 23, 69, 71, 73, 75, 111, 112, ...
                                25, 27, 29, 77, 79, 81, 83, 113, 114, 31, 33, 35, 85, 87, 89, 91, 115, 116)

    declare %nowire_groups[30] := (4, 6, 8, 10, 12, 58, 60, 62, 64, 20, 22, 24, 70, 72, 74, 76, 26, 28, 30, ...
                                 78, 80, 82, 84, 32, 34, 36, 86, 88, 90, 92)


    declare $current_preset := 1
    declare %default__preset[305] := (0, 0, 0, 0, 623, 111, 0, 2000, 63, 0, 2000, 0, 36, 2037, 0, 26, 1628, 24, 0, 2483, 77, 0, 2000, 0, 39, 3042, 0, 0, 1740, 127, 0, 2000, 63, 0, 2000, 0, 0, 2000, 0, 0, 2000, ...

    declare ui_switch $menu_play
    set_text($menu_play,"")
    set_control_par(get_ui_id($menu_play),$CONTROL_PAR_POS_X,318)
    set_control_par(get_ui_id($menu_play),$CONTROL_PAR_POS_Y,3)
    set_control_par(get_ui_id($menu_play),$CONTROL_PAR_WIDTH,22)
    set_control_par(get_ui_id($menu_play),$CONTROL_PAR_HEIGHT,22)
    set_control_par_str(get_ui_id($menu_play),$CONTROL_PAR_PICTURE,"dm_btn_playstop")
    set_control_par(get_ui_id($menu_play),$CONTROL_PAR_HIDE,$HIDE_WHOLE_CONTROL)
    make_persistent($menu_play)
    read_persistent_var($menu_play)

    inc($id9)
    %ui_id9[$id9] := get_ui_id($menu_play)
    declare ui_label $label_beat(87, 19)
    set_text($label_beat,"REVERB")
    set_control_par(get_ui_id($label_beat),$CONTROL_PAR_POS_X,341)
    set_control_par(get_ui_id($label_beat),$CONTROL_PAR_POS_Y,3)
    set_control_par(get_ui_id($label_beat),$CONTROL_PAR_WIDTH,87)
    set_control_par(get_ui_id($label_beat),$CONTROL_PAR_HEIGHT,19)
    set_control_par(get_ui_id($label_beat),$CONTROL_PAR_TEXT_ALIGNMENT,1)
    set_control_par(get_ui_id($label_beat),$CONTROL_PAR_HIDE,$HIDE_WHOLE_CONTROL)
    make_persistent($label_beat)
    read_persistent_var($label_beat)

    inc($id9)
    %ui_id9[$id9] := get_ui_id($label_beat)
    declare ui_switch $menu_beats
    set_text($menu_beats,"")
    set_control_par(get_ui_id($menu_beats),$CONTROL_PAR_POS_X,424)
    set_control_par(get_ui_id($menu_beats),$CONTROL_PAR_POS_Y,3)
    set_control_par(get_ui_id($menu_beats),$CONTROL_PAR_WIDTH,41)
    set_control_par(get_ui_id($menu_beats),$CONTROL_PAR_HEIGHT,23)
    set_control_par_str(get_ui_id($menu_beats),$CONTROL_PAR_PICTURE,"dm_btn_menu_beats")
    set_control_par(get_ui_id($menu_beats),$CONTROL_PAR_HIDE,$HIDE_WHOLE_CONTROL)
    make_persistent($menu_beats)
    read_persistent_var($menu_beats)

    inc($id9)
    %ui_id9[$id9] := get_ui_id($menu_beats)
    declare ui_switch $menu_drums

    declare $mix_swap := 0
    make_persistent($mix_swap)
    read_persistent_var($mix_swap)
    declare %mixer_pos[50] := (2, 327, -2, 312, 32, 312, 5, 259, 5, 215, 17, 174, 4, 350, 34, 156, 1, 329)
    declare $mix_vol_mousebehaviour := -2500
    declare ui_slider $mix_hh_vol(0, 127)
    set_control_par(get_ui_id($mix_hh_vol),$CONTROL_PAR_MOUSE_BEHAVIOUR,$mix_vol_mousebehaviour)
    set_control_par(get_ui_id($mix_hh_vol),$CONTROL_PAR_POS_X,%mixer_pos[0])
    set_control_par(get_ui_id($mix_hh_vol),$CONTROL_PAR_POS_Y,%mixer_pos[1])
    set_control_par_str(get_ui_id($mix_hh_vol),$CONTROL_PAR_PICTURE,"mixer_fader_sennheiser")
    set_control_par(get_ui_id($mix_hh_vol),$CONTROL_PAR_HIDE,$HIDE_WHOLE_CONTROL)
    make_persistent($mix_hh_vol)
    read_persistent_var($mix_hh_vol)

    inc($id2)
    %ui_id2[$id2] := get_ui_id($mix_hh_vol)
    declare ui_button $mix_hh_miclabel
    set_text($mix_hh_miclabel,"")
    set_control_par(get_ui_id($mix_hh_miclabel),$CONTROL_PAR_POS_X,%mixer_pos[16])
    set_control_par(get_ui_id($mix_hh_miclabel),$CONTROL_PAR_POS_Y,%mixer_pos[17])
    set_control_par(get_ui_id($mix_hh_miclabel),$CONTROL_PAR_WIDTH,61)
    set_control_par(get_ui_id($mix_hh_miclabel),$CONTROL_PAR_HEIGHT,16)
    set_control_par_str(get_ui_id($mix_hh_miclabel),$CONTROL_PAR_PICTURE,"")
    set_control_par(get_ui_id($mix_hh_miclabel),$CONTROL_PAR_HIDE,$HIDE_WHOLE_CONTROL)
    make_persistent($mix_hh_miclabel)
    read_persistent_var($mix_hh_miclabel)

    inc($id2)
    %ui_id2[$id2] := get_ui_id($mix_hh_miclabel)
    declare ui_switch $mix_hh_solo
    set_text($mix_hh_solo,"")
    set_control_par(get_ui_id($mix_hh_solo),$CONTROL_PAR_POS_X,%mixer_pos[2])
    set_control_par(get_ui_id($mix_hh_solo),$CONTROL_PAR_POS_Y,%mixer_pos[3])
    set_control_par(get_ui_id($mix_hh_solo),$CONTROL_PAR_WIDTH,30)
    set_control_par(get_ui_id($mix_hh_solo),$CONTROL_PAR_HEIGHT,18)
    set_control_par_str(get_ui_id($mix_hh_solo),$CONTROL_PAR_PICTURE,"dm_btn_solo")
    set_control_par(get_ui_id($mix_hh_solo),$CONTROL_PAR_HIDE,$HIDE_WHOLE_CONTROL)
    make_persistent($mix_hh_solo)
    read_persistent_var($mix_hh_solo)

    inc($id2)
    %ui_id2[$id2] := get_ui_id($mix_hh_solo)
    declare ui_switch $mix_hh_dry

    make_persistent($mix_hh_rev)
    read_persistent_var($mix_hh_rev)

    inc($id2)
    %ui_id2[$id2] := get_ui_id($mix_hh_rev)
    declare ui_switch $mix_hh_sel
    set_text($mix_hh_sel,"")
    set_control_par(get_ui_id($mix_hh_sel),$CONTROL_PAR_POS_X,%mixer_pos[14])
    set_control_par(get_ui_id($mix_hh_sel),$CONTROL_PAR_POS_Y,%mixer_pos[15])

    set_control_par(get_ui_id($mix_hh_sel),$CONTROL_PAR_HEIGHT,18)

    set_control_par(get_ui_id($mix_hh_sel),$CONTROL_PAR_HIDE,$HIDE_WHOLE_CONTROL)
    make_persistent($mix_hh_sel)
    read_persistent_var($mix_hh_sel)

    inc($id2)
    %ui_id2[$id2] := get_ui_id($mix_hh_sel)
    declare ui_level_meter $mix_hh_meterL
    attach_level_meter(get_ui_id($mix_hh_meterL),-1,-1,0,0)
    set_control_par(get_ui_id($mix_hh_meterL),$CONTROL_PAR_POS_X,%mixer_pos[12])
    set_control_par(get_ui_id($mix_hh_meterL),$CONTROL_PAR_POS_Y,%mixer_pos[13])
    set_control_par(get_ui_id($mix_hh_meterL),$CONTROL_PAR_WIDTH,3)
    set_control_par(get_ui_id($mix_hh_meterL),$CONTROL_PAR_HEIGHT,55)
    set_control_par(get_ui_id($mix_hh_meterL),$CONTROL_PAR_VERTICAL,1)
    set_control_par(get_ui_id($mix_hh_meterL),$CONTROL_PAR_OFF_COLOR,159426319)
    set_control_par(get_ui_id($mix_hh_meterL),$CONTROL_PAR_ON_COLOR,162847580)
    set_control_par(get_ui_id($mix_hh_meterL),$CONTROL_PAR_BG_COLOR,156916314)
    set_control_par(get_ui_id($mix_hh_meterL),$CONTROL_PAR_PEAK_COLOR,162847580)
    set_control_par(get_ui_id($mix_hh_meterL),$CONTROL_PAR_HIDE,$HIDE_WHOLE_CONTROL)

    inc($id2)
    %ui_id2[$id2] := get_ui_id($mix_hh_meterL)

    attach_level_meter(get_ui_id($mix_hh_meterR),-1,-1,1,0)
    set_control_par(get_ui_id($mix_hh_meterR),$CONTROL_PAR_POS_X,%mixer_pos[12]+$mixer_gap+4)
    set_control_par(get_ui_id($mix_hh_meterR),$CONTROL_PAR_POS_Y,%mixer_pos[13])
    set_control_par(get_ui_id($mix_hh_meterR),$CONTROL_PAR_WIDTH,3)
    set_control_par(get_ui_id($mix_hh_meterR),$CONTROL_PAR_HEIGHT,55)
    set_control_par(get_ui_id($mix_hh_meterR),$CONTROL_PAR_VERTICAL,1)
    set_control_par(get_ui_id($mix_hh_meterR),$CONTROL_PAR_OFF_COLOR,159426319)
    set_control_par(get_ui_id($mix_hh_meterR),$CONTROL_PAR_ON_COLOR,162847580)
    set_control_par(get_ui_id($mix_hh_meterR),$CONTROL_PAR_BG_COLOR,156916314)
    set_control_par(get_ui_id($mix_hh_meterR),$CONTROL_PAR_PEAK_COLOR,162847580)
    set_control_par(get_ui_id($mix_hh_meterR),$CONTROL_PAR_HIDE,$HIDE_WHOLE_CONTROL)

    inc($id2)
    %ui_id2[$id2] := get_ui_id($mix_hh_meterR)
    $mixer_margin := 64
    $mixer_gap := $mixer_margin-1
    declare ui_slider $mix_bdi_vol(0, 127)
    set_control_par(get_ui_id($mix_bdi_vol),$CONTROL_PAR_MOUSE_BEHAVIOUR,$mix_vol_mousebehaviour)

    set_control_par(get_ui_id($mix_bdi_rev),$CONTROL_PAR_POS_X,%mixer_pos[10]+$mixer_gap)

    %ui_id2[$id2] := get_ui_id($mix_bdi_rev)
    declare ui_switch $mix_bdi_sel
    set_text($mix_bdi_sel,"")

    set_control_par(get_ui_id($mix_bdi_sel),$CONTROL_PAR_POS_Y,%mixer_pos[15])

    set_control_par(get_ui_id($mix_bdi_sel),$CONTROL_PAR_HIDE,$HIDE_WHOLE_CONTROL)

    read_persistent_var($mix_bdi_sel)

    inc($id2)
    %ui_id2[$id2] := get_ui_id($mix_bdi_sel)
    declare ui_level_meter $mix_bdi_meterL
    attach_level_meter(get_ui_id($mix_bdi_meterL),-1,-1,0,1)
    set_control_par(get_ui_id($mix_bdi_meterL),$CONTROL_PAR_POS_X,%mixer_pos[12]+$mixer_gap)
    set_control_par(get_ui_id($mix_bdi_meterL),$CONTROL_PAR_POS_Y,%mixer_pos[13])
    set_control_par(get_ui_id($mix_bdi_meterL),$CONTROL_PAR_WIDTH,3)
    set_control_par(get_ui_id($mix_bdi_meterL),$CONTROL_PAR_HEIGHT,55)
    set_control_par(get_ui_id($mix_bdi_meterL),$CONTROL_PAR_VERTICAL,1)
    set_control_par(get_ui_id($mix_bdi_meterL),$CONTROL_PAR_OFF_COLOR,159426319)
    set_control_par(get_ui_id($mix_bdi_meterL),$CONTROL_PAR_ON_COLOR,162847580)
    set_control_par(get_ui_id($mix_bdi_meterL),$CONTROL_PAR_BG_COLOR,156916314)
    set_control_par(get_ui_id($mix_bdi_meterL),$CONTROL_PAR_PEAK_COLOR,162847580)
    set_control_par(get_ui_id($mix_bdi_meterL),$CONTROL_PAR_HIDE,$HIDE_WHOLE_CONTROL)

    inc($id2)
    %ui_id2[$id2] := get_ui_id($mix_bdi_meterL)
    declare ui_level_meter $mix_bdi_meterR
    attach_level_meter(get_ui_id($mix_bdi_meterR),-1,-1,1,1)
    set_control_par(get_ui_id($mix_bdi_meterR),$CONTROL_PAR_POS_X,%mixer_pos[12]+$mixer_gap+4)
    set_control_par(get_ui_id($mix_bdi_meterR),$CONTROL_PAR_POS_Y,%mixer_pos[13])
    set_control_par(get_ui_id($mix_bdi_meterR),$CONTROL_PAR_WIDTH,3)
    set_control_par(get_ui_id($mix_bdi_meterR),$CONTROL_PAR_HEIGHT,55)
    set_control_par(get_ui_id($mix_bdi_meterR),$CONTROL_PAR_VERTICAL,1)
    set_control_par(get_ui_id($mix_bdi_meterR),$CONTROL_PAR_OFF_COLOR,159426319)
    set_control_par(get_ui_id($mix_bdi_meterR),$CONTROL_PAR_ON_COLOR,162847580)
    set_control_par(get_ui_id($mix_bdi_meterR),$CONTROL_PAR_BG_COLOR,156916314)
    set_control_par(get_ui_id($mix_bdi_meterR),$CONTROL_PAR_PEAK_COLOR,162847580)
    set_control_par(get_ui_id($mix_bdi_meterR),$CONTROL_PAR_HIDE,$HIDE_WHOLE_CONTROL)

    inc($id2)
    %ui_id2[$id2] := get_ui_id($mix_bdi_meterR)
    $mixer_gap := $mixer_margin*2-2
    declare ui_slider $mix_bdo_vol(0, 127)
    set_control_par(get_ui_id($mix_bdo_vol),$CONTROL_PAR_MOUSE_BEHAVIOUR,$mix_vol_mousebehaviour)
    set_control_par(get_ui_id($mix_bdo_vol),$CONTROL_PAR_POS_X,%mixer_pos[0]+$mixer_gap)
    set_control_par(get_ui_id($mix_bdo_vol),$CONTROL_PAR_POS_Y,%mixer_pos[1])
    set_control_par_str(get_ui_id($mix_bdo_vol),$CONTROL_PAR_PICTURE,"mixer_fader_sennheiser")
    set_control_par(get_ui_id($mix_bdo_vol),$CONTROL_PAR_HIDE,$HIDE_WHOLE_CONTROL)
    make_persistent($mix_bdo_vol)
    read_persistent_var($mix_bdo_vol)

    inc($id2)
    %ui_id2[$id2] := get_ui_id($mix_bdo_vol)
    declare ui_button $mix_bdo_miclabel
    set_text($mix_bdo_miclabel,"")
    set_control_par(get_ui_id($mix_bdo_miclabel),$CONTROL_PAR_POS_X,%mixer_pos[16]+$mixer_gap)
    set_control_par(get_ui_id($mix_bdo_miclabel),$CONTROL_PAR_POS_Y,%mixer_pos[17])
    set_control_par(get_ui_id($mix_bdo_miclabel),$CONTROL_PAR_WIDTH,61)
    set_control_par(get_ui_id($mix_bdo_miclabel),$CONTROL_PAR_HEIGHT,16)
    set_control_par_str(get_ui_id($mix_bdo_miclabel),$CONTROL_PAR_PICTURE,"")
    set_control_par(get_ui_id($mix_bdo_miclabel),$CONTROL_PAR_HIDE,$HIDE_WHOLE_CONTROL)
    make_persistent($mix_bdo_miclabel)
    read_persistent_var($mix_bdo_miclabel)

    inc($id2)
    %ui_id2[$id2] := get_ui_id($mix_bdo_miclabel)
    declare ui_switch $mix_bdo_solo
    set_text($mix_bdo_solo,"")
    set_control_par(get_ui_id($mix_bdo_solo),$CONTROL_PAR_POS_X,%mixer_pos[2]+$mixer_gap)
    set_control_par(get_ui_id($mix_bdo_solo),$CONTROL_PAR_POS_Y,%mixer_pos[3])
    set_control_par(get_ui_id($mix_bdo_solo),$CONTROL_PAR_WIDTH,30)
    set_control_par(get_ui_id($mix_bdo_solo),$CONTROL_PAR_HEIGHT,18)
    set_control_par_str(get_ui_id($mix_bdo_solo),$CONTROL_PAR_PICTURE,"dm_btn_solo")
    set_control_par(get_ui_id($mix_bdo_solo),$CONTROL_PAR_HIDE,$HIDE_WHOLE_CONTROL)
    make_persistent($mix_bdo_solo)
    read_persistent_var($mix_bdo_solo)

    inc($id2)
    %ui_id2[$id2] := get_ui_id($mix_bdo_solo)
    declare ui_switch $mix_bdo_dry
    set_text($mix_bdo_dry,"")
    set_control_par(get_ui_id($mix_bdo_dry),$CONTROL_PAR_POS_X,%mixer_pos[4]+$mixer_gap)
    set_control_par(get_ui_id($mix_bdo_dry),$CONTROL_PAR_POS_Y,%mixer_pos[5])
    set_control_par(get_ui_id($mix_bdo_dry),$CONTROL_PAR_WIDTH,30)
    set_control_par(get_ui_id($mix_bdo_dry),$CONTROL_PAR_HEIGHT,18)
    set_control_par_str(get_ui_id($mix_bdo_dry),$CONTROL_PAR_PICTURE,"dm_btn_dry")
    set_control_par(get_ui_id($mix_bdo_dry),$CONTROL_PAR_HIDE,$HIDE_WHOLE_CONTROL)
    make_persistent($mix_bdo_dry)
    read_persistent_var($mix_bdo_dry)

    inc($id2)
    %ui_id2[$id2] := get_ui_id($mix_bdo_dry)
    declare ui_slider $mix_bdo_pan(0, 2000)
    set_control_par(get_ui_id($mix_bdo_pan),$CONTROL_PAR_MOUSE_BEHAVIOUR,-1000)
    set_control_par(get_ui_id($mix_bdo_pan),$CONTROL_PAR_POS_X,%mixer_pos[6]+$mixer_gap)

    set_control_par(get_ui_id($mix_bdo_meterL),$CONTROL_PAR_POS_X,%mixer_pos[12]+$mixer_gap)

    set_control_par(get_ui_id($mix_bdo_meterL),$CONTROL_PAR_OFF_COLOR,159426319)
    set_control_par(get_ui_id($mix_bdo_meterL),$CONTROL_PAR_ON_COLOR,162847580)
    set_control_par(get_ui_id($mix_bdo_meterL),$CONTROL_PAR_BG_COLOR,156916314)
    set_control_par(get_ui_id($mix_bdo_meterL),$CONTROL_PAR_PEAK_COLOR,162847580)
    set_control_par(get_ui_id($mix_bdo_meterL),$CONTROL_PAR_HIDE,$HIDE_WHOLE_CONTROL)

    %ui_id2[$id2] := get_ui_id($mix_bdo_meterL)

    set_control_par(get_ui_id($mix_bdo_meterR),$CONTROL_PAR_POS_X,%mixer_pos[12]+$mixer_gap+4)

    make_persistent($mix_snbt_rev)
    read_persistent_var($mix_snbt_rev)

    inc($id2)
    %ui_id2[$id2] := get_ui_id($mix_snbt_rev)
    declare ui_switch $mix_snbt_sel
    set_text($mix_snbt_sel,"")
    set_control_par(get_ui_id($mix_snbt_sel),$CONTROL_PAR_POS_X,%mixer_pos[14]+$mixer_gap)
    set_control_par(get_ui_id($mix_snbt_sel),$CONTROL_PAR_POS_Y,%mixer_pos[15])
    set_control_par(get_ui_id($mix_snbt_sel),$CONTROL_PAR_WIDTH,30)
    set_control_par(get_ui_id($mix_snbt_sel),$CONTROL_PAR_HEIGHT,18)
    set_control_par_str(get_ui_id($mix_snbt_sel),$CONTROL_PAR_PICTURE,"dm_btn_blanc")
    set_control_par(get_ui_id($mix_snbt_sel),$CONTROL_PAR_HIDE,$HIDE_WHOLE_CONTROL)
    make_persistent($mix_snbt_sel)
    read_persistent_var($mix_snbt_sel)

    inc($id2)
    %ui_id2[$id2] := get_ui_id($mix_snbt_sel)
    declare ui_level_meter $mix_snbt_meterL
    attach_level_meter(get_ui_id($mix_snbt_meterL),-1,-1,0,4)
    set_control_par(get_ui_id($mix_snbt_meterL),$CONTROL_PAR_POS_X,%mixer_pos[12]+$mixer_gap)
    set_control_par(get_ui_id($mix_snbt_meterL),$CONTROL_PAR_POS_Y,%mixer_pos[13])
    set_control_par(get_ui_id($mix_snbt_meterL),$CONTROL_PAR_WIDTH,3)
    set_control_par(get_ui_id($mix_snbt_meterL),$CONTROL_PAR_HEIGHT,55)
    set_control_par(get_ui_id($mix_snbt_meterL),$CONTROL_PAR_VERTICAL,1)
    set_control_par(get_ui_id($mix_snbt_meterL),$CONTROL_PAR_OFF_COLOR,159426319)
    set_control_par(get_ui_id($mix_snbt_meterL),$CONTROL_PAR_ON_COLOR,162847580)
    set_control_par(get_ui_id($mix_snbt_meterL),$CONTROL_PAR_BG_COLOR,156916314)
    set_control_par(get_ui_id($mix_snbt_meterL),$CONTROL_PAR_PEAK_COLOR,162847580)
    set_control_par(get_ui_id($mix_snbt_meterL),$CONTROL_PAR_HIDE,$HIDE_WHOLE_CONTROL)

    inc($id2)
    %ui_id2[$id2] := get_ui_id($mix_snbt_meterL)
    declare ui_level_meter $mix_snbt_meterR
    attach_level_meter(get_ui_id($mix_snbt_meterR),-1,-1,1,4)
    set_control_par(get_ui_id($mix_snbt_meterR),$CONTROL_PAR_POS_X,%mixer_pos[12]+$mixer_gap+4)
    set_control_par(get_ui_id($mix_snbt_meterR),$CONTROL_PAR_POS_Y,%mixer_pos[13])
    set_control_par(get_ui_id($mix_snbt_meterR),$CONTROL_PAR_WIDTH,3)
    set_control_par(get_ui_id($mix_snbt_meterR),$CONTROL_PAR_HEIGHT,55)
    set_control_par(get_ui_id($mix_snbt_meterR),$CONTROL_PAR_VERTICAL,1)
    set_control_par(get_ui_id($mix_snbt_meterR),$CONTROL_PAR_OFF_COLOR,159426319)
    set_control_par(get_ui_id($mix_snbt_meterR),$CONTROL_PAR_ON_COLOR,162847580)
    set_control_par(get_ui_id($mix_snbt_meterR),$CONTROL_PAR_BG_COLOR,156916314)
    set_control_par(get_ui_id($mix_snbt_meterR),$CONTROL_PAR_PEAK_COLOR,162847580)
    set_control_par(get_ui_id($mix_snbt_meterR),$CONTROL_PAR_HIDE,$HIDE_WHOLE_CONTROL)

    inc($id2)
    %ui_id2[$id2] := get_ui_id($mix_snbt_meterR)
    $mixer_gap := $mixer_margin*5-5
    declare ui_slider $mix_tomhi_vol(0, 127)
    set_control_par(get_ui_id($mix_tomhi_vol),$CONTROL_PAR_MOUSE_BEHAVIOUR,$mix_vol_mousebehaviour)
    set_control_par(get_ui_id($mix_tomhi_vol),$CONTROL_PAR_POS_X,%mixer_pos[0]+$mixer_gap)
    set_control_par(get_ui_id($mix_tomhi_vol),$CONTROL_PAR_POS_Y,%mixer_pos[1])
    set_control_par_str(get_ui_id($mix_tomhi_vol),$CONTROL_PAR_PICTURE,"mixer_fader_sennheiser")
    set_control_par(get_ui_id($mix_tomhi_vol),$CONTROL_PAR_HIDE,$HIDE_WHOLE_CONTROL)
    make_persistent($mix_tomhi_vol)
    read_persistent_var($mix_tomhi_vol)

    inc($id2)
    %ui_id2[$id2] := get_ui_id($mix_tomhi_vol)

    inc($id2)
    %ui_id2[$id2] := get_ui_id($mix_tomlow_vol)
    declare ui_button $mix_tomlow_miclabel
    set_text($mix_tomlow_miclabel,"")
    set_control_par(get_ui_id($mix_tomlow_miclabel),$CONTROL_PAR_POS_X,%mixer_pos[16]+$mixer_gap)
    set_control_par(get_ui_id($mix_tomlow_miclabel),$CONTROL_PAR_POS_Y,%mixer_pos[17])
    set_control_par(get_ui_id($mix_tomlow_miclabel),$CONTROL_PAR_WIDTH,61)
    set_control_par(get_ui_id($mix_tomlow_miclabel),$CONTROL_PAR_HEIGHT,16)
    set_control_par_str(get_ui_id($mix_tomlow_miclabel),$CONTROL_PAR_PICTURE,"")
    set_control_par(get_ui_id($mix_tomlow_miclabel),$CONTROL_PAR_HIDE,$HIDE_WHOLE_CONTROL)
    make_persistent($mix_tomlow_miclabel)
    read_persistent_var($mix_tomlow_miclabel)

    inc($id2)
    %ui_id2[$id2] := get_ui_id($mix_tomlow_miclabel)
    declare ui_switch $mix_tomlow_solo
    set_text($mix_tomlow_solo,"")
    set_control_par(get_ui_id($mix_tomlow_solo),$CONTROL_PAR_POS_X,%mixer_pos[2]+$mixer_gap)
    set_control_par(get_ui_id($mix_tomlow_solo),$CONTROL_PAR_POS_Y,%mixer_pos[3])
    set_control_par(get_ui_id($mix_tomlow_solo),$CONTROL_PAR_WIDTH,30)
    set_control_par(get_ui_id($mix_tomlow_solo),$CONTROL_PAR_HEIGHT,18)
    set_control_par_str(get_ui_id($mix_tomlow_solo),$CONTROL_PAR_PICTURE,"dm_btn_solo")
    set_control_par(get_ui_id($mix_tomlow_solo),$CONTROL_PAR_HIDE,$HIDE_WHOLE_CONTROL)
    make_persistent($mix_tomlow_solo)
    read_persistent_var($mix_tomlow_solo)

    inc($id2)
    %ui_id2[$id2] := get_ui_id($mix_tomlow_solo)
    declare ui_switch $mix_tomlow_dry
    set_text($mix_tomlow_dry,"")
    set_control_par(get_ui_id($mix_tomlow_dry),$CONTROL_PAR_POS_X,%mixer_pos[4]+$mixer_gap)
    set_control_par(get_ui_id($mix_tomlow_dry),$CONTROL_PAR_POS_Y,%mixer_pos[5])
    set_control_par(get_ui_id($mix_tomlow_dry),$CONTROL_PAR_WIDTH,30)
    set_control_par(get_ui_id($mix_tomlow_dry),$CONTROL_PAR_HEIGHT,18)
    set_control_par_str(get_ui_id($mix_tomlow_dry),$CONTROL_PAR_PICTURE,"dm_btn_dry")
    set_control_par(get_ui_id($mix_tomlow_dry),$CONTROL_PAR_HIDE,$HIDE_WHOLE_CONTROL)
    make_persistent($mix_tomlow_dry)
    read_persistent_var($mix_tomlow_dry)

    inc($id2)
    %ui_id2[$id2] := get_ui_id($mix_tomlow_dry)
    declare ui_slider $mix_tomlow_pan(0, 2000)
    set_control_par(get_ui_id($mix_tomlow_pan),$CONTROL_PAR_MOUSE_BEHAVIOUR,-1000)
    set_control_par(get_ui_id($mix_tomlow_pan),$CONTROL_PAR_POS_X,%mixer_pos[6]+$mixer_gap)

    read_persistent_var($mix_tomlow_sel)

    inc($id2)
    %ui_id2[$id2] := get_ui_id($mix_tomlow_sel)
    declare ui_level_meter $mix_tomlow_meterL
    attach_level_meter(get_ui_id($mix_tomlow_meterL),-1,-1,0,7)
    set_control_par(get_ui_id($mix_tomlow_meterL),$CONTROL_PAR_POS_X,%mixer_pos[12]+$mixer_gap)
    set_control_par(get_ui_id($mix_tomlow_meterL),$CONTROL_PAR_POS_Y,%mixer_pos[13])
    set_control_par(get_ui_id($mix_tomlow_meterL),$CONTROL_PAR_WIDTH,3)
    set_control_par(get_ui_id($mix_tomlow_meterL),$CONTROL_PAR_HEIGHT,55)

    set_control_par(get_ui_id($mix_tomlow_meterL),$CONTROL_PAR_OFF_COLOR,159426319)
    set_control_par(get_ui_id($mix_tomlow_meterL),$CONTROL_PAR_ON_COLOR,162847580)
    set_control_par(get_ui_id($mix_tomlow_meterL),$CONTROL_PAR_BG_COLOR,156916314)
    set_control_par(get_ui_id($mix_tomlow_meterL),$CONTROL_PAR_PEAK_COLOR,162847580)

    %ui_id2[$id2] := get_ui_id($mix_tomlow_meterL)

    set_control_par(get_ui_id($mix_tomlow_meterR),$CONTROL_PAR_POS_X,%mixer_pos[12]+$mixer_gap+4)

    set_control_par(get_ui_id($mix_tomlow_meterR),$CONTROL_PAR_WIDTH,3)

    %ui_id2[$id2] := get_ui_id($mix_tomlow_meterR)
    $mixer_gap := $mixer_margin*8-8
    declare ui_slider $mix_ov_vol(0, 127)
    set_control_par(get_ui_id($mix_ov_vol),$CONTROL_PAR_MOUSE_BEHAVIOUR,$mix_vol_mousebehaviour)
    set_control_par(get_ui_id($mix_ov_vol),$CONTROL_PAR_POS_X,%mixer_pos[0]+$mixer_gap)

    set_control_par(get_ui_id($mix_ov_miclabel),$CONTROL_PAR_HEIGHT,16)
    set_control_par_str(get_ui_id($mix_ov_miclabel),$CONTROL_PAR_PICTURE,"")

    declare ui_switch $mix_ov_solo

    read_persistent_var($mix_ov_spread)

    inc($id2)
    %ui_id2[$id2] := get_ui_id($mix_ov_spread)
    declare ui_slider $mix_ov_pan(0, 2000)
    set_control_par(get_ui_id($mix_ov_pan),$CONTROL_PAR_MOUSE_BEHAVIOUR,-1000)

    read_persistent_var($mix_ov_rev)

    inc($id2)
    %ui_id2[$id2] := get_ui_id($mix_ov_rev)
    declare ui_switch $mix_ov_sel
    set_text($mix_ov_sel,"")
    set_control_par(get_ui_id($mix_ov_sel),$CONTROL_PAR_POS_X,%mixer_pos[14]+$mixer_gap)
    set_control_par(get_ui_id($mix_ov_sel),$CONTROL_PAR_POS_Y,%mixer_pos[15])

    set_control_par(get_ui_id($mix_ov_sel),$CONTROL_PAR_HIDE,$HIDE_WHOLE_CONTROL)
    make_persistent($mix_ov_sel)
    read_persistent_var($mix_ov_sel)

    inc($id2)
    %ui_id2[$id2] := get_ui_id($mix_ov_sel)
    declare ui_level_meter $mix_ov_meterL
    attach_level_meter(get_ui_id($mix_ov_meterL),-1,-1,0,8)
    set_control_par(get_ui_id($mix_ov_meterL),$CONTROL_PAR_POS_X,%mixer_pos[12]+$mixer_gap+1)
    set_control_par(get_ui_id($mix_ov_meterL),$CONTROL_PAR_POS_Y,%mixer_pos[13])
    set_control_par(get_ui_id($mix_ov_meterL),$CONTROL_PAR_WIDTH,3)
    set_control_par(get_ui_id($mix_ov_meterL),$CONTROL_PAR_HEIGHT,55)
    set_control_par(get_ui_id($mix_ov_meterL),$CONTROL_PAR_VERTICAL,1)
    set_control_par(get_ui_id($mix_ov_meterL),$CONTROL_PAR_OFF_COLOR,159426319)
    set_control_par(get_ui_id($mix_ov_meterL),$CONTROL_PAR_ON_COLOR,162847580)
    set_control_par(get_ui_id($mix_ov_meterL),$CONTROL_PAR_BG_COLOR,156916314)
    set_control_par(get_ui_id($mix_ov_meterL),$CONTROL_PAR_PEAK_COLOR,162847580)
    set_control_par(get_ui_id($mix_ov_meterL),$CONTROL_PAR_HIDE,$HIDE_WHOLE_CONTROL)

    inc($id2)
    %ui_id2[$id2] := get_ui_id($mix_ov_meterL)
    declare ui_level_meter $mix_ov_meterR
    attach_level_meter(get_ui_id($mix_ov_meterR),-1,-1,1,8)
    set_control_par(get_ui_id($mix_ov_meterR),$CONTROL_PAR_POS_X,%mixer_pos[12]+$mixer_gap+5)
    set_control_par(get_ui_id($mix_ov_meterR),$CONTROL_PAR_POS_Y,%mixer_pos[13])
    set_control_par(get_ui_id($mix_ov_meterR),$CONTROL_PAR_WIDTH,3)
    set_control_par(get_ui_id($mix_ov_meterR),$CONTROL_PAR_HEIGHT,55)
    set_control_par(get_ui_id($mix_ov_meterR),$CONTROL_PAR_VERTICAL,1)
    set_control_par(get_ui_id($mix_ov_meterR),$CONTROL_PAR_OFF_COLOR,159426319)
    set_control_par(get_ui_id($mix_ov_meterR),$CONTROL_PAR_ON_COLOR,162847580)
    set_control_par(get_ui_id($mix_ov_meterR),$CONTROL_PAR_BG_COLOR,156916314)
    set_control_par(get_ui_id($mix_ov_meterR),$CONTROL_PAR_PEAK_COLOR,162847580)
    set_control_par(get_ui_id($mix_ov_meterR),$CONTROL_PAR_HIDE,$HIDE_WHOLE_CONTROL)

    inc($id2)
    %ui_id2[$id2] := get_ui_id($mix_ov_meterR)
    $mixer_gap := $mixer_margin*9-7
    declare ui_slider $mix_rev_vol(0, 127)
    set_control_par(get_ui_id($mix_rev_vol),$CONTROL_PAR_MOUSE_BEHAVIOUR,$mix_vol_mousebehaviour)
    set_control_par(get_ui_id($mix_rev_vol),$CONTROL_PAR_POS_X,%mixer_pos[0]+$mixer_gap)
    set_control_par(get_ui_id($mix_rev_vol),$CONTROL_PAR_POS_Y,%mixer_pos[1])
    set_control_par_str(get_ui_id($mix_rev_vol),$CONTROL_PAR_PICTURE,"mixer_fader_sennheiser")
    set_control_par(get_ui_id($mix_rev_vol),$CONTROL_PAR_HIDE,$HIDE_WHOLE_CONTROL)
    make_persistent($mix_rev_vol)
    read_persistent_var($mix_rev_vol)

    inc($id2)
    %ui_id2[$id2] := get_ui_id($mix_rev_vol)
    declare ui_slider $mix_rev_hp(0, 127)
    set_control_par(get_ui_id($mix_rev_hp),$CONTROL_PAR_MOUSE_BEHAVIOUR,-1000)
    set_control_par(get_ui_id($mix_rev_hp),$CONTROL_PAR_POS_X,%mixer_pos[10]+$mixer_gap)
    set_control_par(get_ui_id($mix_rev_hp),$CONTROL_PAR_POS_Y,%mixer_pos[11])
    set_control_par_str(get_ui_id($mix_rev_hp),$CONTROL_PAR_PICTURE,"mixer_send_ledkranz")
    set_control_par(get_ui_id($mix_rev_hp),$CONTROL_PAR_HIDE,$HIDE_WHOLE_CONTROL)
    make_persistent($mix_rev_hp)
    read_persistent_var($mix_rev_hp)

    inc($id2)
    %ui_id2[$id2] := get_ui_id($mix_rev_hp)
    declare ui_slider $mix_rev_lp(0, 127)
    set_control_par(get_ui_id($mix_rev_lp),$CONTROL_PAR_MOUSE_BEHAVIOUR,-1000)
    set_control_par(get_ui_id($mix_rev_lp),$CONTROL_PAR_POS_X,%mixer_pos[8]+$mixer_gap)
    set_control_par(get_ui_id($mix_rev_lp),$CONTROL_PAR_POS_Y,%mixer_pos[9])
    set_control_par_str(get_ui_id($mix_rev_lp),$CONTROL_PAR_PICTURE,"mixer_send_ledkranz")
    set_control_par(get_ui_id($mix_rev_lp),$CONTROL_PAR_HIDE,$HIDE_WHOLE_CONTROL)
    make_persistent($mix_rev_lp)
    read_persistent_var($mix_rev_lp)

    inc($id2)
    %ui_id2[$id2] := get_ui_id($mix_rev_lp)
    set_knob_defval($mix_rev_lp,127)
    declare ui_label $mix_rev_label(1, 1)
    set_text($mix_rev_label,"")
    set_control_par(get_ui_id($mix_rev_label),$CONTROL_PAR_POS_X,%mixer_pos[0]+$mixer_gap+3)
    set_control_par(get_ui_id($mix_rev_label),$CONTROL_PAR_POS_Y,%mixer_pos[5]-13)
    set_control_par(get_ui_id($mix_rev_label),$CONTROL_PAR_WIDTH,50)
    set_control_par(get_ui_id($mix_rev_label),$CONTROL_PAR_HEIGHT,12)
    set_control_par_str(get_ui_id($mix_rev_label),$CONTROL_PAR_PICTURE,"")
    set_control_par(get_ui_id($mix_rev_label),$CONTROL_PAR_HIDE,$HIDE_WHOLE_CONTROL)
    make_persistent($mix_rev_label)
    read_persistent_var($mix_rev_label)

    inc($id2)
    %ui_id2[$id2] := get_ui_id($mix_rev_label)
    declare ui_switch $mix_rev_arrowup
    set_text($mix_rev_arrowup,"")
    set_control_par(get_ui_id($mix_rev_arrowup),$CONTROL_PAR_POS_X,%mixer_pos[6]+$mixer_gap+18)
    set_control_par(get_ui_id($mix_rev_arrowup),$CONTROL_PAR_POS_Y,%mixer_pos[7]+25)
    set_control_par(get_ui_id($mix_rev_arrowup),$CONTROL_PAR_WIDTH,15)
    set_control_par(get_ui_id($mix_rev_arrowup),$CONTROL_PAR_HEIGHT,15)
    set_control_par_str(get_ui_id($mix_rev_arrowup),$CONTROL_PAR_PICTURE,"mixer_arrow_up")
    set_control_par(get_ui_id($mix_rev_arrowup),$CONTROL_PAR_HIDE,$HIDE_WHOLE_CONTROL)
    make_persistent($mix_rev_arrowup)
    read_persistent_var($mix_rev_arrowup)

    inc($id2)
    %ui_id2[$id2] := get_ui_id($mix_rev_arrowup)
    declare ui_switch $mix_rev_arrowdown
    set_text($mix_rev_arrowdown,"")
    set_control_par(get_ui_id($mix_rev_arrowdown),$CONTROL_PAR_POS_X,%mixer_pos[6]+$mixer_gap+18)
    set_control_par(get_ui_id($mix_rev_arrowdown),$CONTROL_PAR_POS_Y,%mixer_pos[7]+52)
    set_control_par(get_ui_id($mix_rev_arrowdown),$CONTROL_PAR_WIDTH,15)
    set_control_par(get_ui_id($mix_rev_arrowdown),$CONTROL_PAR_HEIGHT,15)
    set_control_par_str(get_ui_id($mix_rev_arrowdown),$CONTROL_PAR_PICTURE,"mixer_arrow_down")
    set_control_par(get_ui_id($mix_rev_arrowdown),$CONTROL_PAR_HIDE,$HIDE_WHOLE_CONTROL)
    make_persistent($mix_rev_arrowdown)
    read_persistent_var($mix_rev_arrowdown)

    inc($id2)
    %ui_id2[$id2] := get_ui_id($mix_rev_arrowdown)
    %vol_ui_ids[0] := get_ui_id($mix_hh_vol)
    %vol_ui_ids[1] := get_ui_id($mix_bdi_vol)
    %vol_ui_ids[2] := get_ui_id($mix_bdo_vol)
    %vol_ui_ids[3] := get_ui_id($mix_sntop_vol)
    %vol_ui_ids[4] := get_ui_id($mix_snbt_vol)
    %vol_ui_ids[5] := get_ui_id($mix_tomhi_vol)
    %vol_ui_ids[6] := get_ui_id($mix_tommid_vol)
    %vol_ui_ids[7] := get_ui_id($mix_tomlow_vol)
    %vol_ui_ids[8] := get_ui_id($mix_ov_vol)
    %menu_ui_ids[0] := get_ui_id($menu_option)
    %menu_ui_ids[1] := get_ui_id($menu_micsel)
    %menu_ui_ids[2] := get_ui_id($menu_mixer)
    %menu_ui_ids[3] := get_ui_id($menu_drums)
    %menu_ui_ids[4] := get_ui_id($menu_beats)
    %solo_ui_ids[0] := get_ui_id($mix_hh_solo)
    %solo_ui_ids[1] := get_ui_id($mix_bdi_solo)
    %solo_ui_ids[2] := get_ui_id($mix_bdo_solo)

    set_control_par(get_ui_id($options_mapping_addictive),$CONTROL_PAR_POS_X,234)
    set_control_par(get_ui_id($options_mapping_addictive),$CONTROL_PAR_POS_Y,284)
    set_control_par(get_ui_id($options_mapping_addictive),$CONTROL_PAR_WIDTH,30)
    set_control_par(get_ui_id($options_mapping_addictive),$CONTROL_PAR_HEIGHT,18)
    set_control_par_str(get_ui_id($options_mapping_addictive),$CONTROL_PAR_PICTURE,"dm_btn_blanc")
    set_control_par(get_ui_id($options_mapping_addictive),$CONTROL_PAR_HIDE,$HIDE_WHOLE_CONTROL)
    make_persistent($options_mapping_addictive)
    read_persistent_var($options_mapping_addictive)
    inc($id5)
    %ui_id5[$id5] := get_ui_id($options_mapping_addictive)
    declare ui_switch $options_mapping_superior

    declare ui_menu $menu_output_hh
    set_control_par(get_ui_id($menu_output_hh),$CONTROL_PAR_POS_X,365)
    set_control_par(get_ui_id($menu_output_hh),$CONTROL_PAR_POS_Y,373)
    set_control_par(get_ui_id($menu_output_hh),$CONTROL_PAR_WIDTH,85)
    set_control_par(get_ui_id($menu_output_hh),$CONTROL_PAR_HEIGHT,17)
    set_control_par(get_ui_id($menu_output_hh),$CONTROL_PAR_HIDE,$HIDE_WHOLE_CONTROL)
    make_persistent($menu_output_hh)
    read_persistent_var($menu_output_hh)
    inc($id5)
    %ui_id5[$id5] := get_ui_id($menu_output_hh)
    $i := 0
    while ($i<$NUM_OUTPUT_CHANNELS)
        add_menu_item($menu_output_hh,output_channel_name($i),$i)
        inc($i)
    end while

    declare $MIDISyncID
    declare ui_file_selector $fsMIDISelector
    set_control_par_str(get_ui_id($fsMIDISelector),$CONTROL_PAR_BASEPATH,get_folder($GET_FOLDER_PATCH_DIR) & "MIDI Files")
    set_control_par(get_ui_id($fsMIDISelector),$CONTROL_PAR_FILE_TYPE,$NI_FILE_TYPE_MIDI)
    set_control_par(get_ui_id($fsMIDISelector),$CONTROL_PAR_COLUMN_WIDTH,180)
    set_control_par(get_ui_id($fsMIDISelector),$CONTROL_PAR_HEIGHT,430)
    set_control_par(get_ui_id($fsMIDISelector),$CONTROL_PAR_WIDTH,550)
    set_control_par(get_ui_id($fsMIDISelector),$CONTROL_PAR_POS_X,45)
    set_control_par(get_ui_id($fsMIDISelector),$CONTROL_PAR_POS_Y,50)
    inc($id6)
    %ui_id6[$id6] := get_ui_id($fsMIDISelector)
    set_control_par(get_ui_id($fsMIDISelector),$CONTROL_PAR_HIDE,$HIDE_WHOLE_CONTROL)

    declare @file_path
    declare @file_name

    make_persistent(@file_path)
    read_persistent_var(@file_path)
    set_text($label_beat,"")
    $i := 1
    while ($i<=$id9)
        set_control_par(%ui_id9[$i],$CONTROL_PAR_HIDE,$HIDE_PART_NOTHING)
        inc($i)
    end while
