    set_control_help($fx_eq_lf,"Turn to adjust the Highpass Frequency for the current selected channel.")
    set_control_help($fx_eq_lg,"Turn to adjust the Highpass Gain for the current selected channel.")
    set_control_help($fx_eq_lb,"Click to switch the mode of the Highpass between Bell and Cut for the current selected channel.")
    set_control_help($fx_eq_lmf,"Turn to adjust the Lower Mids Frequency for the current selected channel.")
    set_control_help($fx_eq_lmg,"Turn to adjust the Lower Mids Gain for the current selected channel.")
    set_control_help($fx_eq_lmq,"Turn to adjust the Lower Mids Q-Factor for the current selected channel.")
    set_control_help($fx_eq_hmf,"Turn to adjust the Higher Mids Frequency for the current selected channel.")
    set_control_help($fx_eq_hmg,"Turn to adjust the Higher Mids Gain for the current selected channel.")
    set_control_help($fx_eq_hmq,"Turn to adjust the Higher Mids Q-Factor for the current selected channel.")
    set_control_help($fx_eq_hf,"Turn to adjust the Lowpass Frequency for the current selected channel.")
    set_control_help($fx_eq_hg,"Turn to adjust the Lowpass Gain for the current selected channel.")
    set_control_help($fx_eq_hb,"Click to switch the mode of the Lowpass between Bell and Cut for the current selected channel.")
    set_control_help($fx_td_in,"Turn to adjust the Input Level of the Transient Designer for the current selected channel.")
    set_control_help($fx_td_atk,"Turn to adjust the Attack of the Transient Designer for the current selected channel.")
    set_control_help($fx_td_rel,"Turn to adjust the Release of the Transient Designer for the current selected channel.")
    set_control_help($fx_td_out,"Turn to adjust the Output Level of the Transient Designer for the current selected channel.")
    set_control_help($fx_comp_tres,"Turn to adjust the Treshold Level of the Compressor for the current selected channel.")
    set_control_help($fx_comp_rat,"Turn to adjust the Compression Radio of the Compressor for the current selected channel.")
    set_control_help($fx_comp_atk,"Turn to adjust the Attack of the Compressor for the current selected channel.")
    set_control_help($fx_comp_rel,"Turn to adjust the Release of the Compressor for the current selected channel.")
    set_control_help($fx_comp_makeup,"Turn to adjust the Make Up Level of the Compressor for the current selected channel.")
    set_control_help($fx_comp_mix,"Turn to level between compressed und uncompressed signal for the current selected channel.")
    set_control_help($fx_eq_reset,"Click to reset all parameters of the Equalizer. After the reset the button displays 'Last edit' which lets you jump back to your previous configuration. As soon as you change any parameter of the Equalizer this button switches back to 'Reset'.")
    set_control_help($fx_td_reset,"Click to reset all parameters of the Transient Designer. After the reset the button displays 'Last edit' which lets you jump back to your previous configuration. As soon as you change any parameter of the Transient Designer this button switches back to 'Reset'.")
    set_control_help($fx_td_soft,"Click to achieve a smoother sound for the Transient Designer.")
    set_control_help($fx_comp_reset,"Click to reset all parameters of the Compressor. After the reset the button displays 'Last edit' which lets you jump back to your previous configuration. As soon as you change any parameter of the Compressor this button switches back to 'Reset'.")
    set_control_help($mic_gallery_select1,"Click to switch the microphone for the current selected channel. Click a second time to jump back to the Drumset Overview.")
    set_control_help($mic_gallery_select2,"Click to switch the microphone for the current selected channel. Click a second time to jump back to the Drumset Overview.")
    set_control_help($mic_gallery_select3,"Click to switch the microphone for the current selected channel. Click a second time to jump back to the Drumset Overview.")
    set_control_help($mic_gallery_select4,"Click to switch the microphone for the current selected channel. Click a second time to jump back to the Drumset Overview.")
    set_control_help($mic_0db,"Click to hear the current selected channel at a Volume of 0dB.")
    set_control_help($mic_solo,"Click to hear the current selected channel solo.")
    set_control_help($mic_dry,"Click to mute EQ, Transient Designer, Compressor and Reverb for the current selected channel.")
    set_control_help(%options_table_vel,"Click and draw to change the Velocity Curve.")
    set_control_help($options_velcurve_linear,"Click to switch the Velocity Curve to Linear.")
    set_control_help($options_velcurve_degressive,"Click to switch the Velocity Curve to Degressive.")
    set_control_help($options_velcurve_progressive,"Click to switch the Velocity Curve to Progressive.")
    set_control_help($options_wires_snbtm,"Turn to adjust the amount of Snare Bleed (How loud you hear the resonating snare wires when you hit a Tom or the BassDrum).  ")
    set_control_help($options_credits,"Click to have a look at the people who created the Drum Mic'a")
    set_control_help($options_mapping_gm,"Click to switch the Midi Mapping to 'General Midi'.")
    set_control_help($options_mapping_vdrum1,"Click to switch the Midi Mapping to 'V-Drums TD-12'.")
    set_control_help($options_mapping_vdrum2,"Click to switch the Midi Mapping to 'V-Drums TD-3/6'.")
    set_control_help($options_mapping_ez,"Click to switch the Midi Mapping to 'EZ Drummer'.")
    set_control_help($options_mapping_superior,"Click to switch the Midi Mapping to 'Superior Drummer'.")
    set_control_help($options_mapping_addictive,"Click to switch the Midi Mapping to 'Addictive Drums'.")
    set_control_help($options_mapping_bfd,"Click to switch the Midi Mapping to 'BFD'.")
    set_control_help($mix_bdo_phase,"Click to switch the phase of the BassDrum (outside) channel.")
    set_control_help($mix_snbt_phase,"Click to switch the phase of the Snare (bottom) channel.")

end on {init}

function load_file
    $old_play := $menu_play
    $processing_flag := 1
    note_off($ALL_EVENTS)
    fade_out($ALL_EVENTS,5000,1)
    while ($play_flag=1)
        wait(1000)
    end while
    $load_mf_id := load_midi_file(@file_path)
    while ($load_mf_id # -1)
        wait(1000)
    end while
    $i := 0
    while ($i<=127)
        %mapping_correct[$i] := pgs_get_key_val(CURRENTMAPPING,$i)
        inc($i)
    end while
    mf_get_first($track_idx)
    $count_1 := 0
    while (mf_get_command() # 0)
        %event_array_1[$count_1*5] := mf_get_pos()
        %event_array_1[$count_1*5+1] := mf_get_command()
        $note_mapped := %mapping_correct[mf_get_byte_one()]
        %event_array_1[$count_1*5+2] := $note_mapped
        mf_set_byte_one($note_mapped)
        %event_array_1[$count_1*5+3] := mf_get_byte_two()
        %event_array_1[$count_1*5+4] := -1
        inc($count_1)
        mf_get_next($track_idx)
    end while
    $mf_num_events := $count_1
    mf_get_last($track_idx)
    $mf_length_1 := ((mf_get_pos()-1)/960+1)*960
    $count_1 := 0
    while ($count_1<$mf_num_events)
        if (%event_array_1[$count_1*5+1]=$MIDI_COMMAND_NOTE_ON and (%event_array_1[$count_1*5+3] # 0))
            $count_2 := $count_1+1
            while ($count_2<$mf_num_events)
                if ((%event_array_1[$count_2*5+1]=$MIDI_COMMAND_NOTE_OFF or (%event_array_1[$count_2*5+1]=$MIDI_COMMAND_NOTE_ON and (%event_array_1[$count_2*5+3]=0))) and (%event_array_1[$count_2*5+2]=%event_array_1[$count_1*5+2]) and (%event_array_1[$count_2*5+4]=-1))
                    %event_array_1[$count_1*5+4] := $count_2
                    %event_array_1[$count_2*5+4] := $count_1
                    if (%event_array_1[$count_1*5]=%event_array_1[$count_2*5])
                        inc(%event_array_1[$count_2*5])
                    end if
                    $count_2 := $mf_num_events
                end if
                wait(10)
                inc($count_2)
            end while
        end if
        wait(1)
        inc($count_1)
    end while
    $menu_play := $old_play
    $processing_flag := 0
end function

function init_event_array
    $count_1 := 0
    while ($count_1<($mf_num_events*5+4))
        %event_array_2[$count_1] := %event_array_1[$count_1]
        wait(1)
        inc($count_1)
    end while
    $mf_length_2 := $mf_length_1
end function

function unselect_all_channels
    $i := 0
    while ($i<=9)
        set_control_par(%select_ui_ids[$i],$CONTROL_PAR_VALUE,0)
        inc($i)
    end while
end function

function reset_mic_0db
    if ($mic_current=1 and (%vol_buffer[1]=0))
        $mic_0db := 0
    else
    if ($mic_current=2 and (%vol_buffer[2]=0))
        $mic_0db := 0
    else
    if ($mic_current=3 and (%vol_buffer[3]=0))
        $mic_0db := 0
    else
    if ($mic_current=4 and (%vol_buffer[4]=0))
        $mic_0db := 0
    else
    if ($mic_current=5 and (%vol_buffer[5]=0))
        $mic_0db := 0
    else
    if ($mic_current=6 and (%vol_buffer[6]=0))
        $mic_0db := 0
    else
    if ($mic_current=7 and (%vol_buffer[7]=0))
        $mic_0db := 0
    else
    if ($mic_current=8 and (%vol_buffer[8]=0))
        $mic_0db := 0
    else
    if ($mic_current=9 and (%vol_buffer[9]=0))
        $mic_0db := 0
    end if
    end if
    end if
    end if
    end if
    end if
    end if
    end if
    end if
end function

function update_mic_pictures
    if ($mic_current=1)
        $anz_mikros := 4
        set_control_par_str(get_ui_id($mic_gallery_select1),$CONTROL_PAR_PICTURE,!pic_select1_hh[1])
        set_control_par_str(get_ui_id($mic_gallery_select2),$CONTROL_PAR_PICTURE,!pic_select1_hh[2])
        set_control_par_str(get_ui_id($mic_gallery_select3),$CONTROL_PAR_PICTURE,!pic_select1_hh[3])
        set_control_par_str(get_ui_id($mic_gallery_select4),$CONTROL_PAR_PICTURE,!pic_select1_hh[4])
        if ($drums_hh_mic_current=1)
            set_control_par_str(get_ui_id($mic_img_current),$CONTROL_PAR_PICTURE,!pic_close_hh[1])
            $mic_gallery_select1 := 1
            $mic_gallery_select2 := 0
            $mic_gallery_select3 := 0
            $mic_gallery_select4 := 0
        else
        if ($drums_hh_mic_current=2)
            set_control_par_str(get_ui_id($mic_img_current),$CONTROL_PAR_PICTURE,!pic_close_hh[2])
            $mic_gallery_select1 := 0
            $mic_gallery_select2 := 1
            $mic_gallery_select3 := 0
            $mic_gallery_select4 := 0
        else
        if ($drums_hh_mic_current=3)
            set_control_par_str(get_ui_id($mic_img_current),$CONTROL_PAR_PICTURE,!pic_close_hh[3])
            $mic_gallery_select1 := 0
            $mic_gallery_select2 := 0
            $mic_gallery_select3 := 1
            $mic_gallery_select4 := 0
        else
        if ($drums_hh_mic_current=4)
            set_control_par_str(get_ui_id($mic_img_current),$CONTROL_PAR_PICTURE,!pic_close_hh[4])
            $mic_gallery_select1 := 0
            $mic_gallery_select2 := 0
            $mic_gallery_select3 := 0
            $mic_gallery_select4 := 1
        end if
        end if
        end if
        end if
        if ($mix_hh_solo=1)
            $mic_solo := 1
        else
        if ($mix_hh_solo=0)
            $mic_solo := 0
            if ($anysolo # 0 and (%solo_arr[0]=0))
                set_control_par_str(get_ui_id($mic_solo),$CONTROL_PAR_PICTURE,"dm_btn_blanssc")
            else
            if (%solo_arr[0] # 0 or ($anysolo=0))
                set_control_par_str(get_ui_id($mic_solo),$CONTROL_PAR_PICTURE,"dm_btn_solo")
            end if
            end if
        end if
        end if
        if ($mix_hh_dry=1)
            $mic_dry := 1
        else
        if ($mix_hh_dry=0)
            $mic_dry := 0
        end if
        end if
    else
    if ($mic_current=2)
        $anz_mikros := 3
        set_control_par_str(get_ui_id($mic_gallery_select1),$CONTROL_PAR_PICTURE,!pic_select1_bdi[1])
        set_control_par_str(get_ui_id($mic_gallery_select2),$CONTROL_PAR_PICTURE,!pic_select1_bdi[2])
        set_control_par_str(get_ui_id($mic_gallery_select3),$CONTROL_PAR_PICTURE,!pic_select1_bdi[3])
        set_control_par(get_ui_id($mic_gallery_select4),$CONTROL_PAR_HIDE,$HIDE_WHOLE_CONTROL)
        if ($drums_bdi_mic_current=1)
            set_control_par_str(get_ui_id($mic_img_current),$CONTROL_PAR_PICTURE,!pic_close_bdi[1])
            $mic_gallery_select1 := 1
            $mic_gallery_select2 := 0
            $mic_gallery_select3 := 0
        else
        if ($drums_bdi_mic_current=2)
            set_control_par_str(get_ui_id($mic_img_current),$CONTROL_PAR_PICTURE,!pic_close_bdi[2])
            $mic_gallery_select1 := 0
            $mic_gallery_select2 := 1
            $mic_gallery_select3 := 0
        else
        if ($drums_bdi_mic_current=3)
            set_control_par_str(get_ui_id($mic_img_current),$CONTROL_PAR_PICTURE,!pic_close_bdi[3])
            $mic_gallery_select1 := 0
            $mic_gallery_select2 := 0
            $mic_gallery_select3 := 1
        end if
        end if
        end if
        if ($mix_bdi_solo=1)
            $mic_solo := 1
        else
        if ($mix_bdi_solo=0)
            $mic_solo := 0
            if ($anysolo # 0 and (%solo_arr[1]=0))
                set_control_par_str(get_ui_id($mic_solo),$CONTROL_PAR_PICTURE,"dm_btn_blanssc")
            else
            if (%solo_arr[1] # 0 or ($anysolo=0))
                set_control_par_str(get_ui_id($mic_solo),$CONTROL_PAR_PICTURE,"dm_btn_solo")
            end if
            end if
        end if
        end if
        if ($mix_bdi_dry=1)
            $mic_dry := 1
        else
        if ($mix_bdi_dry=0)
            $mic_dry := 0
        end if
        end if
    else
    if ($mic_current=3)
        $anz_mikros := 2
        set_control_par_str(get_ui_id($mic_gallery_select1),$CONTROL_PAR_PICTURE,!pic_select1_bdo[1])
        set_control_par_str(get_ui_id($mic_gallery_select2),$CONTROL_PAR_PICTURE,!pic_select1_bdo[2])
        set_control_par(get_ui_id($mic_gallery_select3),$CONTROL_PAR_HIDE,$HIDE_WHOLE_CONTROL)
        set_control_par(get_ui_id($mic_gallery_select4),$CONTROL_PAR_HIDE,$HIDE_WHOLE_CONTROL)
        if ($drums_bdo_mic_current=1)
            set_control_par_str(get_ui_id($mic_img_current),$CONTROL_PAR_PICTURE,!pic_close_bdo[1])
            $mic_gallery_select1 := 1
            $mic_gallery_select2 := 0
        else
        if ($drums_bdo_mic_current=2)
            set_control_par_str(get_ui_id($mic_img_current),$CONTROL_PAR_PICTURE,!pic_close_bdo[2])
            $mic_gallery_select1 := 0
            $mic_gallery_select2 := 1
        end if
        end if
        if ($mix_bdo_solo=1)
            $mic_solo := 1
        else
        if ($mix_bdo_solo=0)
            $mic_solo := 0
            if ($anysolo # 0 and (%solo_arr[2]=0))
                set_control_par_str(get_ui_id($mic_solo),$CONTROL_PAR_PICTURE,"dm_btn_blanssc")
            else
            if (%solo_arr[2] # 0 or ($anysolo=0))
                set_control_par_str(get_ui_id($mic_solo),$CONTROL_PAR_PICTURE,"dm_btn_solo")
            end if
            end if
        end if
        end if
        if ($mix_bdo_dry=1)
            $mic_dry := 1
        else
        if ($mix_bdo_dry=0)
            $mic_dry := 0
        end if
        end if
    else
    if ($mic_current=4)
        $anz_mikros := 3
        set_control_par_str(get_ui_id($mic_gallery_select1),$CONTROL_PAR_PICTURE,!pic_select1_sntop[1])
        set_control_par_str(get_ui_id($mic_gallery_select2),$CONTROL_PAR_PICTURE,!pic_select1_sntop[2])
        set_control_par_str(get_ui_id($mic_gallery_select3),$CONTROL_PAR_PICTURE,!pic_select1_sntop[3])
        set_control_par(get_ui_id($mic_gallery_select4),$CONTROL_PAR_HIDE,$HIDE_WHOLE_CONTROL)
        if ($drums_sntop_mic_current=1)
            set_control_par_str(get_ui_id($mic_img_current),$CONTROL_PAR_PICTURE,!pic_close_sntop[1])
            $mic_gallery_select1 := 1
            $mic_gallery_select2 := 0
            $mic_gallery_select3 := 0
        else
        if ($drums_sntop_mic_current=2)
            set_control_par_str(get_ui_id($mic_img_current),$CONTROL_PAR_PICTURE,!pic_close_sntop[2])
            $mic_gallery_select1 := 0
            $mic_gallery_select2 := 1
            $mic_gallery_select3 := 0
        else
        if ($drums_sntop_mic_current=3)
            set_control_par_str(get_ui_id($mic_img_current),$CONTROL_PAR_PICTURE,!pic_close_sntop[3])
            $mic_gallery_select1 := 0
            $mic_gallery_select2 := 0
            $mic_gallery_select3 := 1
        end if
        end if
        end if
        if ($mix_sntop_solo=1)
            $mic_solo := 1
        else
        if ($mix_sntop_solo=0)
            $mic_solo := 0
            if ($anysolo # 0 and (%solo_arr[3]=0))
                set_control_par_str(get_ui_id($mic_solo),$CONTROL_PAR_PICTURE,"dm_btn_blanssc")
            else
            if (%solo_arr[3] # 0 or ($anysolo=0))
                set_control_par_str(get_ui_id($mic_solo),$CONTROL_PAR_PICTURE,"dm_btn_solo")
            end if
            end if
        end if
        end if
        if ($mix_sntop_dry=1)
            $mic_dry := 1
        else
        if ($mix_sntop_dry=0)
            $mic_dry := 0
        end if
        end if
    else
    if ($mic_current=5)
        $anz_mikros := 2
        set_control_par_str(get_ui_id($mic_gallery_select1),$CONTROL_PAR_PICTURE,!pic_select1_snbt[1])
        set_control_par_str(get_ui_id($mic_gallery_select2),$CONTROL_PAR_PICTURE,!pic_select1_snbt[2])
        set_control_par(get_ui_id($mic_gallery_select3),$CONTROL_PAR_HIDE,$HIDE_WHOLE_CONTROL)
        set_control_par(get_ui_id($mic_gallery_select4),$CONTROL_PAR_HIDE,$HIDE_WHOLE_CONTROL)
        if ($drums_snbt_mic_current=1)
            set_control_par_str(get_ui_id($mic_img_current),$CONTROL_PAR_PICTURE,!pic_close_snbt[1])
            $mic_gallery_select1 := 1
            $mic_gallery_select2 := 0
        else
        if ($drums_snbt_mic_current=2)
            set_control_par_str(get_ui_id($mic_img_current),$CONTROL_PAR_PICTURE,!pic_close_snbt[2])
            $mic_gallery_select1 := 0
            $mic_gallery_select2 := 1
        end if
        end if
        if ($mix_snbt_solo=1)
            $mic_solo := 1
        else
        if ($mix_snbt_solo=0)
            $mic_solo := 0
            if ($anysolo # 0 and (%solo_arr[4]=0))
                set_control_par_str(get_ui_id($mic_solo),$CONTROL_PAR_PICTURE,"dm_btn_blanssc")
            else
            if (%solo_arr[4] # 0 or ($anysolo=0))
                set_control_par_str(get_ui_id($mic_solo),$CONTROL_PAR_PICTURE,"dm_btn_solo")
            end if
            end if
        end if
        end if
        if ($mix_snbt_dry=1)
            $mic_dry := 1
        else
        if ($mix_snbt_dry=0)
            $mic_dry := 0
        end if
        end if
    else
    if ($mic_current=6)
        $anz_mikros := 3
        set_control_par_str(get_ui_id($mic_gallery_select1),$CONTROL_PAR_PICTURE,!pic_select1_tomhi[1])
        set_control_par_str(get_ui_id($mic_gallery_select2),$CONTROL_PAR_PICTURE,!pic_select1_tomhi[2])
        set_control_par_str(get_ui_id($mic_gallery_select3),$CONTROL_PAR_PICTURE,!pic_select1_tomhi[3])
        set_control_par(get_ui_id($mic_gallery_select4),$CONTROL_PAR_HIDE,$HIDE_WHOLE_CONTROL)
        if ($drums_tomhi_mic_current=1)
            set_control_par_str(get_ui_id($mic_img_current),$CONTROL_PAR_PICTURE,!pic_close_tomhi[1])
            $mic_gallery_select1 := 1
            $mic_gallery_select2 := 0
            $mic_gallery_select3 := 0
        else
        if ($drums_tomhi_mic_current=2)
            set_control_par_str(get_ui_id($mic_img_current),$CONTROL_PAR_PICTURE,!pic_close_tomhi[2])
            $mic_gallery_select1 := 0
            $mic_gallery_select2 := 1
            $mic_gallery_select3 := 0
        else
        if ($drums_tomhi_mic_current=3)
            set_control_par_str(get_ui_id($mic_img_current),$CONTROL_PAR_PICTURE,!pic_close_tomhi[3])
            $mic_gallery_select1 := 0
            $mic_gallery_select2 := 0
            $mic_gallery_select3 := 1
        end if
        end if
        end if
        if ($mix_tomhi_solo=1)
            $mic_solo := 1
        else
        if ($mix_tomhi_solo=0)
            $mic_solo := 0
            if ($anysolo # 0 and (%solo_arr[5]=0))
                set_control_par_str(get_ui_id($mic_solo),$CONTROL_PAR_PICTURE,"dm_btn_blanssc")
            else
            if (%solo_arr[5] # 0 or ($anysolo=0))
                set_control_par_str(get_ui_id($mic_solo),$CONTROL_PAR_PICTURE,"dm_btn_solo")
            end if
            end if
        end if
        end if
        if ($mix_tomhi_dry=1)
            $mic_dry := 1
        else
        if ($mix_tomhi_dry=0)
            $mic_dry := 0
        end if
        end if
    else
    if ($mic_current=7)
        $anz_mikros := 3
        set_control_par_str(get_ui_id($mic_gallery_select1),$CONTROL_PAR_PICTURE,!pic_select1_tommid[1])
        set_control_par_str(get_ui_id($mic_gallery_select2),$CONTROL_PAR_PICTURE,!pic_select1_tommid[2])
        set_control_par_str(get_ui_id($mic_gallery_select3),$CONTROL_PAR_PICTURE,!pic_select1_tommid[3])
        set_control_par(get_ui_id($mic_gallery_select4),$CONTROL_PAR_HIDE,$HIDE_WHOLE_CONTROL)
        if ($drums_tommid_mic_current=1)
            set_control_par_str(get_ui_id($mic_img_current),$CONTROL_PAR_PICTURE,!pic_close_tommid[1])
            $mic_gallery_select1 := 1
            $mic_gallery_select2 := 0
            $mic_gallery_select3 := 0
        else
        if ($drums_tommid_mic_current=2)
            set_control_par_str(get_ui_id($mic_img_current),$CONTROL_PAR_PICTURE,!pic_close_tommid[2])
            $mic_gallery_select1 := 0
            $mic_gallery_select2 := 1
            $mic_gallery_select3 := 0
        else
        if ($drums_tommid_mic_current=3)
            set_control_par_str(get_ui_id($mic_img_current),$CONTROL_PAR_PICTURE,!pic_close_tommid[3])
            $mic_gallery_select1 := 0
            $mic_gallery_select2 := 0
            $mic_gallery_select3 := 1
        end if
        end if
        end if
        if ($mix_tommid_solo=1)
            $mic_solo := 1
        else
        if ($mix_tommid_solo=0)
            $mic_solo := 0
            if ($anysolo # 0 and (%solo_arr[6]=0))
                set_control_par_str(get_ui_id($mic_solo),$CONTROL_PAR_PICTURE,"dm_btn_blanssc")
            else
            if (%solo_arr[6] # 0 or ($anysolo=0))
                set_control_par_str(get_ui_id($mic_solo),$CONTROL_PAR_PICTURE,"dm_btn_solo")
            end if
            end if
        end if
        end if
        if ($mix_tommid_dry=1)
            $mic_dry := 1
        else
        if ($mix_tommid_dry=0)
            $mic_dry := 0
        end if
        end if
    else
    if ($mic_current=8)
        $anz_mikros := 3
        set_control_par_str(get_ui_id($mic_gallery_select1),$CONTROL_PAR_PICTURE,!pic_select1_tomlow[1])
        set_control_par_str(get_ui_id($mic_gallery_select2),$CONTROL_PAR_PICTURE,!pic_select1_tomlow[2])
        set_control_par_str(get_ui_id($mic_gallery_select3),$CONTROL_PAR_PICTURE,!pic_select1_tomlow[3])
        set_control_par(get_ui_id($mic_gallery_select4),$CONTROL_PAR_HIDE,$HIDE_WHOLE_CONTROL)
        if ($drums_tomlow_mic_current=1)
            set_control_par_str(get_ui_id($mic_img_current),$CONTROL_PAR_PICTURE,!pic_close_tomlow[1])
            $mic_gallery_select1 := 1
            $mic_gallery_select2 := 0
            $mic_gallery_select3 := 0
        else
        if ($drums_tomlow_mic_current=2)
            set_control_par_str(get_ui_id($mic_img_current),$CONTROL_PAR_PICTURE,!pic_close_tomlow[2])
            $mic_gallery_select1 := 0
            $mic_gallery_select2 := 1
            $mic_gallery_select3 := 0
        else
        if ($drums_tomlow_mic_current=3)
            set_control_par_str(get_ui_id($mic_img_current),$CONTROL_PAR_PICTURE,!pic_close_tomlow[3])
            $mic_gallery_select1 := 0
            $mic_gallery_select2 := 0
            $mic_gallery_select3 := 1
        end if
        end if
        end if
        if ($mix_tomlow_solo=1)
            $mic_solo := 1
        else
        if ($mix_tomlow_solo=0)
            $mic_solo := 0
            if ($anysolo # 0 and (%solo_arr[7]=0))
                set_control_par_str(get_ui_id($mic_solo),$CONTROL_PAR_PICTURE,"dm_btn_blanssc")
            else
            if (%solo_arr[7] # 0 or ($anysolo=0))
                set_control_par_str(get_ui_id($mic_solo),$CONTROL_PAR_PICTURE,"dm_btn_solo")
            end if
            end if
        end if
        end if
        if ($mix_tomlow_dry=1)
            $mic_dry := 1
        else
        if ($mix_tomlow_dry=0)
            $mic_dry := 0
        end if
        end if
    else
    if ($mic_current=9)
        $anz_mikros := 4
        set_control_par_str(get_ui_id($mic_gallery_select1),$CONTROL_PAR_PICTURE,!pic_select1_ov[1])
        set_control_par_str(get_ui_id($mic_gallery_select2),$CONTROL_PAR_PICTURE,!pic_select1_ov[2])
        set_control_par_str(get_ui_id($mic_gallery_select3),$CONTROL_PAR_PICTURE,!pic_select1_ov[3])
        set_control_par_str(get_ui_id($mic_gallery_select4),$CONTROL_PAR_PICTURE,!pic_select1_ov[4])
        if ($drums_ov_mic_current=1)
            set_control_par_str(get_ui_id($mic_img_current),$CONTROL_PAR_PICTURE,!pic_close_ov[1])
            $mic_gallery_select1 := 1
            $mic_gallery_select2 := 0
            $mic_gallery_select3 := 0
            $mic_gallery_select4 := 0
        else
        if ($drums_ov_mic_current=2)
            set_control_par_str(get_ui_id($mic_img_current),$CONTROL_PAR_PICTURE,!pic_close_ov[2])
            $mic_gallery_select1 := 0
            $mic_gallery_select2 := 1
            $mic_gallery_select3 := 0
            $mic_gallery_select4 := 0
        else
        if ($drums_ov_mic_current=3)
            set_control_par_str(get_ui_id($mic_img_current),$CONTROL_PAR_PICTURE,!pic_close_ov[3])
            $mic_gallery_select1 := 0
            $mic_gallery_select2 := 0
            $mic_gallery_select3 := 1
            $mic_gallery_select4 := 0
        else
        if ($drums_ov_mic_current=4)
            set_control_par_str(get_ui_id($mic_img_current),$CONTROL_PAR_PICTURE,!pic_close_ov[4])
            $mic_gallery_select1 := 0
            $mic_gallery_select2 := 0
            $mic_gallery_select3 := 0
            $mic_gallery_select4 := 1
        end if
        end if
        end if
        end if
        if ($mix_ov_solo=1)
            $mic_solo := 1
        else
        if ($mix_ov_solo=0)
            $mic_solo := 0
            if ($anysolo # 0 and (%solo_arr[8]=0))
                set_control_par_str(get_ui_id($mic_solo),$CONTROL_PAR_PICTURE,"dm_btn_blanssc")
            else
            if (%solo_arr[8] # 0 or ($anysolo=0))
                set_control_par_str(get_ui_id($mic_solo),$CONTROL_PAR_PICTURE,"dm_btn_solo")
            end if
            end if
        end if
        end if
        if ($mix_ov_dry=1)
            $mic_dry := 1
        else
        if ($mix_ov_dry=0)
            $mic_dry := 0
        end if
        end if
    end if {($mic_current=9)}
    end if {($mic_current=8)}
    end if {($mic_current=7)}
    end if {($mic_current=6)}
    end if {($mic_current=5)}
    end if {($mic_current=4)}
    end if {($mic_current=3)}
    end if {($mic_current=2)}
    end if {($mic_current=1)}
end function

function update_mic_fader_labels
    if ($drums_hh_mic_current=1)
        set_control_par_str(get_ui_id($mix_hh_miclabel),$CONTROL_PAR_PICTURE,"dm_label_mix_mic_km184")
        set_control_par_str(get_ui_id($mix_hh_vol),$CONTROL_PAR_PICTURE,"mixer_fader_neumann")
    else
    if ($drums_hh_mic_current=2)
        set_control_par_str(get_ui_id($mix_hh_miclabel),$CONTROL_PAR_PICTURE,"dm_label_mix_e914")
        set_control_par_str(get_ui_id($mix_hh_vol),$CONTROL_PAR_PICTURE,"mixer_fader_sennheiser")
    else
    if ($drums_hh_mic_current=3)
        set_control_par_str(get_ui_id($mix_hh_miclabel),$CONTROL_PAR_PICTURE,"dm_label_mix_mkh8040")
        set_control_par_str(get_ui_id($mix_hh_vol),$CONTROL_PAR_PICTURE,"mixer_fader_sennheiser")
    else
    if ($drums_hh_mic_current=4)
        set_control_par_str(get_ui_id($mix_hh_miclabel),$CONTROL_PAR_PICTURE,"dm_label_mix_mk4")
        set_control_par_str(get_ui_id($mix_hh_vol),$CONTROL_PAR_PICTURE,"mixer_fader_sennheiser")
    end if
    end if
    end if
    end if
    if ($drums_bdi_mic_current=1)
        set_control_par_str(get_ui_id($mix_bdi_miclabel),$CONTROL_PAR_PICTURE,"dm_label_mix_e901")
        set_control_par_str(get_ui_id($mix_bdi_vol),$CONTROL_PAR_PICTURE,"mixer_fader_sennheiser")
    else
    if ($drums_bdi_mic_current=2)
        set_control_par_str(get_ui_id($mix_bdi_miclabel),$CONTROL_PAR_PICTURE,"dm_label_mix_md421")
        set_control_par_str(get_ui_id($mix_bdi_vol),$CONTROL_PAR_PICTURE,"mixer_fader_sennheiser")
    else
    if ($drums_bdi_mic_current=3)
        set_control_par_str(get_ui_id($mix_bdi_miclabel),$CONTROL_PAR_PICTURE,"dm_label_mix_e902")
        set_control_par_str(get_ui_id($mix_bdi_vol),$CONTROL_PAR_PICTURE,"mixer_fader_sennheiser")
    end if
    end if
    end if
    if ($drums_bdo_mic_current=1)
        set_control_par_str(get_ui_id($mix_bdo_miclabel),$CONTROL_PAR_PICTURE,"dm_label_mix_tlm1070r")
        set_control_par_str(get_ui_id($mix_bdo_vol),$CONTROL_PAR_PICTURE,"mixer_fader_neumann")
    else
    if ($drums_bdo_mic_current=2)
        set_control_par_str(get_ui_id($mix_bdo_miclabel),$CONTROL_PAR_PICTURE,"dm_label_mix_d01")
        set_control_par_str(get_ui_id($mix_bdo_vol),$CONTROL_PAR_PICTURE,"mixer_fader_neumann")
    end if
    end if
    if ($drums_sntop_mic_current=1)
        set_control_par_str(get_ui_id($mix_sntop_miclabel),$CONTROL_PAR_PICTURE,"dm_label_mix_md441")
        set_control_par_str(get_ui_id($mix_sntop_vol),$CONTROL_PAR_PICTURE,"mixer_fader_sennheiser")
    else
    if ($drums_sntop_mic_current=2)
        set_control_par_str(get_ui_id($mix_sntop_miclabel),$CONTROL_PAR_PICTURE,"dm_label_mix_e904")
        set_control_par_str(get_ui_id($mix_sntop_vol),$CONTROL_PAR_PICTURE,"mixer_fader_sennheiser")
    else
    if ($drums_sntop_mic_current=3)
        set_control_par_str(get_ui_id($mix_sntop_miclabel),$CONTROL_PAR_PICTURE,"dm_label_mix_mic_km184")
        set_control_par_str(get_ui_id($mix_sntop_vol),$CONTROL_PAR_PICTURE,"mixer_fader_neumann")
    end if
    end if
    end if
    if ($drums_snbt_mic_current=1)
        set_control_par_str(get_ui_id($mix_snbt_miclabel),$CONTROL_PAR_PICTURE,"dm_label_mix_e906")
        set_control_par_str(get_ui_id($mix_snbt_vol),$CONTROL_PAR_PICTURE,"mixer_fader_sennheiser")
    else
    if ($drums_snbt_mic_current=2)
        set_control_par_str(get_ui_id($mix_snbt_miclabel),$CONTROL_PAR_PICTURE,"dm_label_mix_mic_km184")
        set_control_par_str(get_ui_id($mix_snbt_vol),$CONTROL_PAR_PICTURE,"mixer_fader_neumann")
    end if
    end if
    if ($drums_tomhi_mic_current=1)
        set_control_par_str(get_ui_id($mix_tomhi_miclabel),$CONTROL_PAR_PICTURE,"dm_label_mix_e904")
        set_control_par_str(get_ui_id($mix_tomhi_vol),$CONTROL_PAR_PICTURE,"mixer_fader_sennheiser")
    else
    if ($drums_tomhi_mic_current=2)
        set_control_par_str(get_ui_id($mix_tomhi_miclabel),$CONTROL_PAR_PICTURE,"dm_label_mix_md421")
        set_control_par_str(get_ui_id($mix_tomhi_vol),$CONTROL_PAR_PICTURE,"mixer_fader_sennheiser")
    else
    if ($drums_tomhi_mic_current=3)
        set_control_par_str(get_ui_id($mix_tomhi_miclabel),$CONTROL_PAR_PICTURE,"dm_label_mix_u87")
        set_control_par_str(get_ui_id($mix_tomhi_vol),$CONTROL_PAR_PICTURE,"mixer_fader_neumann")
    end if
    end if
    end if
    if ($drums_tommid_mic_current=1)
        set_control_par_str(get_ui_id($mix_tommid_miclabel),$CONTROL_PAR_PICTURE,"dm_label_mix_e904")
        set_control_par_str(get_ui_id($mix_tommid_vol),$CONTROL_PAR_PICTURE,"mixer_fader_sennheiser")
    else
    if ($drums_tommid_mic_current=2)
        set_control_par_str(get_ui_id($mix_tommid_miclabel),$CONTROL_PAR_PICTURE,"dm_label_mix_md421")
        set_control_par_str(get_ui_id($mix_tommid_vol),$CONTROL_PAR_PICTURE,"mixer_fader_sennheiser")
    else
    if ($drums_tommid_mic_current=3)
        set_control_par_str(get_ui_id($mix_tommid_miclabel),$CONTROL_PAR_PICTURE,"dm_label_mix_u87")
        set_control_par_str(get_ui_id($mix_tommid_vol),$CONTROL_PAR_PICTURE,"mixer_fader_neumann")
    end if
    end if
    end if
    if ($drums_tomlow_mic_current=1)
        set_control_par_str(get_ui_id($mix_tomlow_miclabel),$CONTROL_PAR_PICTURE,"dm_label_mix_e904")
        set_control_par_str(get_ui_id($mix_tomlow_vol),$CONTROL_PAR_PICTURE,"mixer_fader_sennheiser")
    else
    if ($drums_tomlow_mic_current=2)
        set_control_par_str(get_ui_id($mix_tomlow_miclabel),$CONTROL_PAR_PICTURE,"dm_label_mix_md421")
        set_control_par_str(get_ui_id($mix_tomlow_vol),$CONTROL_PAR_PICTURE,"mixer_fader_sennheiser")
    else
    if ($drums_tomlow_mic_current=3)
        set_control_par_str(get_ui_id($mix_tomlow_miclabel),$CONTROL_PAR_PICTURE,"dm_label_mix_u87")
        set_control_par_str(get_ui_id($mix_tomlow_vol),$CONTROL_PAR_PICTURE,"mixer_fader_neumann")
    end if
    end if
    end if
    if ($drums_ov_mic_current=1)
        set_control_par_str(get_ui_id($mix_ov_miclabel),$CONTROL_PAR_PICTURE,"dm_label_mix_e914")
        set_control_par_str(get_ui_id($mix_ov_vol),$CONTROL_PAR_PICTURE,"mixer_fader_sennheiser")
    else
    if ($drums_ov_mic_current=2)
        set_control_par_str(get_ui_id($mix_ov_miclabel),$CONTROL_PAR_PICTURE,"dm_label_mix_mic_km184")
        set_control_par_str(get_ui_id($mix_ov_vol),$CONTROL_PAR_PICTURE,"mixer_fader_neumann")
    else
    if ($drums_ov_mic_current=3)
        set_control_par_str(get_ui_id($mix_ov_miclabel),$CONTROL_PAR_PICTURE,"dm_label_mix_usm69i")
        set_control_par_str(get_ui_id($mix_ov_vol),$CONTROL_PAR_PICTURE,"mixer_fader_neumann")
    else
    if ($drums_ov_mic_current=4)
        set_control_par_str(get_ui_id($mix_ov_miclabel),$CONTROL_PAR_PICTURE,"dm_label_mix_mkh800")
        set_control_par_str(get_ui_id($mix_ov_vol),$CONTROL_PAR_PICTURE,"mixer_fader_sennheiser")
    end if
    end if
    end if
    end if
end function

function fx_eq_td_comp_reset
    if ($fx_eq_reset=1)
        $fx_eq_reset := 0
    end if
    if ($fx_td_reset=1)
        $fx_td_reset := 0
    end if
    if ($fx_comp_reset=1)
        $fx_comp_reset := 0
    end if
end function

function hide_all_controls
    $i := 1
    while ($i<=$id2)
        set_control_par(%ui_id2[$i],$CONTROL_PAR_HIDE,$HIDE_WHOLE_CONTROL)
        inc($i)
    end while
    $i := 1
    while ($i<=$id21)
        set_control_par(%ui_id21[$i],$CONTROL_PAR_HIDE,$HIDE_WHOLE_CONTROL)
        inc($i)
    end while
    $i := 1
    while ($i<=$id22)
        set_control_par(%ui_id22[$i],$CONTROL_PAR_HIDE,$HIDE_WHOLE_CONTROL)
        inc($i)
    end while
    $i := 1
    while ($i<=$id23)
        set_control_par(%ui_id23[$i],$CONTROL_PAR_HIDE,$HIDE_WHOLE_CONTROL)
        inc($i)
    end while
    $i := 1
    while ($i<=$id41)
        set_control_par(%ui_id41[$i],$CONTROL_PAR_HIDE,$HIDE_WHOLE_CONTROL)
        inc($i)
    end while
    $i := 1
    while ($i<=$id42)
        set_control_par(%ui_id42[$i],$CONTROL_PAR_HIDE,$HIDE_WHOLE_CONTROL)
        inc($i)
    end while
    $i := 1
    while ($i<=$id43)
        set_control_par(%ui_id43[$i],$CONTROL_PAR_HIDE,$HIDE_WHOLE_CONTROL)
        inc($i)
    end while
    $i := 1
    while ($i<=$id1)
        set_control_par(%ui_id1[$i],$CONTROL_PAR_HIDE,$HIDE_WHOLE_CONTROL)
        inc($i)
    end while
    $i := 1
    while ($i<=$id5)
        set_control_par(%ui_id5[$i],$CONTROL_PAR_HIDE,$HIDE_WHOLE_CONTROL)
        inc($i)
    end while
    $i := 1
    while ($i<=$id3)
        set_control_par(%ui_id3[$i],$CONTROL_PAR_HIDE,$HIDE_WHOLE_CONTROL)
        inc($i)
    end while
    $i := 1
    while ($i<=$id6)
        set_control_par(%ui_id6[$i],$CONTROL_PAR_HIDE,$HIDE_WHOLE_CONTROL)
        inc($i)
    end while
end function

function set_mic_pictures
    if ($drums_hh_mic_current=1)
        set_control_par_str(get_ui_id($drums_hh_micthumb),$CONTROL_PAR_PICTURE,!pic_thumb_hh[1])
    else
    if ($drums_hh_mic_current=2)
        set_control_par_str(get_ui_id($drums_hh_micthumb),$CONTROL_PAR_PICTURE,!pic_thumb_hh[2])
    else
    if ($drums_hh_mic_current=3)
        set_control_par_str(get_ui_id($drums_hh_micthumb),$CONTROL_PAR_PICTURE,!pic_thumb_hh[3])
    else
    if ($drums_hh_mic_current=4)
        set_control_par_str(get_ui_id($drums_hh_micthumb),$CONTROL_PAR_PICTURE,!pic_thumb_hh[4])
    end if
    end if
    end if
    end if
    if ($drums_bdi_mic_current=1)
        set_control_par_str(get_ui_id($drums_bdi_micthumb),$CONTROL_PAR_PICTURE,!pic_thumb_bdi[1])
    else
    if ($drums_bdi_mic_current=2)
        set_control_par_str(get_ui_id($drums_bdi_micthumb),$CONTROL_PAR_PICTURE,!pic_thumb_bdi[2])
    else
    if ($drums_bdi_mic_current=3)
        set_control_par_str(get_ui_id($drums_bdi_micthumb),$CONTROL_PAR_PICTURE,!pic_thumb_bdi[3])
    end if
    end if
    end if
    if ($drums_bdo_mic_current=1)
        set_control_par_str(get_ui_id($drums_bdo_micthumb),$CONTROL_PAR_PICTURE,!pic_thumb_bdo[1])
    else
    if ($drums_bdo_mic_current=2)
        set_control_par_str(get_ui_id($drums_bdo_micthumb),$CONTROL_PAR_PICTURE,!pic_thumb_bdo[2])
    end if
    end if
    if ($drums_sntop_mic_current=1)
        set_control_par_str(get_ui_id($drums_sntop_micthumb),$CONTROL_PAR_PICTURE,!pic_thumb_sntop[1])
    else
    if ($drums_sntop_mic_current=2)
        set_control_par_str(get_ui_id($drums_sntop_micthumb),$CONTROL_PAR_PICTURE,!pic_thumb_sntop[2])
    else
    if ($drums_sntop_mic_current=3)
        set_control_par_str(get_ui_id($drums_sntop_micthumb),$CONTROL_PAR_PICTURE,!pic_thumb_sntop[3])
    end if
    end if
    end if
    if ($drums_snbt_mic_current=1)
        set_control_par_str(get_ui_id($drums_snbt_micthumb),$CONTROL_PAR_PICTURE,!pic_thumb_snbt[1])
    else
    if ($drums_snbt_mic_current=2)
        set_control_par_str(get_ui_id($drums_snbt_micthumb),$CONTROL_PAR_PICTURE,!pic_thumb_snbt[2])
    end if
    end if
    if ($drums_tomhi_mic_current=1)
        set_control_par_str(get_ui_id($drums_tomhi_micthumb),$CONTROL_PAR_PICTURE,!pic_thumb_tomhi[1])
    else
    if ($drums_tomhi_mic_current=2)
        set_control_par_str(get_ui_id($drums_tomhi_micthumb),$CONTROL_PAR_PICTURE,!pic_thumb_tomhi[2])
    else
    if ($drums_tomhi_mic_current=3)
        set_control_par_str(get_ui_id($drums_tomhi_micthumb),$CONTROL_PAR_PICTURE,!pic_thumb_tomhi[3])
    end if
    end if
    end if
    if ($drums_tommid_mic_current=1)
        set_control_par_str(get_ui_id($drums_tommid_micthumb),$CONTROL_PAR_PICTURE,!pic_thumb_tommid[1])
    else
    if ($drums_tommid_mic_current=2)
        set_control_par_str(get_ui_id($drums_tommid_micthumb),$CONTROL_PAR_PICTURE,!pic_thumb_tommid[2])
    else
    if ($drums_tommid_mic_current=3)
        set_control_par_str(get_ui_id($drums_tommid_micthumb),$CONTROL_PAR_PICTURE,!pic_thumb_tommid[3])
    end if
    end if
    end if
    if ($drums_tomlow_mic_current=1)
        set_control_par_str(get_ui_id($drums_tomlow_micthumb),$CONTROL_PAR_PICTURE,!pic_thumb_tomlow[1])
    else
    if ($drums_tomlow_mic_current=2)
        set_control_par_str(get_ui_id($drums_tomlow_micthumb),$CONTROL_PAR_PICTURE,!pic_thumb_tomlow[2])
    else
    if ($drums_tomlow_mic_current=3)
        set_control_par_str(get_ui_id($drums_tomlow_micthumb),$CONTROL_PAR_PICTURE,!pic_thumb_tomlow[3])
    end if
    end if
    end if
    if ($drums_ov_mic_current=1)
        set_control_par_str(get_ui_id($drums_ov_micthumb),$CONTROL_PAR_PICTURE,!pic_thumb_ov[1])
    else
    if ($drums_ov_mic_current=2)
        set_control_par_str(get_ui_id($drums_ov_micthumb),$CONTROL_PAR_PICTURE,!pic_thumb_ov[2])
    else
    if ($drums_ov_mic_current=3)
        set_control_par_str(get_ui_id($drums_ov_micthumb),$CONTROL_PAR_PICTURE,!pic_thumb_ov[3])
    else
    if ($drums_ov_mic_current=4)
        set_control_par_str(get_ui_id($drums_ov_micthumb),$CONTROL_PAR_PICTURE,!pic_thumb_ov[4])
    end if
    end if
    end if
    end if
end function

function set_micthumb
    if ($mix_hh_sel=1)
        $drums_hh_micthumb := 1
    else
    if ($mix_bdi_sel=1)
        $drums_bdi_micthumb := 1
    else
    if ($mix_bdo_sel=1)
        $drums_bdo_micthumb := 1
    else
    if ($mix_sntop_sel=1)
        $drums_sntop_micthumb := 1
    else
    if ($mix_snbt_sel=1)
        $drums_snbt_micthumb := 1
    else
    if ($mix_tomhi_sel=1)
        $drums_tomhi_micthumb := 1
    else
    if ($mix_tommid_sel=1)
        $drums_tommid_micthumb := 1
    else
    if ($mix_tomlow_sel=1)
        $drums_tomlow_micthumb := 1
    else
    if ($mix_ov_sel=1)
        $drums_ov_micthumb := 1
    end if
    end if
    end if
    end if
    end if
    end if
    end if
    end if
    end if
end function

function update_fx_controls
    if ($mix_eq=1)
        $i := 1
        while ($i<=$id21)
            set_control_par(%ui_id21[$i],$CONTROL_PAR_HIDE,$HIDE_PART_NOTHING)
            inc($i)
        end while
        $i := 1
        while ($i<=$id41)
            set_control_par(%ui_id41[$i],$CONTROL_PAR_HIDE,$HIDE_PART_NOTHING)
            set_control_par(%ui_id41[$i],$CONTROL_PAR_HIDE,$HIDE_PART_BG)
            inc($i)
        end while
        $i := 1
        while ($i<=$id22)
            set_control_par(%ui_id22[$i],$CONTROL_PAR_HIDE,$HIDE_WHOLE_CONTROL)
            inc($i)
        end while
        $i := 1
        while ($i<=$id23)
            set_control_par(%ui_id23[$i],$CONTROL_PAR_HIDE,$HIDE_WHOLE_CONTROL)
            inc($i)
        end while
        $i := 1
        while ($i<=$id42)
            set_control_par(%ui_id42[$i],$CONTROL_PAR_HIDE,$HIDE_WHOLE_CONTROL)
            inc($i)
        end while
        $i := 1
        while ($i<=$id43)
            set_control_par(%ui_id43[$i],$CONTROL_PAR_HIDE,$HIDE_WHOLE_CONTROL)
            inc($i)
        end while
    else
    if ($mix_td=1)
        $i := 1
        while ($i<=$id22)
            set_control_par(%ui_id22[$i],$CONTROL_PAR_HIDE,$HIDE_PART_NOTHING)
            inc($i)
        end while
        $i := 1
        while ($i<=$id42)
            set_control_par(%ui_id42[$i],$CONTROL_PAR_HIDE,$HIDE_PART_NOTHING)
            set_control_par(%ui_id42[$i],$CONTROL_PAR_HIDE,$HIDE_PART_BG)
            inc($i)
        end while
        $i := 1
        while ($i<=$id21)
            set_control_par(%ui_id21[$i],$CONTROL_PAR_HIDE,$HIDE_WHOLE_CONTROL)
            inc($i)
        end while
        $i := 1
        while ($i<=$id41)
            set_control_par(%ui_id41[$i],$CONTROL_PAR_HIDE,$HIDE_WHOLE_CONTROL)
            inc($i)
        end while
        $i := 1
        while ($i<=$id23)
            set_control_par(%ui_id23[$i],$CONTROL_PAR_HIDE,$HIDE_WHOLE_CONTROL)
            inc($i)
        end while
        $i := 1
        while ($i<=$id43)
            set_control_par(%ui_id43[$i],$CONTROL_PAR_HIDE,$HIDE_WHOLE_CONTROL)
            inc($i)
        end while
    else
    if ($mix_comp=1)
        $i := 1
        while ($i<=$id23)
            set_control_par(%ui_id23[$i],$CONTROL_PAR_HIDE,$HIDE_PART_NOTHING)
            inc($i)
        end while
        $i := 1
        while ($i<=$id43)
            set_control_par(%ui_id43[$i],$CONTROL_PAR_HIDE,$HIDE_PART_NOTHING)
            set_control_par(%ui_id43[$i],$CONTROL_PAR_HIDE,$HIDE_PART_BG)
            inc($i)
        end while
        $i := 1
        while ($i<=$id21)
            set_control_par(%ui_id21[$i],$CONTROL_PAR_HIDE,$HIDE_WHOLE_CONTROL)
            inc($i)
        end while
        $i := 1
        while ($i<=$id41)
            set_control_par(%ui_id41[$i],$CONTROL_PAR_HIDE,$HIDE_WHOLE_CONTROL)
            inc($i)
        end while
        $i := 1
        while ($i<=$id42)
            set_control_par(%ui_id42[$i],$CONTROL_PAR_HIDE,$HIDE_WHOLE_CONTROL)
            inc($i)
        end while
        $i := 1
        while ($i<=$id22)
            set_control_par(%ui_id22[$i],$CONTROL_PAR_HIDE,$HIDE_WHOLE_CONTROL)
            inc($i)
        end while
    end if
    end if
    end if
end function

function update_rev_send
    if ($i=0)
        set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_SENDLEVEL_7,$mix_hh_rev*$mix_hh_vol*62,-1,7,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+0)
    else
    if ($i=1)
        set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_SENDLEVEL_7,$mix_bdi_rev*$mix_bdi_vol*62,-1,7,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+1)
    else
    if ($i=2)
        set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_SENDLEVEL_7,$mix_bdo_rev*$mix_bdo_vol*62,-1,7,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+2)
    else
    if ($i=3)
        set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_SENDLEVEL_7,$mix_sntop_rev*$mix_sntop_vol*62,-1,7,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+3)
    else
    if ($i=4)
        set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_SENDLEVEL_7,$mix_snbt_rev*$mix_snbt_vol*62,-1,7,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+4)
    else
    if ($i=5)
        set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_SENDLEVEL_7,$mix_tomhi_rev*$mix_tomhi_vol*62,-1,7,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+5)
    else
    if ($i=6)
        set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_SENDLEVEL_7,$mix_tommid_rev*$mix_tommid_vol*62,-1,7,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+6)
    else
    if ($i=7)
        set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_SENDLEVEL_7,$mix_tomlow_rev*$mix_tomlow_vol*62,-1,7,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+7)
    else
    if ($i=8)
        set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_SENDLEVEL_7,$mix_ov_rev*$mix_ov_vol*62,-1,7,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+8)
    end if
    end if
    end if
    end if
    end if
    end if
    end if
    end if
    end if
end function

function update_all_volumes
    set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_VOLUME,$mix_hh_vol*7874,-1,-1,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+0)
    set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_VOLUME,$mix_bdi_vol*7874,-1,-1,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+1)
    set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_VOLUME,$mix_bdo_vol*7874,-1,-1,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+2)
    set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_VOLUME,$mix_sntop_vol*7874,-1,-1,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+3)
    set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_VOLUME,$mix_snbt_vol*7874,-1,-1,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+4)
    set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_VOLUME,$mix_tomhi_vol*7874,-1,-1,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+5)
    set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_VOLUME,$mix_tommid_vol*7874,-1,-1,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+6)
    set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_VOLUME,$mix_tomlow_vol*7874,-1,-1,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+7)
    set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_VOLUME,$mix_ov_vol*7874,-1,-1,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+8)
    set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_SENDLEVEL_7,$mix_hh_rev*$mix_hh_vol*62,-1,7,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+0)
    set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_SENDLEVEL_7,$mix_bdi_rev*$mix_bdi_vol*62,-1,7,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+1)
    set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_SENDLEVEL_7,$mix_bdo_rev*$mix_bdo_vol*62,-1,7,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+2)
    set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_SENDLEVEL_7,$mix_sntop_rev*$mix_sntop_vol*62,-1,7,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+3)
    set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_SENDLEVEL_7,$mix_snbt_rev*$mix_snbt_vol*62,-1,7,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+4)
    set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_SENDLEVEL_7,$mix_tomhi_rev*$mix_tomhi_vol*62,-1,7,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+5)
    set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_SENDLEVEL_7,$mix_tommid_rev*$mix_tommid_vol*62,-1,7,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+6)
    set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_SENDLEVEL_7,$mix_tomlow_rev*$mix_tomlow_vol*62,-1,7,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+7)
    set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_SENDLEVEL_7,$mix_ov_rev*$mix_ov_vol*62,-1,7,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+8)
    $i := 53
    while ($i<=56)
        set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_VOLUME,1000*$mix_ov_vol/127*($mix_hh_ov*7874)/1000,$i,-1,-1)
        inc($i)
    end while
    $i := 57
    while ($i<=64)
        set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_VOLUME,1000*$mix_ov_vol/127*($mix_bdi_ov*7874)/1000,$i,-1,-1)
        inc($i)
    end while
    $i := 65
    while ($i<=68)
        set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_VOLUME,1000*$mix_ov_vol/127*($mix_sntop_ov*7874)/1000,$i,-1,-1)
        inc($i)
    end while
    $i := 69
    while ($i<=76)
        set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_VOLUME,1000*$mix_ov_vol/127*($mix_tomhi_ov*7874)/1000,$i,-1,-1)
        inc($i)
    end while
    $i := 77
    while ($i<=84)
        set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_VOLUME,1000*$mix_ov_vol/127*($mix_tommid_ov*7874)/1000,$i,-1,-1)
        inc($i)
    end while
    $i := 85
    while ($i<=92)
        set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_VOLUME,1000*$mix_ov_vol/127*($mix_tomlow_ov*7874)/1000,$i,-1,-1)
        inc($i)
    end while
end function

function update_solo_status
    {parameter $busidx}
    if (get_control_par(%solo_ui_ids[$busidx],$CONTROL_PAR_VALUE)=1)
        %solo_arr[$busidx] := 1
        call unselect_all_channels
        set_control_par(%select_ui_ids[$busidx],$CONTROL_PAR_VALUE,1)
        $i := 0
        while ($i<=8)
            if (%solo_arr[$i]=0)
                set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_VOLUME,0,-1,-1,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+$i)
                set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_SENDLEVEL_7,0,-1,7,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+$i)
                if ($i<=8)
                    set_control_par(%solo_ui_ids[$i],$CONTROL_PAR_VALUE,0)
                    set_control_par_str(%solo_ui_ids[$i],$CONTROL_PAR_PICTURE,"dm_btn_blanssc")
                end if
            else
            if (%solo_arr[$i]=1)
                set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_VOLUME,get_control_par(%vol_ui_ids[$busidx],$CONTROL_PAR_VALUE)*7874,-1,-1,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+$busidx)
                $anysolo := 1
                call update_rev_send
            end if
            end if
            inc($i)
        end while
    else
    if (get_control_par(%solo_ui_ids[$busidx],$CONTROL_PAR_VALUE)=0)
        %solo_arr[$busidx] := 0
        $help1 := 0
        $i := 0
        while ($i<=8)
            if (%solo_arr[$i]=1)
                inc($help1)
            else
            if (%solo_arr[$i]=0)
                set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_SENDLEVEL_7,0,-1,7,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+$i)
            end if
            end if
            inc($i)
        end while
        if ($help1>0)
            set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_VOLUME,0,-1,-1,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+$busidx)
            set_control_par_str(%solo_ui_ids[$busidx],$CONTROL_PAR_PICTURE,"dm_btn_blanssc")
        else
        if ($help1=0)
            call update_all_volumes
            $anysolo := 0
            $i := 0
            while ($i<=8)
                set_control_par_str(%solo_ui_ids[$i],$CONTROL_PAR_PICTURE,"dm_btn_solo")
                inc($i)
            end while
        end if
        end if
    end if
    end if
end function

function set_fx_text
    {parameter $busidx}
    set_text($fx_eq_lf_val,get_engine_par_disp($ENGINE_PAR_SEQ_LF_FREQ,-1,1,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+$busidx))
    set_text($fx_eq_lg_val,get_engine_par_disp($ENGINE_PAR_SEQ_LF_GAIN,-1,1,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+$busidx))
    set_text($fx_eq_lmf_val,get_engine_par_disp($ENGINE_PAR_SEQ_LMF_FREQ,-1,1,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+$busidx))
    set_text($fx_eq_lmg_val,get_engine_par_disp($ENGINE_PAR_SEQ_LMF_GAIN,-1,1,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+$busidx))
    set_text($fx_eq_lmq_val,get_engine_par_disp($ENGINE_PAR_SEQ_LMF_Q,-1,1,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+$busidx))
    set_text($fx_eq_hmf_val,get_engine_par_disp($ENGINE_PAR_SEQ_HMF_FREQ,-1,1,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+$busidx))
    set_text($fx_eq_hmg_val,get_engine_par_disp($ENGINE_PAR_SEQ_HMF_GAIN,-1,1,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+$busidx))
    set_text($fx_eq_hmq_val,get_engine_par_disp($ENGINE_PAR_SEQ_HMF_Q,-1,1,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+$busidx))
    set_text($fx_eq_hf_val,get_engine_par_disp($ENGINE_PAR_SEQ_HF_FREQ,-1,1,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+$busidx))
    set_text($fx_eq_hg_val,get_engine_par_disp($ENGINE_PAR_SEQ_HF_GAIN,-1,1,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+$busidx))

    set_text($fx_td_in_val,get_engine_par_disp($ENGINE_PAR_TR_INPUT,-1,2,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+$busidx))
    set_text($fx_td_atk_val,get_engine_par_disp($ENGINE_PAR_TR_ATTACK,-1,2,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+$busidx))
    set_text($fx_td_rel_val,get_engine_par_disp($ENGINE_PAR_TR_SUSTAIN,-1,2,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+$busidx))
    $fx_td_soft := get_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_TR_SMOOTH,-1,2,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+$busidx)
    set_text($fx_td_out_val,get_engine_par_disp($ENGINE_PAR_INSERT_EFFECT_OUTPUT_GAIN,-1,2,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+$busidx))

    set_text($fx_comp_tres_val,get_engine_par_disp($ENGINE_PAR_SCOMP_THRESHOLD,-1,4,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+$busidx))
    set_text($fx_comp_atk_val,get_engine_par_disp($ENGINE_PAR_SCOMP_ATTACK,-1,4,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+$busidx))
    set_text($fx_comp_rel_val,get_engine_par_disp($ENGINE_PAR_SCOMP_RELEASE,-1,4,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+$busidx))
    set_text($fx_comp_rat_val,"1:" & get_engine_par_disp($ENGINE_PAR_SCOMP_RATIO,-1,4,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+$busidx))
    set_text($fx_comp_mix_val,get_engine_par_disp($ENGINE_PAR_SCOMP_MIX,-1,4,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+$busidx))
    set_text($fx_comp_makeup_val,get_engine_par_disp($ENGINE_PAR_SCOMP_MAKEUP,-1,4,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+$busidx))
end function

function check_anysolo {parameter $busidx}
    if ($anysolo=1)
        %solo_arr[$busidx] := 1
        set_control_par(%solo_ui_ids[$busidx],$CONTROL_PAR_VALUE,1)
        $i := 0
        while ($i<=8)
            if (%solo_arr[$i]=0)
                set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_VOLUME,0,-1,-1,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+$i)
                set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_SENDLEVEL_7,0,-1,7,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+$i)
                if ($i<=8)
                    set_control_par(%solo_ui_ids[$i],$CONTROL_PAR_VALUE,0)
                    set_control_par_str(%solo_ui_ids[$i],$CONTROL_PAR_PICTURE,"dm_btn_blanssc")
                end if
            else
            if (%solo_arr[$i]=1)
                set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_VOLUME,get_control_par(%vol_ui_ids[$busidx],$CONTROL_PAR_VALUE)*7874,-1,-1,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+$busidx)
                $anysolo := 1
            end if
            end if
            inc($i)
        end while
    end if
end function

function assign_fx_hh
    $fx_eq_lf := $fx_eq_lf_hh
    $fx_eq_lg := $fx_eq_lg_hh
    $fx_eq_lb := $fx_eq_lb_hh
    $fx_eq_lmf := $fx_eq_lmf_hh
    $fx_eq_lmg := $fx_eq_lmg_hh
    $fx_eq_lmq := $fx_eq_lmq_hh
    $fx_eq_hmf := $fx_eq_hmf_hh
    $fx_eq_hmg := $fx_eq_hmg_hh
    $fx_eq_hmq := $fx_eq_hmq_hh
    $fx_eq_hf := $fx_eq_hf_hh
    $fx_eq_hg := $fx_eq_hg_hh
    $fx_eq_hb := $fx_eq_hb_hh
    $fx_td_in := $fx_td_in_hh
    $fx_td_atk := $fx_td_atk_hh
    $fx_td_rel := $fx_td_rel_hh
    $fx_td_soft := $fx_td_soft_hh
    $fx_td_out := $fx_td_out_hh
    $fx_comp_tres := $fx_comp_tres_hh
    $fx_comp_atk := $fx_comp_atk_hh
    $fx_comp_rel := $fx_comp_rel_hh
    $fx_comp_rat := $fx_comp_rat_hh
    $fx_comp_mix := $fx_comp_mix_hh
    $fx_comp_makeup := $fx_comp_makeup_hh
end function

    $fx_eq_lf := $fx_eq_lf_bdi
    $fx_eq_lg := $fx_eq_lg_bdi
    $fx_eq_lb := $fx_eq_lb_bdi
    $fx_eq_lmf := $fx_eq_lmf_bdi

    $fx_eq_lmq := $fx_eq_lmq_bdi

    $fx_eq_lg := $fx_eq_lg_sntop

    $fx_eq_lg := $fx_eq_lg_snbt
    $fx_eq_lb := $fx_eq_lb_snbt

end function

function assign_fx_tommid
    $fx_eq_lf := $fx_eq_lf_tommid
    $fx_eq_lg := $fx_eq_lg_tommid
    $fx_eq_lb := $fx_eq_lb_tommid
    $fx_eq_lmf := $fx_eq_lmf_tommid
    $fx_eq_lmg := $fx_eq_lmg_tommid
    $fx_eq_lmq := $fx_eq_lmq_tommid
    $fx_eq_hmf := $fx_eq_hmf_tommid
    $fx_eq_hmg := $fx_eq_hmg_tommid

    $fx_comp_mix := $fx_comp_mix_tommid
    $fx_comp_makeup := $fx_comp_makeup_tommid
end function

function assign_fx_tomlow
    $fx_eq_lf := $fx_eq_lf_tomlow
    $fx_eq_lg := $fx_eq_lg_tomlow
    $fx_eq_lb := $fx_eq_lb_tomlow
    $fx_eq_lmf := $fx_eq_lmf_tomlow
    $fx_eq_lmg := $fx_eq_lmg_tomlow
    $fx_eq_lmq := $fx_eq_lmq_tomlow
    $fx_eq_hmf := $fx_eq_hmf_tomlow
    $fx_eq_hmg := $fx_eq_hmg_tomlow
    $fx_eq_hmq := $fx_eq_hmq_tomlow
    $fx_eq_hf := $fx_eq_hf_tomlow
    $fx_eq_hg := $fx_eq_hg_tomlow
    $fx_eq_hb := $fx_eq_hb_tomlow
    $fx_td_in := $fx_td_in_tomlow
    $fx_td_atk := $fx_td_atk_tomlow
    $fx_td_rel := $fx_td_rel_tomlow
    $fx_td_soft := $fx_td_soft_tomlow
    $fx_td_out := $fx_td_out_tomlow
    $fx_comp_tres := $fx_comp_tres_tomlow
    $fx_comp_atk := $fx_comp_atk_tomlow
    $fx_comp_rel := $fx_comp_rel_tomlow
    $fx_comp_rat := $fx_comp_rat_tomlow
    $fx_comp_mix := $fx_comp_mix_tomlow
    $fx_comp_makeup := $fx_comp_makeup_tomlow
end function

function assign_fx_ov
    $fx_eq_lf := $fx_eq_lf_ov
    $fx_eq_lg := $fx_eq_lg_ov
    $fx_eq_lb := $fx_eq_lb_ov
    $fx_eq_lmf := $fx_eq_lmf_ov
    $fx_eq_lmg := $fx_eq_lmg_ov
    $fx_eq_lmq := $fx_eq_lmq_ov
    $fx_eq_hmf := $fx_eq_hmf_ov
    $fx_eq_hmg := $fx_eq_hmg_ov
    $fx_eq_hmq := $fx_eq_hmq_ov
    $fx_eq_hf := $fx_eq_hf_ov
    $fx_eq_hg := $fx_eq_hg_ov
    $fx_eq_hb := $fx_eq_hb_ov
    $fx_td_in := $fx_td_in_ov
    $fx_td_atk := $fx_td_atk_ov
    $fx_td_rel := $fx_td_rel_ov
    $fx_td_soft := $fx_td_soft_ov
    $fx_td_out := $fx_td_out_ov
    $fx_comp_tres := $fx_comp_tres_ov
    $fx_comp_atk := $fx_comp_atk_ov
    $fx_comp_rel := $fx_comp_rel_ov
    $fx_comp_rat := $fx_comp_rat_ov
    $fx_comp_mix := $fx_comp_mix_ov
    $fx_comp_makeup := $fx_comp_makeup_ov
end function

function assign_fx_master
    $fx_eq_lf := $fx_eq_lf_master
    $fx_eq_lg := $fx_eq_lg_master
    $fx_eq_lb := $fx_eq_lb_master
    $fx_eq_lmf := $fx_eq_lmf_master
    $fx_eq_lmg := $fx_eq_lmg_master
    $fx_eq_lmq := $fx_eq_lmq_master
    $fx_eq_hmf := $fx_eq_hmf_master
    $fx_eq_hmg := $fx_eq_hmg_master
    $fx_eq_hmq := $fx_eq_hmq_master
    $fx_eq_hf := $fx_eq_hf_master
    $fx_eq_hg := $fx_eq_hg_master
    $fx_eq_hb := $fx_eq_hb_master
    $fx_td_in := $fx_td_in_master
    $fx_td_atk := $fx_td_atk_master
    $fx_td_rel := $fx_td_rel_master
    $fx_td_soft := $fx_td_soft_master
    $fx_td_out := $fx_td_out_master
    $fx_td_soft := $fx_td_soft_master
    $fx_comp_tres := $fx_comp_tres_master
    $fx_comp_atk := $fx_comp_atk_master
    $fx_comp_rel := $fx_comp_rel_master
    $fx_comp_rat := $fx_comp_rat_master
    $fx_comp_mix := $fx_comp_mix_master
    $fx_comp_makeup := $fx_comp_makeup_master
end function

function change_mapping
    if (get_control_par(%mapping_ui_ids[$new_mapping],$CONTROL_PAR_VALUE)=1)
        $i := 1
        while ($i<=7)
            if ($i # $new_mapping)
                set_control_par(%mapping_ui_ids[$i],$CONTROL_PAR_VALUE,0)
            end if
            inc($i)
        end while
        set_control_par(%mapping_ui_ids[$new_mapping],$CONTROL_PAR_VALUE,1)
        pgs_set_key_val(MAPPINGS,0,$new_mapping)
        call load_file
    else
        set_control_par(%mapping_ui_ids[$new_mapping],$CONTROL_PAR_VALUE,1)
    end if
end function

function highlight_menu_micsel
    $i := 0
    while ($i<=4)
        if ($i # 1)
            set_control_par(%menu_ui_ids[$i],$CONTROL_PAR_VALUE,0)
        end if
        set_control_par(%menu_ui_ids[1],$CONTROL_PAR_VALUE,1)
        inc($i)
    end while
end function

function fx_set_engine_par
    set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_SEQ_LF_FREQ,$fx_eq_lf_hh*7874,-1,1,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+0)
    set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_SEQ_LF_GAIN,$fx_eq_lg_hh*250,-1,1,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+0)
    set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_SEQ_LF_BELL,$fx_eq_lb_hh,-1,1,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+0)
    set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_SEQ_LMF_FREQ,$fx_eq_lmf_hh*7874,-1,1,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+0)
    set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_SEQ_LMF_GAIN,$fx_eq_lmg_hh*250,-1,1,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+0)
    set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_SEQ_LMF_Q,$fx_eq_lmq_hh*7874,-1,1,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+0)
    set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_SEQ_HMF_FREQ,$fx_eq_hmf_hh*7874,-1,1,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+0)
    set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_SEQ_HMF_GAIN,$fx_eq_hmg_hh*250,-1,1,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+0)
    set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_SEQ_HMF_Q,$fx_eq_hmq_hh*7874,-1,1,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+0)
    set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_SEQ_HF_GAIN,$fx_eq_hg_hh*250,-1,1,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+0)
    set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_SEQ_HF_FREQ,$fx_eq_hf_hh*7874,-1,1,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+0)
    set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_SEQ_LF_FREQ,$fx_eq_lf_bdi*7874,-1,1,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+1)
    set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_SEQ_LF_GAIN,$fx_eq_lg_bdi*250,-1,1,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+1)
    set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_SEQ_LF_BELL,$fx_eq_lb_bdi*7874,-1,1,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+1)
    set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_SEQ_LMF_FREQ,$fx_eq_lmf_bdi*7874,-1,1,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+1)
    set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_SEQ_LMF_GAIN,$fx_eq_lmg_bdi*250,-1,1,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+1)
    set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_SEQ_LMF_Q,$fx_eq_lmq_bdi*7874,-1,1,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+1)
    set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_SEQ_HMF_FREQ,$fx_eq_hmf_bdi*7874,-1,1,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+1)
    set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_SEQ_HMF_GAIN,$fx_eq_hmg_bdi*250,-1,1,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+1)
    set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_SEQ_HMF_Q,$fx_eq_hmq_bdi*7874,-1,1,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+1)
    set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_SEQ_HF_GAIN,$fx_eq_hg_bdi*250,-1,1,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+1)
    set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_SEQ_HF_FREQ,$fx_eq_hf_bdi*7874,-1,1,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+1)
    set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_SEQ_LF_FREQ,$fx_eq_lf_bdo*7874,-1,1,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+2)
    set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_SEQ_LF_GAIN,$fx_eq_lg_bdo*250,-1,1,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+2)
    set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_SEQ_LF_BELL,$fx_eq_lb_bdo*7874,-1,1,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+2)
    set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_SEQ_LMF_FREQ,$fx_eq_lmf_bdo*7874,-1,1,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+2)
    set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_SEQ_LMF_GAIN,$fx_eq_lmg_bdo*250,-1,1,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+2)
    set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_SEQ_LMF_Q,$fx_eq_lmq_bdo*7874,-1,1,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+2)
    set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_SEQ_HMF_FREQ,$fx_eq_hmf_bdo*7874,-1,1,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+2)
    set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_SEQ_HMF_GAIN,$fx_eq_hmg_bdo*250,-1,1,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+2)
    set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_SEQ_HMF_Q,$fx_eq_hmq_bdo*7874,-1,1,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+2)
    set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_SEQ_HF_GAIN,$fx_eq_hg_bdo*250,-1,1,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+2)
    set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_SEQ_HF_FREQ,$fx_eq_hf_bdo*7874,-1,1,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+2)
    set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_SEQ_LF_FREQ,$fx_eq_lf_sntop*7874,-1,1,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+3)
    set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_SEQ_LF_GAIN,$fx_eq_lg_sntop*250,-1,1,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+3)
    set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_SEQ_LF_BELL,$fx_eq_lb_sntop*7874,-1,1,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+3)
    set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_SEQ_LMF_FREQ,$fx_eq_lmf_sntop*7874,-1,1,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+3)
    set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_SEQ_LMF_GAIN,$fx_eq_lmg_sntop*250,-1,1,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+3)
    set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_SEQ_LMF_Q,$fx_eq_lmq_sntop*7874,-1,1,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+3)
    set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_SEQ_HMF_FREQ,$fx_eq_hmf_sntop*7874,-1,1,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+3)
    set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_SEQ_HMF_GAIN,$fx_eq_hmg_sntop*250,-1,1,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+3)
    set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_SEQ_HMF_Q,$fx_eq_hmq_sntop*7874,-1,1,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+3)
    set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_SEQ_HF_GAIN,$fx_eq_hg_sntop*250,-1,1,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+3)
    set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_SEQ_HF_FREQ,$fx_eq_hf_sntop*7874,-1,1,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+3)
    set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_SEQ_LF_FREQ,$fx_eq_lf_snbt*7874,-1,1,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+4)
    set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_SEQ_LF_GAIN,$fx_eq_lg_snbt*250,-1,1,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+4)
    set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_SEQ_LF_BELL,$fx_eq_lb_snbt*7874,-1,1,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+4)
    set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_SEQ_LMF_FREQ,$fx_eq_lmf_snbt*7874,-1,1,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+4)
    set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_SEQ_LMF_GAIN,$fx_eq_lmg_snbt*250,-1,1,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+4)

    set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_SEQ_HMF_GAIN,$fx_eq_hmg_tomhi*250,-1,1,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+5)
    set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_SEQ_HMF_Q,$fx_eq_hmq_tomhi*7874,-1,1,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+5)
    set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_SEQ_HF_GAIN,$fx_eq_hg_tomhi*250,-1,1,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+5)
    set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_SEQ_HF_FREQ,$fx_eq_hf_tomhi*7874,-1,1,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+5)
    set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_SEQ_LF_FREQ,$fx_eq_lf_tommid*7874,-1,1,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+6)
    set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_SEQ_LF_GAIN,$fx_eq_lg_tommid*250,-1,1,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+6)
    set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_SEQ_LF_BELL,$fx_eq_lb_tommid*7874,-1,1,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+6)
    set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_SEQ_LMF_FREQ,$fx_eq_lmf_tommid*7874,-1,1,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+6)
    set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_SEQ_LMF_GAIN,$fx_eq_lmg_tommid*250,-1,1,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+6)
    set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_SEQ_LMF_Q,$fx_eq_lmq_tommid*7874,-1,1,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+6)
    set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_SEQ_HMF_FREQ,$fx_eq_hmf_tommid*7874,-1,1,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+6)
    set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_SEQ_HMF_GAIN,$fx_eq_hmg_tommid*250,-1,1,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+6)
    set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_SEQ_HMF_Q,$fx_eq_hmq_tommid*7874,-1,1,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+6)
    set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_SEQ_HF_GAIN,$fx_eq_hg_tommid*250,-1,1,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+6)
    set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_SEQ_HF_FREQ,$fx_eq_hf_tommid*7874,-1,1,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+6)
