    set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_SEQ_LF_BELL,$fx_eq_lb_tomlow*7874,-1,1,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+7)
    set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_SEQ_LMF_FREQ,$fx_eq_lmf_tomlow*7874,-1,1,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+7)
    set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_SEQ_LMF_GAIN,$fx_eq_lmg_tomlow*250,-1,1,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+7)
    set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_SEQ_LMF_Q,$fx_eq_lmq_tomlow*7874,-1,1,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+7)
    set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_SEQ_HMF_FREQ,$fx_eq_hmf_tomlow*7874,-1,1,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+7)
    set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_SEQ_HMF_GAIN,$fx_eq_hmg_tomlow*250,-1,1,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+7)
    set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_SEQ_HMF_Q,$fx_eq_hmq_tomlow*7874,-1,1,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+7)
    set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_SEQ_HF_GAIN,$fx_eq_hg_tomlow*250,-1,1,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+7)
    set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_SEQ_HF_FREQ,$fx_eq_hf_tomlow*7874,-1,1,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+7)
    set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_SEQ_LF_FREQ,$fx_eq_lf_ov*7874,-1,1,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+8)
    set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_SEQ_LF_GAIN,$fx_eq_lg_ov*250,-1,1,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+8)
    set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_SEQ_LF_BELL,$fx_eq_lb_ov*7874,-1,1,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+8)
    set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_SEQ_LMF_FREQ,$fx_eq_lmf_ov*7874,-1,1,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+8)
    set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_SEQ_LMF_GAIN,$fx_eq_lmg_ov*250,-1,1,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+8)
    set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_SEQ_LMF_Q,$fx_eq_lmq_ov*7874,-1,1,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+8)
    set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_SEQ_HMF_FREQ,$fx_eq_hmf_ov*7874,-1,1,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+8)
    set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_SEQ_HMF_GAIN,$fx_eq_hmg_ov*250,-1,1,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+8)
    set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_SEQ_HMF_Q,$fx_eq_hmq_ov*7874,-1,1,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+8)
    set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_SEQ_HF_GAIN,$fx_eq_hg_ov*250,-1,1,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+8)
    set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_SEQ_HF_FREQ,$fx_eq_hf_ov*7874,-1,1,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+8)
    set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_SEQ_LF_FREQ,$fx_eq_lf_master*7874,-1,1,-1)
    set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_SEQ_LF_GAIN,$fx_eq_lg_master*250,-1,1,-1)
    set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_SEQ_LF_BELL,$fx_eq_lb_master*7874,-1,1,-1)
    set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_SEQ_LMF_FREQ,$fx_eq_lmf_master*7874,-1,1,-1)
    set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_SEQ_LMF_GAIN,$fx_eq_lmg_master*250,-1,1,-1)
    set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_SEQ_LMF_Q,$fx_eq_lmq_master*7874,-1,1,-1)
    set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_SEQ_HMF_FREQ,$fx_eq_hmf_master*7874,-1,1,-1)
    set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_SEQ_HMF_GAIN,$fx_eq_hmg_master*250,-1,1,-1)
    set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_SEQ_HMF_Q,$fx_eq_hmq_master*7874,-1,1,-1)
    set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_SEQ_HF_GAIN,$fx_eq_hg_master*250,-1,1,-1)
    set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_SEQ_HF_FREQ,$fx_eq_hf_master*7874,-1,1,-1)

    set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_TR_INPUT,$fx_td_in_hh*250,-1,2,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+0)
    set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_TR_ATTACK,$fx_td_atk_hh*250,-1,2,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+0)
    set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_TR_SUSTAIN,$fx_td_rel_hh*250,-1,2,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+0)
    set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_TR_SMOOTH,$fx_td_soft_hh,-1,2,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+0)
    set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_INSERT_EFFECT_OUTPUT_GAIN,$fx_td_out_hh*250,-1,2,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+0)
    set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_TR_INPUT,$fx_td_in_bdi*250,-1,2,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+1)
    set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_TR_ATTACK,$fx_td_atk_bdi*250,-1,2,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+1)
    set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_TR_SUSTAIN,$fx_td_rel_bdi*250,-1,2,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+1)
    set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_TR_SMOOTH,$fx_td_soft_bdi,-1,2,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+1)
    set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_INSERT_EFFECT_OUTPUT_GAIN,$fx_td_out_bdi*250,-1,2,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+1)
    set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_TR_INPUT,$fx_td_in_bdo*250,-1,2,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+2)
    set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_TR_ATTACK,$fx_td_atk_bdo*250,-1,2,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+2)
    set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_TR_SUSTAIN,$fx_td_rel_bdo*250,-1,2,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+2)
    set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_TR_SMOOTH,$fx_td_soft_bdo,-1,2,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+2)
    set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_INSERT_EFFECT_OUTPUT_GAIN,$fx_td_out_bdo*250,-1,2,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+2)
    set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_TR_INPUT,$fx_td_in_sntop*250,-1,2,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+3)
    set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_TR_ATTACK,$fx_td_atk_sntop*250,-1,2,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+3)
    set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_TR_SUSTAIN,$fx_td_rel_sntop*250,-1,2,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+3)
    set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_TR_SMOOTH,$fx_td_soft_sntop,-1,2,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+3)
    set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_INSERT_EFFECT_OUTPUT_GAIN,$fx_td_out_sntop*250,-1,2,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+3)
    set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_TR_INPUT,$fx_td_in_snbt*250,-1,2,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+4)
    set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_TR_ATTACK,$fx_td_atk_snbt*250,-1,2,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+4)
    set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_TR_SUSTAIN,$fx_td_rel_snbt*250,-1,2,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+4)
    set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_TR_SMOOTH,$fx_td_soft_snbt,-1,2,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+4)
    set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_INSERT_EFFECT_OUTPUT_GAIN,$fx_td_out_snbt*250,-1,2,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+4)
    set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_TR_INPUT,$fx_td_in_tomhi*250,-1,2,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+5)
    set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_TR_ATTACK,$fx_td_atk_tomhi*250,-1,2,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+5)
    set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_TR_SUSTAIN,$fx_td_rel_tomhi*250,-1,2,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+5)
    set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_TR_SMOOTH,$fx_td_soft_tomhi,-1,2,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+5)
    set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_INSERT_EFFECT_OUTPUT_GAIN,$fx_td_out_tomhi*250,-1,2,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+5)
    set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_TR_INPUT,$fx_td_in_tommid*250,-1,2,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+6)
    set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_TR_ATTACK,$fx_td_atk_tommid*250,-1,2,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+6)
    set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_TR_SUSTAIN,$fx_td_rel_tommid*250,-1,2,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+6)
    set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_TR_SMOOTH,$fx_td_soft_tommid,-1,2,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+6)
    set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_INSERT_EFFECT_OUTPUT_GAIN,$fx_td_out_tommid*250,-1,2,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+6)
    set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_TR_INPUT,$fx_td_in_tomlow*250,-1,2,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+7)
    set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_TR_ATTACK,$fx_td_atk_tomlow*250,-1,2,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+7)
    set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_TR_SUSTAIN,$fx_td_rel_tomlow*250,-1,2,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+7)
    set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_TR_SMOOTH,$fx_td_soft_tomlow,-1,2,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+7)
    set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_INSERT_EFFECT_OUTPUT_GAIN,$fx_td_out_tomlow*250,-1,2,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+7)
    set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_TR_INPUT,$fx_td_in_ov*250,-1,2,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+8)
    set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_TR_ATTACK,$fx_td_atk_ov*250,-1,2,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+8)
    set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_TR_SUSTAIN,$fx_td_rel_ov*250,-1,2,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+8)
    set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_TR_SMOOTH,$fx_td_soft_ov,-1,2,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+8)
    set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_INSERT_EFFECT_OUTPUT_GAIN,$fx_td_out_ov*250,-1,2,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+8)
    set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_TR_INPUT,$fx_td_in_master*250,-1,2,-1)
    set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_TR_ATTACK,$fx_td_atk_master*250,-1,2,-1)
    set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_TR_SUSTAIN,$fx_td_rel_master*250,-1,2,-1)
    set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_TR_SMOOTH,$fx_td_soft_master,-1,2,-1)
    set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_INSERT_EFFECT_OUTPUT_GAIN,$fx_td_out_master*250,-1,2,-1)

    set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_SCOMP_THRESHOLD,$fx_comp_tres_hh*250,-1,4,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+0)
    set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_SCOMP_RATIO,$fx_comp_rat_hh*7874,-1,4,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+0)
    set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_SCOMP_ATTACK,$fx_comp_atk_hh*7874,-1,4,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+0)
    set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_SCOMP_RELEASE,$fx_comp_rel_hh*7874,-1,4,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+0)
    set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_SCOMP_MAKEUP,$fx_comp_makeup_hh*250,-1,4,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+0)
    set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_SCOMP_MIX,$fx_comp_mix_hh*7874,-1,4,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+0)
    set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_SCOMP_THRESHOLD,$fx_comp_tres_bdi*250,-1,4,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+1)
    set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_SCOMP_RATIO,$fx_comp_rat_bdi*7874,-1,4,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+1)
    set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_SCOMP_ATTACK,$fx_comp_atk_bdi*7874,-1,4,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+1)
    set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_SCOMP_RELEASE,$fx_comp_rel_bdi*7874,-1,4,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+1)
    set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_SCOMP_MAKEUP,$fx_comp_makeup_bdi*250,-1,4,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+1)
    set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_SCOMP_MIX,$fx_comp_mix_bdi*7874,-1,4,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+1)
    set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_SCOMP_THRESHOLD,$fx_comp_tres_bdo*250,-1,4,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+2)
    set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_SCOMP_RATIO,$fx_comp_rat_bdo*7874,-1,4,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+2)
    set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_SCOMP_ATTACK,$fx_comp_atk_bdo*7874,-1,4,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+2)
    set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_SCOMP_RELEASE,$fx_comp_rel_bdo*7874,-1,4,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+2)
    set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_SCOMP_MAKEUP,$fx_comp_makeup_bdo*250,-1,4,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+2)
    set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_SCOMP_MIX,$fx_comp_mix_bdo*7874,-1,4,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+2)
    set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_SCOMP_THRESHOLD,$fx_comp_tres_sntop*250,-1,4,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+3)
    set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_SCOMP_RATIO,$fx_comp_rat_sntop*7874,-1,4,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+3)
    set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_SCOMP_ATTACK,$fx_comp_atk_sntop*7874,-1,4,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+3)
    set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_SCOMP_RELEASE,$fx_comp_rel_sntop*7874,-1,4,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+3)
    set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_SCOMP_MAKEUP,$fx_comp_makeup_sntop*250,-1,4,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+3)
    set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_SCOMP_MIX,$fx_comp_mix_sntop*7874,-1,4,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+3)
    set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_SCOMP_THRESHOLD,$fx_comp_tres_snbt*250,-1,4,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+4)
    set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_SCOMP_RATIO,$fx_comp_rat_snbt*7874,-1,4,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+4)
    set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_SCOMP_ATTACK,$fx_comp_atk_snbt*7874,-1,4,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+4)
    set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_SCOMP_RELEASE,$fx_comp_rel_snbt*7874,-1,4,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+4)
    set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_SCOMP_MAKEUP,$fx_comp_makeup_snbt*250,-1,4,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+4)
    set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_SCOMP_MIX,$fx_comp_mix_snbt*7874,-1,4,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+4)
    set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_SCOMP_THRESHOLD,$fx_comp_tres_tomhi*250,-1,4,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+5)
    set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_SCOMP_RATIO,$fx_comp_rat_tomhi*7874,-1,4,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+5)
    set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_SCOMP_ATTACK,$fx_comp_atk_tomhi*7874,-1,4,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+5)
    set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_SCOMP_RELEASE,$fx_comp_rel_tomhi*7874,-1,4,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+5)
    set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_SCOMP_MAKEUP,$fx_comp_makeup_tomhi*250,-1,4,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+5)
    set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_SCOMP_MIX,$fx_comp_mix_tomhi*7874,-1,4,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+5)
    set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_SCOMP_THRESHOLD,$fx_comp_tres_tommid*250,-1,4,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+6)
    set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_SCOMP_RATIO,$fx_comp_rat_tommid*7874,-1,4,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+6)
    set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_SCOMP_ATTACK,$fx_comp_atk_tommid*7874,-1,4,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+6)
    set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_SCOMP_RELEASE,$fx_comp_rel_tommid*7874,-1,4,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+6)
    set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_SCOMP_MAKEUP,$fx_comp_makeup_tommid*250,-1,4,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+6)
    set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_SCOMP_MIX,$fx_comp_mix_tommid*7874,-1,4,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+6)
    set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_SCOMP_THRESHOLD,$fx_comp_tres_tomlow*250,-1,4,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+7)
    set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_SCOMP_RATIO,$fx_comp_rat_tomlow*7874,-1,4,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+7)
    set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_SCOMP_ATTACK,$fx_comp_atk_tomlow*7874,-1,4,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+7)
    set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_SCOMP_RELEASE,$fx_comp_rel_tomlow*7874,-1,4,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+7)
    set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_SCOMP_MAKEUP,$fx_comp_makeup_tomlow*250,-1,4,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+7)
    set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_SCOMP_MIX,$fx_comp_mix_tomlow*7874,-1,4,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+7)
    set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_SCOMP_THRESHOLD,$fx_comp_tres_ov*250,-1,4,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+8)
    set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_SCOMP_RATIO,$fx_comp_rat_ov*7874,-1,4,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+8)
    set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_SCOMP_ATTACK,$fx_comp_atk_ov*7874,-1,4,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+8)
    set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_SCOMP_RELEASE,$fx_comp_rel_ov*7874,-1,4,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+8)
    set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_SCOMP_MAKEUP,$fx_comp_makeup_ov*250,-1,4,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+8)
    set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_SCOMP_MIX,$fx_comp_mix_ov*7874,-1,4,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+8)
    set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_SCOMP_THRESHOLD,$fx_comp_tres_master*250,-1,4,-1)
    set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_SCOMP_RATIO,$fx_comp_rat_master*7874,-1,4,-1)
    set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_SCOMP_ATTACK,$fx_comp_atk_master*7874,-1,4,-1)
    set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_SCOMP_RELEASE,$fx_comp_rel_master*7874,-1,4,-1)
    set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_SCOMP_MAKEUP,$fx_comp_makeup_master*250,-1,4,-1)
    set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_SCOMP_MIX,$fx_comp_mix_master*7874,-1,4,-1)
end function

function load_preset
    $i := 0
    while ($i<=8)
        %solo_arr[$i] := 0
        set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_SENDLEVEL_7,0,-1,7,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+$i)
        set_control_par_str(%solo_ui_ids[$i],$CONTROL_PAR_PICTURE,"dm_btn_solo")
        if (get_control_par(%solo_ui_ids[$i],$CONTROL_PAR_VALUE)=1)
            set_control_par(%solo_ui_ids[$i],$CONTROL_PAR_VALUE,0)
        end if
        inc($i)
    end while

    call update_all_volumes

    $anysolo := 0

    call fx_eq_td_comp_reset

    if($load_arr_id = -2)
        set_control_par_str(get_ui_id($mix_preset_label),$CONTROL_PAR_PICTURE,"preset_user")
    else
    if ($current_preset=1)
        $i := 0
        while ($i<=304)
            %save[$i] := %default__preset[$i]
            set_control_par_str(get_ui_id($mix_preset_label),$CONTROL_PAR_PICTURE,"preset_default")
            inc($i)
        end while
    else
    if ($current_preset=2)
        $i := 0
        while ($i<=304)
            %save[$i] := %preset_rock[$i]
            set_control_par_str(get_ui_id($mix_preset_label),$CONTROL_PAR_PICTURE,"preset_rock")
            inc($i)
        end while
    else
    if ($current_preset=3)
        $i := 0
        while ($i<=304)
            %save[$i] := %preset_lofi[$i]
            set_control_par_str(get_ui_id($mix_preset_label),$CONTROL_PAR_PICTURE,"preset_lofi")
            inc($i)
        end while
    else
    if ($current_preset=4)
        $i := 0
        while ($i<=304)
            %save[$i] := %preset_fx01[$i]
            set_control_par_str(get_ui_id($mix_preset_label),$CONTROL_PAR_PICTURE,"preset_fx1")
            inc($i)
        end while
    else
    if ($current_preset=5)
        $i := 0
        while ($i<=304)
            %save[$i] := %deftones__preset[$i]
            set_control_par_str(get_ui_id($mix_preset_label),$CONTROL_PAR_PICTURE,"preset_deftones")
            inc($i)
        end while
    else
    if ($current_preset=6)
        $i := 0
        while ($i<=304)
            %save[$i] := %demolofi__preset[$i]
            set_control_par_str(get_ui_id($mix_preset_label),$CONTROL_PAR_PICTURE,"preset_ambient")
            inc($i)
        end while
    else
    if ($current_preset=7)
        $i := 0
        while ($i<=304)
            %save[$i] := %funkh__preset[$i]
            set_control_par_str(get_ui_id($mix_preset_label),$CONTROL_PAR_PICTURE,"preset_funkh")
            inc($i)
        end while
    else
    if ($current_preset=8)
        $i := 0
        while ($i<=304)
            %save[$i] := %jazzfunk__preset[$i]
            set_control_par_str(get_ui_id($mix_preset_label),$CONTROL_PAR_PICTURE,"preset_jazzfunk")
            inc($i)
        end while
    else
    if ($current_preset=9)
        $i := 0
        while ($i<=304)
            %save[$i] := %limpbizkit__preset[$i]
            set_control_par_str(get_ui_id($mix_preset_label),$CONTROL_PAR_PICTURE,"preset_limp")
            inc($i)
        end while
    else
    if ($current_preset=10)
        $i := 0
        while ($i<=304)
            %save[$i] := %lofi2__preset[$i]
            set_control_par_str(get_ui_id($mix_preset_label),$CONTROL_PAR_PICTURE,"preset_lofi2")
            inc($i)
        end while
    else
    if ($current_preset=11)
        $i := 0
        while ($i<=304)
            %save[$i] := %metal1__preset[$i]
            set_control_par_str(get_ui_id($mix_preset_label),$CONTROL_PAR_PICTURE,"preset_metal")
            inc($i)
        end while
    else
    if ($current_preset=12)
        $i := 0
        while ($i<=304)
            %save[$i] := %metal2__preset[$i]
            set_control_par_str(get_ui_id($mix_preset_label),$CONTROL_PAR_PICTURE,"preset_metal2")
            inc($i)
        end while
    else
    if ($current_preset=13)
        $i := 0
        while ($i<=304)
            %save[$i] := %modernrock__preset[$i]
            set_control_par_str(get_ui_id($mix_preset_label),$CONTROL_PAR_PICTURE,"preset_modernrock")
            inc($i)
        end while
    else
    if ($current_preset=14)
        $i := 0
        while ($i<=304)
            %save[$i] := %chili__preset[$i]
            set_control_par_str(get_ui_id($mix_preset_label),$CONTROL_PAR_PICTURE,"preset_redhotchillipeppers")
            inc($i)
        end while
    else
    if ($current_preset=15)
        $i := 0
        while ($i<=304)
            %save[$i] := %postrock__preset[$i]
            set_control_par_str(get_ui_id($mix_preset_label),$CONTROL_PAR_PICTURE,"preset_postrock")
            inc($i)
        end while
    else
    if ($current_preset=16)
        $i := 0
        while ($i<=304)
            %save[$i] := %progressive__preset[$i]
            set_control_par_str(get_ui_id($mix_preset_label),$CONTROL_PAR_PICTURE,"preset_progressiverock")
            inc($i)
        end while
    else
    if ($current_preset=17)
        $i := 0
        while ($i<=304)
            %save[$i] := %rockj__preset[$i]
            set_control_par_str(get_ui_id($mix_preset_label),$CONTROL_PAR_PICTURE,"preset_rock2")
            inc($i)
        end while
    else
    if ($current_preset=18)
        $i := 0
        while ($i<=304)
            %save[$i] := %triphop__preset[$i]
            set_control_par_str(get_ui_id($mix_preset_label),$CONTROL_PAR_PICTURE,"preset_triphop")
            inc($i)
        end while
    else
    if ($current_preset=19)
        $i := 0
        while ($i<=304)
            %save[$i] := %winehouse__preset[$i]
            set_control_par_str(get_ui_id($mix_preset_label),$CONTROL_PAR_PICTURE,"preset_winehouse")
            inc($i)
        end while
    else
    if ($current_preset=20)
        $i := 0
        while ($i<=304)
            %save[$i] := %posthardcore__preset[$i]
            set_control_par_str(get_ui_id($mix_preset_label),$CONTROL_PAR_PICTURE,"preset_posthardcore")
            inc($i)
        end while
    else
    if ($current_preset=21)
        $i := 0
        while ($i<=304)
            %save[$i] := %normalj__preset[$i]
            set_control_par_str(get_ui_id($mix_preset_label),$CONTROL_PAR_PICTURE,"preset_normal")
            inc($i)
        end while
    else
    if ($current_preset=22)
        $i := 0
        while ($i<=304)
            %save[$i] := %phat__preset[$i]
            set_control_par_str(get_ui_id($mix_preset_label),$CONTROL_PAR_PICTURE,"preset_phat")
            inc($i)
        end while
    else
    if ($current_preset=23)
        $i := 0
        while ($i<=304)
            %save[$i] := %dirtyblues__preset[$i]
            set_control_par_str(get_ui_id($mix_preset_label),$CONTROL_PAR_PICTURE,"preset_dirtyblues")
            inc($i)
        end while
    else
    if ($current_preset=24)
        $i := 0
        while ($i<=304)
            %save[$i] := %dnb__preset[$i]
            set_control_par_str(get_ui_id($mix_preset_label),$CONTROL_PAR_PICTURE,"preset_dnb")
            inc($i)
        end while
    else
    if ($current_preset=25)
        $i := 0
        while ($i<=304)
            %save[$i] := %prodigy__preset[$i]
            set_control_par_str(get_ui_id($mix_preset_label),$CONTROL_PAR_PICTURE,"preset_prodigy")
            inc($i)
        end while
    else
    if ($current_preset=26)
        $i := 0
        while ($i<=304)
            %save[$i] := %cranked__preset[$i]
            set_control_par_str(get_ui_id($mix_preset_label),$CONTROL_PAR_PICTURE,"preset_cranked")
            inc($i)
        end while
    else
    if ($current_preset=27)
        $i := 0
        while ($i<=304)
            %save[$i] := %claustro__preset[$i]
            set_control_par_str(get_ui_id($mix_preset_label),$CONTROL_PAR_PICTURE,"preset_claustro")
            inc($i)
        end while
    else
    if ($current_preset=28)
        $i := 0
        while ($i<=304)
            %save[$i] := %modernsoul__preset[$i]
            set_control_par_str(get_ui_id($mix_preset_label),$CONTROL_PAR_PICTURE,"preset_modernsoul")
            inc($i)
        end while
    else
    if ($current_preset=29)
        $i := 0
        while ($i<=304)
            %save[$i] := %chemical1__preset[$i]
            set_control_par_str(get_ui_id($mix_preset_label),$CONTROL_PAR_PICTURE,"preset_chemical1")
            inc($i)
        end while
    else
    if ($current_preset=30)
        $i := 0
        while ($i<=304)
            %save[$i] := %chemical2__preset[$i]
            set_control_par_str(get_ui_id($mix_preset_label),$CONTROL_PAR_PICTURE,"preset_chemical2")
            inc($i)
        end while
    else
    if ($current_preset=31)
        $i := 0
        while ($i<=304)
            %save[$i] := %dub__preset[$i]
            set_control_par_str(get_ui_id($mix_preset_label),$CONTROL_PAR_PICTURE,"preset_dub")
            inc($i)
        end while
    else
    if ($current_preset=32)
        $i := 0
        while ($i<=304)
            %save[$i] := %oasis__preset[$i]
            set_control_par_str(get_ui_id($mix_preset_label),$CONTROL_PAR_PICTURE,"preset_oasis")
            inc($i)
        end while
    else
    if ($current_preset=33)
        $i := 0
        while ($i<=304)
            %save[$i] := %hifi__preset[$i]
            set_control_par_str(get_ui_id($mix_preset_label),$CONTROL_PAR_PICTURE,"preset_hifi")
            inc($i)
        end while
    else
    if ($current_preset=34)
        $i := 0
        while ($i<=304)
            %save[$i] := %natural__preset[$i]
            set_control_par_str(get_ui_id($mix_preset_label),$CONTROL_PAR_PICTURE,"preset_natural")
            inc($i)
        end while
    else
    if ($current_preset=35)
        $i := 0
        while ($i<=304)
            %save[$i] := %extreme__preset[$i]
            set_control_par_str(get_ui_id($mix_preset_label),$CONTROL_PAR_PICTURE,"preset_extreme")
            inc($i)
        end while
    else
    if ($current_preset=36)
        $i := 0
        while ($i<=304)
            %save[$i] := %init__preset[$i]
            set_control_par_str(get_ui_id($mix_preset_label),$CONTROL_PAR_PICTURE,"preset_init")
            inc($i)
        end while
    end if {36}
    end if {35}
    end if {34}
    end if {33}
    end if {32}
    end if {31}
    end if {30}
    end if {29}
    end if {28}
    end if {27}
    end if {26}
    end if {25}
    end if {24}
    end if {23}
    end if {22}
    end if {21}
    end if {20}
    end if {19}
    end if {18}
    end if {17}
    end if {16}
    end if {15}
    end if {14}
    end if {13}
    end if {12}
    end if {11}
    end if {10}
    end if { 9}
    end if { 8}
    end if { 7}
    end if { 6}
    end if { 5}
    end if { 4}
    end if { 3}
    end if { 2}
    end if { 1}
    end if

    set_control_par_str(get_ui_id($mix_edit_light),$CONTROL_PAR_PICTURE,"edit_light_inactive")
    $fx_eq_lf_hh := %save[0]
    $fx_eq_lg_hh := %save[1]
    $fx_eq_lb_hh := %save[2]
    $fx_eq_lmf_hh := %save[3]
    $fx_eq_lmg_hh := %save[4]
    $fx_eq_lmq_hh := %save[5]
    $fx_eq_hmf_hh := %save[6]
    $fx_eq_hmg_hh := %save[7]
    $fx_eq_hmq_hh := %save[8]
    $fx_eq_hf_hh := %save[9]
    $fx_eq_hg_hh := %save[10]
    $fx_eq_hb_hh := %save[11]
    $fx_eq_lf_bdi := %save[12]
    $fx_eq_lg_bdi := %save[13]
    $fx_eq_lb_bdi := %save[14]
    $fx_eq_lmf_bdi := %save[15]
    $fx_eq_lmg_bdi := %save[16]
    $fx_eq_lmq_bdi := %save[17]
    $fx_eq_hmf_bdi := %save[18]
    $fx_eq_hmg_bdi := %save[19]
    $fx_eq_hmq_bdi := %save[20]
    $fx_eq_hf_bdi := %save[21]
    $fx_eq_hg_bdi := %save[22]
    $fx_eq_hb_bdi := %save[23]
    $fx_eq_lf_bdo := %save[24]
    $fx_eq_lg_bdo := %save[25]
    $fx_eq_lb_bdo := %save[26]
    $fx_eq_lmf_bdo := %save[27]
    $fx_eq_lmg_bdo := %save[28]
    $fx_eq_lmq_bdo := %save[29]
    $fx_eq_hmf_bdo := %save[30]
    $fx_eq_hmg_bdo := %save[31]
    $fx_eq_hmq_bdo := %save[32]
    $fx_eq_hf_bdo := %save[33]
    $fx_eq_hg_bdo := %save[34]
    $fx_eq_hb_bdo := %save[35]
    $fx_eq_lf_sntop := %save[36]
    $fx_eq_lg_sntop := %save[37]
    $fx_eq_lb_sntop := %save[38]
    $fx_eq_lmf_sntop := %save[39]
    $fx_eq_lmg_sntop := %save[40]
    $fx_eq_lmq_sntop := %save[41]
    $fx_eq_hmf_sntop := %save[42]
    $fx_eq_hmg_sntop := %save[43]
    $fx_eq_hmq_sntop := %save[44]
    $fx_eq_hf_sntop := %save[45]
    $fx_eq_hg_sntop := %save[46]
    $fx_eq_hb_sntop := %save[47]
    $fx_eq_lf_snbt := %save[48]
    $fx_eq_lg_snbt := %save[49]
    $fx_eq_lb_snbt := %save[50]
    $fx_eq_lmf_snbt := %save[51]
    $fx_eq_lmg_snbt := %save[52]
    $fx_eq_lmq_snbt := %save[53]
    $fx_eq_hmf_snbt := %save[54]
    $fx_eq_hmg_snbt := %save[55]
    $fx_eq_hmq_snbt := %save[56]
    $fx_eq_hf_snbt := %save[57]
    $fx_eq_hg_snbt := %save[58]
    $fx_eq_hb_snbt := %save[59]
    $fx_eq_lf_tomhi := %save[60]
    $fx_eq_lg_tomhi := %save[61]
    $fx_eq_lb_tomhi := %save[62]
    $fx_eq_lmf_tomhi := %save[63]
    $fx_eq_lmg_tomhi := %save[64]
    $fx_eq_lmq_tomhi := %save[65]
    $fx_eq_hmf_tomhi := %save[66]
    $fx_eq_hmg_tomhi := %save[67]
    $fx_eq_hmq_tomhi := %save[68]

    $fx_comp_rel_sntop := %save[180]
    $fx_comp_rat_sntop := %save[181]
    $fx_comp_mix_sntop := %save[182]
    $fx_comp_makeup_sntop := %save[299]
    $fx_comp_tres_snbt := %save[183]
    $fx_comp_atk_snbt := %save[184]
    $fx_comp_rel_snbt := %save[185]
    $fx_comp_rat_snbt := %save[186]
    $fx_comp_mix_snbt := %save[187]
    $fx_comp_makeup_snbt := %save[188]
    $fx_comp_tres_tomhi := %save[189]
    $fx_comp_atk_tomhi := %save[190]
    $fx_comp_rel_tomhi := %save[191]
    $fx_comp_rat_tomhi := %save[192]
    $fx_comp_mix_tomhi := %save[193]
    $fx_comp_makeup_tomhi := %save[194]
    $fx_comp_tres_tommid := %save[195]
    $fx_comp_atk_tommid := %save[196]
    $fx_comp_rel_tommid := %save[197]
    $fx_comp_rat_tommid := %save[198]
    $fx_comp_mix_tommid := %save[199]
    $fx_comp_makeup_tommid := %save[200]
    $fx_comp_tres_tomlow := %save[201]
    $fx_comp_atk_tomlow := %save[202]
    $fx_comp_rel_tomlow := %save[203]
    $fx_comp_rat_tomlow := %save[204]
    $fx_comp_mix_tomlow := %save[205]
    $fx_comp_makeup_tomlow := %save[206]
    $fx_comp_tres_ov := %save[207]
    $fx_comp_atk_ov := %save[208]
    $fx_comp_rel_ov := %save[209]
    $fx_comp_rat_ov := %save[210]
    $fx_comp_mix_ov := %save[211]
    $fx_comp_makeup_ov := %save[212]
    $fx_comp_tres_master := %save[213]
    $fx_comp_atk_master := %save[214]
    $fx_comp_rel_master := %save[215]
    $fx_comp_rat_master := %save[216]
    $fx_comp_mix_master := %save[217]
    $fx_comp_makeup_master := %save[218]
    while ($mix_hh_vol # %save[230] or ($mix_bdi_vol # %save[231]) or ($mix_bdo_vol # %save[232]) or ($mix_sntop_vol # %save[233]) or ($mix_snbt_vol # %save[234]) or ($mix_tomhi_vol # %save[235]) or ($mix_tommid_vol # %save[236]) or ($mix_tomlow_vol # %save[237]) or ($mix_ov_vol # %save[238]) or ($mix_rev_vol # %save[239]))
        if ($mix_hh_vol<%save[230])
            inc($mix_hh_vol)
        else
        if ($mix_hh_vol>%save[230])
            dec($mix_hh_vol)
        end if
        end if
        if ($mix_bdi_vol<%save[231])
            inc($mix_bdi_vol)
        else
        if ($mix_bdi_vol>%save[231])
            dec($mix_bdi_vol)
        end if
        end if
        if ($mix_bdo_vol<%save[232])
            inc($mix_bdo_vol)
        else
        if ($mix_bdo_vol>%save[232])
            dec($mix_bdo_vol)
        end if
        end if
        if ($mix_sntop_vol<%save[233])
            inc($mix_sntop_vol)
        else
        if ($mix_sntop_vol>%save[233])
            dec($mix_sntop_vol)
        end if
        end if
        if ($mix_snbt_vol<%save[234])
            inc($mix_snbt_vol)
        else
        if ($mix_snbt_vol>%save[234])
            dec($mix_snbt_vol)
        end if
        end if
        if ($mix_tomhi_vol<%save[235])
            inc($mix_tomhi_vol)
        else
        if ($mix_tomhi_vol>%save[235])
            dec($mix_tomhi_vol)
        end if
        end if
        if ($mix_tommid_vol<%save[236])
            inc($mix_tommid_vol)
        else
        if ($mix_tommid_vol>%save[236])
            dec($mix_tommid_vol)
        end if
        end if
        if ($mix_tomlow_vol<%save[237])
            inc($mix_tomlow_vol)
        else
        if ($mix_tomlow_vol>%save[237])
            dec($mix_tomlow_vol)
        end if
        end if
        if ($mix_ov_vol<%save[238])
            inc($mix_ov_vol)
        else
        if ($mix_ov_vol>%save[238])
            dec($mix_ov_vol)
        end if
        end if
        if ($mix_rev_vol<%save[239])
            inc($mix_rev_vol)
        else
        if ($mix_rev_vol>%save[239])
            dec($mix_rev_vol)
        end if
        end if
        wait(2000)
    end while
    $mix_hh_pan := %save[240]
    $mix_bdi_pan := %save[241]
    $mix_bdo_pan := %save[242]
    $mix_sntop_pan := %save[243]
    $mix_snbt_pan := %save[244]
    $mix_tomhi_pan := %save[245]
    $mix_tommid_pan := %save[246]
    $mix_tomlow_pan := %save[247]
    $mix_ov_pan := %save[248]
    $mix_ov_spread := %save[249]
    $mix_ov_mono := %save[250]
    $mix_hh_ov := %save[251]
    $mix_bdi_ov := %save[252]
    $mix_sntop_ov := %save[254]
    $mix_tomhi_ov := %save[256]
    $mix_tommid_ov := %save[257]
    $mix_tomlow_ov := %save[258]
    $mix_hh_rev := %save[259]
    $mix_bdi_rev := %save[260]
    $mix_bdo_rev := %save[261]
    $mix_sntop_rev := %save[262]
    $mix_snbt_rev := %save[263]
    $mix_tomhi_rev := %save[264]
    $mix_tommid_rev := %save[265]
    $mix_tomlow_rev := %save[266]
    $mix_ov_rev := %save[267]
    $mix_bd_link := %save[268]
    $mix_bdo_phase := %save[269]
    $mix_sn_link := %save[270]
    $mix_snbt_phase := %save[271]
    $mix_rev_hp := %save[272]
    $mix_rev_lp := %save[273]
    $IR_current := %save[274]
    $drums_hh_mic_current := %save[280]
    $drums_bdi_mic_current := %save[281]
    $drums_bdo_mic_current := %save[282]
    $drums_sntop_mic_current := %save[283]
    $drums_snbt_mic_current := %save[284]
    $drums_tomhi_mic_current := %save[285]
    $drums_tommid_mic_current := %save[286]
    $drums_tomlow_mic_current := %save[287]
    $drums_ov_mic_current := %save[288]
    pgs_set_key_val(MICS,0,$drums_hh_mic_current)
    pgs_set_key_val(MICS,1,$drums_bdi_mic_current)
    pgs_set_key_val(MICS,2,$drums_bdo_mic_current)
    pgs_set_key_val(MICS,3,$drums_sntop_mic_current)
    pgs_set_key_val(MICS,4,$drums_snbt_mic_current)
    pgs_set_key_val(MICS,5,$drums_tomhi_mic_current)
    pgs_set_key_val(MICS,6,$drums_tommid_mic_current)
    pgs_set_key_val(MICS,7,$drums_tomlow_mic_current)
    pgs_set_key_val(MICS,8,$drums_ov_mic_current)
    $fx_td_soft_hh := %save[298]
    $fx_td_soft_bdi := %save[289]
    $fx_td_soft_bdo := %save[290]
    $fx_td_soft_sntop := %save[291]
    $fx_td_soft_snbt := %save[292]
    $fx_td_soft_tomhi := %save[293]
    $fx_td_soft_tommid := %save[294]
    $fx_td_soft_tomlow := %save[295]
    $fx_td_soft_ov := %save[296]
    $fx_td_soft_master := %save[297]
    $options_wires_snbtm := %save[301]
    $mix_swap := %save[302]
    if ($mix_bd_link=1)
        $mix_bd_diff := $mix_bdi_vol-$mix_bdo_vol
    else
    if ($mix_bd_link=0)
        set_control_par(get_ui_id($mix_bdi_vol),$CONTROL_PAR_MOUSE_BEHAVIOUR,$mix_vol_mousebehaviour)
        set_control_par(get_ui_id($mix_bdo_vol),$CONTROL_PAR_MOUSE_BEHAVIOUR,$mix_vol_mousebehaviour)
    end if
    end if
    if ($mix_sn_link=1)
        $mix_sn_diff := $mix_sntop_vol-$mix_snbt_vol
    else
    if ($mix_sn_link=0)
        set_control_par(get_ui_id($mix_sntop_vol),$CONTROL_PAR_MOUSE_BEHAVIOUR,$mix_vol_mousebehaviour)
        set_control_par(get_ui_id($mix_snbt_vol),$CONTROL_PAR_MOUSE_BEHAVIOUR,$mix_vol_mousebehaviour)
    end if
    end if

    call fx_set_engine_par

    if ($mix_hh_sel=1)
        $help1 := 0
        call assign_fx_hh
    else
    if ($mix_bdi_sel=1)
        $help1 := 1
        call assign_fx_bdi
    else
    if ($mix_bdo_sel=1)
        $help1 := 2
        call assign_fx_bdo
    else
    if ($mix_sntop_sel=1)
        $help1 := 3
        call assign_fx_sntop
    else
    if ($mix_snbt_sel=1)
        $help1 := 4
        call assign_fx_snbt
    else
    if ($mix_tomhi_sel=1)
        $help1 := 5
        call assign_fx_tomhi
    else
    if ($mix_tommid_sel=1)
        $help1 := 6
        call assign_fx_tommid
    else
    if ($mix_tomlow_sel=1)
        $help1 := 7
        call assign_fx_tomlow
    else
    if ($mix_ov_sel=1)
        $help1 := 8
        call assign_fx_ov
    else
    if ($mix_master_select=1)
        $help1 := 9
        call assign_fx_master
    end if
    end if
    end if
    end if
    end if
    end if
    end if
    end if
    end if
    end if

    if ($help1 # 9)
        @fx_eq_lf_str := get_engine_par_disp($ENGINE_PAR_SEQ_LF_FREQ,-1,1,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+$help1)
        @fx_eq_lg_str := get_engine_par_disp($ENGINE_PAR_SEQ_LF_GAIN,-1,1,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+$help1)
        @fx_eq_lmf_str := get_engine_par_disp($ENGINE_PAR_SEQ_LMF_FREQ,-1,1,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+$help1)
        @fx_eq_lmg_str := get_engine_par_disp($ENGINE_PAR_SEQ_LMF_GAIN,-1,1,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+$help1)
        @fx_eq_lmq_str := get_engine_par_disp($ENGINE_PAR_SEQ_LMF_Q,-1,1,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+$help1)
        @fx_eq_hmf_str := get_engine_par_disp($ENGINE_PAR_SEQ_HMF_FREQ,-1,1,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+$help1)
        @fx_eq_hmg_str := get_engine_par_disp($ENGINE_PAR_SEQ_HMF_GAIN,-1,1,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+$help1)
        @fx_eq_hmq_str := get_engine_par_disp($ENGINE_PAR_SEQ_HMF_Q,-1,1,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+$help1)
        @fx_eq_hf_str := get_engine_par_disp($ENGINE_PAR_SEQ_HF_FREQ,-1,1,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+$help1)
        @fx_eq_hg_str := get_engine_par_disp($ENGINE_PAR_SEQ_HF_GAIN,-1,1,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+$help1)
        set_text($fx_eq_lf_val,@fx_eq_lf_str)
        set_text($fx_eq_lg_val,@fx_eq_lg_str)
        set_text($fx_eq_lmf_val,@fx_eq_lmf_str)
        set_text($fx_eq_lmg_val,@fx_eq_lmg_str)
        set_text($fx_eq_lmq_val,@fx_eq_lmq_str)
        set_text($fx_eq_hmf_val,@fx_eq_hmf_str)
        set_text($fx_eq_hmg_val,@fx_eq_hmg_str)
        set_text($fx_eq_hmq_val,@fx_eq_hmq_str)
        set_text($fx_eq_hf_val,@fx_eq_hf_str)
        set_text($fx_eq_hg_val,@fx_eq_hg_str)
        @fx_td_in_str := get_engine_par_disp($ENGINE_PAR_TR_INPUT,-1,2,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+$help1)
        @fx_td_atk_str := get_engine_par_disp($ENGINE_PAR_TR_ATTACK,-1,2,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+$help1)
        @fx_td_rel_str := get_engine_par_disp($ENGINE_PAR_TR_SUSTAIN,-1,2,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+$help1)
        @fx_td_out_str := get_engine_par_disp($ENGINE_PAR_INSERT_EFFECT_OUTPUT_GAIN,-1,2,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+$help1)
        set_text($fx_td_in_val,@fx_td_in_str)
        set_text($fx_td_atk_val,@fx_td_atk_str)
        set_text($fx_td_rel_val,@fx_td_rel_str)
        set_text($fx_td_out_val,@fx_td_out_str)
        @fx_comp_tres_str := get_engine_par_disp($ENGINE_PAR_SCOMP_THRESHOLD,-1,4,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+$help1)
        @fx_comp_atk_str := get_engine_par_disp($ENGINE_PAR_SCOMP_ATTACK,-1,4,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+$help1)
        @fx_comp_rel_str := get_engine_par_disp($ENGINE_PAR_SCOMP_RELEASE,-1,4,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+$help1)
        @fx_comp_rat_str := get_engine_par_disp($ENGINE_PAR_SCOMP_RATIO,-1,4,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+$help1)
        @fx_comp_mix_str := get_engine_par_disp($ENGINE_PAR_SCOMP_MIX,-1,4,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+$help1)
        @fx_comp_makeup_str := get_engine_par_disp($ENGINE_PAR_SCOMP_MAKEUP,-1,4,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+$help1)
        set_text($fx_comp_tres_val,@fx_comp_tres_str)
        set_text($fx_comp_atk_val,@fx_comp_atk_str)
        set_text($fx_comp_rel_val,@fx_comp_rel_str)
        set_text($fx_comp_rat_val,"1:" & @fx_comp_rat_str)
        set_text($fx_comp_mix_val,@fx_comp_mix_str)
        set_text($fx_comp_makeup_val,@fx_comp_makeup_str)
    else
    if ($help1=9)
        @fx_eq_lf_str := get_engine_par_disp($ENGINE_PAR_SEQ_LF_FREQ,-1,1,-1)
        @fx_eq_lg_str := get_engine_par_disp($ENGINE_PAR_SEQ_LF_GAIN,-1,1,-1)
        @fx_eq_lmf_str := get_engine_par_disp($ENGINE_PAR_SEQ_LMF_FREQ,-1,1,-1)
        @fx_eq_lmg_str := get_engine_par_disp($ENGINE_PAR_SEQ_LMF_GAIN,-1,1,-1)
        @fx_eq_lmq_str := get_engine_par_disp($ENGINE_PAR_SEQ_LMF_Q,-1,1,-1)
        @fx_eq_hmf_str := get_engine_par_disp($ENGINE_PAR_SEQ_HMF_FREQ,-1,1,-1)
        @fx_eq_hmg_str := get_engine_par_disp($ENGINE_PAR_SEQ_HMF_GAIN,-1,1,-1)
        @fx_eq_hmq_str := get_engine_par_disp($ENGINE_PAR_SEQ_HMF_Q,-1,1,-1)
        @fx_eq_hf_str := get_engine_par_disp($ENGINE_PAR_SEQ_HF_FREQ,-1,1,-1)
        @fx_eq_hg_str := get_engine_par_disp($ENGINE_PAR_SEQ_HF_GAIN,-1,1,-1)
        set_text($fx_eq_lf_val,@fx_eq_lf_str)
        set_text($fx_eq_lg_val,@fx_eq_lg_str)
        set_text($fx_eq_lmf_val,@fx_eq_lmf_str)
        set_text($fx_eq_lmg_val,@fx_eq_lmg_str)
        set_text($fx_eq_lmq_val,@fx_eq_lmq_str)
        set_text($fx_eq_hmf_val,@fx_eq_hmf_str)
        set_text($fx_eq_hmg_val,@fx_eq_hmg_str)
        set_text($fx_eq_hmq_val,@fx_eq_hmq_str)
        set_text($fx_eq_hf_val,@fx_eq_hf_str)
        set_text($fx_eq_hg_val,@fx_eq_hg_str)
        @fx_td_in_str := get_engine_par_disp($ENGINE_PAR_TR_INPUT,-1,2,-1)
        @fx_td_atk_str := get_engine_par_disp($ENGINE_PAR_TR_ATTACK,-1,2,-1)
        @fx_td_rel_str := get_engine_par_disp($ENGINE_PAR_TR_SUSTAIN,-1,2,-1)
        @fx_td_out_str := get_engine_par_disp($ENGINE_PAR_INSERT_EFFECT_OUTPUT_GAIN,-1,2,-1)
        set_text($fx_td_in_val,@fx_td_in_str)
        set_text($fx_td_atk_val,@fx_td_atk_str)
        set_text($fx_td_rel_val,@fx_td_rel_str)
        set_text($fx_td_out_val,@fx_td_out_str)
        @fx_comp_tres_str := get_engine_par_disp($ENGINE_PAR_SCOMP_THRESHOLD,-1,4,-1)
        @fx_comp_atk_str := get_engine_par_disp($ENGINE_PAR_SCOMP_ATTACK,-1,4,-1)
        @fx_comp_rel_str := get_engine_par_disp($ENGINE_PAR_SCOMP_RELEASE,-1,4,-1)
        @fx_comp_rat_str := get_engine_par_disp($ENGINE_PAR_SCOMP_RATIO,-1,4,-1)
        @fx_comp_mix_str := get_engine_par_disp($ENGINE_PAR_SCOMP_MIX,-1,4,-1)
        @fx_comp_makeup_str := get_engine_par_disp($ENGINE_PAR_SCOMP_MAKEUP,-1,4,-1)
        set_text($fx_comp_tres_val,@fx_comp_tres_str)
        set_text($fx_comp_atk_val,@fx_comp_atk_str)
        set_text($fx_comp_rel_val,@fx_comp_rel_str)
        set_text($fx_comp_rat_val,"1:" & @fx_comp_rat_str)
        set_text($fx_comp_mix_val,@fx_comp_mix_str)
        set_text($fx_comp_makeup_val,@fx_comp_makeup_str)
    end if
    end if
    set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_PAN,$mix_hh_pan*500,-1,-1,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+0)
    set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_PAN,$mix_bdi_pan*500,-1,-1,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+1)
    set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_PAN,$mix_bdo_pan*500,-1,-1,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+2)
    set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_PAN,$mix_sntop_pan*500,-1,-1,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+3)
    set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_PAN,$mix_snbt_pan*500,-1,-1,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+4)
    set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_PAN,$mix_tomhi_pan*500,-1,-1,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+5)
    set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_PAN,$mix_tommid_pan*500,-1,-1,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+6)
    set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_PAN,$mix_tomlow_pan*500,-1,-1,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+7)
    call update_all_volumes
    if ($mix_ov_mono=0)
        set_control_par(get_ui_id($mix_ov_pan),$CONTROL_PAR_HIDE,$HIDE_WHOLE_CONTROL)
        set_control_par(get_ui_id($mix_ov_spread),$CONTROL_PAR_HIDE,$HIDE_PART_NOTHING)
        set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_STEREO_PAN,500000,-1,6,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+8)
        set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_STEREO,$mix_ov_spread*250,-1,6,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+8)
    else
    if ($mix_ov_mono=1)
        set_control_par(get_ui_id($mix_ov_spread),$CONTROL_PAR_HIDE,$HIDE_WHOLE_CONTROL)
        set_control_par(get_ui_id($mix_ov_pan),$CONTROL_PAR_HIDE,$HIDE_PART_NOTHING)
        set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_STEREO_PAN,$mix_ov_pan*500,-1,6,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+8)
        set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_STEREO,0,-1,6,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+8)
    end if
    end if
    set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_IRC_FREQ_HIGHPASS_LR,$mix_rev_hp*7874,-1,7,0)
    set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_IRC_FREQ_HIGHPASS_ER,$mix_rev_hp*7874,-1,7,0)
    set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_IRC_FREQ_LOWPASS_LR,$mix_rev_lp*7874,-1,7,0)
    set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_IRC_FREQ_LOWPASS_ER,$mix_rev_lp*7874,-1,7,0)
    set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_SEND_EFFECT_OUTPUT_GAIN,$mix_rev_vol*5200,-1,7,0)
    $load_ir_id := load_ir_sample(!IR_id[$IR_current],7,0)
    set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_SENDLEVEL_7,$mix_hh_rev*$mix_hh_vol*62,-1,7,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+0)
    set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_SENDLEVEL_7,$mix_bdi_rev*$mix_bdi_vol*62,-1,7,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+1)
    set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_SENDLEVEL_7,$mix_bdo_rev*$mix_bdo_vol*62,-1,7,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+2)
    set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_SENDLEVEL_7,$mix_sntop_rev*$mix_sntop_vol*62,-1,7,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+3)
    set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_SENDLEVEL_7,$mix_snbt_rev*$mix_snbt_vol*62,-1,7,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+4)
    set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_SENDLEVEL_7,$mix_tomhi_rev*$mix_tomhi_vol*62,-1,7,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+5)
    set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_SENDLEVEL_7,$mix_tommid_rev*$mix_tommid_vol*62,-1,7,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+6)
    set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_SENDLEVEL_7,$mix_tomlow_rev*$mix_tomlow_vol*62,-1,7,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+7)
    set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_SENDLEVEL_7,$mix_ov_rev*$mix_ov_vol*62,-1,7,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+8)
    
    call update_mic_fader_labels

    if ($mix_swap=0)
        set_control_par_str(get_ui_id($mix_view_label),$CONTROL_PAR_PICTURE,"view_drummer")
    else
    if ($mix_swap=1)
        set_control_par_str(get_ui_id($mix_view_label),$CONTROL_PAR_PICTURE,"view_auditorial")
    end if
    end if
    set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_EFFECT_BYPASS,$mix_swap,-1,5,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+8)
    set_control_par_str(get_ui_id($mix_rev_label),$CONTROL_PAR_PICTURE,!ir_id_pic[$IR_current])
end function

on persistence_changed
    {call fx_set_engine_par}
    if ($menu_drums=1)
        set_skin_offset(0)
        $i := 1
        while ($i<=$id1)
            set_control_par(%ui_id1[$i],$CONTROL_PAR_HIDE,$HIDE_PART_NOTHING)
            inc($i)
        end while
        call set_mic_pictures
        $drums_hh_micthumb := 0
        $drums_bdi_micthumb := 0
        $drums_bdo_micthumb := 0
        $drums_sntop_micthumb := 0
        $drums_snbt_micthumb := 0
        $drums_tomhi_micthumb := 0
        $drums_tommid_micthumb := 0
        $drums_tomlow_micthumb := 0
        $drums_ov_micthumb := 0
        call set_micthumb
    else
    if ($menu_mixer=1)
        set_skin_offset(1204)
        $i := 1
        while ($i<=$id2)
            set_control_par(%ui_id2[$i],$CONTROL_PAR_HIDE,$HIDE_PART_NOTHING)
            inc($i)
        end while
        if ($mix_hh_sel=1)
            $busidx := 0
            set_control_par_str(get_ui_id($fx_instr_label),$CONTROL_PAR_PICTURE,@fx_instr_label_hh)
            $fx_td_soft_hh := get_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_TR_SMOOTH,-1,2,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+$busidx)
            call assign_fx_hh
            call set_fx_text
        else
        if ($mix_bdi_sel=1)
            $busidx := 1
            set_control_par_str(get_ui_id($fx_instr_label),$CONTROL_PAR_PICTURE,@fx_instr_label_bdi)
            $fx_td_soft_bdi := get_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_TR_SMOOTH,-1,2,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+$busidx)
            call assign_fx_bdi
            call set_fx_text
        else
        if ($mix_bdo_sel=1)
            $busidx := 2
            set_control_par_str(get_ui_id($fx_instr_label),$CONTROL_PAR_PICTURE,@fx_instr_label_bdo)
            $fx_td_soft_bdo := get_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_TR_SMOOTH,-1,2,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+$busidx)
            call assign_fx_bdo
            call set_fx_text
        else
        if ($mix_sntop_sel=1)
            $busidx := 3
            set_control_par_str(get_ui_id($fx_instr_label),$CONTROL_PAR_PICTURE,@fx_instr_label_sntop)
            $fx_td_soft_sntop := get_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_TR_SMOOTH,-1,2,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+$busidx)
            call assign_fx_sntop
            call set_fx_text
        else
        if ($mix_snbt_sel=1)
            $busidx := 4
            set_control_par_str(get_ui_id($fx_instr_label),$CONTROL_PAR_PICTURE,@fx_instr_label_snbt)
            $fx_td_soft_snbt := get_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_TR_SMOOTH,-1,2,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+$busidx)
            call assign_fx_snbt
            call set_fx_text
        else
        if ($mix_tomhi_sel=1)
            $busidx := 5
            set_control_par_str(get_ui_id($fx_instr_label),$CONTROL_PAR_PICTURE,@fx_instr_label_tomhi)
            $fx_td_soft_tomhi := get_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_TR_SMOOTH,-1,2,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+$busidx)
            call assign_fx_tomhi
            call set_fx_text
        else
        if ($mix_tommid_sel=1)
            $busidx := 6
            set_control_par_str(get_ui_id($fx_instr_label),$CONTROL_PAR_PICTURE,@fx_instr_label_tommid)
            $fx_td_soft_tommid := get_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_TR_SMOOTH,-1,2,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+$busidx)
            call assign_fx_tommid
            call set_fx_text
        else
        if ($mix_tomlow_sel=1)
            $busidx := 7
            set_control_par_str(get_ui_id($fx_instr_label),$CONTROL_PAR_PICTURE,@fx_instr_label_tomlow)
            $fx_td_soft_tomlow := get_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_TR_SMOOTH,-1,2,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+$busidx)
            call assign_fx_tomlow
            call set_fx_text
        else
        if ($mix_ov_sel=1)
            $busidx := 8
            set_control_par_str(get_ui_id($fx_instr_label),$CONTROL_PAR_PICTURE,@fx_instr_label_ov)
            $fx_td_soft_ov := get_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_TR_SMOOTH,-1,2,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+$busidx)
            call assign_fx_ov
            call set_fx_text
        else
        if ($mix_master_select=1)
            $busidx := -1025
            set_control_par_str(get_ui_id($fx_instr_label),$CONTROL_PAR_PICTURE,@fx_instr_label_master)
            $fx_td_soft_master := get_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_TR_SMOOTH,-1,2,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+$busidx)
            call assign_fx_master
            call set_fx_text
        end if {($mix_master_select=1)}
        end if {($mix_ov_sel=1)}
        end if {($mix_tomlow_sel=1)}
        end if {($mix_tommid_sel=1)}
        end if {($mix_tomhi_sel=1)}
        end if {($mix_snbt_sel=1)}
        end if {($mix_sntop_sel=1)}
        end if {($mix_bdo_sel=1)}
        end if {($mix_bdi_sel=1)}
        end if {($mix_hh_sel=1)}

        call update_mic_fader_labels
        call update_fx_controls

        if ($mix_ov_mono=0)
            set_control_par(get_ui_id($mix_ov_pan),$CONTROL_PAR_HIDE,$HIDE_WHOLE_CONTROL)
        else
        if ($mix_ov_mono=1)
            set_control_par(get_ui_id($mix_ov_spread),$CONTROL_PAR_HIDE,$HIDE_WHOLE_CONTROL)
        end if
        end if

        set_control_par_str(get_ui_id($mix_rev_label),$CONTROL_PAR_PICTURE,!ir_id_pic[$IR_current])

    else
    if ($menu_beats=1)
        set_skin_offset(2408)
        $i := 1
        while ($i<=$id6)
            set_control_par(%ui_id6[$i],$CONTROL_PAR_HIDE,$HIDE_PART_NOTHING)
            inc($i)
        end while
    else
    if ($menu_option=1)
        set_skin_offset(1806)
        $i := 1
        while ($i<=$id5)
            set_control_par(%ui_id5[$i],$CONTROL_PAR_HIDE,$HIDE_PART_NOTHING)
            inc($i)
        end while
        set_control_par(get_ui_id($credits),$CONTROL_PAR_HIDE,$HIDE_WHOLE_CONTROL)
    else
    if ($menu_micsel=1)
        call hide_all_controls
        set_skin_offset(602)
        $i := 1
        while ($i<=$id3)
            set_control_par(%ui_id3[$i],$CONTROL_PAR_HIDE,$HIDE_PART_NOTHING)
            inc($i)
        end while
        if ($mix_hh_sel=1)
            $mic_current := 1
        else
        if ($mix_bdi_sel=1)
            $mic_current := 2
        else
        if ($mix_bdo_sel=1)
            $mic_current := 3
        else
        if ($mix_sntop_sel=1)
            $mic_current := 4
        else
        if ($mix_snbt_sel=1)
            $mic_current := 5
        else
        if ($mix_tomhi_sel=1)
            $mic_current := 6
        else
        if ($mix_tommid_sel=1)
            $mic_current := 7
        else
        if ($mix_tomlow_sel=1)
            $mic_current := 8
        else
        if ($mix_ov_sel=1 or $mix_ov_sel=0)
            {if master selected or nothing selected show overheads mic page}
            $mic_current := 9
        end if {($mix_ov_sel=1)}
        end if {($mix_tomlow_sel=1)}
        end if {($mix_tommid_sel=1)}
        end if {($mix_tomhi_sel=1)}
        end if {($mix_snbt_sel=1)}
        end if {($mix_sntop_sel=1)}
        end if {($mix_bdo_sel=1)}
        end if {($mix_bdi_sel=1)}
        end if {($mix_hh_sel=1)}
        call update_mic_pictures
        call reset_mic_0db
    end if {-($menu_micsel=1)}
    end if {-($menu_option=1)}
    end if {-($menu_beats=1)}
    end if {-($menu_mixer=1)}
    end if {-($menu_drums=1)}

    if ($mix_bd_link=1)
        $mix_bd_diff := $mix_bdi_vol-$mix_bdo_vol
    else
    if ($mix_bd_link=0)
        set_control_par(get_ui_id($mix_bdi_vol),$CONTROL_PAR_MOUSE_BEHAVIOUR,$mix_vol_mousebehaviour)
        set_control_par(get_ui_id($mix_bdo_vol),$CONTROL_PAR_MOUSE_BEHAVIOUR,$mix_vol_mousebehaviour)
    end if
    end if
    {wires}
    set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_VOLUME,$options_wires_snbtm*7874,97,-1,-1)
    set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_VOLUME,$options_wires_snbtm*6174,98,-1,-1)
    if ($options_wires_snbtm>60)
        pgs_set_key_val(MICS,9,1)
        pgs_set_key_val(MICS,10,1)
        if ($wire_purge_status = 0)
            $i := 0
            while($i < 30)
                purge_group(%nowire_groups[$i], 0)
                inc($i)
            end while
            $i := 0
            while($i < 38)
                purge_group(%wire_groups[$i], 1)
                inc($i)
            end while
            $wire_purge_status := 1
        end if
    else
    if ($options_wires_snbtm<=60)
        pgs_set_key_val(MICS,9,0)
        pgs_set_key_val(MICS,10,0)
        if ($wire_purge_status = 1)
            $i := 0
            while($i < 38)
                purge_group(%wire_groups[$i], 0)
                inc($i)
            end while
            $i := 0
            while($i < 30)
                purge_group(%nowire_groups[$i], 1)
                inc($i)
            end while
            $wire_purge_status := 0
        end if
    end if
    end if
end on {persistence_changed}

on ui_control($menu_output_hh)
    set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_OUTPUT_CHANNEL,$menu_output_hh,-1,-1,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+0)
end on
on ui_control($menu_output_bdi)
    set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_OUTPUT_CHANNEL,$menu_output_bdi,-1,-1,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+1)
end on
on ui_control($menu_output_bdo)
    set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_OUTPUT_CHANNEL,$menu_output_bdo,-1,-1,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+2)
end on
on ui_control($menu_output_sntop)
    set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_OUTPUT_CHANNEL,$menu_output_sntop,-1,-1,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+3)
end on
on ui_control($menu_output_snbt)
    set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_OUTPUT_CHANNEL,$menu_output_snbt,-1,-1,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+4)
end on
on ui_control($menu_output_tomhi)
    set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_OUTPUT_CHANNEL,$menu_output_tomhi,-1,-1,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+5)
end on
on ui_control($menu_output_tommid)
    set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_OUTPUT_CHANNEL,$menu_output_tommid,-1,-1,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+6)
end on
on ui_control($menu_output_tomlow)
    set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_OUTPUT_CHANNEL,$menu_output_tomlow,-1,-1,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+7)
end on
on ui_control($menu_output_ov)
    set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_OUTPUT_CHANNEL,$menu_output_ov,-1,-1,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+8)
end on

on ui_control($menu_option)
    $i := 0
    while ($i<=4)
        if ($i # 0)
            set_control_par(%menu_ui_ids[$i],$CONTROL_PAR_VALUE,0)
        end if
        set_control_par(%menu_ui_ids[0],$CONTROL_PAR_VALUE,1)
        inc($i)
    end while
    if ($menu_option=1)
        call hide_all_controls
        set_skin_offset(1806)
        $i := 1
        while ($i<=$id5)
            set_control_par(%ui_id5[$i],$CONTROL_PAR_HIDE,$HIDE_PART_NOTHING)
            inc($i)
        end while
        set_control_par(get_ui_id($credits),$CONTROL_PAR_HIDE,$HIDE_WHOLE_CONTROL)
    end if
end on

on ui_control($menu_micsel)
    call highlight_menu_micsel
    if ($menu_micsel=1)
        call hide_all_controls
        set_skin_offset(602)
        $i := 1
        while ($i<=$id3)
            set_control_par(%ui_id3[$i],$CONTROL_PAR_HIDE,$HIDE_PART_NOTHING)
            inc($i)
        end while
        if ($mix_hh_sel=1)
            $mic_current := 1
        else
        if ($mix_bdi_sel=1)
            $mic_current := 2
        else
        if ($mix_bdo_sel=1)
            $mic_current := 3
        else
        if ($mix_sntop_sel=1)
            $mic_current := 4
        else
        if ($mix_snbt_sel=1)
            $mic_current := 5
        else
        if ($mix_tomhi_sel=1)
            $mic_current := 6
        else
        if ($mix_tommid_sel=1)
            $mic_current := 7
        else
        if ($mix_tomlow_sel=1)
            $mic_current := 8
        else
        if ($mix_ov_sel=1 or $mix_ov_sel=0 or $mix_master_select=1)
            {if master selected or nothing selected display overheads page}
            $mic_current := 9
        end if {($mix_ov_sel=1)}
        end if {($mix_tomlow_sel=1)}
        end if {($mix_tommid_sel=1)}
        end if {($mix_tomhi_sel=1)}
        end if {($mix_snbt_sel=1)}
        end if {($mix_sntop_sel=1)}
        end if {($mix_bdo_sel=1)}
        end if {($mix_bdi_sel=1)}
        end if {($mix_hh_sel=1)}
        call update_mic_pictures
        call reset_mic_0db
    end if {-($menu_micsel=1)}
end on

on ui_control($menu_mixer)
    $i := 0
    while ($i<=4)
        if ($i # 2)
            set_control_par(%menu_ui_ids[$i],$CONTROL_PAR_VALUE,0)
        end if
        set_control_par(%menu_ui_ids[2],$CONTROL_PAR_VALUE,1)
        inc($i)
    end while
    if ($menu_mixer=1)
        call hide_all_controls
        set_skin_offset(1204)
        $i := 1
        while ($i<=$id2)
            set_control_par(%ui_id2[$i],$CONTROL_PAR_HIDE,$HIDE_PART_NOTHING)
            inc($i)
        end while

        if ($mix_hh_sel=1)
            $busidx := 0
            set_control_par_str(get_ui_id($fx_instr_label),$CONTROL_PAR_PICTURE,@fx_instr_label_hh)
            $fx_td_soft_hh := get_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_TR_SMOOTH,-1,2,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+$busidx)
            call assign_fx_hh
            call set_fx_text
        else
        if ($mix_bdi_sel=1)
            $busidx := 1
            set_control_par_str(get_ui_id($fx_instr_label),$CONTROL_PAR_PICTURE,@fx_instr_label_bdi)
            $fx_td_soft_bdi := get_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_TR_SMOOTH,-1,2,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+$busidx)
            call assign_fx_bdi
            call set_fx_text
        else
        if ($mix_bdo_sel=1)
            $busidx := 2
            set_control_par_str(get_ui_id($fx_instr_label),$CONTROL_PAR_PICTURE,@fx_instr_label_bdo)
            $fx_td_soft_bdo := get_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_TR_SMOOTH,-1,2,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+$busidx)
            call assign_fx_bdo
            call set_fx_text
        else
        if ($mix_sntop_sel=1)
            $busidx := 3
            set_control_par_str(get_ui_id($fx_instr_label),$CONTROL_PAR_PICTURE,@fx_instr_label_sntop)
            $fx_td_soft_sntop := get_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_TR_SMOOTH,-1,2,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+$busidx)
            call assign_fx_sntop
            call set_fx_text
        else
        if ($mix_snbt_sel=1)
            $busidx := 4
            set_control_par_str(get_ui_id($fx_instr_label),$CONTROL_PAR_PICTURE,@fx_instr_label_snbt)
            $fx_td_soft_snbt := get_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_TR_SMOOTH,-1,2,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+$busidx)
            call assign_fx_snbt
            call set_fx_text
        else
        if ($mix_tomhi_sel=1)
            $busidx := 5
            set_control_par_str(get_ui_id($fx_instr_label),$CONTROL_PAR_PICTURE,@fx_instr_label_tomhi)
            $fx_td_soft_tomhi := get_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_TR_SMOOTH,-1,2,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+$busidx)
            call assign_fx_tomhi
            call set_fx_text
        else
        if ($mix_tommid_sel=1)
            $busidx := 6
            set_control_par_str(get_ui_id($fx_instr_label),$CONTROL_PAR_PICTURE,@fx_instr_label_tommid)
            $fx_td_soft_tommid := get_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_TR_SMOOTH,-1,2,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+$busidx)
            call assign_fx_tommid
            call set_fx_text
        else
        if ($mix_tomlow_sel=1)
            $busidx := 7
            set_control_par_str(get_ui_id($fx_instr_label),$CONTROL_PAR_PICTURE,@fx_instr_label_tomlow)
            $fx_td_soft_tomlow := get_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_TR_SMOOTH,-1,2,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+$busidx)
            call assign_fx_tomlow
            call set_fx_text
        else
        if ($mix_ov_sel=1)
            $busidx := 8
            set_control_par_str(get_ui_id($fx_instr_label),$CONTROL_PAR_PICTURE,@fx_instr_label_ov)
            $fx_td_soft_ov := get_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_TR_SMOOTH,-1,2,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+$busidx)
            call assign_fx_ov
            call set_fx_text
        else
        if ($mix_master_select=1)
            $busidx := -1025
            set_control_par_str(get_ui_id($fx_instr_label),$CONTROL_PAR_PICTURE,@fx_instr_label_master)
            $fx_td_soft_master := get_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_TR_SMOOTH,-1,2,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+$busidx)
            call assign_fx_master
            call set_fx_text
        end if {($mix_master_select=1)}
        end if {($mix_ov_sel=1)}
        end if {($mix_tomlow_sel=1)}
        end if {($mix_tommid_sel=1)}
        end if {($mix_tomhi_sel=1)}
        end if {($mix_snbt_sel=1)}
        end if {($mix_sntop_sel=1)}
        end if {($mix_bdo_sel=1)}
        end if {($mix_bdi_sel=1)}
        end if {($mix_hh_sel=1)}

        call update_mic_fader_labels
        call update_fx_controls

        if ($mix_ov_mono=0)
            set_control_par(get_ui_id($mix_ov_pan),$CONTROL_PAR_HIDE,$HIDE_WHOLE_CONTROL)
        else
        if ($mix_ov_mono=1)
            set_control_par(get_ui_id($mix_ov_spread),$CONTROL_PAR_HIDE,$HIDE_WHOLE_CONTROL)
        end if
        end if

    set_control_par_str(get_ui_id($mix_rev_label),$CONTROL_PAR_PICTURE,!ir_id_pic[$IR_current])

    end if

end on

on ui_control($menu_drums)
    $i := 0
    while ($i<=4)
        if ($i # 3)
            set_control_par(%menu_ui_ids[$i],$CONTROL_PAR_VALUE,0)
        end if
        set_control_par(%menu_ui_ids[3],$CONTROL_PAR_VALUE,1)
        inc($i)
    end while
    $drums_hh_micthumb := 0
    if ($menu_drums=1)
        call hide_all_controls
        set_skin_offset(0)
        $i := 1
        while ($i<=$id1)
            set_control_par(%ui_id1[$i],$CONTROL_PAR_HIDE,$HIDE_PART_NOTHING)
            inc($i)
        end while
        call set_mic_pictures
        $drums_hh_micthumb := 0
        $drums_bdi_micthumb := 0
        $drums_bdo_micthumb := 0
        $drums_sntop_micthumb := 0
        $drums_snbt_micthumb := 0
        $drums_tomhi_micthumb := 0
        $drums_tommid_micthumb := 0
        $drums_tomlow_micthumb := 0
        $drums_ov_micthumb := 0
        call set_micthumb
    end if
end on

on ui_control($menu_beats)
    $i := 0
    while ($i<=4)
        if ($i # 4)
            set_control_par(%menu_ui_ids[$i],$CONTROL_PAR_VALUE,0)
        end if
        set_control_par(%menu_ui_ids[4],$CONTROL_PAR_VALUE,1)
        inc($i)
    end while
    call hide_all_controls
    set_skin_offset(2408)
    $i := 1
    while ($i<=$id6)
        set_control_par(%ui_id6[$i],$CONTROL_PAR_HIDE,$HIDE_PART_NOTHING)
        inc($i)
    end while
end on

on ui_control($drums_hh_micthumb)
    call highlight_menu_micsel
    call hide_all_controls
    call unselect_all_channels
    $mic_current := 1
    $mix_hh_sel := 1
    set_skin_offset(602)
    $i := 1
    while ($i<=$id3)
        set_control_par(%ui_id3[$i],$CONTROL_PAR_HIDE,$HIDE_PART_NOTHING)
        inc($i)
    end while
    call update_mic_pictures
    call reset_mic_0db
    $busidx := 0
    call update_solo_status
    call fx_eq_td_comp_reset
end on

on ui_control($drums_bdi_micthumb)
    call highlight_menu_micsel
    call hide_all_controls
    call unselect_all_channels
    $mic_current := 2
    $mix_bdi_sel := 1
    set_skin_offset(602)
    $i := 1
    while ($i<=$id3)
        set_control_par(%ui_id3[$i],$CONTROL_PAR_HIDE,$HIDE_PART_NOTHING)
        inc($i)
    end while
    call update_mic_pictures
    call reset_mic_0db
    $busidx := 1
    call update_solo_status
    call fx_eq_td_comp_reset
end on

    call hide_all_controls

    call highlight_menu_micsel
    call hide_all_controls
    call unselect_all_channels
    $mic_current := 9
    $mix_ov_sel := 1
    set_skin_offset(602)
    $i := 1

        set_control_par(%ui_id3[$i],$CONTROL_PAR_HIDE,$HIDE_PART_NOTHING)
        inc($i)
    end while
    call update_mic_pictures
    call reset_mic_0db
    $busidx := 8
    call update_solo_status
    call fx_eq_td_comp_reset
end on

on ui_control($mic_gallery_select1)
    set_control_par_str(get_ui_id($mix_edit_light),$CONTROL_PAR_PICTURE,"edit_light_active")
    if ($mic_current=1)
        $drums_hh_mic_current := 1
        set_control_par_str(get_ui_id($mic_img_current),$CONTROL_PAR_PICTURE,!pic_close_hh[1])
        pgs_set_key_val(MICS,0,$drums_hh_mic_current)
    else
    if ($mic_current=2)
        $drums_bdi_mic_current := 1
        set_control_par_str(get_ui_id($mic_img_current),$CONTROL_PAR_PICTURE,!pic_close_bdi[1])
        pgs_set_key_val(MICS,1,$drums_bdi_mic_current)
    else
    if ($mic_current=3)
        $drums_bdo_mic_current := 1
        set_control_par_str(get_ui_id($mic_img_current),$CONTROL_PAR_PICTURE,!pic_close_bdo[1])
        pgs_set_key_val(MICS,2,$drums_bdo_mic_current)
    else
    if ($mic_current=4)
        $drums_sntop_mic_current := 1
        set_control_par_str(get_ui_id($mic_img_current),$CONTROL_PAR_PICTURE,!pic_close_sntop[1])
        pgs_set_key_val(MICS,3,$drums_sntop_mic_current)
    else
    if ($mic_current=5)
        $drums_snbt_mic_current := 1
        set_control_par_str(get_ui_id($mic_img_current),$CONTROL_PAR_PICTURE,!pic_close_snbt[1])
        pgs_set_key_val(MICS,4,$drums_snbt_mic_current)
    else
    if ($mic_current=6)
        $drums_tomhi_mic_current := 1
        set_control_par_str(get_ui_id($mic_img_current),$CONTROL_PAR_PICTURE,!pic_close_tomhi[1])
        pgs_set_key_val(MICS,5,$drums_tomhi_mic_current)
    else
    if ($mic_current=7)
        $drums_tommid_mic_current := 1
        set_control_par_str(get_ui_id($mic_img_current),$CONTROL_PAR_PICTURE,!pic_close_tommid[1])
        pgs_set_key_val(MICS,6,$drums_tommid_mic_current)
    else
    if ($mic_current=8)
        $drums_tomlow_mic_current := 1
        set_control_par_str(get_ui_id($mic_img_current),$CONTROL_PAR_PICTURE,!pic_close_tomlow[1])
        pgs_set_key_val(MICS,7,$drums_tomlow_mic_current)
    else
    if ($mic_current=9)
        $drums_ov_mic_current := 1
        set_control_par_str(get_ui_id($mic_img_current),$CONTROL_PAR_PICTURE,!pic_close_ov[1])
        pgs_set_key_val(MICS,8,$drums_ov_mic_current)
    end if
    end if
    end if
    end if
    end if
    end if
    end if
    end if
    end if

    if ($mic_gallery_select1=0)
        call hide_all_controls
        $i := 0
        while ($i<=4)
            if ($i # 3)
                set_control_par(%menu_ui_ids[$i],$CONTROL_PAR_VALUE,0)
            end if
            set_control_par(%menu_ui_ids[3],$CONTROL_PAR_VALUE,1)
            inc($i)
        end while
        set_skin_offset(0)
        $i := 1
        while ($i<=$id1)
            set_control_par(%ui_id1[$i],$CONTROL_PAR_HIDE,$HIDE_PART_NOTHING)
            inc($i)
        end while
        call set_mic_pictures
        $drums_hh_micthumb := 0
        $drums_bdi_micthumb := 0
        $drums_bdo_micthumb := 0
        $drums_sntop_micthumb := 0
        $drums_snbt_micthumb := 0
        $drums_tomhi_micthumb := 0
        $drums_tommid_micthumb := 0
        $drums_tomlow_micthumb := 0
        $drums_ov_micthumb := 0
        call set_micthumb
    end if

    $i := 0
    while ($i<=3)
        if ($i # 0)
            set_control_par(%mic_gallery_ids[$i],$CONTROL_PAR_VALUE,0)
        end if
        set_control_par(%mic_gallery_ids[0],$CONTROL_PAR_VALUE,1)
        inc($i)
    end while

end on

on ui_control($mic_gallery_select2)
    set_control_par_str(get_ui_id($mix_edit_light),$CONTROL_PAR_PICTURE,"edit_light_active")
    if ($mic_current=1)
        $drums_hh_mic_current := 2
        set_control_par_str(get_ui_id($mic_img_current),$CONTROL_PAR_PICTURE,!pic_close_hh[2])
        pgs_set_key_val(MICS,0,$drums_hh_mic_current)
    else
    if ($mic_current=2)
        $drums_bdi_mic_current := 2
        set_control_par_str(get_ui_id($mic_img_current),$CONTROL_PAR_PICTURE,!pic_close_bdi[2])
        pgs_set_key_val(MICS,1,$drums_bdi_mic_current)
    else
    if ($mic_current=3)
        $drums_bdo_mic_current := 2
        set_control_par_str(get_ui_id($mic_img_current),$CONTROL_PAR_PICTURE,!pic_close_bdo[2])
        pgs_set_key_val(MICS,2,$drums_bdo_mic_current)
    else
    if ($mic_current=4)
        $drums_sntop_mic_current := 2
        set_control_par_str(get_ui_id($mic_img_current),$CONTROL_PAR_PICTURE,!pic_close_sntop[2])
        pgs_set_key_val(MICS,3,$drums_sntop_mic_current)
    else
    if ($mic_current=5)
        $drums_snbt_mic_current := 2
        set_control_par_str(get_ui_id($mic_img_current),$CONTROL_PAR_PICTURE,!pic_close_snbt[2])
        pgs_set_key_val(MICS,4,$drums_snbt_mic_current)
    else
    if ($mic_current=6)
        $drums_tomhi_mic_current := 2
        set_control_par_str(get_ui_id($mic_img_current),$CONTROL_PAR_PICTURE,!pic_close_tomhi[2])
        pgs_set_key_val(MICS,5,$drums_tomhi_mic_current)
    else
    if ($mic_current=7)
        $drums_tommid_mic_current := 2
        set_control_par_str(get_ui_id($mic_img_current),$CONTROL_PAR_PICTURE,!pic_close_tommid[2])
        pgs_set_key_val(MICS,6,$drums_tommid_mic_current)
    else
    if ($mic_current=8)
        $drums_tomlow_mic_current := 2
        set_control_par_str(get_ui_id($mic_img_current),$CONTROL_PAR_PICTURE,!pic_close_tomlow[2])
        pgs_set_key_val(MICS,7,$drums_tomlow_mic_current)
    else
    if ($mic_current=9)
        $drums_ov_mic_current := 2
        set_control_par_str(get_ui_id($mic_img_current),$CONTROL_PAR_PICTURE,!pic_close_ov[2])
        pgs_set_key_val(MICS,8,$drums_ov_mic_current)
    end if
    end if
    end if
    end if
    end if
    end if
    end if
    end if
    end if

    if ($mic_gallery_select2=0)
        call hide_all_controls
        $i := 0
        while ($i<=4)
            if ($i # 3)
                set_control_par(%menu_ui_ids[$i],$CONTROL_PAR_VALUE,0)
            end if
            set_control_par(%menu_ui_ids[3],$CONTROL_PAR_VALUE,1)
            inc($i)
        end while
        set_skin_offset(0)
        $i := 1
        while ($i<=$id1)
            set_control_par(%ui_id1[$i],$CONTROL_PAR_HIDE,$HIDE_PART_NOTHING)
            inc($i)
        end while
        call set_mic_pictures
        $drums_hh_micthumb := 0
        $drums_bdi_micthumb := 0
        $drums_bdo_micthumb := 0
        $drums_sntop_micthumb := 0
        $drums_snbt_micthumb := 0
        $drums_tomhi_micthumb := 0
        $drums_tommid_micthumb := 0
        $drums_tomlow_micthumb := 0
        $drums_ov_micthumb := 0
        call set_micthumb
    end if

    $i := 0
    while ($i<=3)
        if ($i # 1)
        set_control_par(%mic_gallery_ids[$i],$CONTROL_PAR_VALUE,0)
        end if
        set_control_par(%mic_gallery_ids[1],$CONTROL_PAR_VALUE,1)
        inc($i)
    end while
end on

on ui_control($mic_gallery_select3)
    set_control_par_str(get_ui_id($mix_edit_light),$CONTROL_PAR_PICTURE,"edit_light_active")
    if ($mic_current=1)
        $drums_hh_mic_current := 3
        set_control_par_str(get_ui_id($mic_img_current),$CONTROL_PAR_PICTURE,!pic_close_hh[3])
        pgs_set_key_val(MICS,0,$drums_hh_mic_current)
    else
    if ($mic_current=2)
        $drums_bdi_mic_current := 3
        set_control_par_str(get_ui_id($mic_img_current),$CONTROL_PAR_PICTURE,!pic_close_bdi[3])
        pgs_set_key_val(MICS,1,$drums_bdi_mic_current)
    else
    if ($mic_current=4)
        $drums_sntop_mic_current := 3
        set_control_par_str(get_ui_id($mic_img_current),$CONTROL_PAR_PICTURE,!pic_close_sntop[3])
        pgs_set_key_val(MICS,3,$drums_sntop_mic_current)
    else
    if ($mic_current=6)
        $drums_tomhi_mic_current := 3
        set_control_par_str(get_ui_id($mic_img_current),$CONTROL_PAR_PICTURE,!pic_close_tomhi[3])
        pgs_set_key_val(MICS,5,$drums_tomhi_mic_current)
    else
    if ($mic_current=7)
        $drums_tommid_mic_current := 3
        set_control_par_str(get_ui_id($mic_img_current),$CONTROL_PAR_PICTURE,!pic_close_tommid[3])
        pgs_set_key_val(MICS,6,$drums_tommid_mic_current)
    else
    if ($mic_current=8)
        $drums_tomlow_mic_current := 3
        set_control_par_str(get_ui_id($mic_img_current),$CONTROL_PAR_PICTURE,!pic_close_tomlow[3])
        pgs_set_key_val(MICS,7,$drums_tomlow_mic_current)
    else
    if ($mic_current=9)
        $drums_ov_mic_current := 3
        set_control_par_str(get_ui_id($mic_img_current),$CONTROL_PAR_PICTURE,!pic_close_ov[3])
        pgs_set_key_val(MICS,8,$drums_ov_mic_current)
    end if
    end if
    end if
    end if
    end if
    end if
    end if

    if ($mic_gallery_select3=0)
        call hide_all_controls
        $i := 0
        while ($i<=4)
            if ($i # 3)
                set_control_par(%menu_ui_ids[$i],$CONTROL_PAR_VALUE,0)
            end if
            set_control_par(%menu_ui_ids[3],$CONTROL_PAR_VALUE,1)
            inc($i)
        end while
        set_skin_offset(0)
        $i := 1
        while ($i<=$id1)
            set_control_par(%ui_id1[$i],$CONTROL_PAR_HIDE,$HIDE_PART_NOTHING)
            inc($i)
        end while

        call set_mic_pictures

        $drums_hh_micthumb := 0
        $drums_bdi_micthumb := 0
        $drums_bdo_micthumb := 0
        $drums_sntop_micthumb := 0
        $drums_snbt_micthumb := 0
        $drums_tomhi_micthumb := 0
        $drums_tommid_micthumb := 0
        $drums_tomlow_micthumb := 0
        $drums_ov_micthumb := 0

        call set_micthumb

    end if
    $i := 0
    while ($i<=3)
        if ($i # 2)
            set_control_par(%mic_gallery_ids[$i],$CONTROL_PAR_VALUE,0)
        end if
        set_control_par(%mic_gallery_ids[2],$CONTROL_PAR_VALUE,1)
        inc($i)
    end while
end on

on ui_control($mic_gallery_select4)
    set_control_par_str(get_ui_id($mix_edit_light),$CONTROL_PAR_PICTURE,"edit_light_active")
    if ($mic_current=1)
        $drums_hh_mic_current := 4
        set_control_par_str(get_ui_id($mic_img_current),$CONTROL_PAR_PICTURE,!pic_close_hh[4])
        pgs_set_key_val(MICS,0,$drums_hh_mic_current)
    else
    if ($mic_current=9)
        $drums_ov_mic_current := 4
        set_control_par_str(get_ui_id($mic_img_current),$CONTROL_PAR_PICTURE,!pic_close_ov[4])
        pgs_set_key_val(MICS,8,$drums_ov_mic_current)
    end if
    end if

    if ($mic_gallery_select4=0)
        call hide_all_controls
        $i := 0
        while ($i<=4)
            if ($i # 3)
                set_control_par(%menu_ui_ids[$i],$CONTROL_PAR_VALUE,0)
            end if
            set_control_par(%menu_ui_ids[3],$CONTROL_PAR_VALUE,1)
            inc($i)
        end while
        set_skin_offset(0)
        $i := 1
        while ($i<=$id1)
            set_control_par(%ui_id1[$i],$CONTROL_PAR_HIDE,$HIDE_PART_NOTHING)
            inc($i)
        end while

        call set_mic_pictures

        $drums_hh_micthumb := 0
        $drums_bdi_micthumb := 0
        $drums_bdo_micthumb := 0
        $drums_sntop_micthumb := 0
        $drums_snbt_micthumb := 0
        $drums_tomhi_micthumb := 0
        $drums_tommid_micthumb := 0
        $drums_tomlow_micthumb := 0
        $drums_ov_micthumb := 0

        call set_micthumb

    end if
    $i := 0
    while ($i<=3)
        if ($i # 3)
            set_control_par(%mic_gallery_ids[$i],$CONTROL_PAR_VALUE,0)
        end if
        set_control_par(%mic_gallery_ids[3],$CONTROL_PAR_VALUE,1)
        inc($i)
    end while
end on

on ui_control($mic_solo)
    if ($mic_solo=1)
        if ($mic_current=1)
            $mix_hh_solo := 1
            %solo_arr[0] := 0
            $help1 := 0
            $i := 0
            while ($i<=8)
                if (%solo_arr[$i]=1)
                    inc($help1)
                else
                if (%solo_arr[$i]=0)
                    set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_SENDLEVEL_7,0,-1,7,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+$i)
                end if
                end if
                inc($i)
            end while
            if ($help1>0)
                set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_VOLUME,0,-1,-1,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+0)
                set_control_par_str(%solo_ui_ids[0],$CONTROL_PAR_PICTURE,"dm_btn_blanssc")
            else
            if ($help1=0)
                call update_all_volumes
                $anysolo := 0
                $i := 0
                while ($i<=8)
                    set_control_par_str(%solo_ui_ids[$i],$CONTROL_PAR_PICTURE,"dm_btn_solo")
                    inc($i)
                end while
            end if
            end if
            $anysolo := 1
            %solo_arr[0] := 1
            call unselect_all_channels
            set_control_par(%select_ui_ids[0],$CONTROL_PAR_VALUE,1)
            $i := 0
            while ($i<=8)
                if (%solo_arr[$i]=0)
                    set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_VOLUME,0,-1,-1,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+$i)
                    set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_SENDLEVEL_7,0,-1,7,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+$i)
                    if ($i<=8)
                    set_control_par(%solo_ui_ids[$i],$CONTROL_PAR_VALUE,0)
                    set_control_par_str(%solo_ui_ids[$i],$CONTROL_PAR_PICTURE,"dm_btn_blanssc")
                    end if
                else
                if (%solo_arr[$i]=1)
                    set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_VOLUME,get_control_par(%vol_ui_ids[0],$CONTROL_PAR_VALUE)*7874,-1,-1,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+0)
                    $anysolo := 1
                    call update_rev_send
                end if
                end if
                inc($i)
            end while
        end if {if ($mic_current=1)}
        if ($mic_current=2)
            $mix_bdi_solo := 1
            %solo_arr[1] := 0
            $help1 := 0
            $i := 0
            while ($i<=8)
                if (%solo_arr[$i]=1)
                    inc($help1)
                else
                if (%solo_arr[$i]=0)
                    set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_SENDLEVEL_7,0,-1,7,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+$i)
                end if
                end if
                inc($i)
            end while
            if ($help1>0)
                set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_VOLUME,0,-1,-1,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+1)
                set_control_par_str(%solo_ui_ids[1],$CONTROL_PAR_PICTURE,"dm_btn_blanssc")
            else
            if ($help1=0)
                call update_all_volumes
                $anysolo := 0
                $i := 0
                while ($i<=8)
                    set_control_par_str(%solo_ui_ids[$i],$CONTROL_PAR_PICTURE,"dm_btn_solo")
                    inc($i)
                end while
            end if
            end if
            $anysolo := 1
            %solo_arr[1] := 1
            call unselect_all_channels
            set_control_par(%select_ui_ids[1],$CONTROL_PAR_VALUE,1)
            $i := 0
            while ($i<=8)
                if (%solo_arr[$i]=0)
                    set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_VOLUME,0,-1,-1,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+$i)
                    set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_SENDLEVEL_7,0,-1,7,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+$i)
                    if ($i<=8)
                        set_control_par(%solo_ui_ids[$i],$CONTROL_PAR_VALUE,0)
                        set_control_par_str(%solo_ui_ids[$i],$CONTROL_PAR_PICTURE,"dm_btn_blanssc")
                    end if
                else
                    if (%solo_arr[$i]=1)
                        set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_VOLUME,get_control_par(%vol_ui_ids[1],$CONTROL_PAR_VALUE)*7874,-1,-1,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+1)
                    $anysolo := 1
                    call update_rev_send
                end if
                end if
                inc($i)
            end while
        end if {if ($mic_current=2)}
        if ($mic_current=3)
            $mix_bdo_solo := 1
            %solo_arr[2] := 0
            $help1 := 0
            $i := 0
            while ($i<=8)
                if (%solo_arr[$i]=1)
                    inc($help1)
                else
                if (%solo_arr[$i]=0)
                    set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_SENDLEVEL_7,0,-1,7,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+$i)
                end if
                end if
                inc($i)
            end while
            if ($help1>0)
                set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_VOLUME,0,-1,-1,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+2)
                set_control_par_str(%solo_ui_ids[2],$CONTROL_PAR_PICTURE,"dm_btn_blanssc")
            else
            if ($help1=0)
                call update_all_volumes
                $anysolo := 0
                $i := 0
                while ($i<=8)
                    set_control_par_str(%solo_ui_ids[$i],$CONTROL_PAR_PICTURE,"dm_btn_solo")
                    inc($i)
                end while
            end if
            end if
            $anysolo := 1
            %solo_arr[2] := 1
            call unselect_all_channels
            set_control_par(%select_ui_ids[2],$CONTROL_PAR_VALUE,1)
            $i := 0
            while ($i<=8)
                if (%solo_arr[$i]=0)
                    set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_VOLUME,0,-1,-1,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+$i)
                    set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_SENDLEVEL_7,0,-1,7,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+$i)

    else {($mic_solo=1)}
    if ($mic_solo=0)
        if ($mic_current=1)
            $mix_hh_solo := 0
            $anysolo := 0
            %solo_arr[0] := 0
            $help1 := 0
            $i := 0
            while ($i<=8)
                if (%solo_arr[$i]=1)
                    inc($help1)
                else
                if (%solo_arr[$i]=0)
                    set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_SENDLEVEL_7,0,-1,7,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+$i)
                end if
                end if
                inc($i)
            end while
            if ($help1>0)
                set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_VOLUME,0,-1,-1,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+0)
                set_control_par_str(%solo_ui_ids[0],$CONTROL_PAR_PICTURE,"dm_btn_blanssc")
            else
            if ($help1=0)
                call update_all_volumes
                $anysolo := 0
                $i := 0
                while ($i<=8)
                    set_control_par_str(%solo_ui_ids[$i],$CONTROL_PAR_PICTURE,"dm_btn_solo")
                    inc($i)
                end while
            end if
            end if
            if ($anysolo # 0 and (%solo_arr[0]=0))
                set_control_par_str(get_ui_id($mic_solo),$CONTROL_PAR_PICTURE,"dm_btn_blanssc")
            else
            if (%solo_arr[0] # 0 or ($anysolo=0))
                set_control_par_str(get_ui_id($mic_solo),$CONTROL_PAR_PICTURE,"dm_btn_solo")
            end if
            end if
        end if {($mic_current=1)}
        if ($mic_current=2)
            $mix_bdi_solo := 0
            $anysolo := 0
            %solo_arr[1] := 0
            $help1 := 0

            while ($i<=8)

                    inc($help1)
                else
                if (%solo_arr[$i]=0)
                    set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_SENDLEVEL_7,0,-1,7,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+$i)
                end if
                end if
                inc($i)
            end while
            if ($help1>0)
                set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_VOLUME,0,-1,-1,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+1)
                set_control_par_str(%solo_ui_ids[1],$CONTROL_PAR_PICTURE,"dm_btn_blanssc")
