                set_control_par_str(get_ui_id($mic_solo),$CONTROL_PAR_PICTURE,"dm_btn_solo")
            end if
            end if
        end if {($mic_current=6)}
        if ($mic_current=7)
            $mix_tommid_solo := 0
            $anysolo := 0
            %solo_arr[6] := 0
            $help1 := 0
            $i := 0
            while ($i<=8)
                if (%solo_arr[$i]=1)
                    inc($help1)
                else
                if (%solo_arr[$i]=0)
                    set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_SENDLEVEL_7,0,-1,7,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+$i)
                end if
                end if
                inc($i)
            end while
            if ($help1>0)
                set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_VOLUME,0,-1,-1,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+6)
                set_control_par_str(%solo_ui_ids[6],$CONTROL_PAR_PICTURE,"dm_btn_blanssc")
            else
            if ($help1=0)
                call update_all_volumes
                $anysolo := 0
                $i := 0
                while ($i<=8)
                    set_control_par_str(%solo_ui_ids[$i],$CONTROL_PAR_PICTURE,"dm_btn_solo")
                    inc($i)
                end while
            end if
            end if
            if ($anysolo # 0 and (%solo_arr[6]=0))
                set_control_par_str(get_ui_id($mic_solo),$CONTROL_PAR_PICTURE,"dm_btn_blanssc")
            else
            if (%solo_arr[6] # 0 or ($anysolo=0))
                set_control_par_str(get_ui_id($mic_solo),$CONTROL_PAR_PICTURE,"dm_btn_solo")
            end if
            end if
        end if {($mic_current=7)}
        if ($mic_current=8)
            $mix_tomlow_solo := 0
            $anysolo := 0
            %solo_arr[7] := 0
            $help1 := 0
            $i := 0
            while ($i<=8)
                if (%solo_arr[$i]=1)
                    inc($help1)
                else
                if (%solo_arr[$i]=0)
                    set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_SENDLEVEL_7,0,-1,7,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+$i)
                end if
                end if
                inc($i)
            end while
            if ($help1>0)
                set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_VOLUME,0,-1,-1,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+7)
                set_control_par_str(%solo_ui_ids[7],$CONTROL_PAR_PICTURE,"dm_btn_blanssc")
            else
            if ($help1=0)
                call update_all_volumes
                $anysolo := 0
                $i := 0
                while ($i<=8)
                    set_control_par_str(%solo_ui_ids[$i],$CONTROL_PAR_PICTURE,"dm_btn_solo")
                    inc($i)
                end while
            end if
            end if
            if ($anysolo # 0 and (%solo_arr[7]=0))
                set_control_par_str(get_ui_id($mic_solo),$CONTROL_PAR_PICTURE,"dm_btn_blanssc")
            else
            if (%solo_arr[7] # 0 or ($anysolo=0))
                set_control_par_str(get_ui_id($mic_solo),$CONTROL_PAR_PICTURE,"dm_btn_solo")
            end if
            end if
        end if {($mic_current=8)}
        if ($mic_current=9)
            $mix_ov_solo := 0
            $anysolo := 0
            %solo_arr[8] := 0
            $help1 := 0
            $i := 0
            while ($i<=8)
                if (%solo_arr[$i]=1)
                    inc($help1)
                else
                if (%solo_arr[$i]=0)
                    set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_SENDLEVEL_7,0,-1,7,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+$i)
                end if
                end if
                inc($i)
            end while
            if ($help1>0)
                set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_VOLUME,0,-1,-1,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+8)
                set_control_par_str(%solo_ui_ids[8],$CONTROL_PAR_PICTURE,"dm_btn_blanssc")
            else
            if ($help1=0)
                call update_all_volumes
                $anysolo := 0
                $i := 0
                while ($i<=8)
                    set_control_par_str(%solo_ui_ids[$i],$CONTROL_PAR_PICTURE,"dm_btn_solo")
                    inc($i)
                end while
            end if
            end if
            if ($anysolo # 0 and (%solo_arr[8]=0))
                set_control_par_str(get_ui_id($mic_solo),$CONTROL_PAR_PICTURE,"dm_btn_blanssc")
            else
            if (%solo_arr[8] # 0 or ($anysolo=0))
                set_control_par_str(get_ui_id($mic_solo),$CONTROL_PAR_PICTURE,"dm_btn_solo")
            end if
            end if
        end if
        end if
    end if {($mic_solo=1)}
end on

on ui_control($mic_dry)
    if ($mic_dry=1)
        if ($mic_current=1)
            $mix_hh_dry := 1
            set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_EFFECT_BYPASS,1,-1,1,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+0)
            set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_EFFECT_BYPASS,1,-1,2,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+0)
            set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_EFFECT_BYPASS,1,-1,4,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+0)
            set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_EFFECT_BYPASS,1,-1,7,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+0)
        end if
        if ($mic_current=2)
            $mix_bdi_dry := 1
            set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_EFFECT_BYPASS,1,-1,1,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+1)
            set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_EFFECT_BYPASS,1,-1,2,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+1)
            set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_EFFECT_BYPASS,1,-1,4,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+1)
            set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_EFFECT_BYPASS,1,-1,7,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+1)
        end if
        if ($mic_current=3)
            $mix_bdo_dry := 1
            set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_EFFECT_BYPASS,1,-1,1,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+2)
            set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_EFFECT_BYPASS,1,-1,2,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+2)
            set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_EFFECT_BYPASS,1,-1,4,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+2)
            set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_EFFECT_BYPASS,1,-1,7,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+2)
        end if
        if ($mic_current=4)
            $mix_sntop_dry := 1
            set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_EFFECT_BYPASS,1,-1,1,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+3)
            set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_EFFECT_BYPASS,1,-1,2,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+3)
            set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_EFFECT_BYPASS,1,-1,4,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+3)
            set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_EFFECT_BYPASS,1,-1,7,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+3)
        end if
        if ($mic_current=5)
            $mix_snbt_dry := 1
            set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_EFFECT_BYPASS,1,-1,1,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+4)
            set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_EFFECT_BYPASS,1,-1,2,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+4)
            set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_EFFECT_BYPASS,1,-1,4,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+4)
            set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_EFFECT_BYPASS,1,-1,7,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+4)
        end if
        if ($mic_current=6)
            $mix_tomhi_dry := 1
            set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_EFFECT_BYPASS,1,-1,1,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+5)
            set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_EFFECT_BYPASS,1,-1,2,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+5)
            set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_EFFECT_BYPASS,1,-1,4,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+5)
            set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_EFFECT_BYPASS,1,-1,7,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+5)
        end if
        if ($mic_current=7)
            $mix_tommid_dry := 1
            set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_EFFECT_BYPASS,1,-1,1,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+6)
            set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_EFFECT_BYPASS,1,-1,2,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+6)
            set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_EFFECT_BYPASS,1,-1,4,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+6)
            set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_EFFECT_BYPASS,1,-1,7,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+6)
        end if
        if ($mic_current=8)
            $mix_tomlow_dry := 1
            set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_EFFECT_BYPASS,1,-1,1,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+7)
            set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_EFFECT_BYPASS,1,-1,2,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+7)
            set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_EFFECT_BYPASS,1,-1,4,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+7)
            set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_EFFECT_BYPASS,1,-1,7,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+7)
        end if
        if ($mic_current=9)
            $mix_ov_dry := 1
            set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_EFFECT_BYPASS,1,-1,1,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+8)
            set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_EFFECT_BYPASS,1,-1,2,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+8)
            set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_EFFECT_BYPASS,1,-1,4,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+8)
            set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_EFFECT_BYPASS,1,-1,7,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+8)
        end if
    else
    if ($mic_dry=0)
        if ($mic_current=1)
            $mix_hh_dry := 0
            set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_EFFECT_BYPASS,0,-1,1,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+0)
            set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_EFFECT_BYPASS,0,-1,2,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+0)
            set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_EFFECT_BYPASS,0,-1,4,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+0)
            set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_EFFECT_BYPASS,0,-1,7,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+0)
        end if
        if ($mic_current=2)
            $mix_bdi_dry := 0
            set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_EFFECT_BYPASS,0,-1,1,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+1)
            set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_EFFECT_BYPASS,0,-1,2,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+1)
            set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_EFFECT_BYPASS,0,-1,4,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+1)
            set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_EFFECT_BYPASS,0,-1,7,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+1)
        end if
        if ($mic_current=3)
            $mix_bdo_dry := 0
            set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_EFFECT_BYPASS,0,-1,1,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+2)
            set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_EFFECT_BYPASS,0,-1,2,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+2)
            set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_EFFECT_BYPASS,0,-1,4,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+2)
            set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_EFFECT_BYPASS,0,-1,7,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+2)
        end if
        if ($mic_current=4)
            $mix_sntop_dry := 0
            set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_EFFECT_BYPASS,0,-1,1,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+3)
            set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_EFFECT_BYPASS,0,-1,2,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+3)
            set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_EFFECT_BYPASS,0,-1,4,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+3)
            set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_EFFECT_BYPASS,0,-1,7,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+3)
        end if
        if ($mic_current=5)
            $mix_snbt_dry := 0
            set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_EFFECT_BYPASS,0,-1,1,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+4)
            set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_EFFECT_BYPASS,0,-1,2,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+4)
            set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_EFFECT_BYPASS,0,-1,4,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+4)
            set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_EFFECT_BYPASS,0,-1,7,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+4)
        end if
        if ($mic_current=6)
            $mix_tomhi_dry := 0
            set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_EFFECT_BYPASS,0,-1,1,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+5)
            set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_EFFECT_BYPASS,0,-1,2,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+5)
            set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_EFFECT_BYPASS,0,-1,4,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+5)
            set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_EFFECT_BYPASS,0,-1,7,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+5)
        end if
        if ($mic_current=7)
            $mix_tommid_dry := 0
            set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_EFFECT_BYPASS,0,-1,1,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+6)
            set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_EFFECT_BYPASS,0,-1,2,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+6)
            set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_EFFECT_BYPASS,0,-1,4,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+6)
            set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_EFFECT_BYPASS,0,-1,7,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+6)
        end if
        if ($mic_current=8)
            $mix_tomlow_dry := 0
            set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_EFFECT_BYPASS,0,-1,1,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+7)
            set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_EFFECT_BYPASS,0,-1,2,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+7)
            set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_EFFECT_BYPASS,0,-1,4,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+7)
            set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_EFFECT_BYPASS,0,-1,7,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+7)
        end if
        if ($mic_current=9)
            $mix_ov_dry := 0
            set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_EFFECT_BYPASS,0,-1,1,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+8)
            set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_EFFECT_BYPASS,0,-1,2,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+8)
            set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_EFFECT_BYPASS,0,-1,4,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+8)
            set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_EFFECT_BYPASS,0,-1,7,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+8)
        end if
    end if
    end if
end on

on ui_control($mic_0db)
    if ($mic_0db=1)
        if ($mic_current=1)
            %vol_buffer[1] := $mix_hh_vol
            $mix_hh_vol := 100
            if ($anysolo # 1 or ($mix_hh_solo=1))
                set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_VOLUME,$mix_hh_vol*7874,-1,-1,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+0)
                set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_SENDLEVEL_7,$mix_hh_rev*$mix_hh_vol*62,-1,7,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+0)
            end if
        end if
        if ($mic_current=2)
            %vol_buffer[2] := $mix_bdi_vol
            $mix_bdi_vol := 100
            if ($anysolo # 2 or ($mix_bdi_solo=1))
                set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_VOLUME,$mix_bdi_vol*7874,-1,-1,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+1)
                set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_SENDLEVEL_7,$mix_bdi_rev*$mix_bdi_vol*62,-1,7,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+1)
            end if
        end if
        if ($mic_current=3)
            %vol_buffer[3] := $mix_bdo_vol
            $mix_bdo_vol := 100
            if ($anysolo # 3 or ($mix_bdo_solo=1))
                set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_VOLUME,$mix_bdo_vol*7874,-1,-1,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+2)
                set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_SENDLEVEL_7,$mix_bdo_rev*$mix_bdo_vol*62,-1,7,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+2)
            end if
        end if
        if ($mic_current=4)
            %vol_buffer[4] := $mix_sntop_vol
            $mix_sntop_vol := 100
            if ($anysolo # 4 or ($mix_sntop_solo=1))
                set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_VOLUME,$mix_sntop_vol*7874,-1,-1,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+3)
                set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_SENDLEVEL_7,$mix_sntop_rev*$mix_sntop_vol*62,-1,7,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+3)
            end if
        end if
        if ($mic_current=5)
            %vol_buffer[5] := $mix_snbt_vol
            $mix_snbt_vol := 100
            if ($anysolo # 5 or ($mix_snbt_solo=1))
                set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_VOLUME,$mix_snbt_vol*7874,-1,-1,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+4)
                set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_SENDLEVEL_7,$mix_snbt_rev*$mix_snbt_vol*62,-1,7,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+4)
            end if
        end if
        if ($mic_current=6)
            %vol_buffer[6] := $mix_tomhi_vol
            $mix_tomhi_vol := 100
            if ($anysolo # 6 or ($mix_tomhi_solo=1))
                set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_VOLUME,$mix_tomhi_vol*7874,-1,-1,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+5)
                set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_SENDLEVEL_7,$mix_tomhi_rev*$mix_tomhi_vol*62,-1,7,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+5)
            end if
        end if
        if ($mic_current=7)
            %vol_buffer[7] := $mix_tommid_vol
            $mix_tommid_vol := 100
            if ($anysolo # 7 or ($mix_tommid_solo=1))
                set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_VOLUME,$mix_tommid_vol*7874,-1,-1,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+6)
                set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_SENDLEVEL_7,$mix_tommid_rev*$mix_tommid_vol*62,-1,7,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+6)
            end if
        end if
        if ($mic_current=8)
            %vol_buffer[8] := $mix_tomlow_vol
            $mix_tomlow_vol := 100
            if ($anysolo # 8 or ($mix_tomlow_solo=1))
                set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_VOLUME,$mix_tomlow_vol*7874,-1,-1,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+7)
                set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_SENDLEVEL_7,$mix_tomlow_rev*$mix_tomlow_vol*62,-1,7,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+7)
            end if
        end if
        if ($mic_current=9)
            %vol_buffer[9] := $mix_ov_vol
            $mix_ov_vol := 100
            if ($anysolo # 9 or ($mix_ov_solo=1))
                set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_VOLUME,$mix_ov_vol*7874,-1,-1,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+8)
                set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_SENDLEVEL_7,$mix_ov_rev*$mix_ov_vol*62,-1,7,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+8)
            end if
        end if
    else
    if ($mic_0db=0)
        if ($mic_current=1)
            $mix_hh_vol := %vol_buffer[1]
            if ($anysolo # 1 or ($mix_hh_solo=1))
                set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_VOLUME,$mix_hh_vol*7874,-1,-1,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+0)
                set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_SENDLEVEL_7,$mix_hh_rev*$mix_hh_vol*62,-1,7,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+0)
            end if
        end if
        if ($mic_current=2)
            $mix_bdi_vol := %vol_buffer[2]
            if ($anysolo # 2 or ($mix_bdi_solo=1))
                set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_VOLUME,$mix_bdi_vol*7874,-1,-1,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+1)
                set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_SENDLEVEL_7,$mix_bdi_rev*$mix_bdi_vol*62,-1,7,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+1)
            end if
        end if
        if ($mic_current=3)
            $mix_bdo_vol := %vol_buffer[3]
            if ($anysolo # 3 or ($mix_bdo_solo=1))
                set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_VOLUME,$mix_bdo_vol*7874,-1,-1,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+2)
                set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_SENDLEVEL_7,$mix_bdo_rev*$mix_bdo_vol*62,-1,7,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+2)
            end if
        end if
        if ($mic_current=4)
            $mix_sntop_vol := %vol_buffer[4]
            if ($anysolo # 4 or ($mix_sntop_solo=1))
                set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_VOLUME,$mix_sntop_vol*7874,-1,-1,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+3)
                set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_SENDLEVEL_7,$mix_sntop_rev*$mix_sntop_vol*62,-1,7,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+3)
            end if
        end if
        if ($mic_current=5)
            $mix_snbt_vol := %vol_buffer[5]
            if ($anysolo # 5 or ($mix_snbt_solo=1))
                set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_VOLUME,$mix_snbt_vol*7874,-1,-1,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+4)
                set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_SENDLEVEL_7,$mix_snbt_rev*$mix_snbt_vol*62,-1,7,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+4)
            end if
        end if
        if ($mic_current=6)
            $mix_tomhi_vol := %vol_buffer[6]
            if ($anysolo # 6 or ($mix_tomhi_solo=1))
                set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_VOLUME,$mix_tomhi_vol*7874,-1,-1,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+5)
                set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_SENDLEVEL_7,$mix_tomhi_rev*$mix_tomhi_vol*62,-1,7,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+5)
            end if
        end if
        if ($mic_current=7)
            $mix_tommid_vol := %vol_buffer[7]
            if ($anysolo # 7 or ($mix_tommid_solo=1))
                set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_VOLUME,$mix_tommid_vol*7874,-1,-1,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+6)
                set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_SENDLEVEL_7,$mix_tommid_rev*$mix_tommid_vol*62,-1,7,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+6)
            end if
        end if
        if ($mic_current=8)
            $mix_tomlow_vol := %vol_buffer[8]
            if ($anysolo # 8 or ($mix_tomlow_solo=1))
                set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_VOLUME,$mix_tomlow_vol*7874,-1,-1,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+7)
                set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_SENDLEVEL_7,$mix_tomlow_rev*$mix_tomlow_vol*62,-1,7,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+7)
            end if
        end if
        if ($mic_current=9)
            $mix_ov_vol := %vol_buffer[9]
            if ($anysolo # 9 or ($mix_ov_solo=1))
                set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_VOLUME,$mix_ov_vol*7874,-1,-1,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+8)
                set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_SENDLEVEL_7,$mix_ov_rev*$mix_ov_vol*62,-1,7,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+8)
            end if
        end if
    end if
    end if
end on

on ui_control($mix_eq)
    $mix_eq := 1
    $mix_td := 0
    $mix_comp := 0
    $i := 1
    while ($i<=$id21)
        set_control_par(%ui_id21[$i],$CONTROL_PAR_HIDE,$HIDE_PART_NOTHING)
        inc($i)
    end while
    $i := 1
    while ($i<=$id41)
        set_control_par(%ui_id41[$i],$CONTROL_PAR_HIDE,$HIDE_PART_NOTHING)
        set_control_par(%ui_id41[$i],$CONTROL_PAR_HIDE,$HIDE_PART_BG)
        inc($i)
    end while
    $i := 1
    while ($i<=$id22)
        set_control_par(%ui_id22[$i],$CONTROL_PAR_HIDE,$HIDE_WHOLE_CONTROL)
        inc($i)
    end while
    $i := 1
    while ($i<=$id23)
        set_control_par(%ui_id23[$i],$CONTROL_PAR_HIDE,$HIDE_WHOLE_CONTROL)
        inc($i)
    end while
    $i := 1
    while ($i<=$id42)
        set_control_par(%ui_id42[$i],$CONTROL_PAR_HIDE,$HIDE_WHOLE_CONTROL)
        inc($i)
    end while
    $i := 1
    while ($i<=$id43)
        set_control_par(%ui_id43[$i],$CONTROL_PAR_HIDE,$HIDE_WHOLE_CONTROL)
        inc($i)
    end while
end on

on ui_control($mix_td)
    $mix_eq := 0
    $mix_td := 1
    $mix_comp := 0
    $i := 1
    while ($i<=$id22)
        set_control_par(%ui_id22[$i],$CONTROL_PAR_HIDE,$HIDE_PART_NOTHING)
        inc($i)
    end while
    $i := 1
    while ($i<=$id42)
        set_control_par(%ui_id42[$i],$CONTROL_PAR_HIDE,$HIDE_PART_NOTHING)
        set_control_par(%ui_id42[$i],$CONTROL_PAR_HIDE,$HIDE_PART_BG)
        inc($i)
    end while
    $i := 1
    while ($i<=$id21)
        set_control_par(%ui_id21[$i],$CONTROL_PAR_HIDE,$HIDE_WHOLE_CONTROL)
        inc($i)
    end while
    $i := 1
    while ($i<=$id41)
        set_control_par(%ui_id41[$i],$CONTROL_PAR_HIDE,$HIDE_WHOLE_CONTROL)
        inc($i)
    end while
    $i := 1
    while ($i<=$id23)
        set_control_par(%ui_id23[$i],$CONTROL_PAR_HIDE,$HIDE_WHOLE_CONTROL)
        inc($i)
    end while
    $i := 1
    while ($i<=$id43)
        set_control_par(%ui_id43[$i],$CONTROL_PAR_HIDE,$HIDE_WHOLE_CONTROL)
        inc($i)
    end while
end on

on ui_control($mix_comp)
    $mix_eq := 0
    $mix_td := 0
    $mix_comp := 1
    $i := 1
    while ($i<=$id23)
        set_control_par(%ui_id23[$i],$CONTROL_PAR_HIDE,$HIDE_PART_NOTHING)
        inc($i)
    end while
    $i := 1
    while ($i<=$id43)
        set_control_par(%ui_id43[$i],$CONTROL_PAR_HIDE,$HIDE_PART_NOTHING)
        set_control_par(%ui_id43[$i],$CONTROL_PAR_HIDE,$HIDE_PART_BG)
        inc($i)
    end while
    $i := 1
    while ($i<=$id21)
        set_control_par(%ui_id21[$i],$CONTROL_PAR_HIDE,$HIDE_WHOLE_CONTROL)
        inc($i)
    end while
    $i := 1
    while ($i<=$id41)
        set_control_par(%ui_id41[$i],$CONTROL_PAR_HIDE,$HIDE_WHOLE_CONTROL)
        inc($i)
    end while
    $i := 1
    while ($i<=$id42)
        set_control_par(%ui_id42[$i],$CONTROL_PAR_HIDE,$HIDE_WHOLE_CONTROL)
        inc($i)
    end while
    $i := 1
    while ($i<=$id22)
        set_control_par(%ui_id22[$i],$CONTROL_PAR_HIDE,$HIDE_WHOLE_CONTROL)
        inc($i)
    end while
end on

on ui_control($mix_hh_vol)
    set_control_par_str(get_ui_id($mix_edit_light),$CONTROL_PAR_PICTURE,"edit_light_active")
    if (get_control_par(get_ui_id($mix_hh_vol),$CONTROL_PAR_KEY_CONTROL)=1)
        $mix_hh_vol := 100
    end if
    if ($anysolo # 1 or ($mix_hh_solo=1))
        set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_VOLUME,$mix_hh_vol*7874,-1,-1,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+0)
        set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_SENDLEVEL_7,$mix_hh_rev*$mix_hh_vol*62,-1,7,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+0)
    end if
    %vol_buffer[1] := 0
end on

on ui_control($mix_hh_solo)
    $busidx := 0
    call update_solo_status
    call fx_eq_td_comp_reset
    if ($mix_hh_solo=1)
        set_control_par_str(get_ui_id($fx_instr_label),$CONTROL_PAR_PICTURE,@fx_instr_label_hh)
        call assign_fx_hh
        call set_fx_text
    end if
end on

on ui_control($mix_hh_dry)
    if ($mix_hh_dry=1)
        set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_EFFECT_BYPASS,1,-1,1,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+0)
        set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_EFFECT_BYPASS,1,-1,2,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+0)
        set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_EFFECT_BYPASS,1,-1,4,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+0)
        set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_EFFECT_BYPASS,1,-1,7,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+0)
    else
    if ($mix_hh_dry=0)
        set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_EFFECT_BYPASS,0,-1,1,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+0)
        set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_EFFECT_BYPASS,0,-1,2,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+0)
        set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_EFFECT_BYPASS,0,-1,4,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+0)
        set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_EFFECT_BYPASS,0,-1,7,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+0)
    end if
    end if
end on

on ui_control($mix_hh_pan)
    set_control_par_str(get_ui_id($mix_edit_light),$CONTROL_PAR_PICTURE,"edit_light_active")
    if (get_control_par(get_ui_id($mix_hh_pan),$CONTROL_PAR_KEY_CONTROL)=1)
        $mix_hh_pan := 1000
    end if
    set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_PAN,$mix_hh_pan*500,-1,-1,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+0)
end on

on ui_control($mix_hh_ov)
    set_control_par_str(get_ui_id($mix_edit_light),$CONTROL_PAR_PICTURE,"edit_light_active")
    $i := 53
    while ($i<=56)
        set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_VOLUME,1000*$mix_ov_vol/127*($mix_hh_ov*7874)/1000,$i,-1,-1)
        inc($i)
    end while
end on

on ui_control($mix_hh_rev)
    if ($anysolo # 1 or ($mix_hh_solo=1))
        set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_SENDLEVEL_7,$mix_hh_rev*$mix_hh_vol*62,-1,7,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+0)
    end if
    set_control_par_str(get_ui_id($mix_edit_light),$CONTROL_PAR_PICTURE,"edit_light_active")
end on

on ui_control($mix_bdi_vol)
    set_control_par_str(get_ui_id($mix_edit_light),$CONTROL_PAR_PICTURE,"edit_light_active")
    if (get_control_par(get_ui_id($mix_bdi_vol),$CONTROL_PAR_KEY_CONTROL)=1)
        $mix_bdi_vol := 100
    end if
    if ($anysolo # 1 or ($mix_bdi_solo=1))
        set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_VOLUME,$mix_bdi_vol*7874,-1,-1,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+1)
        set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_SENDLEVEL_7,$mix_bdi_rev*$mix_bdi_vol*62,-1,7,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+1)
    end if
    if ($mix_bd_link=1)
        if (in_range($mix_bdi_vol-$mix_bd_diff,0,127))
            $mix_bdo_vol := $mix_bdi_vol-$mix_bd_diff
            if ($anysolo # 1 or ($mix_bdo_solo=1))
                set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_VOLUME,$mix_bdo_vol*7874,-1,-1,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+2)
            end if
        else
        if ($mix_bdi_vol-$mix_bd_diff>=127)
            $mix_bdo_vol := 127
        else
        if ($mix_bdi_vol-$mix_bd_diff<=0)
            $mix_bdo_vol := 0
        end if
        end if
        end if
        if ($mix_bdo_vol<=0 or ($mix_bdo_vol>=127))
            $mix_bdi_vol := $mix_bdo_vol+$mix_bd_diff
            set_control_par(get_ui_id($mix_bdi_vol),$CONTROL_PAR_MOUSE_BEHAVIOUR,-1)
        end if
        if (in_range($mix_bdi_vol-$mix_bd_diff,0,127))
            set_control_par(get_ui_id($mix_bdi_vol),$CONTROL_PAR_MOUSE_BEHAVIOUR,$mix_vol_mousebehaviour)
        end if
    end if
    %vol_buffer[2] := 0
end on

on ui_control($mix_bd_link)
    if ($mix_bd_link=1)
        $mix_bd_diff := $mix_bdi_vol-$mix_bdo_vol
    else
    if ($mix_bd_link=0)
        set_control_par(get_ui_id($mix_bdi_vol),$CONTROL_PAR_MOUSE_BEHAVIOUR,$mix_vol_mousebehaviour)
        set_control_par(get_ui_id($mix_bdo_vol),$CONTROL_PAR_MOUSE_BEHAVIOUR,$mix_vol_mousebehaviour)
    end if
    end if
end on

on ui_control($mix_bdi_solo)
    $busidx := 1
    call update_solo_status
    call fx_eq_td_comp_reset
    if ($mix_bdi_solo=1)
        set_control_par_str(get_ui_id($fx_instr_label),$CONTROL_PAR_PICTURE,@fx_instr_label_bdi)
        call assign_fx_bdi
        call set_fx_text
    end if
end on

on ui_control($mix_bdi_dry)
    if ($mix_bdi_dry=1)
        set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_EFFECT_BYPASS,1,-1,1,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+1)
        set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_EFFECT_BYPASS,1,-1,2,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+1)
        set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_EFFECT_BYPASS,1,-1,4,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+1)
        set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_EFFECT_BYPASS,1,-1,7,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+1)
    else
    if ($mix_bdi_dry=0)
        set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_EFFECT_BYPASS,0,-1,1,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+1)
        set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_EFFECT_BYPASS,0,-1,2,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+1)
        set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_EFFECT_BYPASS,0,-1,4,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+1)
        set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_EFFECT_BYPASS,0,-1,7,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+1)
    end if
    end if
end on

on ui_control($mix_bdi_pan)
    set_control_par_str(get_ui_id($mix_edit_light),$CONTROL_PAR_PICTURE,"edit_light_active")
    if (get_control_par(get_ui_id($mix_bdi_pan),$CONTROL_PAR_KEY_CONTROL)=1)
        $mix_bdi_pan := 1000
    end if
    set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_PAN,$mix_bdi_pan*500,-1,-1,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+1)
end on

on ui_control($mix_bdi_ov)
    set_control_par_str(get_ui_id($mix_edit_light),$CONTROL_PAR_PICTURE,"edit_light_active")
    $i := 57
    while ($i<=64)
        set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_VOLUME,1000*$mix_ov_vol/127*($mix_bdi_ov*7874)/1000,$i,-1,-1)
        inc($i)
    end while
end on

on ui_control($mix_bdi_rev)
    if ($anysolo # 1 or ($mix_bdi_solo=1))
        set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_SENDLEVEL_7,$mix_bdi_rev*$mix_bdi_vol*62,-1,7,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+1)
    end if
    set_control_par_str(get_ui_id($mix_edit_light),$CONTROL_PAR_PICTURE,"edit_light_active")
end on

on ui_control($mix_bdo_vol)
    set_control_par_str(get_ui_id($mix_edit_light),$CONTROL_PAR_PICTURE,"edit_light_active")
    if (get_control_par(get_ui_id($mix_bdo_vol),$CONTROL_PAR_KEY_CONTROL)=1)
        $mix_bdo_vol := 100
    end if
    if ($anysolo # 1 or ($mix_bdo_solo=1))
        set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_VOLUME,$mix_bdo_vol*7874,-1,-1,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+2)
        set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_SENDLEVEL_7,$mix_bdo_rev*$mix_bdo_vol*62,-1,7,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+2)
    end if
    if ($mix_bd_link=1)
        if (in_range($mix_bdo_vol+$mix_bd_diff,0,127))
            $mix_bdi_vol := $mix_bdo_vol+$mix_bd_diff
            if ($anysolo # 1 or ($mix_bdi_solo=1))
                set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_VOLUME,$mix_bdi_vol*7874,-1,-1,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+1)
            end if
        else
        if ($mix_bdo_vol+$mix_bd_diff>=127)
            $mix_bdi_vol := 127
        else
        if ($mix_bdo_vol+$mix_bd_diff<=0)
            $mix_bdi_vol := 0
        end if
        end if
        end if
        if ($mix_bdi_vol<=0 or ($mix_bdi_vol>=127))
            $mix_bdo_vol := $mix_bdi_vol-$mix_bd_diff
            set_control_par(get_ui_id($mix_bdo_vol),$CONTROL_PAR_MOUSE_BEHAVIOUR,-1)
        end if
        if (in_range($mix_bdo_vol+$mix_bd_diff,0,127))
            set_control_par(get_ui_id($mix_bdo_vol),$CONTROL_PAR_MOUSE_BEHAVIOUR,$mix_vol_mousebehaviour)
        end if
    end if
    %vol_buffer[3] := 0
end on

on ui_control($mix_bdo_solo)
    $busidx := 2
    call update_solo_status
    call fx_eq_td_comp_reset
    if ($mix_bdo_solo=1)
        set_control_par_str(get_ui_id($fx_instr_label),$CONTROL_PAR_PICTURE,@fx_instr_label_bdo)
        call assign_fx_bdo
        call set_fx_text
    end if
end on

on ui_control($mix_bdo_dry)
    if ($mix_bdo_dry=1)
        set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_EFFECT_BYPASS,1,-1,1,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+2)
        set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_EFFECT_BYPASS,1,-1,2,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+2)
        set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_EFFECT_BYPASS,1,-1,4,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+2)
        set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_EFFECT_BYPASS,1,-1,7,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+2)
    else
    if ($mix_bdo_dry=0)
        set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_EFFECT_BYPASS,0,-1,1,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+2)
        set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_EFFECT_BYPASS,0,-1,2,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+2)
        set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_EFFECT_BYPASS,0,-1,4,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+2)
        set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_EFFECT_BYPASS,0,-1,7,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+2)
    end if
    end if
end on

on ui_control($mix_bdo_pan)
    set_control_par_str(get_ui_id($mix_edit_light),$CONTROL_PAR_PICTURE,"edit_light_active")
    if (get_control_par(get_ui_id($mix_bdo_pan),$CONTROL_PAR_KEY_CONTROL)=1)
        $mix_bdo_pan := 1000
    end if
    set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_PAN,$mix_bdo_pan*500,-1,-1,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+2)
end on

on ui_control($mix_bdo_phase)
    set_control_par_str(get_ui_id($mix_edit_light),$CONTROL_PAR_PICTURE,"edit_light_active")
    if ($mix_bdo_phase=1)
        set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_EFFECT_BYPASS,0,-1,0,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+2)
    else
    if ($mix_bdo_phase=0)
        set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_EFFECT_BYPASS,1,-1,0,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+2)
    end if
    end if
end on

on ui_control($mix_bdo_rev)
    if ($anysolo # 1 or ($mix_bdo_solo=1))
        set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_SENDLEVEL_7,$mix_bdo_rev*$mix_bdo_vol*62,-1,7,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+2)
    end if
    set_control_par_str(get_ui_id($mix_edit_light),$CONTROL_PAR_PICTURE,"edit_light_active")
end on

on ui_control($mix_sntop_vol)
    set_control_par_str(get_ui_id($mix_edit_light),$CONTROL_PAR_PICTURE,"edit_light_active")
    if (get_control_par(get_ui_id($mix_sntop_vol),$CONTROL_PAR_KEY_CONTROL)=1)
        $mix_sntop_vol := 100
    end if
    if ($anysolo # 1 or ($mix_sntop_solo=1))
        set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_VOLUME,$mix_sntop_vol*7874,-1,-1,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+3)
        set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_SENDLEVEL_7,$mix_sntop_rev*$mix_sntop_vol*62,-1,7,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+3)
    end if
    if ($mix_sn_link=1)
        if (in_range($mix_sntop_vol-$mix_sn_diff,0,127))
            $mix_snbt_vol := $mix_sntop_vol-$mix_sn_diff
            if ($anysolo # 1 or ($mix_snbt_solo=1))
                set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_VOLUME,$mix_snbt_vol*7874,-1,-1,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+4)
            end if
        else
            if ($mix_sntop_vol-$mix_sn_diff>=127)
                $mix_snbt_vol := 127
            else
            if ($mix_sntop_vol-$mix_sn_diff<=0)
                $mix_snbt_vol := 0
            end if
            end if
        end if
        if ($mix_snbt_vol<=0 or ($mix_snbt_vol>=127))
            $mix_sntop_vol := $mix_snbt_vol+$mix_sn_diff
            set_control_par(get_ui_id($mix_sntop_vol),$CONTROL_PAR_MOUSE_BEHAVIOUR,-1)
        end if
        if (in_range($mix_sntop_vol-$mix_sn_diff,0,127))
            set_control_par(get_ui_id($mix_sntop_vol),$CONTROL_PAR_MOUSE_BEHAVIOUR,$mix_vol_mousebehaviour)
        end if
    end if
    %vol_buffer[4] := 0
end on

on ui_control($mix_sn_link)
    if ($mix_sn_link=1)
        $mix_sn_diff := $mix_sntop_vol-$mix_snbt_vol
    else
    if ($mix_sn_link=0)
        set_control_par(get_ui_id($mix_sntop_vol),$CONTROL_PAR_MOUSE_BEHAVIOUR,$mix_vol_mousebehaviour)
        set_control_par(get_ui_id($mix_snbt_vol),$CONTROL_PAR_MOUSE_BEHAVIOUR,$mix_vol_mousebehaviour)
    end if
    end if
end on

on ui_control($mix_sntop_solo)
    $busidx := 3
    call update_solo_status
    call fx_eq_td_comp_reset
    if ($mix_sntop_solo=1)
        set_control_par_str(get_ui_id($fx_instr_label),$CONTROL_PAR_PICTURE,@fx_instr_label_sntop)
        call assign_fx_sntop
        call set_fx_text
    end if
end on

on ui_control($mix_sntop_dry)
    if ($mix_sntop_dry=1)
        set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_EFFECT_BYPASS,1,-1,1,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+3)
        set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_EFFECT_BYPASS,1,-1,2,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+3)
        set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_EFFECT_BYPASS,1,-1,4,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+3)
        set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_EFFECT_BYPASS,1,-1,7,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+3)
    else
    if ($mix_sntop_dry=0)
        set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_EFFECT_BYPASS,0,-1,1,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+3)
        set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_EFFECT_BYPASS,0,-1,2,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+3)
        set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_EFFECT_BYPASS,0,-1,4,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+3)
        set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_EFFECT_BYPASS,0,-1,7,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+3)
    end if
    end if
end on

on ui_control($mix_sntop_pan)
    set_control_par_str(get_ui_id($mix_edit_light),$CONTROL_PAR_PICTURE,"edit_light_active")
    if (get_control_par(get_ui_id($mix_sntop_pan),$CONTROL_PAR_KEY_CONTROL)=1)
        $mix_sntop_pan := 1000
    end if
    set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_PAN,$mix_sntop_pan*500,-1,-1,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+3)
end on

on ui_control($mix_sntop_ov)
    set_control_par_str(get_ui_id($mix_edit_light),$CONTROL_PAR_PICTURE,"edit_light_active")
    $i := 65
    while ($i<=68)
        set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_VOLUME,1000*$mix_ov_vol/127*($mix_sntop_ov*7874)/1000,$i,-1,-1)
        inc($i)
    end while
end on

on ui_control($mix_sntop_rev)
    if ($anysolo # 1 or ($mix_sntop_solo=1))
        set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_SENDLEVEL_7,$mix_sntop_rev*$mix_sntop_vol*62,-1,7,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+3)
    end if
    set_control_par_str(get_ui_id($mix_edit_light),$CONTROL_PAR_PICTURE,"edit_light_active")
end on

on ui_control($mix_snbt_vol)
    set_control_par_str(get_ui_id($mix_edit_light),$CONTROL_PAR_PICTURE,"edit_light_active")
    if (get_control_par(get_ui_id($mix_snbt_vol),$CONTROL_PAR_KEY_CONTROL)=1)
        $mix_snbt_vol := 100
    end if
    if ($anysolo # 1 or ($mix_snbt_solo=1))
        set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_VOLUME,$mix_snbt_vol*7874,-1,-1,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+4)
        set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_SENDLEVEL_7,$mix_snbt_rev*$mix_snbt_vol*62,-1,7,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+4)
    end if
    if ($mix_sn_link=1 and ($mix_snbt_locked=0))
        if (in_range($mix_snbt_vol+$mix_sn_diff,0,127))
            $mix_sntop_vol := $mix_snbt_vol+$mix_sn_diff
            if ($anysolo # 1 or ($mix_sntop_solo=1))
                set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_VOLUME,$mix_sntop_vol*7874,-1,-1,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+3)
            end if
        else
            if ($mix_snbt_vol+$mix_sn_diff>=127)
                $mix_sntop_vol := 127
            else
            if ($mix_snbt_vol+$mix_sn_diff<=0)
                $mix_sntop_vol := 0
            end if
            end if
        end if
        if ($mix_sntop_vol<=0 or ($mix_sntop_vol>=127))
            $mix_snbt_vol := $mix_sntop_vol-$mix_sn_diff
            set_control_par(get_ui_id($mix_snbt_vol),$CONTROL_PAR_MOUSE_BEHAVIOUR,-1)
        end if
        if (in_range($mix_snbt_vol+$mix_sn_diff,0,127))
            set_control_par(get_ui_id($mix_snbt_vol),$CONTROL_PAR_MOUSE_BEHAVIOUR,$mix_vol_mousebehaviour)
        end if
    end if
    %vol_buffer[5] := 0
end on

on ui_control($mix_snbt_solo)
    $busidx := 4
    call update_solo_status
    call fx_eq_td_comp_reset
    if ($mix_snbt_solo=1)
        set_control_par_str(get_ui_id($fx_instr_label),$CONTROL_PAR_PICTURE,@fx_instr_label_snbt)
        call assign_fx_snbt
        call set_fx_text
    end if
end on

on ui_control($mix_snbt_dry)
    if ($mix_snbt_dry=1)
        set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_EFFECT_BYPASS,1,-1,1,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+4)
        set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_EFFECT_BYPASS,1,-1,2,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+4)
        set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_EFFECT_BYPASS,1,-1,4,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+4)
        set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_EFFECT_BYPASS,1,-1,7,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+4)
    else
    if ($mix_snbt_dry=0)
        set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_EFFECT_BYPASS,0,-1,1,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+4)
        set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_EFFECT_BYPASS,0,-1,2,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+4)
        set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_EFFECT_BYPASS,0,-1,4,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+4)
        set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_EFFECT_BYPASS,0,-1,7,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+4)
    end if
    end if
end on

on ui_control($mix_snbt_pan)
    set_control_par_str(get_ui_id($mix_edit_light),$CONTROL_PAR_PICTURE,"edit_light_active")
    if (get_control_par(get_ui_id($mix_snbt_pan),$CONTROL_PAR_KEY_CONTROL)=1)
        $mix_snbt_pan := 1000
    end if
    set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_PAN,$mix_snbt_pan*500,-1,-1,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+4)
end on

on ui_control($mix_snbt_phase)
    set_control_par_str(get_ui_id($mix_edit_light),$CONTROL_PAR_PICTURE,"edit_light_active")
    if ($mix_snbt_phase=1)
        set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_EFFECT_BYPASS,0,-1,0,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+4)
    else
    if ($mix_snbt_phase=0)
        set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_EFFECT_BYPASS,1,-1,0,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+4)
    end if
    end if
end on

on ui_control($mix_snbt_rev)
    if ($anysolo # 1 or ($mix_snbt_solo=1))
        set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_SENDLEVEL_7,$mix_snbt_rev*$mix_snbt_vol*62,-1,7,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+4)
    end if
    set_control_par_str(get_ui_id($mix_edit_light),$CONTROL_PAR_PICTURE,"edit_light_active")
end on

on ui_control($mix_tomhi_vol)
    set_control_par_str(get_ui_id($mix_edit_light),$CONTROL_PAR_PICTURE,"edit_light_active")
    if (get_control_par(get_ui_id($mix_tomhi_vol),$CONTROL_PAR_KEY_CONTROL)=1)
        $mix_tomhi_vol := 100
    end if
    if ($anysolo # 1 or ($mix_tomhi_solo=1))
        set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_VOLUME,$mix_tomhi_vol*7874,-1,-1,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+5)
        set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_SENDLEVEL_7,$mix_tomhi_rev*$mix_tomhi_vol*62,-1,7,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+5)
    end if
    %vol_buffer[6] := 0
end on

on ui_control($mix_tomhi_solo)
    $busidx := 5
    call update_solo_status
    call fx_eq_td_comp_reset
    if ($mix_tomhi_solo=1)
        set_control_par_str(get_ui_id($fx_instr_label),$CONTROL_PAR_PICTURE,@fx_instr_label_tomhi)
        call assign_fx_tomhi
        call set_fx_text
    end if
end on

on ui_control($mix_tomhi_dry)
    if ($mix_tomhi_dry=1)
        set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_EFFECT_BYPASS,1,-1,1,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+5)
        set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_EFFECT_BYPASS,1,-1,2,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+5)
        set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_EFFECT_BYPASS,1,-1,4,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+5)
        set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_EFFECT_BYPASS,1,-1,7,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+5)
    else
    if ($mix_tomhi_dry=0)
        set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_EFFECT_BYPASS,0,-1,1,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+5)
        set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_EFFECT_BYPASS,0,-1,2,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+5)
        set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_EFFECT_BYPASS,0,-1,4,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+5)
        set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_EFFECT_BYPASS,0,-1,7,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+5)
    end if
    end if
end on

on ui_control($mix_tomhi_pan)
    set_control_par_str(get_ui_id($mix_edit_light),$CONTROL_PAR_PICTURE,"edit_light_active")
    if (get_control_par(get_ui_id($mix_tomhi_pan),$CONTROL_PAR_KEY_CONTROL)=1)
        $mix_tomhi_pan := 1000
    end if
    set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_PAN,$mix_tomhi_pan*500,-1,-1,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+5)
end on

on ui_control($mix_tomhi_ov)
    set_control_par_str(get_ui_id($mix_edit_light),$CONTROL_PAR_PICTURE,"edit_light_active")
    $i := 69
    while ($i<=76)
        set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_VOLUME,1000*$mix_ov_vol/127*($mix_tomhi_ov*7874)/1000,$i,-1,-1)
        inc($i)
    end while
end on

on ui_control($mix_tomhi_rev)
    if ($anysolo # 1 or ($mix_tomhi_solo=1))
        set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_SENDLEVEL_7,$mix_tomhi_rev*$mix_tomhi_vol*62,-1,7,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+5)
    end if
    set_control_par_str(get_ui_id($mix_edit_light),$CONTROL_PAR_PICTURE,"edit_light_active")
end on

on ui_control($mix_tommid_vol)
    set_control_par_str(get_ui_id($mix_edit_light),$CONTROL_PAR_PICTURE,"edit_light_active")
    if (get_control_par(get_ui_id($mix_tommid_vol),$CONTROL_PAR_KEY_CONTROL)=1)
        $mix_tommid_vol := 100
    end if
    if ($anysolo # 1 or ($mix_tommid_solo=1))
        set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_VOLUME,$mix_tommid_vol*7874,-1,-1,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+6)
        set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_SENDLEVEL_7,$mix_tommid_rev*$mix_tommid_vol*62,-1,7,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+6)
    end if
    %vol_buffer[7] := 0
end on

on ui_control($mix_tommid_solo)
    $busidx := 6
    call update_solo_status
    call fx_eq_td_comp_reset
    if ($mix_tommid_solo=1)
        set_control_par_str(get_ui_id($fx_instr_label),$CONTROL_PAR_PICTURE,@fx_instr_label_tommid)
        call assign_fx_tommid
        call set_fx_text
    end if
end on

on ui_control($mix_tommid_dry)
    if ($mix_tommid_dry=1)
        set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_EFFECT_BYPASS,1,-1,1,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+6)
        set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_EFFECT_BYPASS,1,-1,2,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+6)
        set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_EFFECT_BYPASS,1,-1,4,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+6)
        set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_EFFECT_BYPASS,1,-1,7,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+6)
    else
    if ($mix_tommid_dry=0)
        set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_EFFECT_BYPASS,0,-1,1,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+6)
        set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_EFFECT_BYPASS,0,-1,2,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+6)
        set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_EFFECT_BYPASS,0,-1,4,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+6)
        set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_EFFECT_BYPASS,0,-1,7,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+6)
    end if
    end if
end on

on ui_control($mix_tommid_pan)
    set_control_par_str(get_ui_id($mix_edit_light),$CONTROL_PAR_PICTURE,"edit_light_active")
    if (get_control_par(get_ui_id($mix_tommid_pan),$CONTROL_PAR_KEY_CONTROL)=1)
        $mix_tommid_pan := 1000
    end if
    set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_PAN,$mix_tommid_pan*500,-1,-1,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+6)
end on

on ui_control($mix_tommid_ov)
    set_control_par_str(get_ui_id($mix_edit_light),$CONTROL_PAR_PICTURE,"edit_light_active")
    $i := 77
    while ($i<=84)
        set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_VOLUME,1000*$mix_ov_vol/127*($mix_tommid_ov*7874)/1000,$i,-1,-1)
        inc($i)
    end while
end on

on ui_control($mix_tommid_rev)
    if ($anysolo # 1 or ($mix_tommid_solo=1))
        set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_SENDLEVEL_7,$mix_tommid_rev*$mix_tommid_vol*62,-1,7,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+6)
    end if
    set_control_par_str(get_ui_id($mix_edit_light),$CONTROL_PAR_PICTURE,"edit_light_active")
end on

on ui_control($mix_tomlow_vol)
    set_control_par_str(get_ui_id($mix_edit_light),$CONTROL_PAR_PICTURE,"edit_light_active")
    if (get_control_par(get_ui_id($mix_tomlow_vol),$CONTROL_PAR_KEY_CONTROL)=1)
        $mix_tomlow_vol := 100
    end if
    if ($anysolo # 1 or ($mix_tomlow_solo=1))
        set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_VOLUME,$mix_tomlow_vol*7874,-1,-1,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+7)
        set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_SENDLEVEL_7,$mix_tomlow_rev*$mix_tomlow_vol*62,-1,7,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+7)
    end if
    %vol_buffer[8] := 0
end on

on ui_control($mix_tomlow_solo)
    $busidx := 7
    call update_solo_status
    call fx_eq_td_comp_reset
    if ($mix_tomlow_solo=1)
        set_control_par_str(get_ui_id($fx_instr_label),$CONTROL_PAR_PICTURE,@fx_instr_label_tomlow)
        call assign_fx_tomlow
        call set_fx_text
    end if
end on

on ui_control($mix_tomlow_dry)
    if ($mix_tomlow_dry=1)
        set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_EFFECT_BYPASS,1,-1,1,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+7)
        set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_EFFECT_BYPASS,1,-1,2,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+7)
        set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_EFFECT_BYPASS,1,-1,4,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+7)
        set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_EFFECT_BYPASS,1,-1,7,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+7)
    else
    if ($mix_tomlow_dry=0)
        set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_EFFECT_BYPASS,0,-1,1,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+7)
        set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_EFFECT_BYPASS,0,-1,2,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+7)
        set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_EFFECT_BYPASS,0,-1,4,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+7)
        set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_EFFECT_BYPASS,0,-1,7,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+7)
    end if
    end if
end on

on ui_control($mix_tomlow_pan)
    set_control_par_str(get_ui_id($mix_edit_light),$CONTROL_PAR_PICTURE,"edit_light_active")
    if (get_control_par(get_ui_id($mix_tomlow_pan),$CONTROL_PAR_KEY_CONTROL)=1)
        $mix_tomlow_pan := 1000
    end if
    set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_PAN,$mix_tomlow_pan*500,-1,-1,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+7)
end on

on ui_control($mix_tomlow_ov)
    set_control_par_str(get_ui_id($mix_edit_light),$CONTROL_PAR_PICTURE,"edit_light_active")
    $i := 85
    while ($i<=92)
        set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_VOLUME,1000*$mix_ov_vol/127*($mix_tomlow_ov*7874)/1000,$i,-1,-1)
        inc($i)
    end while
end on

on ui_control($mix_tomlow_rev)
    if ($anysolo # 1 or ($mix_tomlow_solo=1))
        set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_SENDLEVEL_7,$mix_tomlow_rev*$mix_tomlow_vol*62,-1,7,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+7)
    end if
    set_control_par_str(get_ui_id($mix_edit_light),$CONTROL_PAR_PICTURE,"edit_light_active")
end on

on ui_control($mix_ov_vol)
    set_control_par_str(get_ui_id($mix_edit_light),$CONTROL_PAR_PICTURE,"edit_light_active")
    if (get_control_par(get_ui_id($mix_ov_vol),$CONTROL_PAR_KEY_CONTROL)=1)
        $mix_ov_vol := 100
    end if
    if ($anysolo # 1 or ($mix_ov_solo=1))
        set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_VOLUME,$mix_ov_vol*7874,-1,-1,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+8)
        set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_SENDLEVEL_7,$mix_ov_rev*$mix_ov_vol*62,-1,7,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+8)
        call update_all_volumes
        %vol_buffer[9] := 0
    end if
end on

on ui_control($mix_ov_solo)
    $busidx := 8
    call update_solo_status
    call fx_eq_td_comp_reset
    if ($mix_ov_solo=1)
        set_control_par_str(get_ui_id($fx_instr_label),$CONTROL_PAR_PICTURE,@fx_instr_label_ov)
        call assign_fx_ov
        call set_fx_text
    end if
end on

on ui_control($mix_ov_dry)
    if ($mix_ov_dry=1)
        set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_EFFECT_BYPASS,1,-1,1,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+8)
        set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_EFFECT_BYPASS,1,-1,2,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+8)
        set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_EFFECT_BYPASS,1,-1,4,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+8)
        set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_EFFECT_BYPASS,1,-1,7,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+8)
    else
    if ($mix_ov_dry=0)
        set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_EFFECT_BYPASS,0,-1,1,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+8)
        set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_EFFECT_BYPASS,0,-1,2,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+8)
        set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_EFFECT_BYPASS,0,-1,4,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+8)
        set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_EFFECT_BYPASS,0,-1,7,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+8)
    end if
    end if
end on

on ui_control($mix_ov_spread)
    set_control_par_str(get_ui_id($mix_edit_light),$CONTROL_PAR_PICTURE,"edit_light_active")
    if (get_control_par(get_ui_id($mix_ov_spread),$CONTROL_PAR_KEY_CONTROL)=1)
        $mix_ov_spread := 1000
    end if
    set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_STEREO,$mix_ov_spread*250,-1,6,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+8)
end on

on ui_control($mix_ov_pan)
    set_control_par_str(get_ui_id($mix_edit_light),$CONTROL_PAR_PICTURE,"edit_light_active")
    if (get_control_par(get_ui_id($mix_ov_pan),$CONTROL_PAR_KEY_CONTROL)=1)
        $mix_ov_pan := 1000
    end if
    set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_STEREO_PAN,$mix_ov_pan*500,-1,6,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+8)
end on

on ui_control($mix_ov_mono)
    set_control_par_str(get_ui_id($mix_edit_light),$CONTROL_PAR_PICTURE,"edit_light_active")
    if ($mix_ov_mono=0)
        set_control_par(get_ui_id($mix_ov_pan),$CONTROL_PAR_HIDE,$HIDE_WHOLE_CONTROL)
        set_control_par(get_ui_id($mix_ov_spread),$CONTROL_PAR_HIDE,$HIDE_PART_NOTHING)
        set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_PAN,500000,-1,-1,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+8)
        set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_STEREO,$mix_ov_spread*250,-1,6,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+8)
        set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_STEREO_PAN,500000,-1,6,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+8)
    else
    if ($mix_ov_mono=1)
        set_control_par(get_ui_id($mix_ov_spread),$CONTROL_PAR_HIDE,$HIDE_WHOLE_CONTROL)
        set_control_par(get_ui_id($mix_ov_pan),$CONTROL_PAR_HIDE,$HIDE_PART_NOTHING)
        set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_STEREO_PAN,$mix_ov_pan*500,-1,6,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+8)
        set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_STEREO,0,-1,6,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+8)
    end if
    end if
end on

on ui_control($mix_ov_rev)
    if ($anysolo # 1 or ($mix_ov_solo=1))
        set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_SENDLEVEL_7,$mix_ov_rev*$mix_ov_vol*62,-1,7,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+8)
    end if
    set_control_par_str(get_ui_id($mix_edit_light),$CONTROL_PAR_PICTURE,"edit_light_active")
end on
on ui_control($mix_rev_vol)
    set_control_par_str(get_ui_id($mix_edit_light),$CONTROL_PAR_PICTURE,"edit_light_active")
    if (get_control_par(get_ui_id($mix_rev_vol),$CONTROL_PAR_KEY_CONTROL)=1)
        $mix_rev_vol := 100
    end if
    set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_SEND_EFFECT_OUTPUT_GAIN,$mix_rev_vol*5200,-1,7,0)
end on
on ui_control($mix_rev_hp)
    set_control_par_str(get_ui_id($mix_edit_light),$CONTROL_PAR_PICTURE,"edit_light_active")
    set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_IRC_FREQ_HIGHPASS_LR,$mix_rev_hp*7874,-1,7,0)
    set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_IRC_FREQ_HIGHPASS_ER,$mix_rev_hp*7874,-1,7,0)
end on
on ui_control($mix_rev_lp)
    set_control_par_str(get_ui_id($mix_edit_light),$CONTROL_PAR_PICTURE,"edit_light_active")
    set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_IRC_FREQ_LOWPASS_LR,$mix_rev_lp*7874,-1,7,0)
    set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_IRC_FREQ_LOWPASS_ER,$mix_rev_lp*7874,-1,7,0)
end on

on ui_control($mix_rev_arrowup)
    set_control_par_str(get_ui_id($mix_edit_light),$CONTROL_PAR_PICTURE,"edit_light_active")
    $mix_rev_arrowup := 0
    inc($IR_current)
    if ($IR_current>$IR_max)
        $IR_current := 0
    end if
    $load_ir_id := load_ir_sample(!IR_id[$IR_current],7,0)
    while ($load_ir_id # -1)
        wait(1)
    end while
    set_control_par_str(get_ui_id($mix_rev_label),$CONTROL_PAR_PICTURE,!ir_id_pic[$IR_current])
end on

on ui_control($mix_rev_arrowdown)
    set_control_par_str(get_ui_id($mix_edit_light),$CONTROL_PAR_PICTURE,"edit_light_active")
    $mix_rev_arrowdown := 0
    dec($IR_current)
    if ($IR_current<0)
        $IR_current := $IR_max
    end if
    $load_ir_id := load_ir_sample(!IR_id[$IR_current],7,0)
    while ($load_ir_id # -1)
        wait(1)
    end while
    set_control_par_str(get_ui_id($mix_rev_label),$CONTROL_PAR_PICTURE,!ir_id_pic[$IR_current])
end on

on ui_control($mix_hh_miclabel)
    call highlight_menu_micsel
    call hide_all_controls
    $mic_current := 1
    set_skin_offset(602)
    $i := 1
    while ($i<=$id3)
        set_control_par(%ui_id3[$i],$CONTROL_PAR_HIDE,$HIDE_PART_NOTHING)
        inc($i)
    end while
    call update_mic_pictures
    call reset_mic_0db
end on

on ui_control($mix_bdi_miclabel)
    call highlight_menu_micsel
    call hide_all_controls
    $mic_current := 2
    set_skin_offset(602)
    $i := 1
    while ($i<=$id3)
        set_control_par(%ui_id3[$i],$CONTROL_PAR_HIDE,$HIDE_PART_NOTHING)
        inc($i)
    end while
    call update_mic_pictures
    call reset_mic_0db
end on

on ui_control($mix_bdo_miclabel)
    call highlight_menu_micsel
    call hide_all_controls
    $mic_current := 3
    set_skin_offset(602)
    $i := 1
    while ($i<=$id3)
        set_control_par(%ui_id3[$i],$CONTROL_PAR_HIDE,$HIDE_PART_NOTHING)
        inc($i)
    end while
    call update_mic_pictures
    call reset_mic_0db
end on

on ui_control($mix_sntop_miclabel)
    call highlight_menu_micsel
    call hide_all_controls
    $mic_current := 4
    set_skin_offset(602)
    $i := 1
    while ($i<=$id3)
        set_control_par(%ui_id3[$i],$CONTROL_PAR_HIDE,$HIDE_PART_NOTHING)
        inc($i)
    end while
    call update_mic_pictures
    call reset_mic_0db
end on

on ui_control($mix_snbt_miclabel)
    call highlight_menu_micsel
    call hide_all_controls
    $mic_current := 5
    set_skin_offset(602)
    $i := 1
    while ($i<=$id3)
        set_control_par(%ui_id3[$i],$CONTROL_PAR_HIDE,$HIDE_PART_NOTHING)
        inc($i)
    end while
    call update_mic_pictures
    call reset_mic_0db
end on

on ui_control($mix_tomhi_miclabel)
    call highlight_menu_micsel
    call hide_all_controls
    $mic_current := 6
    set_skin_offset(602)
    $i := 1
    while ($i<=$id3)
        set_control_par(%ui_id3[$i],$CONTROL_PAR_HIDE,$HIDE_PART_NOTHING)
        inc($i)
    end while
    call update_mic_pictures
    call reset_mic_0db
end on

on ui_control($mix_tommid_miclabel)
    call highlight_menu_micsel
    call hide_all_controls
    $mic_current := 7
    set_skin_offset(602)
    $i := 1
    while ($i<=$id3)
        set_control_par(%ui_id3[$i],$CONTROL_PAR_HIDE,$HIDE_PART_NOTHING)
        inc($i)
    end while
    call update_mic_pictures
    call reset_mic_0db
end on

on ui_control($mix_tomlow_miclabel)
    call highlight_menu_micsel
    call hide_all_controls
    $mic_current := 8
    set_skin_offset(602)
    $i := 1
    while ($i<=$id3)
        set_control_par(%ui_id3[$i],$CONTROL_PAR_HIDE,$HIDE_PART_NOTHING)
        inc($i)
    end while
    call update_mic_pictures
    call reset_mic_0db
end on

on ui_control($mix_ov_miclabel)
    call highlight_menu_micsel
    call hide_all_controls
    $mic_current := 9
    set_skin_offset(602)
    $i := 1
    while ($i<=$id3)
        set_control_par(%ui_id3[$i],$CONTROL_PAR_HIDE,$HIDE_PART_NOTHING)
        inc($i)
    end while
    call update_mic_pictures
    call reset_mic_0db
end on

on ui_control($mix_preset_up)
    $mix_preset_up := 0
    inc($current_preset)
    if ($current_preset>36)
        $current_preset := 1
    end if

    call load_preset

    set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_VOLUME,$options_wires_snbtm*7874,97,-1,-1)
    set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_VOLUME,$options_wires_snbtm*6174,98,-1,-1)
    if ($options_wires_snbtm>60)
        pgs_set_key_val(MICS,9,1)
        pgs_set_key_val(MICS,10,1)
        if ($wire_purge_status = 0)
            $i := 0
            while($i < 30)
                purge_group(%nowire_groups[$i], 0)
                inc($i)
            end while
            $i := 0
            while($i < 38)
                purge_group(%wire_groups[$i], 1)
                inc($i)
            end while
            $wire_purge_status := 1
        end if
    else
    if ($options_wires_snbtm<=60)
        pgs_set_key_val(MICS,9,0)
        pgs_set_key_val(MICS,10,0)
        if ($wire_purge_status = 1)
            $i := 0
            while($i < 38)
                purge_group(%wire_groups[$i], 0)
                inc($i)
            end while
            $i := 0
            while($i < 30)
                purge_group(%nowire_groups[$i], 1)
                inc($i)
            end while
            $wire_purge_status := 0
        end if
    end if
    end if
end on

on ui_control($mix_preset_down)
    $mix_preset_down := 0
    dec($current_preset)
    if ($current_preset<1)
        $current_preset := 36
    end if

    call load_preset

    set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_VOLUME,$options_wires_snbtm*7874,97,-1,-1)
    set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_VOLUME,$options_wires_snbtm*6174,98,-1,-1)
    if ($options_wires_snbtm>60)
        pgs_set_key_val(MICS,9,1)
        pgs_set_key_val(MICS,10,1)
        if ($wire_purge_status = 0)
            $i := 0
            while($i < 30)
                purge_group(%nowire_groups[$i], 0)
                inc($i)
            end while
            $i := 0
            while($i < 38)
                purge_group(%wire_groups[$i], 1)
                inc($i)
            end while
            $wire_purge_status := 1
        end if
    else
    if ($options_wires_snbtm<=60)
        pgs_set_key_val(MICS,9,0)
        pgs_set_key_val(MICS,10,0)
        if ($wire_purge_status = 1)
            $i := 0
            while($i < 38)
                purge_group(%wire_groups[$i], 0)
                inc($i)
            end while
            $i := 0
            while($i < 30)
                purge_group(%nowire_groups[$i], 1)
                inc($i)
            end while
            $wire_purge_status := 0
        end if
    end if
    end if
end on

on ui_control($mix_load)
    $mix_save := 0
    $mix_load := 0
    $load_arr_id := load_array(%save,0)
    while($load_arr_id # -2)
        wait(10)
    end while
    call load_preset
    set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_VOLUME,$options_wires_snbtm*7874,97,-1,-1)
    set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_VOLUME,$options_wires_snbtm*6174,98,-1,-1)
    if ($options_wires_snbtm>60)
        pgs_set_key_val(MICS,9,1)
        pgs_set_key_val(MICS,10,1)
        if ($wire_purge_status = 0)
            $i := 0
            while($i < 30)
                purge_group(%nowire_groups[$i], 0)
                inc($i)
            end while
            $i := 0
            while($i < 38)
                purge_group(%wire_groups[$i], 1)
                inc($i)
            end while
            $wire_purge_status := 1
        end if
    else
    if ($options_wires_snbtm<=60)
        pgs_set_key_val(MICS,9,0)
        pgs_set_key_val(MICS,10,0)
        if ($wire_purge_status = 1)
            $i := 0
            while($i < 38)
                purge_group(%wire_groups[$i], 0)
                inc($i)
            end while
            $i := 0
            while($i < 30)
                purge_group(%nowire_groups[$i], 1)
                inc($i)
            end while
            $wire_purge_status := 0
        end if
    end if
    end if
    $load_arr_id := -1
end on

on ui_control($mix_save)
    $mix_save := 0
    $mix_load := 0
    %save[300] := 123
    %save[0] := $fx_eq_lf_hh
    %save[1] := $fx_eq_lg_hh
    %save[2] := $fx_eq_lb_hh
    %save[3] := $fx_eq_lmf_hh
    %save[4] := $fx_eq_lmg_hh
    %save[5] := $fx_eq_lmq_hh
    %save[6] := $fx_eq_hmf_hh

    %save[294] := $fx_td_soft_tommid
    %save[295] := $fx_td_soft_tomlow

    %save[297] := $fx_td_soft_master
    %save[298] := $fx_td_soft_hh
    %save[301] := $options_wires_snbtm
    %save[302] := $mix_swap
    $save_arr_id := save_array(%save,0)
end on

function mix_swap
    set_control_par_str(get_ui_id($mix_edit_light),$CONTROL_PAR_PICTURE,"edit_light_active")
    if ($mix_swap=1)
        $mix_swap := 0
    else
    if ($mix_swap=0)
        $mix_swap := 1
    end if
    end if
    if ($mix_swap=0)
        set_control_par_str(get_ui_id($mix_view_label),$CONTROL_PAR_PICTURE,"view_drummer")
    else
    if ($mix_swap=1)
        set_control_par_str(get_ui_id($mix_view_label),$CONTROL_PAR_PICTURE,"view_auditorial")
    end if
    end if
    set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_EFFECT_BYPASS,$mix_swap,-1,5,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+8)
    $mix_hh_pan := 2000-$mix_hh_pan
    $mix_bdi_pan := 2000-$mix_bdi_pan
    $mix_bdo_pan := 2000-$mix_bdo_pan
    $mix_sntop_pan := 2000-$mix_sntop_pan
    $mix_snbt_pan := 2000-$mix_snbt_pan
    $mix_tomhi_pan := 2000-$mix_tomhi_pan
    $mix_tommid_pan := 2000-$mix_tommid_pan
    $mix_tomlow_pan := 2000-$mix_tomlow_pan
    $mix_ov_pan := 2000-$mix_ov_pan
    set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_PAN,$mix_hh_pan*500,-1,-1,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+0)
    set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_PAN,$mix_bdi_pan*500,-1,-1,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+1)
    set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_PAN,$mix_bdo_pan*500,-1,-1,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+2)
    set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_PAN,$mix_sntop_pan*500,-1,-1,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+3)
    set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_PAN,$mix_snbt_pan*500,-1,-1,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+4)
    set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_PAN,$mix_tomhi_pan*500,-1,-1,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+5)
    set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_PAN,$mix_tommid_pan*500,-1,-1,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+6)
    set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_PAN,$mix_tomlow_pan*500,-1,-1,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+7)
    if ($mix_ov_mono=0)
        set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_STEREO_PAN,500000,-1,6,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+8)
        set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_STEREO,$mix_ov_spread*250,-1,6,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+8)
    else
    if ($mix_ov_mono=1)
        set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_STEREO_PAN,$mix_ov_pan*500,-1,6,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+8)
    end if
    end if
end function

on ui_control($mix_swap_L)
    $mix_swap_L := 0
    call mix_swap
end on
on ui_control($mix_swap_R)
    $mix_swap_R := 0
    call mix_swap
end on

on ui_control($mix_hh_sel)
    call unselect_all_channels
    $busidx := 0
    $mix_hh_sel := 1
    call update_fx_controls
    set_control_par_str(get_ui_id($fx_instr_label),$CONTROL_PAR_PICTURE,@fx_instr_label_hh)
    call assign_fx_hh
    call set_fx_text
    call check_anysolo
    call fx_eq_td_comp_reset
end on

on ui_control($mix_bdi_sel)
    call unselect_all_channels
    $busidx := 1
    $mix_bdi_sel := 1
    call update_fx_controls
    set_control_par_str(get_ui_id($fx_instr_label),$CONTROL_PAR_PICTURE,@fx_instr_label_bdi)
    call assign_fx_bdi
    call set_fx_text
    call check_anysolo
    call fx_eq_td_comp_reset
end on

on ui_control($mix_bdo_sel)
    call unselect_all_channels
    $busidx := 2
    $mix_bdo_sel := 1
    call update_fx_controls
    set_control_par_str(get_ui_id($fx_instr_label),$CONTROL_PAR_PICTURE,@fx_instr_label_bdo)
    call assign_fx_bdo
    call set_fx_text
    call check_anysolo
    call fx_eq_td_comp_reset
end on

on ui_control($mix_sntop_sel)
    call unselect_all_channels
    $busidx := 3
    $mix_sntop_sel := 1
    call update_fx_controls
    set_control_par_str(get_ui_id($fx_instr_label),$CONTROL_PAR_PICTURE,@fx_instr_label_sntop)
    call assign_fx_sntop
    call set_fx_text
    call check_anysolo
    call fx_eq_td_comp_reset
end on

on ui_control($mix_snbt_sel)
    call unselect_all_channels
    $busidx := 4
    $mix_snbt_sel := 1
    call update_fx_controls
    set_control_par_str(get_ui_id($fx_instr_label),$CONTROL_PAR_PICTURE,@fx_instr_label_snbt)
    call assign_fx_snbt
    call set_fx_text
    call check_anysolo
    call fx_eq_td_comp_reset
end on

on ui_control($mix_tomhi_sel)
    call unselect_all_channels
    $busidx := 5
    $mix_tomhi_sel := 1
    call update_fx_controls
    set_control_par_str(get_ui_id($fx_instr_label),$CONTROL_PAR_PICTURE,@fx_instr_label_tomhi)
    call assign_fx_tomhi
    call set_fx_text
    call check_anysolo
    call fx_eq_td_comp_reset
end on

on ui_control($mix_tommid_sel)
    call unselect_all_channels
    $busidx := 6
    $mix_tommid_sel := 1
    call update_fx_controls
    set_control_par_str(get_ui_id($fx_instr_label),$CONTROL_PAR_PICTURE,@fx_instr_label_tommid)
    call assign_fx_tommid
    call set_fx_text
    call check_anysolo
    call fx_eq_td_comp_reset
end on

on ui_control($mix_tomlow_sel)
    call unselect_all_channels
    $busidx := 7
    $mix_tomlow_sel := 1
    call update_fx_controls
    set_control_par_str(get_ui_id($fx_instr_label),$CONTROL_PAR_PICTURE,@fx_instr_label_tomlow)
    call assign_fx_tomlow
    call set_fx_text
    call check_anysolo
    call fx_eq_td_comp_reset
end on

on ui_control($mix_ov_sel)
    call unselect_all_channels
    $busidx := 8
    $mix_ov_sel := 1
    call update_fx_controls
    set_control_par_str(get_ui_id($fx_instr_label),$CONTROL_PAR_PICTURE,@fx_instr_label_ov)
    call assign_fx_ov
    call set_fx_text
    call check_anysolo
    call fx_eq_td_comp_reset
end on

on ui_control($mix_master_select)
    call unselect_all_channels
    $busidx := -1025
    $mix_master_select := 1
    call update_fx_controls
    set_control_par_str(get_ui_id($fx_instr_label),$CONTROL_PAR_PICTURE,@fx_instr_label_master)
    call assign_fx_master
    call set_fx_text
    if ($anysolo=1)
        $anysolo := 0
        call update_all_volumes
        $i := 0
        while ($i<=8)
            set_control_par_str(%solo_ui_ids[$i],$CONTROL_PAR_PICTURE,"dm_btn_solo")
            set_control_par(%solo_ui_ids[$i],$CONTROL_PAR_VALUE,0)
            %solo_arr[$i] := 0
            inc($i)
        end while
    end if

    call fx_eq_td_comp_reset

end on

on ui_control($fx_eq_lf)
    set_control_par_str(get_ui_id($mix_edit_light),$CONTROL_PAR_PICTURE,"edit_light_active")
    if ($fx_eq_reset=1)
        $fx_eq_reset := 0
        set_control_par_str(get_ui_id($mix_eq),$CONTROL_PAR_PICTURE,"Btn_eq_on")
    end if
    if ($mix_hh_sel=1)
        $fx_eq_lf_hh := $fx_eq_lf
        set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_SEQ_LF_FREQ,$fx_eq_lf*7874,-1,1,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+0)
        @fx_eq_lf_str := get_engine_par_disp($ENGINE_PAR_SEQ_LF_FREQ,-1,1,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+0)
    end if
    if ($mix_bdi_sel=1)
        $fx_eq_lf_bdi := $fx_eq_lf
        set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_SEQ_LF_FREQ,$fx_eq_lf*7874,-1,1,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+1)
        @fx_eq_lf_str := get_engine_par_disp($ENGINE_PAR_SEQ_LF_FREQ,-1,1,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+1)
    end if
    if ($mix_bdo_sel=1)
        $fx_eq_lf_bdo := $fx_eq_lf
        set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_SEQ_LF_FREQ,$fx_eq_lf*7874,-1,1,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+2)
        @fx_eq_lf_str := get_engine_par_disp($ENGINE_PAR_SEQ_LF_FREQ,-1,1,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+2)
    end if
    if ($mix_sntop_sel=1)
        $fx_eq_lf_sntop := $fx_eq_lf
        set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_SEQ_LF_FREQ,$fx_eq_lf*7874,-1,1,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+3)
        @fx_eq_lf_str := get_engine_par_disp($ENGINE_PAR_SEQ_LF_FREQ,-1,1,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+3)
    end if
    if ($mix_snbt_sel=1)
        $fx_eq_lf_snbt := $fx_eq_lf
        set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_SEQ_LF_FREQ,$fx_eq_lf*7874,-1,1,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+4)
        @fx_eq_lf_str := get_engine_par_disp($ENGINE_PAR_SEQ_LF_FREQ,-1,1,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+4)
    end if
    if ($mix_tomhi_sel=1)
        $fx_eq_lf_tomhi := $fx_eq_lf
        set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_SEQ_LF_FREQ,$fx_eq_lf*7874,-1,1,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+5)
        @fx_eq_lf_str := get_engine_par_disp($ENGINE_PAR_SEQ_LF_FREQ,-1,1,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+5)
    end if
    if ($mix_tommid_sel=1)
        $fx_eq_lf_tommid := $fx_eq_lf
        set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_SEQ_LF_FREQ,$fx_eq_lf*7874,-1,1,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+6)
        @fx_eq_lf_str := get_engine_par_disp($ENGINE_PAR_SEQ_LF_FREQ,-1,1,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+6)
    end if
    if ($mix_tomlow_sel=1)
        $fx_eq_lf_tomlow := $fx_eq_lf
        set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_SEQ_LF_FREQ,$fx_eq_lf*7874,-1,1,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+7)
        @fx_eq_lf_str := get_engine_par_disp($ENGINE_PAR_SEQ_LF_FREQ,-1,1,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+7)
    end if
    if ($mix_ov_sel=1)
        $fx_eq_lf_ov := $fx_eq_lf
        set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_SEQ_LF_FREQ,$fx_eq_lf*7874,-1,1,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+8)
        @fx_eq_lf_str := get_engine_par_disp($ENGINE_PAR_SEQ_LF_FREQ,-1,1,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+8)
    end if
    if ($mix_master_select=1)
        $fx_eq_lf_master := $fx_eq_lf
        set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_SEQ_LF_FREQ,$fx_eq_lf*7874,-1,1,-1)
        @fx_eq_lf_str := get_engine_par_disp($ENGINE_PAR_SEQ_LF_FREQ,-1,1,-1)
    end if
    set_text($fx_eq_lf_val,@fx_eq_lf_str)
end on

on ui_control($fx_eq_lg)
    set_control_par_str(get_ui_id($mix_edit_light),$CONTROL_PAR_PICTURE,"edit_light_active")
    if ($fx_eq_reset=1)
        $fx_eq_reset := 0
        set_control_par_str(get_ui_id($mix_eq),$CONTROL_PAR_PICTURE,"Btn_eq_on")
    end if
    if ($mix_hh_sel=1)
        $fx_eq_lg_hh := $fx_eq_lg
        set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_SEQ_LF_GAIN,$fx_eq_lg*250,-1,1,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+0)
        @fx_eq_lg_str := get_engine_par_disp($ENGINE_PAR_SEQ_LF_GAIN,-1,1,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+0)
    end if
    if ($mix_bdi_sel=1)
        $fx_eq_lg_bdi := $fx_eq_lg
        set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_SEQ_LF_GAIN,$fx_eq_lg*250,-1,1,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+1)
        @fx_eq_lg_str := get_engine_par_disp($ENGINE_PAR_SEQ_LF_GAIN,-1,1,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+1)
    end if
    if ($mix_bdo_sel=1)
        $fx_eq_lg_bdo := $fx_eq_lg
        set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_SEQ_LF_GAIN,$fx_eq_lg*250,-1,1,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+2)
        @fx_eq_lg_str := get_engine_par_disp($ENGINE_PAR_SEQ_LF_GAIN,-1,1,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+2)
    end if
    if ($mix_sntop_sel=1)
        $fx_eq_lg_sntop := $fx_eq_lg
        set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_SEQ_LF_GAIN,$fx_eq_lg*250,-1,1,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+3)
        @fx_eq_lg_str := get_engine_par_disp($ENGINE_PAR_SEQ_LF_GAIN,-1,1,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+3)
    end if
    if ($mix_snbt_sel=1)
        $fx_eq_lg_snbt := $fx_eq_lg
        set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_SEQ_LF_GAIN,$fx_eq_lg*250,-1,1,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+4)
        @fx_eq_lg_str := get_engine_par_disp($ENGINE_PAR_SEQ_LF_GAIN,-1,1,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+4)
    end if
    if ($mix_tomhi_sel=1)
        $fx_eq_lg_tomhi := $fx_eq_lg
        set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_SEQ_LF_GAIN,$fx_eq_lg*250,-1,1,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+5)
        @fx_eq_lg_str := get_engine_par_disp($ENGINE_PAR_SEQ_LF_GAIN,-1,1,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+5)
    end if
    if ($mix_tommid_sel=1)
        $fx_eq_lg_tommid := $fx_eq_lg
        set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_SEQ_LF_GAIN,$fx_eq_lg*250,-1,1,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+6)
        @fx_eq_lg_str := get_engine_par_disp($ENGINE_PAR_SEQ_LF_GAIN,-1,1,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+6)
    end if
    if ($mix_tomlow_sel=1)
        $fx_eq_lg_tomlow := $fx_eq_lg
        set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_SEQ_LF_GAIN,$fx_eq_lg*250,-1,1,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+7)
        @fx_eq_lg_str := get_engine_par_disp($ENGINE_PAR_SEQ_LF_GAIN,-1,1,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+7)
    end if
    if ($mix_ov_sel=1)
        $fx_eq_lg_ov := $fx_eq_lg
        set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_SEQ_LF_GAIN,$fx_eq_lg*250,-1,1,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+8)
        @fx_eq_lg_str := get_engine_par_disp($ENGINE_PAR_SEQ_LF_GAIN,-1,1,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+8)
    end if
    if ($mix_master_select=1)
        $fx_eq_lg_master := $fx_eq_lg
        set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_SEQ_LF_GAIN,$fx_eq_lg*250,-1,1,-1)
        @fx_eq_lg_str := get_engine_par_disp($ENGINE_PAR_SEQ_LF_GAIN,-1,1,-1)
    end if
    set_text($fx_eq_lg_val,@fx_eq_lg_str)
end on

on ui_control($fx_eq_lb)
    set_control_par_str(get_ui_id($mix_edit_light),$CONTROL_PAR_PICTURE,"edit_light_active")
    if ($fx_eq_reset=1)
        $fx_eq_reset := 0
        set_control_par_str(get_ui_id($mix_eq),$CONTROL_PAR_PICTURE,"Btn_eq_on")
    end if
    if ($mix_hh_sel=1)
        $fx_eq_lb_hh := $fx_eq_lb
        set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_SEQ_LF_BELL,$fx_eq_lb,-1,1,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+0)
    end if
    if ($mix_bdi_sel=1)
        $fx_eq_lb_bdi := $fx_eq_lb
        set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_SEQ_LF_BELL,$fx_eq_lb,-1,1,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+1)
    end if
    if ($mix_bdo_sel=1)
        $fx_eq_lb_bdo := $fx_eq_lb
        set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_SEQ_LF_BELL,$fx_eq_lb,-1,1,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+2)
    end if
    if ($mix_sntop_sel=1)
        $fx_eq_lb_sntop := $fx_eq_lb
        set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_SEQ_LF_BELL,$fx_eq_lb,-1,1,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+3)
    end if
    if ($mix_snbt_sel=1)
        $fx_eq_lb_snbt := $fx_eq_lb
        set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_SEQ_LF_BELL,$fx_eq_lb,-1,1,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+4)
    end if
    if ($mix_tomhi_sel=1)
        $fx_eq_lb_tomhi := $fx_eq_lb
        set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_SEQ_LF_BELL,$fx_eq_lb,-1,1,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+5)
    end if
    if ($mix_tommid_sel=1)
        $fx_eq_lb_tommid := $fx_eq_lb
        set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_SEQ_LF_BELL,$fx_eq_lb,-1,1,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+6)
    end if
    if ($mix_tomlow_sel=1)
        $fx_eq_lb_tomlow := $fx_eq_lb
        set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_SEQ_LF_BELL,$fx_eq_lb,-1,1,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+7)
    end if
    if ($mix_ov_sel=1)
        $fx_eq_lb_ov := $fx_eq_lb
        set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_SEQ_LF_BELL,$fx_eq_lb,-1,1,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+8)
    end if
    if ($mix_master_select=1)
        $fx_eq_lb_master := $fx_eq_lb
        set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_SEQ_LF_BELL,$fx_eq_lb,-1,1,-1)
    end if
end on

on ui_control($fx_eq_lmf)
    set_control_par_str(get_ui_id($mix_edit_light),$CONTROL_PAR_PICTURE,"edit_light_active")
    if ($fx_eq_reset=1)
        $fx_eq_reset := 0
        set_control_par_str(get_ui_id($mix_eq),$CONTROL_PAR_PICTURE,"Btn_eq_on")
    end if
    if ($mix_hh_sel=1)
        $fx_eq_lmf_hh := $fx_eq_lmf
        set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_SEQ_LMF_FREQ,$fx_eq_lmf*7874,-1,1,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+0)
        @fx_eq_lmf_str := get_engine_par_disp($ENGINE_PAR_SEQ_LMF_FREQ,-1,1,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+0)
    end if
    if ($mix_bdi_sel=1)
        $fx_eq_lmf_bdi := $fx_eq_lmf
        set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_SEQ_LMF_FREQ,$fx_eq_lmf*7874,-1,1,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+1)
        @fx_eq_lmf_str := get_engine_par_disp($ENGINE_PAR_SEQ_LMF_FREQ,-1,1,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+1)
    end if
    if ($mix_bdo_sel=1)
        $fx_eq_lmf_bdo := $fx_eq_lmf
        set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_SEQ_LMF_FREQ,$fx_eq_lmf*7874,-1,1,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+2)
        @fx_eq_lmf_str := get_engine_par_disp($ENGINE_PAR_SEQ_LMF_FREQ,-1,1,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+2)
    end if
    if ($mix_sntop_sel=1)
        $fx_eq_lmf_sntop := $fx_eq_lmf
        set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_SEQ_LMF_FREQ,$fx_eq_lmf*7874,-1,1,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+3)
        @fx_eq_lmf_str := get_engine_par_disp($ENGINE_PAR_SEQ_LMF_FREQ,-1,1,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+3)
    end if
    if ($mix_snbt_sel=1)
        $fx_eq_lmf_snbt := $fx_eq_lmf
        set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_SEQ_LMF_FREQ,$fx_eq_lmf*7874,-1,1,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+4)
        @fx_eq_lmf_str := get_engine_par_disp($ENGINE_PAR_SEQ_LMF_FREQ,-1,1,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+4)
    end if
    if ($mix_tomhi_sel=1)
        $fx_eq_lmf_tomhi := $fx_eq_lmf
        set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_SEQ_LMF_FREQ,$fx_eq_lmf*7874,-1,1,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+5)
        @fx_eq_lmf_str := get_engine_par_disp($ENGINE_PAR_SEQ_LMF_FREQ,-1,1,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+5)
    end if
    if ($mix_tommid_sel=1)
        $fx_eq_lmf_tommid := $fx_eq_lmf
        set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_SEQ_LMF_FREQ,$fx_eq_lmf*7874,-1,1,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+6)
        @fx_eq_lmf_str := get_engine_par_disp($ENGINE_PAR_SEQ_LMF_FREQ,-1,1,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+6)
    end if
    if ($mix_tomlow_sel=1)
        $fx_eq_lmf_tomlow := $fx_eq_lmf
        set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_SEQ_LMF_FREQ,$fx_eq_lmf*7874,-1,1,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+7)
        @fx_eq_lmf_str := get_engine_par_disp($ENGINE_PAR_SEQ_LMF_FREQ,-1,1,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+7)
    end if
    if ($mix_ov_sel=1)
        $fx_eq_lmf_ov := $fx_eq_lmf
        set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_SEQ_LMF_FREQ,$fx_eq_lmf*7874,-1,1,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+8)
        @fx_eq_lmf_str := get_engine_par_disp($ENGINE_PAR_SEQ_LMF_FREQ,-1,1,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+8)
    end if
    if ($mix_master_select=1)
        $fx_eq_lmf_master := $fx_eq_lmf
        set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_SEQ_LMF_FREQ,$fx_eq_lmf*7874,-1,1,-1)
        @fx_eq_lmf_str := get_engine_par_disp($ENGINE_PAR_SEQ_LMF_FREQ,-1,1,-1)
    end if
    set_text($fx_eq_lmf_val,@fx_eq_lmf_str)
end on

on ui_control($fx_eq_lmg)
    set_control_par_str(get_ui_id($mix_edit_light),$CONTROL_PAR_PICTURE,"edit_light_active")
    if ($fx_eq_reset=1)
        $fx_eq_reset := 0
        set_control_par_str(get_ui_id($mix_eq),$CONTROL_PAR_PICTURE,"Btn_eq_on")
    end if
    if ($mix_hh_sel=1)
        $fx_eq_lmg_hh := $fx_eq_lmg
        set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_SEQ_LMF_GAIN,$fx_eq_lmg*250,-1,1,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+0)
        @fx_eq_lmg_str := get_engine_par_disp($ENGINE_PAR_SEQ_LMF_GAIN,-1,1,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+0)
    end if
    if ($mix_bdi_sel=1)
        $fx_eq_lmg_bdi := $fx_eq_lmg
        set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_SEQ_LMF_GAIN,$fx_eq_lmg*250,-1,1,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+1)
        @fx_eq_lmg_str := get_engine_par_disp($ENGINE_PAR_SEQ_LMF_GAIN,-1,1,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+1)
    end if
    if ($mix_bdo_sel=1)
        $fx_eq_lmg_bdo := $fx_eq_lmg
        set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_SEQ_LMF_GAIN,$fx_eq_lmg*250,-1,1,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+2)
        @fx_eq_lmg_str := get_engine_par_disp($ENGINE_PAR_SEQ_LMF_GAIN,-1,1,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+2)
    end if
    if ($mix_sntop_sel=1)
        $fx_eq_lmg_sntop := $fx_eq_lmg
        set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_SEQ_LMF_GAIN,$fx_eq_lmg*250,-1,1,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+3)
        @fx_eq_lmg_str := get_engine_par_disp($ENGINE_PAR_SEQ_LMF_GAIN,-1,1,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+3)
    end if
    if ($mix_snbt_sel=1)
        $fx_eq_lmg_snbt := $fx_eq_lmg
        set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_SEQ_LMF_GAIN,$fx_eq_lmg*250,-1,1,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+4)
        @fx_eq_lmg_str := get_engine_par_disp($ENGINE_PAR_SEQ_LMF_GAIN,-1,1,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+4)
    end if
    if ($mix_tomhi_sel=1)
        $fx_eq_lmg_tomhi := $fx_eq_lmg
        set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_SEQ_LMF_GAIN,$fx_eq_lmg*250,-1,1,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+5)
        @fx_eq_lmg_str := get_engine_par_disp($ENGINE_PAR_SEQ_LMF_GAIN,-1,1,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+5)
    end if
    if ($mix_tommid_sel=1)
        $fx_eq_lmg_tommid := $fx_eq_lmg
        set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_SEQ_LMF_GAIN,$fx_eq_lmg*250,-1,1,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+6)
        @fx_eq_lmg_str := get_engine_par_disp($ENGINE_PAR_SEQ_LMF_GAIN,-1,1,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+6)
    end if
    if ($mix_tomlow_sel=1)
        $fx_eq_lmg_tomlow := $fx_eq_lmg
        set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_SEQ_LMF_GAIN,$fx_eq_lmg*250,-1,1,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+7)
        @fx_eq_lmg_str := get_engine_par_disp($ENGINE_PAR_SEQ_LMF_GAIN,-1,1,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+7)
    end if
    if ($mix_ov_sel=1)
        $fx_eq_lmg_ov := $fx_eq_lmg
        set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_SEQ_LMF_GAIN,$fx_eq_lmg*250,-1,1,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+8)
        @fx_eq_lmg_str := get_engine_par_disp($ENGINE_PAR_SEQ_LMF_GAIN,-1,1,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+8)
    end if
    if ($mix_master_select=1)
        $fx_eq_lmg_master := $fx_eq_lmg
        set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_SEQ_LMF_GAIN,$fx_eq_lmg*250,-1,1,-1)
        @fx_eq_lmg_str := get_engine_par_disp($ENGINE_PAR_SEQ_LMF_GAIN,-1,1,-1)
    end if
    set_text($fx_eq_lmg_val,@fx_eq_lmg_str)
end on

on ui_control($fx_eq_lmq)
    set_control_par_str(get_ui_id($mix_edit_light),$CONTROL_PAR_PICTURE,"edit_light_active")
    if ($fx_eq_reset=1)
        $fx_eq_reset := 0
        set_control_par_str(get_ui_id($mix_eq),$CONTROL_PAR_PICTURE,"Btn_eq_on")
    end if
    if ($mix_hh_sel=1)
        $fx_eq_lmq_hh := $fx_eq_lmq
        set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_SEQ_LMF_Q,$fx_eq_lmq*7874,-1,1,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+0)
        @fx_eq_lmq_str := get_engine_par_disp($ENGINE_PAR_SEQ_LMF_Q,-1,1,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+0)
    end if
    if ($mix_bdi_sel=1)
        $fx_eq_lmq_bdi := $fx_eq_lmq
        set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_SEQ_LMF_Q,$fx_eq_lmq*7874,-1,1,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+1)
        @fx_eq_lmq_str := get_engine_par_disp($ENGINE_PAR_SEQ_LMF_Q,-1,1,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+1)
    end if
    if ($mix_bdo_sel=1)
        $fx_eq_lmq_bdo := $fx_eq_lmq
        set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_SEQ_LMF_Q,$fx_eq_lmq*7874,-1,1,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+2)
        @fx_eq_lmq_str := get_engine_par_disp($ENGINE_PAR_SEQ_LMF_Q,-1,1,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+2)
    end if
    if ($mix_sntop_sel=1)
        $fx_eq_lmq_sntop := $fx_eq_lmq
        set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_SEQ_LMF_Q,$fx_eq_lmq*7874,-1,1,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+3)
        @fx_eq_lmq_str := get_engine_par_disp($ENGINE_PAR_SEQ_LMF_Q,-1,1,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+3)
    end if
    if ($mix_snbt_sel=1)
        $fx_eq_lmq_snbt := $fx_eq_lmq
        set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_SEQ_LMF_Q,$fx_eq_lmq*7874,-1,1,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+4)
        @fx_eq_lmq_str := get_engine_par_disp($ENGINE_PAR_SEQ_LMF_Q,-1,1,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+4)
    end if
    if ($mix_tomhi_sel=1)
        $fx_eq_lmq_tomhi := $fx_eq_lmq
        set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_SEQ_LMF_Q,$fx_eq_lmq*7874,-1,1,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+5)
        @fx_eq_lmq_str := get_engine_par_disp($ENGINE_PAR_SEQ_LMF_Q,-1,1,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+5)
    end if
    if ($mix_tommid_sel=1)
        $fx_eq_lmq_tommid := $fx_eq_lmq
        set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_SEQ_LMF_Q,$fx_eq_lmq*7874,-1,1,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+6)
        @fx_eq_lmq_str := get_engine_par_disp($ENGINE_PAR_SEQ_LMF_Q,-1,1,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+6)
    end if
    if ($mix_tomlow_sel=1)
        $fx_eq_lmq_tomlow := $fx_eq_lmq
        set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_SEQ_LMF_Q,$fx_eq_lmq*7874,-1,1,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+7)
        @fx_eq_lmq_str := get_engine_par_disp($ENGINE_PAR_SEQ_LMF_Q,-1,1,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+7)
    end if
    if ($mix_ov_sel=1)
        $fx_eq_lmq_ov := $fx_eq_lmq
        set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_SEQ_LMF_Q,$fx_eq_lmq*7874,-1,1,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+8)
        @fx_eq_lmq_str := get_engine_par_disp($ENGINE_PAR_SEQ_LMF_Q,-1,1,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+8)
    end if
    if ($mix_master_select=1)
        $fx_eq_lmq_master := $fx_eq_lmq
        set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_SEQ_LMF_Q,$fx_eq_lmq*7874,-1,1,-1)
        @fx_eq_lmq_str := get_engine_par_disp($ENGINE_PAR_SEQ_LMF_Q,-1,1,-1)
    end if
    set_text($fx_eq_lmq_val,@fx_eq_lmq_str)
end on

on ui_control($fx_eq_hmf)
    set_control_par_str(get_ui_id($mix_edit_light),$CONTROL_PAR_PICTURE,"edit_light_active")
    if ($fx_eq_reset=1)
        $fx_eq_reset := 0
        set_control_par_str(get_ui_id($mix_eq),$CONTROL_PAR_PICTURE,"Btn_eq_on")
    end if
    if ($mix_hh_sel=1)
        $fx_eq_hmf_hh := $fx_eq_hmf
