        set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_SEQ_HMF_FREQ,$fx_eq_hmf*7874,-1,1,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+0)
        @fx_eq_hmf_str := get_engine_par_disp($ENGINE_PAR_SEQ_HMF_FREQ,-1,1,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+0)
    end if
    if ($mix_bdi_sel=1)
        $fx_eq_hmf_bdi := $fx_eq_hmf
        set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_SEQ_HMF_FREQ,$fx_eq_hmf*7874,-1,1,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+1)
        @fx_eq_hmf_str := get_engine_par_disp($ENGINE_PAR_SEQ_HMF_FREQ,-1,1,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+1)
    end if
    if ($mix_bdo_sel=1)
        $fx_eq_hmf_bdo := $fx_eq_hmf
        set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_SEQ_HMF_FREQ,$fx_eq_hmf*7874,-1,1,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+2)
        @fx_eq_hmf_str := get_engine_par_disp($ENGINE_PAR_SEQ_HMF_FREQ,-1,1,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+2)
    end if
    if ($mix_sntop_sel=1)
        $fx_eq_hmf_sntop := $fx_eq_hmf
        set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_SEQ_HMF_FREQ,$fx_eq_hmf*7874,-1,1,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+3)
        @fx_eq_hmf_str := get_engine_par_disp($ENGINE_PAR_SEQ_HMF_FREQ,-1,1,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+3)
    end if
    if ($mix_snbt_sel=1)
        $fx_eq_hmf_snbt := $fx_eq_hmf
        set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_SEQ_HMF_FREQ,$fx_eq_hmf*7874,-1,1,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+4)
        @fx_eq_hmf_str := get_engine_par_disp($ENGINE_PAR_SEQ_HMF_FREQ,-1,1,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+4)
    end if
    if ($mix_tomhi_sel=1)
        $fx_eq_hmf_tomhi := $fx_eq_hmf
        set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_SEQ_HMF_FREQ,$fx_eq_hmf*7874,-1,1,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+5)
        @fx_eq_hmf_str := get_engine_par_disp($ENGINE_PAR_SEQ_HMF_FREQ,-1,1,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+5)
    end if
    if ($mix_tommid_sel=1)
        $fx_eq_hmf_tommid := $fx_eq_hmf
        set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_SEQ_HMF_FREQ,$fx_eq_hmf*7874,-1,1,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+6)
        @fx_eq_hmf_str := get_engine_par_disp($ENGINE_PAR_SEQ_HMF_FREQ,-1,1,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+6)
    end if
    if ($mix_tomlow_sel=1)
        $fx_eq_hmf_tomlow := $fx_eq_hmf
        set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_SEQ_HMF_FREQ,$fx_eq_hmf*7874,-1,1,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+7)
        @fx_eq_hmf_str := get_engine_par_disp($ENGINE_PAR_SEQ_HMF_FREQ,-1,1,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+7)
    end if
    if ($mix_ov_sel=1)
        $fx_eq_hmf_ov := $fx_eq_hmf
        set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_SEQ_HMF_FREQ,$fx_eq_hmf*7874,-1,1,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+8)
        @fx_eq_hmf_str := get_engine_par_disp($ENGINE_PAR_SEQ_HMF_FREQ,-1,1,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+8)
    end if
    if ($mix_master_select=1)
        $fx_eq_hmf_master := $fx_eq_hmf
        set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_SEQ_HMF_FREQ,$fx_eq_hmf*7874,-1,1,-1)
        @fx_eq_hmf_str := get_engine_par_disp($ENGINE_PAR_SEQ_HMF_FREQ,-1,1,-1)
    end if
    set_text($fx_eq_hmf_val,@fx_eq_hmf_str)
end on

on ui_control($fx_eq_hmg)
    set_control_par_str(get_ui_id($mix_edit_light),$CONTROL_PAR_PICTURE,"edit_light_active")
    if ($fx_eq_reset=1)
        $fx_eq_reset := 0
        set_control_par_str(get_ui_id($mix_eq),$CONTROL_PAR_PICTURE,"Btn_eq_on")
    end if
    if ($mix_hh_sel=1)
        $fx_eq_hmg_hh := $fx_eq_hmg
        set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_SEQ_HMF_GAIN,$fx_eq_hmg*250,-1,1,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+0)
        @fx_eq_hmg_str := get_engine_par_disp($ENGINE_PAR_SEQ_HMF_GAIN,-1,1,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+0)
    end if
    if ($mix_bdi_sel=1)
        $fx_eq_hmg_bdi := $fx_eq_hmg
        set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_SEQ_HMF_GAIN,$fx_eq_hmg*250,-1,1,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+1)
        @fx_eq_hmg_str := get_engine_par_disp($ENGINE_PAR_SEQ_HMF_GAIN,-1,1,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+1)
    end if
    if ($mix_bdo_sel=1)
        $fx_eq_hmg_bdo := $fx_eq_hmg
        set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_SEQ_HMF_GAIN,$fx_eq_hmg*250,-1,1,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+2)
        @fx_eq_hmg_str := get_engine_par_disp($ENGINE_PAR_SEQ_HMF_GAIN,-1,1,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+2)
    end if
    if ($mix_sntop_sel=1)
        $fx_eq_hmg_sntop := $fx_eq_hmg
        set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_SEQ_HMF_GAIN,$fx_eq_hmg*250,-1,1,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+3)
        @fx_eq_hmg_str := get_engine_par_disp($ENGINE_PAR_SEQ_HMF_GAIN,-1,1,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+3)
    end if
    if ($mix_snbt_sel=1)
        $fx_eq_hmg_snbt := $fx_eq_hmg
        set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_SEQ_HMF_GAIN,$fx_eq_hmg*250,-1,1,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+4)
        @fx_eq_hmg_str := get_engine_par_disp($ENGINE_PAR_SEQ_HMF_GAIN,-1,1,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+4)
    end if
    if ($mix_tomhi_sel=1)
        $fx_eq_hmg_tomhi := $fx_eq_hmg
        set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_SEQ_HMF_GAIN,$fx_eq_hmg*250,-1,1,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+5)
        @fx_eq_hmg_str := get_engine_par_disp($ENGINE_PAR_SEQ_HMF_GAIN,-1,1,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+5)
    end if
    if ($mix_tommid_sel=1)
        $fx_eq_hmg_tommid := $fx_eq_hmg
        set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_SEQ_HMF_GAIN,$fx_eq_hmg*250,-1,1,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+6)
        @fx_eq_hmg_str := get_engine_par_disp($ENGINE_PAR_SEQ_HMF_GAIN,-1,1,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+6)
    end if
    if ($mix_tomlow_sel=1)
        $fx_eq_hmg_tomlow := $fx_eq_hmg
        set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_SEQ_HMF_GAIN,$fx_eq_hmg*250,-1,1,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+7)
        @fx_eq_hmg_str := get_engine_par_disp($ENGINE_PAR_SEQ_HMF_GAIN,-1,1,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+7)
    end if
    if ($mix_ov_sel=1)
        $fx_eq_hmg_ov := $fx_eq_hmg
        set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_SEQ_HMF_GAIN,$fx_eq_hmg*250,-1,1,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+8)
        @fx_eq_hmg_str := get_engine_par_disp($ENGINE_PAR_SEQ_HMF_GAIN,-1,1,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+8)
    end if
    if ($mix_master_select=1)
        $fx_eq_hmg_master := $fx_eq_hmg
        set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_SEQ_HMF_GAIN,$fx_eq_hmg*250,-1,1,-1)
        @fx_eq_hmg_str := get_engine_par_disp($ENGINE_PAR_SEQ_HMF_GAIN,-1,1,-1)
    end if
    set_text($fx_eq_hmg_val,@fx_eq_hmg_str)
end on

on ui_control($fx_eq_hmq)
    set_control_par_str(get_ui_id($mix_edit_light),$CONTROL_PAR_PICTURE,"edit_light_active")
    if ($fx_eq_reset=1)
        $fx_eq_reset := 0
        set_control_par_str(get_ui_id($mix_eq),$CONTROL_PAR_PICTURE,"Btn_eq_on")
    end if
    if ($mix_hh_sel=1)
        $fx_eq_hmq_hh := $fx_eq_hmq
        set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_SEQ_HMF_Q,$fx_eq_hmq*7874,-1,1,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+0)
        @fx_eq_hmq_str := get_engine_par_disp($ENGINE_PAR_SEQ_HMF_Q,-1,1,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+0)
    end if
    if ($mix_bdi_sel=1)
        $fx_eq_hmq_bdi := $fx_eq_hmq
        set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_SEQ_HMF_Q,$fx_eq_hmq*7874,-1,1,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+1)
        @fx_eq_hmq_str := get_engine_par_disp($ENGINE_PAR_SEQ_HMF_Q,-1,1,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+1)
    end if
    if ($mix_bdo_sel=1)
        $fx_eq_hmq_bdo := $fx_eq_hmq
        set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_SEQ_HMF_Q,$fx_eq_hmq*7874,-1,1,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+2)
        @fx_eq_hmq_str := get_engine_par_disp($ENGINE_PAR_SEQ_HMF_Q,-1,1,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+2)
    end if
    if ($mix_sntop_sel=1)
        $fx_eq_hmq_sntop := $fx_eq_hmq
        set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_SEQ_HMF_Q,$fx_eq_hmq*7874,-1,1,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+3)
        @fx_eq_hmq_str := get_engine_par_disp($ENGINE_PAR_SEQ_HMF_Q,-1,1,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+3)
    end if
    if ($mix_snbt_sel=1)
        $fx_eq_hmq_snbt := $fx_eq_hmq
        set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_SEQ_HMF_Q,$fx_eq_hmq*7874,-1,1,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+4)
        @fx_eq_hmq_str := get_engine_par_disp($ENGINE_PAR_SEQ_HMF_Q,-1,1,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+4)
    end if
    if ($mix_tomhi_sel=1)
        $fx_eq_hmq_tomhi := $fx_eq_hmq
        set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_SEQ_HMF_Q,$fx_eq_hmq*7874,-1,1,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+5)
        @fx_eq_hmq_str := get_engine_par_disp($ENGINE_PAR_SEQ_HMF_Q,-1,1,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+5)
    end if
    if ($mix_tommid_sel=1)
        $fx_eq_hmq_tommid := $fx_eq_hmq
        set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_SEQ_HMF_Q,$fx_eq_hmq*7874,-1,1,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+6)
        @fx_eq_hmq_str := get_engine_par_disp($ENGINE_PAR_SEQ_HMF_Q,-1,1,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+6)
    end if
    if ($mix_tomlow_sel=1)
        $fx_eq_hmq_tomlow := $fx_eq_hmq
        set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_SEQ_HMF_Q,$fx_eq_hmq*7874,-1,1,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+7)
        @fx_eq_hmq_str := get_engine_par_disp($ENGINE_PAR_SEQ_HMF_Q,-1,1,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+7)
    end if
    if ($mix_ov_sel=1)
        $fx_eq_hmq_ov := $fx_eq_hmq
        set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_SEQ_HMF_Q,$fx_eq_hmq*7874,-1,1,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+8)
        @fx_eq_hmq_str := get_engine_par_disp($ENGINE_PAR_SEQ_HMF_Q,-1,1,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+8)
    end if
    if ($mix_master_select=1)
        $fx_eq_hmq_master := $fx_eq_hmq
        set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_SEQ_HMF_Q,$fx_eq_hmq*7874,-1,1,-1)
        @fx_eq_hmq_str := get_engine_par_disp($ENGINE_PAR_SEQ_HMF_Q,-1,1,-1)
    end if
    set_text($fx_eq_hmq_val,@fx_eq_hmq_str)
end on

on ui_control($fx_eq_hf)
    set_control_par_str(get_ui_id($mix_edit_light),$CONTROL_PAR_PICTURE,"edit_light_active")
    if ($fx_eq_reset=1)
        $fx_eq_reset := 0
        set_control_par_str(get_ui_id($mix_eq),$CONTROL_PAR_PICTURE,"Btn_eq_on")
    end if
    if ($mix_hh_sel=1)
        $fx_eq_hf_hh := $fx_eq_hf
        set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_SEQ_HF_FREQ,$fx_eq_hf*7874,-1,1,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+0)
        @fx_eq_hf_str := get_engine_par_disp($ENGINE_PAR_SEQ_HF_FREQ,-1,1,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+0)
    end if
    if ($mix_bdi_sel=1)
        $fx_eq_hf_bdi := $fx_eq_hf
        set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_SEQ_HF_FREQ,$fx_eq_hf*7874,-1,1,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+1)
        @fx_eq_hf_str := get_engine_par_disp($ENGINE_PAR_SEQ_HF_FREQ,-1,1,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+1)
    end if
    if ($mix_bdo_sel=1)
        $fx_eq_hf_bdo := $fx_eq_hf
        set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_SEQ_HF_FREQ,$fx_eq_hf*7874,-1,1,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+2)
        @fx_eq_hf_str := get_engine_par_disp($ENGINE_PAR_SEQ_HF_FREQ,-1,1,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+2)
    end if
    if ($mix_sntop_sel=1)
        $fx_eq_hf_sntop := $fx_eq_hf
        set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_SEQ_HF_FREQ,$fx_eq_hf*7874,-1,1,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+3)
        @fx_eq_hf_str := get_engine_par_disp($ENGINE_PAR_SEQ_HF_FREQ,-1,1,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+3)
    end if
    if ($mix_snbt_sel=1)
        $fx_eq_hf_snbt := $fx_eq_hf
        set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_SEQ_HF_FREQ,$fx_eq_hf*7874,-1,1,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+4)
        @fx_eq_hf_str := get_engine_par_disp($ENGINE_PAR_SEQ_HF_FREQ,-1,1,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+4)
    end if
    if ($mix_tomhi_sel=1)
        $fx_eq_hf_tomhi := $fx_eq_hf
        set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_SEQ_HF_FREQ,$fx_eq_hf*7874,-1,1,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+5)
        @fx_eq_hf_str := get_engine_par_disp($ENGINE_PAR_SEQ_HF_FREQ,-1,1,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+5)
    end if
    if ($mix_tommid_sel=1)
        $fx_eq_hf_tommid := $fx_eq_hf
        set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_SEQ_HF_FREQ,$fx_eq_hf*7874,-1,1,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+6)
        @fx_eq_hf_str := get_engine_par_disp($ENGINE_PAR_SEQ_HF_FREQ,-1,1,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+6)
    end if
    if ($mix_tomlow_sel=1)
        $fx_eq_hf_tomlow := $fx_eq_hf
        set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_SEQ_HF_FREQ,$fx_eq_hf*7874,-1,1,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+7)
        @fx_eq_hf_str := get_engine_par_disp($ENGINE_PAR_SEQ_HF_FREQ,-1,1,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+7)
    end if
    if ($mix_ov_sel=1)
        $fx_eq_hf_ov := $fx_eq_hf
        set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_SEQ_HF_FREQ,$fx_eq_hf*7874,-1,1,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+8)
        @fx_eq_hf_str := get_engine_par_disp($ENGINE_PAR_SEQ_HF_FREQ,-1,1,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+8)
    end if
    if ($mix_master_select=1)
        $fx_eq_hf_master := $fx_eq_hf
        set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_SEQ_HF_FREQ,$fx_eq_hf*7874,-1,1,-1)
        @fx_eq_hf_str := get_engine_par_disp($ENGINE_PAR_SEQ_HF_FREQ,-1,1,-1)
    end if
    set_text($fx_eq_hf_val,@fx_eq_hf_str)
end on

on ui_control($fx_eq_hg)
    set_control_par_str(get_ui_id($mix_edit_light),$CONTROL_PAR_PICTURE,"edit_light_active")
    if ($fx_eq_reset=1)
        $fx_eq_reset := 0
        set_control_par_str(get_ui_id($mix_eq),$CONTROL_PAR_PICTURE,"Btn_eq_on")
    end if
    if ($mix_hh_sel=1)
        $fx_eq_hg_hh := $fx_eq_hg
        set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_SEQ_HF_GAIN,$fx_eq_hg*250,-1,1,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+0)
        @fx_eq_hg_str := get_engine_par_disp($ENGINE_PAR_SEQ_HF_GAIN,-1,1,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+0)
    end if
    if ($mix_bdi_sel=1)
        $fx_eq_hg_bdi := $fx_eq_hg
        set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_SEQ_HF_GAIN,$fx_eq_hg*250,-1,1,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+1)
        @fx_eq_hg_str := get_engine_par_disp($ENGINE_PAR_SEQ_HF_GAIN,-1,1,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+1)
    end if
    if ($mix_bdo_sel=1)
        $fx_eq_hg_bdo := $fx_eq_hg
        set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_SEQ_HF_GAIN,$fx_eq_hg*250,-1,1,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+2)
        @fx_eq_hg_str := get_engine_par_disp($ENGINE_PAR_SEQ_HF_GAIN,-1,1,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+2)
    end if
    if ($mix_sntop_sel=1)
        $fx_eq_hg_sntop := $fx_eq_hg
        set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_SEQ_HF_GAIN,$fx_eq_hg*250,-1,1,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+3)
        @fx_eq_hg_str := get_engine_par_disp($ENGINE_PAR_SEQ_HF_GAIN,-1,1,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+3)
    end if
    if ($mix_snbt_sel=1)
        $fx_eq_hg_snbt := $fx_eq_hg
        set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_SEQ_HF_GAIN,$fx_eq_hg*250,-1,1,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+4)
        @fx_eq_hg_str := get_engine_par_disp($ENGINE_PAR_SEQ_HF_GAIN,-1,1,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+4)
    end if
    if ($mix_tomhi_sel=1)
        $fx_eq_hg_tomhi := $fx_eq_hg
        set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_SEQ_HF_GAIN,$fx_eq_hg*250,-1,1,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+5)
        @fx_eq_hg_str := get_engine_par_disp($ENGINE_PAR_SEQ_HF_GAIN,-1,1,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+5)
    end if
    if ($mix_tommid_sel=1)
        $fx_eq_hg_tommid := $fx_eq_hg
        set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_SEQ_HF_GAIN,$fx_eq_hg*250,-1,1,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+6)
        @fx_eq_hg_str := get_engine_par_disp($ENGINE_PAR_SEQ_HF_GAIN,-1,1,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+6)
    end if
    if ($mix_tomlow_sel=1)
        $fx_eq_hg_tomlow := $fx_eq_hg
        set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_SEQ_HF_GAIN,$fx_eq_hg*250,-1,1,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+7)
        @fx_eq_hg_str := get_engine_par_disp($ENGINE_PAR_SEQ_HF_GAIN,-1,1,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+7)
    end if
    if ($mix_ov_sel=1)
        $fx_eq_hg_ov := $fx_eq_hg
        set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_SEQ_HF_GAIN,$fx_eq_hg*250,-1,1,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+8)
        @fx_eq_hg_str := get_engine_par_disp($ENGINE_PAR_SEQ_HF_GAIN,-1,1,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+8)
    end if
    if ($mix_master_select=1)
        $fx_eq_hg_master := $fx_eq_hg
        set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_SEQ_HF_GAIN,$fx_eq_hg*250,-1,1,-1)
        @fx_eq_hg_str := get_engine_par_disp($ENGINE_PAR_SEQ_HF_GAIN,-1,1,-1)
    end if
    set_text($fx_eq_hg_val,@fx_eq_hg_str)
end on

on ui_control($fx_eq_hb)
    set_control_par_str(get_ui_id($mix_edit_light),$CONTROL_PAR_PICTURE,"edit_light_active")
    if ($fx_eq_reset=1)
        $fx_eq_reset := 0
        set_control_par_str(get_ui_id($mix_eq),$CONTROL_PAR_PICTURE,"Btn_eq_on")
    end if
    if ($mix_hh_sel=1)
        $fx_eq_hb_hh := $fx_eq_hb
        set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_SEQ_HF_BELL,$fx_eq_hb,-1,1,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+0)
    end if
    if ($mix_bdi_sel=1)
        $fx_eq_hb_bdi := $fx_eq_hb
        set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_SEQ_HF_BELL,$fx_eq_hb,-1,1,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+1)
    end if
    if ($mix_bdo_sel=1)
        $fx_eq_hb_bdo := $fx_eq_hb
        set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_SEQ_HF_BELL,$fx_eq_hb,-1,1,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+2)
    end if
    if ($mix_sntop_sel=1)
        $fx_eq_hb_sntop := $fx_eq_hb
        set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_SEQ_HF_BELL,$fx_eq_hb,-1,1,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+3)
    end if
    if ($mix_snbt_sel=1)
        $fx_eq_hb_snbt := $fx_eq_hb
        set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_SEQ_HF_BELL,$fx_eq_hb,-1,1,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+4)
    end if
    if ($mix_tomhi_sel=1)
        $fx_eq_hb_tomhi := $fx_eq_hb
        set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_SEQ_HF_BELL,$fx_eq_hb,-1,1,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+5)
    end if
    if ($mix_tommid_sel=1)
        $fx_eq_hb_tommid := $fx_eq_hb
        set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_SEQ_HF_BELL,$fx_eq_hb,-1,1,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+6)
    end if
    if ($mix_tomlow_sel=1)
        $fx_eq_hb_tomlow := $fx_eq_hb
        set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_SEQ_HF_BELL,$fx_eq_hb,-1,1,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+7)
    end if
    if ($mix_ov_sel=1)
        $fx_eq_hb_ov := $fx_eq_hb
        set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_SEQ_HF_BELL,$fx_eq_hb,-1,1,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+8)
    end if
    if ($mix_master_select=1)
        $fx_eq_hb_master := $fx_eq_hb
        set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_SEQ_HF_BELL,$fx_eq_hb,-1,1,-1)
    end if
end on

on ui_control($fx_td_in)
    set_control_par_str(get_ui_id($mix_edit_light),$CONTROL_PAR_PICTURE,"edit_light_active")
    if ($fx_td_reset=1)
        $fx_td_reset := 0
    end if
    if ($mix_hh_sel=1)
        $fx_td_in_hh := $fx_td_in
        set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_TR_INPUT,$fx_td_in*250,-1,2,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+0)
        @fx_td_in_str := get_engine_par_disp($ENGINE_PAR_TR_INPUT,-1,2,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+0)
    end if
    if ($mix_bdi_sel=1)
        $fx_td_in_bdi := $fx_td_in
        set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_TR_INPUT,$fx_td_in*250,-1,2,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+1)
        @fx_td_in_str := get_engine_par_disp($ENGINE_PAR_TR_INPUT,-1,2,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+1)
    end if
    if ($mix_bdo_sel=1)
        $fx_td_in_bdo := $fx_td_in
        set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_TR_INPUT,$fx_td_in*250,-1,2,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+2)
        @fx_td_in_str := get_engine_par_disp($ENGINE_PAR_TR_INPUT,-1,2,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+2)
    end if
    if ($mix_sntop_sel=1)
        $fx_td_in_sntop := $fx_td_in
        set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_TR_INPUT,$fx_td_in*250,-1,2,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+3)
        @fx_td_in_str := get_engine_par_disp($ENGINE_PAR_TR_INPUT,-1,2,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+3)
    end if
    if ($mix_snbt_sel=1)
        $fx_td_in_snbt := $fx_td_in
        set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_TR_INPUT,$fx_td_in*250,-1,2,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+4)
        @fx_td_in_str := get_engine_par_disp($ENGINE_PAR_TR_INPUT,-1,2,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+4)
    end if
    if ($mix_tomhi_sel=1)
        $fx_td_in_tomhi := $fx_td_in
        set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_TR_INPUT,$fx_td_in*250,-1,2,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+5)
        @fx_td_in_str := get_engine_par_disp($ENGINE_PAR_TR_INPUT,-1,2,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+5)
    end if
    if ($mix_tommid_sel=1)
        $fx_td_in_tommid := $fx_td_in
        set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_TR_INPUT,$fx_td_in*250,-1,2,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+6)
        @fx_td_in_str := get_engine_par_disp($ENGINE_PAR_TR_INPUT,-1,2,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+6)
    end if
    if ($mix_tomlow_sel=1)
        $fx_td_in_tomlow := $fx_td_in
        set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_TR_INPUT,$fx_td_in*250,-1,2,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+7)
        @fx_td_in_str := get_engine_par_disp($ENGINE_PAR_TR_INPUT,-1,2,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+7)
    end if
    if ($mix_ov_sel=1)
        $fx_td_in_ov := $fx_td_in
        set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_TR_INPUT,$fx_td_in*250,-1,2,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+8)
        @fx_td_in_str := get_engine_par_disp($ENGINE_PAR_TR_INPUT,-1,2,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+8)
    end if
    if ($mix_master_select=1)
        $fx_td_in_master := $fx_td_in
        set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_TR_INPUT,$fx_td_in*250,-1,2,-1)
        @fx_td_in_str := get_engine_par_disp($ENGINE_PAR_TR_INPUT,-1,2,-1)
    end if
    set_text($fx_td_in_val,@fx_td_in_str)
end on

on ui_control($fx_td_atk)
    set_control_par_str(get_ui_id($mix_edit_light),$CONTROL_PAR_PICTURE,"edit_light_active")
    if ($fx_td_reset=1)
        $fx_td_reset := 0
    end if
    if ($mix_hh_sel=1)
        $fx_td_atk_hh := $fx_td_atk
        set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_TR_ATTACK,$fx_td_atk*250,-1,2,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+0)
        @fx_td_atk_str := get_engine_par_disp($ENGINE_PAR_TR_ATTACK,-1,2,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+0)
    end if
    if ($mix_bdi_sel=1)
        $fx_td_atk_bdi := $fx_td_atk
        set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_TR_ATTACK,$fx_td_atk*250,-1,2,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+1)
        @fx_td_atk_str := get_engine_par_disp($ENGINE_PAR_TR_ATTACK,-1,2,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+1)
    end if
    if ($mix_bdo_sel=1)
        $fx_td_atk_bdo := $fx_td_atk
        set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_TR_ATTACK,$fx_td_atk*250,-1,2,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+2)
        @fx_td_atk_str := get_engine_par_disp($ENGINE_PAR_TR_ATTACK,-1,2,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+2)
    end if
    if ($mix_sntop_sel=1)
        $fx_td_atk_sntop := $fx_td_atk
        set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_TR_ATTACK,$fx_td_atk*250,-1,2,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+3)
        @fx_td_atk_str := get_engine_par_disp($ENGINE_PAR_TR_ATTACK,-1,2,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+3)
    end if
    if ($mix_snbt_sel=1)
        $fx_td_atk_snbt := $fx_td_atk
        set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_TR_ATTACK,$fx_td_atk*250,-1,2,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+4)
        @fx_td_atk_str := get_engine_par_disp($ENGINE_PAR_TR_ATTACK,-1,2,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+4)
    end if
    if ($mix_tomhi_sel=1)
        $fx_td_atk_tomhi := $fx_td_atk
        set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_TR_ATTACK,$fx_td_atk*250,-1,2,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+5)
        @fx_td_atk_str := get_engine_par_disp($ENGINE_PAR_TR_ATTACK,-1,2,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+5)
    end if
    if ($mix_tommid_sel=1)
        $fx_td_atk_tommid := $fx_td_atk
        set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_TR_ATTACK,$fx_td_atk*250,-1,2,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+6)
        @fx_td_atk_str := get_engine_par_disp($ENGINE_PAR_TR_ATTACK,-1,2,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+6)
    end if
    if ($mix_tomlow_sel=1)
        $fx_td_atk_tomlow := $fx_td_atk
        set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_TR_ATTACK,$fx_td_atk*250,-1,2,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+7)
        @fx_td_atk_str := get_engine_par_disp($ENGINE_PAR_TR_ATTACK,-1,2,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+7)
    end if
    if ($mix_ov_sel=1)
        $fx_td_atk_ov := $fx_td_atk
        set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_TR_ATTACK,$fx_td_atk*250,-1,2,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+8)
        @fx_td_atk_str := get_engine_par_disp($ENGINE_PAR_TR_ATTACK,-1,2,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+8)
    end if
    if ($mix_master_select=1)
        $fx_td_atk_master := $fx_td_atk
        set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_TR_ATTACK,$fx_td_atk*250,-1,2,-1)
        @fx_td_atk_str := get_engine_par_disp($ENGINE_PAR_TR_ATTACK,-1,2,-1)
    end if
    set_text($fx_td_atk_val,@fx_td_atk_str)
end on

on ui_control($fx_td_rel)
    set_control_par_str(get_ui_id($mix_edit_light),$CONTROL_PAR_PICTURE,"edit_light_active")
    if ($fx_td_reset=1)
        $fx_td_reset := 0
        set_control_par_str(get_ui_id($mix_td),$CONTROL_PAR_PICTURE,"Btn_td_on")
    end if
    if ($mix_hh_sel=1)
        $fx_td_rel_hh := $fx_td_rel
        set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_TR_SUSTAIN,$fx_td_rel*250,-1,2,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+0)
        @fx_td_rel_str := get_engine_par_disp($ENGINE_PAR_TR_SUSTAIN,-1,2,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+0)
    end if
    if ($mix_bdi_sel=1)
        $fx_td_rel_bdi := $fx_td_rel
        set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_TR_SUSTAIN,$fx_td_rel*250,-1,2,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+1)
        @fx_td_rel_str := get_engine_par_disp($ENGINE_PAR_TR_SUSTAIN,-1,2,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+1)
    end if
    if ($mix_bdo_sel=1)
        $fx_td_rel_bdo := $fx_td_rel
        set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_TR_SUSTAIN,$fx_td_rel*250,-1,2,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+2)
        @fx_td_rel_str := get_engine_par_disp($ENGINE_PAR_TR_SUSTAIN,-1,2,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+2)
    end if
    if ($mix_sntop_sel=1)
        $fx_td_rel_sntop := $fx_td_rel
        set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_TR_SUSTAIN,$fx_td_rel*250,-1,2,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+3)
        @fx_td_rel_str := get_engine_par_disp($ENGINE_PAR_TR_SUSTAIN,-1,2,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+3)
    end if
    if ($mix_snbt_sel=1)
        $fx_td_rel_snbt := $fx_td_rel
        set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_TR_SUSTAIN,$fx_td_rel*250,-1,2,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+4)
        @fx_td_rel_str := get_engine_par_disp($ENGINE_PAR_TR_SUSTAIN,-1,2,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+4)
    end if
    if ($mix_tomhi_sel=1)
        $fx_td_rel_tomhi := $fx_td_rel
        set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_TR_SUSTAIN,$fx_td_rel*250,-1,2,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+5)
        @fx_td_rel_str := get_engine_par_disp($ENGINE_PAR_TR_SUSTAIN,-1,2,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+5)
    end if
    if ($mix_tommid_sel=1)
        $fx_td_rel_tommid := $fx_td_rel
        set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_TR_SUSTAIN,$fx_td_rel*250,-1,2,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+6)
        @fx_td_rel_str := get_engine_par_disp($ENGINE_PAR_TR_SUSTAIN,-1,2,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+6)
    end if
    if ($mix_tomlow_sel=1)
        $fx_td_rel_tomlow := $fx_td_rel
        set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_TR_SUSTAIN,$fx_td_rel*250,-1,2,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+7)
        @fx_td_rel_str := get_engine_par_disp($ENGINE_PAR_TR_SUSTAIN,-1,2,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+7)
    end if
    if ($mix_ov_sel=1)
        $fx_td_rel_ov := $fx_td_rel
        set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_TR_SUSTAIN,$fx_td_rel*250,-1,2,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+8)
        @fx_td_rel_str := get_engine_par_disp($ENGINE_PAR_TR_SUSTAIN,-1,2,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+8)
    end if
    if ($mix_master_select=1)
        $fx_td_rel_master := $fx_td_rel
        set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_TR_SUSTAIN,$fx_td_rel*250,-1,2,-1)
        @fx_td_rel_str := get_engine_par_disp($ENGINE_PAR_TR_SUSTAIN,-1,2,-1)
    end if
    set_text($fx_td_rel_val,@fx_td_rel_str)
end on

on ui_control($fx_td_out)
    set_control_par_str(get_ui_id($mix_edit_light),$CONTROL_PAR_PICTURE,"edit_light_active")
    $correct := 3500
    if ($fx_td_reset=1)
        $fx_td_reset := 0
        set_control_par_str(get_ui_id($mix_td),$CONTROL_PAR_PICTURE,"Btn_td_on")
    end if
    if ($mix_hh_sel=1)
        $fx_td_out_hh := $fx_td_out
        set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_INSERT_EFFECT_OUTPUT_GAIN,$fx_td_out*250,-1,2,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+0)
        @fx_td_out_str := get_engine_par_disp($ENGINE_PAR_INSERT_EFFECT_OUTPUT_GAIN,-1,2,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+0)
    end if
    if ($mix_bdi_sel=1)
        $fx_td_out_bdi := $fx_td_out
        set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_INSERT_EFFECT_OUTPUT_GAIN,$fx_td_out*250,-1,2,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+1)
        @fx_td_out_str := get_engine_par_disp($ENGINE_PAR_INSERT_EFFECT_OUTPUT_GAIN,-1,2,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+1)
    end if
    if ($mix_bdo_sel=1)
        $fx_td_out_bdo := $fx_td_out
        set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_INSERT_EFFECT_OUTPUT_GAIN,$fx_td_out*250,-1,2,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+2)
        @fx_td_out_str := get_engine_par_disp($ENGINE_PAR_INSERT_EFFECT_OUTPUT_GAIN,-1,2,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+2)
    end if
    if ($mix_sntop_sel=1)
        $fx_td_out_sntop := $fx_td_out
        set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_INSERT_EFFECT_OUTPUT_GAIN,$fx_td_out*250,-1,2,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+3)
        @fx_td_out_str := get_engine_par_disp($ENGINE_PAR_INSERT_EFFECT_OUTPUT_GAIN,-1,2,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+3)
    end if
    if ($mix_snbt_sel=1)
        $fx_td_out_snbt := $fx_td_out
        set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_INSERT_EFFECT_OUTPUT_GAIN,$fx_td_out*250,-1,2,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+4)
        @fx_td_out_str := get_engine_par_disp($ENGINE_PAR_INSERT_EFFECT_OUTPUT_GAIN,-1,2,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+4)
    end if
    if ($mix_tomhi_sel=1)
        $fx_td_out_tomhi := $fx_td_out
        set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_INSERT_EFFECT_OUTPUT_GAIN,$fx_td_out*250,-1,2,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+5)
        @fx_td_out_str := get_engine_par_disp($ENGINE_PAR_INSERT_EFFECT_OUTPUT_GAIN,-1,2,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+5)
    end if
    if ($mix_tommid_sel=1)
        $fx_td_out_tommid := $fx_td_out
        set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_INSERT_EFFECT_OUTPUT_GAIN,$fx_td_out*250,-1,2,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+6)
        @fx_td_out_str := get_engine_par_disp($ENGINE_PAR_INSERT_EFFECT_OUTPUT_GAIN,-1,2,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+6)
    end if
    if ($mix_tomlow_sel=1)
        $fx_td_out_tomlow := $fx_td_out
        set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_INSERT_EFFECT_OUTPUT_GAIN,$fx_td_out*250,-1,2,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+7)
        @fx_td_out_str := get_engine_par_disp($ENGINE_PAR_INSERT_EFFECT_OUTPUT_GAIN,-1,2,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+7)
    end if
    if ($mix_ov_sel=1)
        $fx_td_out_ov := $fx_td_out
        set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_INSERT_EFFECT_OUTPUT_GAIN,$fx_td_out*250,-1,2,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+8)
        @fx_td_out_str := get_engine_par_disp($ENGINE_PAR_INSERT_EFFECT_OUTPUT_GAIN,-1,2,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+8)
    end if
    if ($mix_master_select=1)
        $fx_td_out_master := $fx_td_out
        set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_INSERT_EFFECT_OUTPUT_GAIN,$fx_td_out*250,-1,2,-1)
        @fx_td_out_str := get_engine_par_disp($ENGINE_PAR_INSERT_EFFECT_OUTPUT_GAIN,-1,2,-1)
    end if
    set_text($fx_td_out_val,@fx_td_out_str)
end on

on ui_control($fx_td_soft)
    set_control_par_str(get_ui_id($mix_edit_light),$CONTROL_PAR_PICTURE,"edit_light_active")
    if ($fx_td_reset=1)
        $fx_td_reset := 0
    end if
    if ($mix_hh_sel=1)
        $fx_td_soft_hh := $fx_td_soft
        set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_TR_SMOOTH,$fx_td_soft,-1,2,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+0)
    end if
    if ($mix_bdi_sel=1)
        $fx_td_soft_bdi := $fx_td_soft
        set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_TR_SMOOTH,$fx_td_soft,-1,2,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+1)
    end if
    if ($mix_bdo_sel=1)
        $fx_td_soft_bdo := $fx_td_soft
        set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_TR_SMOOTH,$fx_td_soft,-1,2,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+2)
    end if
    if ($mix_sntop_sel=1)
        $fx_td_soft_sntop := $fx_td_soft
        set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_TR_SMOOTH,$fx_td_soft,-1,2,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+3)
    end if
    if ($mix_snbt_sel=1)
        $fx_td_soft_snbt := $fx_td_soft
        set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_TR_SMOOTH,$fx_td_soft,-1,2,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+4)
    end if
    if ($mix_tomhi_sel=1)
        $fx_td_soft_tomhi := $fx_td_soft
        set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_TR_SMOOTH,$fx_td_soft,-1,2,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+5)
    end if
    if ($mix_tommid_sel=1)
        $fx_td_soft_tommid := $fx_td_soft
        set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_TR_SMOOTH,$fx_td_soft,-1,2,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+6)
    end if
    if ($mix_tomlow_sel=1)
        $fx_td_soft_tomlow := $fx_td_soft
        set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_TR_SMOOTH,$fx_td_soft,-1,2,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+7)
    end if
    if ($mix_ov_sel=1)
        $fx_td_soft_ov := $fx_td_soft
        set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_TR_SMOOTH,$fx_td_soft,-1,2,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+8)
    end if
    if ($mix_master_select=1)
        $fx_td_soft_master := $fx_td_soft
        set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_TR_SMOOTH,$fx_td_soft,-1,2,-1)
    end if
end on

on ui_control($fx_comp_tres)
    set_control_par_str(get_ui_id($mix_edit_light),$CONTROL_PAR_PICTURE,"edit_light_active")
    $correct := 4000
    if ($fx_comp_reset=1)
        $fx_comp_reset := 0
        set_control_par_str(get_ui_id($mix_comp),$CONTROL_PAR_PICTURE,"Btn_co_on")
    end if
    if ($mix_hh_sel=1)
        $fx_comp_tres_hh := $fx_comp_tres
        set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_SCOMP_THRESHOLD,$fx_comp_tres*250,-1,4,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+0)
        @fx_comp_tres_str := get_engine_par_disp($ENGINE_PAR_SCOMP_THRESHOLD,-1,4,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+0)
    end if
    if ($mix_bdi_sel=1)
        $fx_comp_tres_bdi := $fx_comp_tres
        set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_SCOMP_THRESHOLD,$fx_comp_tres*250,-1,4,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+1)
        @fx_comp_tres_str := get_engine_par_disp($ENGINE_PAR_SCOMP_THRESHOLD,-1,4,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+1)
    end if
    if ($mix_bdo_sel=1)
        $fx_comp_tres_bdo := $fx_comp_tres
        set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_SCOMP_THRESHOLD,$fx_comp_tres*250,-1,4,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+2)
        @fx_comp_tres_str := get_engine_par_disp($ENGINE_PAR_SCOMP_THRESHOLD,-1,4,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+2)
    end if
    if ($mix_sntop_sel=1)
        $fx_comp_tres_sntop := $fx_comp_tres
        set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_SCOMP_THRESHOLD,$fx_comp_tres*250,-1,4,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+3)
        @fx_comp_tres_str := get_engine_par_disp($ENGINE_PAR_SCOMP_THRESHOLD,-1,4,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+3)
    end if
    if ($mix_snbt_sel=1)
        $fx_comp_tres_snbt := $fx_comp_tres
        set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_SCOMP_THRESHOLD,$fx_comp_tres*250,-1,4,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+4)
        @fx_comp_tres_str := get_engine_par_disp($ENGINE_PAR_SCOMP_THRESHOLD,-1,4,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+4)
    end if
    if ($mix_tomhi_sel=1)
        $fx_comp_tres_tomhi := $fx_comp_tres
        set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_SCOMP_THRESHOLD,$fx_comp_tres*250,-1,4,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+5)
        @fx_comp_tres_str := get_engine_par_disp($ENGINE_PAR_SCOMP_THRESHOLD,-1,4,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+5)
    end if
    if ($mix_tommid_sel=1)
        $fx_comp_tres_tommid := $fx_comp_tres
        set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_SCOMP_THRESHOLD,$fx_comp_tres*250,-1,4,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+6)
        @fx_comp_tres_str := get_engine_par_disp($ENGINE_PAR_SCOMP_THRESHOLD,-1,4,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+6)
    end if
    if ($mix_tomlow_sel=1)
        $fx_comp_tres_tomlow := $fx_comp_tres
        set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_SCOMP_THRESHOLD,$fx_comp_tres*250,-1,4,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+7)
        @fx_comp_tres_str := get_engine_par_disp($ENGINE_PAR_SCOMP_THRESHOLD,-1,4,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+7)
    end if
    if ($mix_ov_sel=1)
        $fx_comp_tres_ov := $fx_comp_tres
        set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_SCOMP_THRESHOLD,$fx_comp_tres*250,-1,4,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+8)
        @fx_comp_tres_str := get_engine_par_disp($ENGINE_PAR_SCOMP_THRESHOLD,-1,4,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+8)
    end if
    if ($mix_master_select=1)
        $fx_comp_tres_master := $fx_comp_tres
        set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_SCOMP_THRESHOLD,$fx_comp_tres*250,-1,4,-1)
        @fx_comp_tres_str := get_engine_par_disp($ENGINE_PAR_SCOMP_THRESHOLD,-1,4,-1)
    end if
    set_text($fx_comp_tres_val,@fx_comp_tres_str)
end on

on ui_control($fx_comp_rat)
    set_control_par_str(get_ui_id($mix_edit_light),$CONTROL_PAR_PICTURE,"edit_light_active")
    if (in_range($fx_comp_rat,0,21))
        $fx_comp_rat := 0
    else
    if (in_range($fx_comp_rat,22,42))
        $fx_comp_rat := 32
    else
    if (in_range($fx_comp_rat,43,63))
        $fx_comp_rat := 53
    else
    if (in_range($fx_comp_rat,64,84))
        $fx_comp_rat := 74
    else
    if (in_range($fx_comp_rat,85,105))
        $fx_comp_rat := 95
    else
    if (in_range($fx_comp_rat,106,127))
        $fx_comp_rat := 127
    end if
    end if
    end if
    end if
    end if
    end if
    if ($fx_comp_reset=1)
        $fx_comp_reset := 0
        set_control_par_str(get_ui_id($mix_comp),$CONTROL_PAR_PICTURE,"Btn_co_on")
    end if
    if ($mix_hh_sel=1)
        $fx_comp_rat_hh := $fx_comp_rat
        set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_SCOMP_RATIO,$fx_comp_rat*7874,-1,4,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+0)
        @fx_comp_rat_str := get_engine_par_disp($ENGINE_PAR_SCOMP_RATIO,-1,4,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+0)
    end if
    if ($mix_bdi_sel=1)
        $fx_comp_rat_bdi := $fx_comp_rat
        set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_SCOMP_RATIO,$fx_comp_rat*7874,-1,4,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+1)
        @fx_comp_rat_str := get_engine_par_disp($ENGINE_PAR_SCOMP_RATIO,-1,4,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+1)
    end if
    if ($mix_bdo_sel=1)
        $fx_comp_rat_bdo := $fx_comp_rat
        set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_SCOMP_RATIO,$fx_comp_rat*7874,-1,4,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+2)
        @fx_comp_rat_str := get_engine_par_disp($ENGINE_PAR_SCOMP_RATIO,-1,4,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+2)
    end if
    if ($mix_sntop_sel=1)
        $fx_comp_rat_sntop := $fx_comp_rat
        set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_SCOMP_RATIO,$fx_comp_rat*7874,-1,4,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+3)
        @fx_comp_rat_str := get_engine_par_disp($ENGINE_PAR_SCOMP_RATIO,-1,4,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+3)
    end if
    if ($mix_snbt_sel=1)
        $fx_comp_rat_snbt := $fx_comp_rat
        set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_SCOMP_RATIO,$fx_comp_rat*7874,-1,4,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+4)
        @fx_comp_rat_str := get_engine_par_disp($ENGINE_PAR_SCOMP_RATIO,-1,4,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+4)
    end if
    if ($mix_tomhi_sel=1)
        $fx_comp_rat_tomhi := $fx_comp_rat
        set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_SCOMP_RATIO,$fx_comp_rat*7874,-1,4,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+5)
        @fx_comp_rat_str := get_engine_par_disp($ENGINE_PAR_SCOMP_RATIO,-1,4,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+5)
    end if
    if ($mix_tommid_sel=1)
        $fx_comp_rat_tommid := $fx_comp_rat
        set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_SCOMP_RATIO,$fx_comp_rat*7874,-1,4,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+6)
        @fx_comp_rat_str := get_engine_par_disp($ENGINE_PAR_SCOMP_RATIO,-1,4,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+6)
    end if
    if ($mix_tomlow_sel=1)
        $fx_comp_rat_tomlow := $fx_comp_rat
        set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_SCOMP_RATIO,$fx_comp_rat*7874,-1,4,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+7)
        @fx_comp_rat_str := get_engine_par_disp($ENGINE_PAR_SCOMP_RATIO,-1,4,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+7)
    end if
    if ($mix_ov_sel=1)
        $fx_comp_rat_ov := $fx_comp_rat
        set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_SCOMP_RATIO,$fx_comp_rat*7874,-1,4,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+8)
        @fx_comp_rat_str := get_engine_par_disp($ENGINE_PAR_SCOMP_RATIO,-1,4,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+8)
    end if
    if ($mix_master_select=1)
        $fx_comp_rat_master := $fx_comp_rat
        set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_SCOMP_RATIO,$fx_comp_rat*7874,-1,4,-1)
        @fx_comp_rat_str := get_engine_par_disp($ENGINE_PAR_SCOMP_RATIO,-1,4,-1)
    end if
    set_text($fx_comp_rat_val,"1:" & @fx_comp_rat_str)
end on

on ui_control($fx_comp_atk)
    set_control_par_str(get_ui_id($mix_edit_light),$CONTROL_PAR_PICTURE,"edit_light_active")
    if (in_range($fx_comp_atk,0,21))
        $fx_comp_atk := 0
    else
    if (in_range($fx_comp_atk,22,42))
        $fx_comp_atk := 27
    else
    if (in_range($fx_comp_atk,43,63))
        $fx_comp_atk := 47
    else
    if (in_range($fx_comp_atk,64,84))
        $fx_comp_atk := 77
    else
    if (in_range($fx_comp_atk,85,105))
        $fx_comp_atk := 95
    else
    if (in_range($fx_comp_atk,106,127))
        $fx_comp_atk := 127
    end if
    end if
    end if
    end if
    end if
    end if
    if ($fx_comp_reset=1)
        $fx_comp_reset := 0
        set_control_par_str(get_ui_id($mix_comp),$CONTROL_PAR_PICTURE,"Btn_co_on")
    end if
    if ($mix_hh_sel=1)
        $fx_comp_atk_hh := $fx_comp_atk
        set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_SCOMP_ATTACK,$fx_comp_atk*7874,-1,4,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+0)
        @fx_comp_atk_str := get_engine_par_disp($ENGINE_PAR_SCOMP_ATTACK,-1,4,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+0)
    end if
    if ($mix_bdi_sel=1)
        $fx_comp_atk_bdi := $fx_comp_atk
        set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_SCOMP_ATTACK,$fx_comp_atk*7874,-1,4,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+1)
        @fx_comp_atk_str := get_engine_par_disp($ENGINE_PAR_SCOMP_ATTACK,-1,4,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+1)
    end if
    if ($mix_bdo_sel=1)
        $fx_comp_atk_bdo := $fx_comp_atk
        set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_SCOMP_ATTACK,$fx_comp_atk*7874,-1,4,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+2)
        @fx_comp_atk_str := get_engine_par_disp($ENGINE_PAR_SCOMP_ATTACK,-1,4,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+2)
    end if
    if ($mix_sntop_sel=1)
        $fx_comp_atk_sntop := $fx_comp_atk
        set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_SCOMP_ATTACK,$fx_comp_atk*7874,-1,4,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+3)
        @fx_comp_atk_str := get_engine_par_disp($ENGINE_PAR_SCOMP_ATTACK,-1,4,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+3)
    end if
    if ($mix_snbt_sel=1)
        $fx_comp_atk_snbt := $fx_comp_atk
        set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_SCOMP_ATTACK,$fx_comp_atk*7874,-1,4,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+4)
        @fx_comp_atk_str := get_engine_par_disp($ENGINE_PAR_SCOMP_ATTACK,-1,4,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+4)
    end if
    if ($mix_tomhi_sel=1)
        $fx_comp_atk_tomhi := $fx_comp_atk
        set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_SCOMP_ATTACK,$fx_comp_atk*7874,-1,4,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+5)
        @fx_comp_atk_str := get_engine_par_disp($ENGINE_PAR_SCOMP_ATTACK,-1,4,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+5)
    end if
    if ($mix_tommid_sel=1)
        $fx_comp_atk_tommid := $fx_comp_atk
        set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_SCOMP_ATTACK,$fx_comp_atk*7874,-1,4,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+6)
        @fx_comp_atk_str := get_engine_par_disp($ENGINE_PAR_SCOMP_ATTACK,-1,4,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+6)
    end if
    if ($mix_tomlow_sel=1)
        $fx_comp_atk_tomlow := $fx_comp_atk
        set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_SCOMP_ATTACK,$fx_comp_atk*7874,-1,4,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+7)
        @fx_comp_atk_str := get_engine_par_disp($ENGINE_PAR_SCOMP_ATTACK,-1,4,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+7)
    end if
    if ($mix_ov_sel=1)
        $fx_comp_atk_ov := $fx_comp_atk
        set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_SCOMP_ATTACK,$fx_comp_atk*7874,-1,4,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+8)
        @fx_comp_atk_str := get_engine_par_disp($ENGINE_PAR_SCOMP_ATTACK,-1,4,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+8)
    end if
    if ($mix_master_select=1)
        $fx_comp_atk_master := $fx_comp_atk
        set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_SCOMP_ATTACK,$fx_comp_atk*7874,-1,4,-1)
        @fx_comp_atk_str := get_engine_par_disp($ENGINE_PAR_SCOMP_ATTACK,-1,4,-1)
    end if
    set_text($fx_comp_atk_val,@fx_comp_atk_str)
end on

on ui_control($fx_comp_rel)
    set_control_par_str(get_ui_id($mix_edit_light),$CONTROL_PAR_PICTURE,"edit_light_active")
    if (in_range($fx_comp_rel,0,21))
        $fx_comp_rel := 0
    else
    if (in_range($fx_comp_rel,22,42))
        $fx_comp_rel := 27
    else
    if (in_range($fx_comp_rel,43,63))
        $fx_comp_rel := 47
    else
    if (in_range($fx_comp_rel,64,84))
        $fx_comp_rel := 77
    else
    if (in_range($fx_comp_rel,85,105))
        $fx_comp_rel := 95
    else
    if (in_range($fx_comp_rel,106,127))
        $fx_comp_rel := 127
    end if
    end if
    end if
    end if
    end if
    end if
    if ($fx_comp_reset=1)
        $fx_comp_reset := 0
        set_control_par_str(get_ui_id($mix_comp),$CONTROL_PAR_PICTURE,"Btn_co_on")
    end if
    if ($mix_hh_sel=1)
        $fx_comp_rel_hh := $fx_comp_rel
        set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_SCOMP_RELEASE,$fx_comp_rel*7874,-1,4,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+0)
        @fx_comp_rel_str := get_engine_par_disp($ENGINE_PAR_SCOMP_RELEASE,-1,4,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+0)
    end if
    if ($mix_bdi_sel=1)
        $fx_comp_rel_bdi := $fx_comp_rel
        set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_SCOMP_RELEASE,$fx_comp_rel*7874,-1,4,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+1)
        @fx_comp_rel_str := get_engine_par_disp($ENGINE_PAR_SCOMP_RELEASE,-1,4,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+1)
    end if
    if ($mix_bdo_sel=1)
        $fx_comp_rel_bdo := $fx_comp_rel
        set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_SCOMP_RELEASE,$fx_comp_rel*7874,-1,4,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+2)
        @fx_comp_rel_str := get_engine_par_disp($ENGINE_PAR_SCOMP_RELEASE,-1,4,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+2)
    end if
    if ($mix_sntop_sel=1)
        $fx_comp_rel_sntop := $fx_comp_rel
        set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_SCOMP_RELEASE,$fx_comp_rel*7874,-1,4,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+3)
        @fx_comp_rel_str := get_engine_par_disp($ENGINE_PAR_SCOMP_RELEASE,-1,4,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+3)
    end if
    if ($mix_snbt_sel=1)
        $fx_comp_rel_snbt := $fx_comp_rel
        set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_SCOMP_RELEASE,$fx_comp_rel*7874,-1,4,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+4)
        @fx_comp_rel_str := get_engine_par_disp($ENGINE_PAR_SCOMP_RELEASE,-1,4,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+4)
    end if
    if ($mix_tomhi_sel=1)
        $fx_comp_rel_tomhi := $fx_comp_rel
        set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_SCOMP_RELEASE,$fx_comp_rel*7874,-1,4,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+5)
        @fx_comp_rel_str := get_engine_par_disp($ENGINE_PAR_SCOMP_RELEASE,-1,4,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+5)
    end if
    if ($mix_tommid_sel=1)
        $fx_comp_rel_tommid := $fx_comp_rel
        set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_SCOMP_RELEASE,$fx_comp_rel*7874,-1,4,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+6)
        @fx_comp_rel_str := get_engine_par_disp($ENGINE_PAR_SCOMP_RELEASE,-1,4,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+6)
    end if
    if ($mix_tomlow_sel=1)
        $fx_comp_rel_tomlow := $fx_comp_rel
        set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_SCOMP_RELEASE,$fx_comp_rel*7874,-1,4,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+7)
        @fx_comp_rel_str := get_engine_par_disp($ENGINE_PAR_SCOMP_RELEASE,-1,4,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+7)
    end if
    if ($mix_ov_sel=1)
        $fx_comp_rel_ov := $fx_comp_rel
        set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_SCOMP_RELEASE,$fx_comp_rel*7874,-1,4,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+8)
        @fx_comp_rel_str := get_engine_par_disp($ENGINE_PAR_SCOMP_RELEASE,-1,4,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+8)
    end if
    if ($mix_master_select=1)
        $fx_comp_rel_master := $fx_comp_rel
        set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_SCOMP_RELEASE,$fx_comp_rel*7874,-1,4,-1)
        @fx_comp_rel_str := get_engine_par_disp($ENGINE_PAR_SCOMP_RELEASE,-1,4,-1)
    end if
    set_text($fx_comp_rel_val,@fx_comp_rel_str)
end on

on ui_control($fx_comp_makeup)
    set_control_par_str(get_ui_id($mix_edit_light),$CONTROL_PAR_PICTURE,"edit_light_active")
    $correct := -4600
    if ($fx_comp_reset=1)
        $fx_comp_reset := 0
        set_control_par_str(get_ui_id($mix_comp),$CONTROL_PAR_PICTURE,"Btn_co_on")
    end if
    if ($mix_hh_sel=1)
        $fx_comp_makeup_hh := $fx_comp_makeup
        set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_SCOMP_MAKEUP,$fx_comp_makeup*250,-1,4,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+0)
        @fx_comp_makeup_str := get_engine_par_disp($ENGINE_PAR_SCOMP_MAKEUP,-1,4,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+0)
    end if
    if ($mix_bdi_sel=1)
        $fx_comp_makeup_bdi := $fx_comp_makeup
        set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_SCOMP_MAKEUP,$fx_comp_makeup*250,-1,4,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+1)
        @fx_comp_makeup_str := get_engine_par_disp($ENGINE_PAR_SCOMP_MAKEUP,-1,4,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+1)
    end if
    if ($mix_bdo_sel=1)
        $fx_comp_makeup_bdo := $fx_comp_makeup
        set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_SCOMP_MAKEUP,$fx_comp_makeup*250,-1,4,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+2)
        @fx_comp_makeup_str := get_engine_par_disp($ENGINE_PAR_SCOMP_MAKEUP,-1,4,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+2)
    end if
    if ($mix_sntop_sel=1)
        $fx_comp_makeup_sntop := $fx_comp_makeup
        set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_SCOMP_MAKEUP,$fx_comp_makeup*250,-1,4,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+3)
        @fx_comp_makeup_str := get_engine_par_disp($ENGINE_PAR_SCOMP_MAKEUP,-1,4,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+3)
    end if
    if ($mix_snbt_sel=1)
        $fx_comp_makeup_snbt := $fx_comp_makeup
        set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_SCOMP_MAKEUP,$fx_comp_makeup*250,-1,4,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+4)
        @fx_comp_makeup_str := get_engine_par_disp($ENGINE_PAR_SCOMP_MAKEUP,-1,4,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+4)
    end if
    if ($mix_tomhi_sel=1)
        $fx_comp_makeup_tomhi := $fx_comp_makeup
        set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_SCOMP_MAKEUP,$fx_comp_makeup*250,-1,4,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+5)
        @fx_comp_makeup_str := get_engine_par_disp($ENGINE_PAR_SCOMP_MAKEUP,-1,4,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+5)
    end if
    if ($mix_tommid_sel=1)
        $fx_comp_makeup_tommid := $fx_comp_makeup
        set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_SCOMP_MAKEUP,$fx_comp_makeup*250,-1,4,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+6)
        @fx_comp_makeup_str := get_engine_par_disp($ENGINE_PAR_SCOMP_MAKEUP,-1,4,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+6)
    end if
    if ($mix_tomlow_sel=1)
        $fx_comp_makeup_tomlow := $fx_comp_makeup
        set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_SCOMP_MAKEUP,$fx_comp_makeup*250,-1,4,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+7)
        @fx_comp_makeup_str := get_engine_par_disp($ENGINE_PAR_SCOMP_MAKEUP,-1,4,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+7)
    end if
    if ($mix_ov_sel=1)
        $fx_comp_makeup_ov := $fx_comp_makeup
        set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_SCOMP_MAKEUP,$fx_comp_makeup*250,-1,4,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+8)
        @fx_comp_makeup_str := get_engine_par_disp($ENGINE_PAR_SCOMP_MAKEUP,-1,4,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+8)
    end if
    if ($mix_master_select=1)
        $fx_comp_makeup_master := $fx_comp_makeup
        set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_SCOMP_MAKEUP,$fx_comp_makeup*250,-1,4,-1)
        @fx_comp_makeup_str := get_engine_par_disp($ENGINE_PAR_SCOMP_MAKEUP,-1,4,-1)
    end if
    set_text($fx_comp_makeup_val,@fx_comp_makeup_str)
end on

on ui_control($fx_comp_mix)
    set_control_par_str(get_ui_id($mix_edit_light),$CONTROL_PAR_PICTURE,"edit_light_active")
    if ($fx_comp_reset=1)
        $fx_comp_reset := 0
        set_control_par_str(get_ui_id($mix_comp),$CONTROL_PAR_PICTURE,"Btn_co_on")
    end if
    if ($mix_hh_sel=1)
        $fx_comp_mix_hh := $fx_comp_mix
        set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_SCOMP_MIX,$fx_comp_mix*7874,-1,4,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+0)
        @fx_comp_mix_str := get_engine_par_disp($ENGINE_PAR_SCOMP_MIX,-1,4,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+0)
    end if
    if ($mix_bdi_sel=1)
        $fx_comp_mix_bdi := $fx_comp_mix
        set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_SCOMP_MIX,$fx_comp_mix*7874,-1,4,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+1)
        @fx_comp_mix_str := get_engine_par_disp($ENGINE_PAR_SCOMP_MIX,-1,4,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+1)
    end if
    if ($mix_bdo_sel=1)
        $fx_comp_mix_bdo := $fx_comp_mix
        set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_SCOMP_MIX,$fx_comp_mix*7874,-1,4,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+2)
        @fx_comp_mix_str := get_engine_par_disp($ENGINE_PAR_SCOMP_MIX,-1,4,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+2)
    end if
    if ($mix_sntop_sel=1)
        $fx_comp_mix_sntop := $fx_comp_mix
        set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_SCOMP_MIX,$fx_comp_mix*7874,-1,4,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+3)
        @fx_comp_mix_str := get_engine_par_disp($ENGINE_PAR_SCOMP_MIX,-1,4,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+3)
    end if
    if ($mix_snbt_sel=1)
        $fx_comp_mix_snbt := $fx_comp_mix
        set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_SCOMP_MIX,$fx_comp_mix*7874,-1,4,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+4)
        @fx_comp_mix_str := get_engine_par_disp($ENGINE_PAR_SCOMP_MIX,-1,4,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+4)
    end if
    if ($mix_tomhi_sel=1)
        $fx_comp_mix_tomhi := $fx_comp_mix
        set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_SCOMP_MIX,$fx_comp_mix*7874,-1,4,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+5)
        @fx_comp_mix_str := get_engine_par_disp($ENGINE_PAR_SCOMP_MIX,-1,4,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+5)
    end if
    if ($mix_tommid_sel=1)
        $fx_comp_mix_tommid := $fx_comp_mix
        set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_SCOMP_MIX,$fx_comp_mix*7874,-1,4,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+6)
        @fx_comp_mix_str := get_engine_par_disp($ENGINE_PAR_SCOMP_MIX,-1,4,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+6)
    end if
    if ($mix_tomlow_sel=1)
        $fx_comp_mix_tomlow := $fx_comp_mix
        set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_SCOMP_MIX,$fx_comp_mix*7874,-1,4,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+7)
        @fx_comp_mix_str := get_engine_par_disp($ENGINE_PAR_SCOMP_MIX,-1,4,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+7)
    end if
    if ($mix_ov_sel=1)
        $fx_comp_mix_ov := $fx_comp_mix
        set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_SCOMP_MIX,$fx_comp_mix*7874,-1,4,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+8)
        @fx_comp_mix_str := get_engine_par_disp($ENGINE_PAR_SCOMP_MIX,-1,4,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+8)
    end if
    if ($mix_master_select=1)
        $fx_comp_mix_master := $fx_comp_mix
        set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_SCOMP_MIX,$fx_comp_mix*7874,-1,4,-1)
        @fx_comp_mix_str := get_engine_par_disp($ENGINE_PAR_SCOMP_MIX,-1,4,-1)
    end if
    set_text($fx_comp_mix_val,@fx_comp_mix_str)
end on

on ui_control($fx_eq_reset)

    set_control_par_str(get_ui_id($mix_edit_light),$CONTROL_PAR_PICTURE,"edit_light_active")

    if ($fx_eq_reset=1)
        $eq_bypass := 1
        %fx_eq_vals[0] := $fx_eq_lf
        %fx_eq_vals[1] := $fx_eq_lg
        %fx_eq_vals[2] := $fx_eq_lb
        %fx_eq_vals[3] := $fx_eq_lmf
        %fx_eq_vals[4] := $fx_eq_lmg
        %fx_eq_vals[5] := $fx_eq_lmq
        %fx_eq_vals[6] := $fx_eq_hmf
        %fx_eq_vals[7] := $fx_eq_hmg
        %fx_eq_vals[8] := $fx_eq_hmq
        %fx_eq_vals[9] := $fx_eq_hf
        %fx_eq_vals[10] := $fx_eq_hg
        %fx_eq_vals[11] := $fx_eq_hb
        $fx_eq_lf := 0
        $fx_eq_lg := 2000
        $fx_eq_lb := 0
        $fx_eq_lmf := 0
        $fx_eq_lmg := 2000
        $fx_eq_lmq := 63
        $fx_eq_hmf := 0
        $fx_eq_hmg := 2000
        $fx_eq_hmq := 63
        $fx_eq_hf := 0
        $fx_eq_hg := 2000
        $fx_eq_hb := 0
    else
    if ($fx_eq_reset=0)
        $eq_bypass := 0
        set_control_par_str(get_ui_id($mix_eq),$CONTROL_PAR_PICTURE,"Btn_eq_on")
        $fx_eq_lf := %fx_eq_vals[0]
        $fx_eq_lg := %fx_eq_vals[1]
        $fx_eq_lb := %fx_eq_vals[2]
        $fx_eq_lmf := %fx_eq_vals[3]
        $fx_eq_lmg := %fx_eq_vals[4]
        $fx_eq_lmq := %fx_eq_vals[5]
        $fx_eq_hmf := %fx_eq_vals[6]
        $fx_eq_hmg := %fx_eq_vals[7]
        $fx_eq_hmq := %fx_eq_vals[8]
        $fx_eq_hf := %fx_eq_vals[9]
        $fx_eq_hg := %fx_eq_vals[10]
        $fx_eq_hb := %fx_eq_vals[11]
    end if
    end if

    if ($mix_hh_sel=1)
        $help1 := $instr_bus_hh
        $fx_eq_lf_hh := $fx_eq_lf
        $fx_eq_lg_hh := $fx_eq_lg
        $fx_eq_lb_hh := $fx_eq_lb
        $fx_eq_lmf_hh := $fx_eq_lmf
        $fx_eq_lmg_hh := $fx_eq_lmg
        $fx_eq_lmq_hh := $fx_eq_lmq
        $fx_eq_hmf_hh := $fx_eq_hmf
        $fx_eq_hmg_hh := $fx_eq_hmg
        $fx_eq_hmq_hh := $fx_eq_hmq
        $fx_eq_hf_hh := $fx_eq_hf
        $fx_eq_hg_hh := $fx_eq_hg
        $fx_eq_hb_hh := $fx_eq_hb
    else
    if ($mix_bdi_sel=1)
        $help1 := $instr_bus_bdi
        $fx_eq_lf_bdi := $fx_eq_lf
        $fx_eq_lg_bdi := $fx_eq_lg
        $fx_eq_lb_bdi := $fx_eq_lb
        $fx_eq_lmf_bdi := $fx_eq_lmf
        $fx_eq_lmg_bdi := $fx_eq_lmg
        $fx_eq_lmq_bdi := $fx_eq_lmq
        $fx_eq_hmf_bdi := $fx_eq_hmf
        $fx_eq_hmg_bdi := $fx_eq_hmg
        $fx_eq_hmq_bdi := $fx_eq_hmq
        $fx_eq_hf_bdi := $fx_eq_hf
        $fx_eq_hg_bdi := $fx_eq_hg
        $fx_eq_hb_bdi := $fx_eq_hb
    else
    if ($mix_bdo_sel=1)
        $help1 := $instr_bus_bdo
        $fx_eq_lf_bdo := $fx_eq_lf
        $fx_eq_lg_bdo := $fx_eq_lg
        $fx_eq_lb_bdo := $fx_eq_lb
        $fx_eq_lmf_bdo := $fx_eq_lmf
        $fx_eq_lmg_bdo := $fx_eq_lmg
        $fx_eq_lmq_bdo := $fx_eq_lmq
        $fx_eq_hmf_bdo := $fx_eq_hmf
        $fx_eq_hmg_bdo := $fx_eq_hmg
        $fx_eq_hmq_bdo := $fx_eq_hmq
        $fx_eq_hf_bdo := $fx_eq_hf
        $fx_eq_hg_bdo := $fx_eq_hg
        $fx_eq_hb_bdo := $fx_eq_hb
    else
    if ($mix_sntop_sel=1)
        $help1 := $instr_bus_sntop
        $fx_eq_lf_sntop := $fx_eq_lf
        $fx_eq_lg_sntop := $fx_eq_lg
        $fx_eq_lb_sntop := $fx_eq_lb
        $fx_eq_lmf_sntop := $fx_eq_lmf
        $fx_eq_lmg_sntop := $fx_eq_lmg
        $fx_eq_lmq_sntop := $fx_eq_lmq
        $fx_eq_hmf_sntop := $fx_eq_hmf
        $fx_eq_hmg_sntop := $fx_eq_hmg
        $fx_eq_hmq_sntop := $fx_eq_hmq
        $fx_eq_hf_sntop := $fx_eq_hf
        $fx_eq_hg_sntop := $fx_eq_hg
        $fx_eq_hb_sntop := $fx_eq_hb
    else
    if ($mix_snbt_sel=1)
        $help1 := $instr_bus_snbt
        $fx_eq_lf_snbt := $fx_eq_lf
        $fx_eq_lg_snbt := $fx_eq_lg
        $fx_eq_lb_snbt := $fx_eq_lb
        $fx_eq_lmf_snbt := $fx_eq_lmf
        $fx_eq_lmg_snbt := $fx_eq_lmg
        $fx_eq_lmq_snbt := $fx_eq_lmq
        $fx_eq_hmf_snbt := $fx_eq_hmf
        $fx_eq_hmg_snbt := $fx_eq_hmg
        $fx_eq_hmq_snbt := $fx_eq_hmq
        $fx_eq_hf_snbt := $fx_eq_hf
        $fx_eq_hg_snbt := $fx_eq_hg
        $fx_eq_hb_snbt := $fx_eq_hb
    else
    if ($mix_tomhi_sel=1)
        $help1 := $instr_bus_tomhi
        $fx_eq_lf_tomhi := $fx_eq_lf
        $fx_eq_lg_tomhi := $fx_eq_lg
        $fx_eq_lb_tomhi := $fx_eq_lb
        $fx_eq_lmf_tomhi := $fx_eq_lmf
        $fx_eq_lmg_tomhi := $fx_eq_lmg
        $fx_eq_lmq_tomhi := $fx_eq_lmq
        $fx_eq_hmf_tomhi := $fx_eq_hmf
        $fx_eq_hmg_tomhi := $fx_eq_hmg
        $fx_eq_hmq_tomhi := $fx_eq_hmq
        $fx_eq_hf_tomhi := $fx_eq_hf
        $fx_eq_hg_tomhi := $fx_eq_hg
        $fx_eq_hb_tomhi := $fx_eq_hb
    else
    if ($mix_tommid_sel=1)
        $help1 := $instr_bus_tommid
        $fx_eq_lf_tommid := $fx_eq_lf
        $fx_eq_lg_tommid := $fx_eq_lg
        $fx_eq_lb_tommid := $fx_eq_lb
        $fx_eq_lmf_tommid := $fx_eq_lmf
        $fx_eq_lmg_tommid := $fx_eq_lmg
        $fx_eq_lmq_tommid := $fx_eq_lmq
        $fx_eq_hmf_tommid := $fx_eq_hmf
        $fx_eq_hmg_tommid := $fx_eq_hmg
        $fx_eq_hmq_tommid := $fx_eq_hmq
        $fx_eq_hf_tommid := $fx_eq_hf
        $fx_eq_hg_tommid := $fx_eq_hg
        $fx_eq_hb_tommid := $fx_eq_hb
    else
    if ($mix_tomlow_sel=1)
        $help1 := $instr_bus_tomlow
        $fx_eq_lf_tomlow := $fx_eq_lf
        $fx_eq_lg_tomlow := $fx_eq_lg
        $fx_eq_lb_tomlow := $fx_eq_lb
        $fx_eq_lmf_tomlow := $fx_eq_lmf
        $fx_eq_lmg_tomlow := $fx_eq_lmg
        $fx_eq_lmq_tomlow := $fx_eq_lmq
        $fx_eq_hmf_tomlow := $fx_eq_hmf
        $fx_eq_hmg_tomlow := $fx_eq_hmg
        $fx_eq_hmq_tomlow := $fx_eq_hmq
        $fx_eq_hf_tomlow := $fx_eq_hf
        $fx_eq_hg_tomlow := $fx_eq_hg
        $fx_eq_hb_tomlow := $fx_eq_hb
    else
    if ($mix_ov_sel=1)
        $help1 := $instr_bus_ov
        $fx_eq_lf_ov := $fx_eq_lf
        $fx_eq_lg_ov := $fx_eq_lg
        $fx_eq_lb_ov := $fx_eq_lb
        $fx_eq_lmf_ov := $fx_eq_lmf
        $fx_eq_lmg_ov := $fx_eq_lmg
        $fx_eq_lmq_ov := $fx_eq_lmq
        $fx_eq_hmf_ov := $fx_eq_hmf
        $fx_eq_hmg_ov := $fx_eq_hmg
        $fx_eq_hmq_ov := $fx_eq_hmq
        $fx_eq_hf_ov := $fx_eq_hf
        $fx_eq_hg_ov := $fx_eq_hg
        $fx_eq_hb_ov := $fx_eq_hb
    else
    if ($mix_master_select=1)
        $help1 := -1
        $fx_eq_lf_master := $fx_eq_lf
        $fx_eq_lg_master := $fx_eq_lg
        $fx_eq_lb_master := $fx_eq_lb
        $fx_eq_lmf_master := $fx_eq_lmf
        $fx_eq_lmg_master := $fx_eq_lmg
        $fx_eq_lmq_master := $fx_eq_lmq
        $fx_eq_hmf_master := $fx_eq_hmf
        $fx_eq_hmg_master := $fx_eq_hmg
        $fx_eq_hmq_master := $fx_eq_hmq
        $fx_eq_hf_master := $fx_eq_hf
        $fx_eq_hg_master := $fx_eq_hg
        $fx_eq_hb_master := $fx_eq_hb
    end if
    end if
    end if
    end if
    end if
    end if
    end if
    end if
    end if
    end if

    if ($help1=-1)
        set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_SEQ_LF_FREQ,$fx_eq_lf*7874,-1,1,-1)
        @fx_eq_lf_str := get_engine_par_disp($ENGINE_PAR_SEQ_LF_FREQ,-1,1,-1)
        set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_SEQ_LF_GAIN,$fx_eq_lg*250,-1,1,-1)
        @fx_eq_lg_str := get_engine_par_disp($ENGINE_PAR_SEQ_LF_GAIN,-1,1,-1)
        set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_SEQ_LF_BELL,$fx_eq_lb,-1,1,-1)
        set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_SEQ_LMF_FREQ,$fx_eq_lmf*7874,-1,1,-1)
        @fx_eq_lmf_str := get_engine_par_disp($ENGINE_PAR_SEQ_LMF_FREQ,-1,1,-1)
        set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_SEQ_LMF_GAIN,$fx_eq_lmg*250,-1,1,-1)
        @fx_eq_lmg_str := get_engine_par_disp($ENGINE_PAR_SEQ_LMF_GAIN,-1,1,-1)
        set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_SEQ_LMF_Q,$fx_eq_lmq*7874,-1,1,-1)
        @fx_eq_lmq_str := get_engine_par_disp($ENGINE_PAR_SEQ_LMF_Q,-1,1,-1)
        set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_SEQ_HMF_FREQ,$fx_eq_hmf*7874,-1,1,-1)
        @fx_eq_hmf_str := get_engine_par_disp($ENGINE_PAR_SEQ_HMF_FREQ,-1,1,-1)
        set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_SEQ_HMF_GAIN,$fx_eq_hmg*250,-1,1,-1)
        @fx_eq_hmg_str := get_engine_par_disp($ENGINE_PAR_SEQ_HMF_GAIN,-1,1,-1)
        set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_SEQ_HMF_Q,$fx_eq_hmq*7874,-1,1,-1)
        @fx_eq_hmq_str := get_engine_par_disp($ENGINE_PAR_SEQ_HMF_Q,-1,1,-1)
        set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_SEQ_HF_FREQ,$fx_eq_hf*7874,-1,1,-1)
        @fx_eq_hf_str := get_engine_par_disp($ENGINE_PAR_SEQ_HF_FREQ,-1,1,-1)
        set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_SEQ_HF_GAIN,$fx_eq_hg*250,-1,1,-1)
        @fx_eq_hg_str := get_engine_par_disp($ENGINE_PAR_SEQ_HF_GAIN,-1,1,-1)
        set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_SEQ_HF_BELL,$fx_eq_hb,-1,1,-1)
    else
    if ($help1 # -1)
        set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_SEQ_LF_FREQ,$fx_eq_lf*7874,-1,1,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+$help1)
        @fx_eq_lf_str := get_engine_par_disp($ENGINE_PAR_SEQ_LF_FREQ,-1,1,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+$help1)
        set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_SEQ_LF_GAIN,$fx_eq_lg*250,-1,1,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+$help1)
        @fx_eq_lg_str := get_engine_par_disp($ENGINE_PAR_SEQ_LF_GAIN,-1,1,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+$help1)
        set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_SEQ_LF_BELL,$fx_eq_lb,-1,1,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+$help1)
        set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_SEQ_LMF_FREQ,$fx_eq_lmf*7874,-1,1,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+$help1)
        @fx_eq_lmf_str := get_engine_par_disp($ENGINE_PAR_SEQ_LMF_FREQ,-1,1,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+$help1)
        set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_SEQ_LMF_GAIN,$fx_eq_lmg*250,-1,1,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+$help1)
        @fx_eq_lmg_str := get_engine_par_disp($ENGINE_PAR_SEQ_LMF_GAIN,-1,1,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+$help1)
        set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_SEQ_LMF_Q,$fx_eq_lmq*7874,-1,1,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+$help1)
        @fx_eq_lmq_str := get_engine_par_disp($ENGINE_PAR_SEQ_LMF_Q,-1,1,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+$help1)
        set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_SEQ_HMF_FREQ,$fx_eq_hmf*7874,-1,1,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+$help1)
        @fx_eq_hmf_str := get_engine_par_disp($ENGINE_PAR_SEQ_HMF_FREQ,-1,1,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+$help1)
        set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_SEQ_HMF_GAIN,$fx_eq_hmg*250,-1,1,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+$help1)
        @fx_eq_hmg_str := get_engine_par_disp($ENGINE_PAR_SEQ_HMF_GAIN,-1,1,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+$help1)
        set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_SEQ_HMF_Q,$fx_eq_hmq*7874,-1,1,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+$help1)
        @fx_eq_hmq_str := get_engine_par_disp($ENGINE_PAR_SEQ_HMF_Q,-1,1,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+$help1)
        set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_SEQ_HF_FREQ,$fx_eq_hf*7874,-1,1,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+$help1)
        @fx_eq_hf_str := get_engine_par_disp($ENGINE_PAR_SEQ_HF_FREQ,-1,1,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+$help1)
        set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_SEQ_HF_GAIN,$fx_eq_hg*250,-1,1,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+$help1)
        @fx_eq_hg_str := get_engine_par_disp($ENGINE_PAR_SEQ_HF_GAIN,-1,1,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+$help1)
        set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_SEQ_HF_BELL,$fx_eq_hb,-1,1,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+$help1)
    end if
    end if

    set_text($fx_eq_lf_val,@fx_eq_lf_str)
    set_text($fx_eq_lg_val,@fx_eq_lg_str)
    set_text($fx_eq_lmf_val,@fx_eq_lmf_str)
    set_text($fx_eq_lmg_val,@fx_eq_lmg_str)
    set_text($fx_eq_lmq_val,@fx_eq_lmq_str)
    set_text($fx_eq_hmf_val,@fx_eq_hmf_str)
    set_text($fx_eq_hmg_val,@fx_eq_hmg_str)
    set_text($fx_eq_hmq_val,@fx_eq_hmq_str)
    set_text($fx_eq_hf_val,@fx_eq_hf_str)
    set_text($fx_eq_hg_val,@fx_eq_hg_str)

end on

on ui_control($fx_td_reset)

    set_control_par_str(get_ui_id($mix_edit_light),$CONTROL_PAR_PICTURE,"edit_light_active")

    if ($fx_td_reset=1)
        %fx_td_vals[0] := $fx_td_in
        %fx_td_vals[1] := $fx_td_atk
        %fx_td_vals[2] := $fx_td_rel
        %fx_td_vals[3] := $fx_td_out
        %fx_td_vals[4] := $fx_td_soft
        $fx_td_in := 2000
        $fx_td_atk := 2000
        $fx_td_rel := 2000
        $fx_td_out := 1589
        $fx_td_soft := 0
    else
    if ($fx_td_reset=0)
        set_control_par_str(get_ui_id($mix_td),$CONTROL_PAR_PICTURE,"Btn_td_on")
        $fx_td_in := %fx_td_vals[0]
        $fx_td_atk := %fx_td_vals[1]
        $fx_td_rel := %fx_td_vals[2]
        $fx_td_out := %fx_td_vals[3]
        $fx_td_soft := %fx_td_vals[4]
    end if
    end if

    if ($mix_hh_sel=1)
        $help1 := $instr_bus_hh
        $fx_td_in_hh := $fx_td_in
        $fx_td_atk_hh := $fx_td_atk
        $fx_td_rel_hh := $fx_td_rel
        $fx_td_out_hh := $fx_td_out
        $fx_td_soft_hh := $fx_td_soft
    else
    if ($mix_bdi_sel=1)
        $help1 := $instr_bus_bdi
        $fx_td_in_bdi := $fx_td_in
        $fx_td_atk_bdi := $fx_td_atk
        $fx_td_rel_bdi := $fx_td_rel
        $fx_td_out_bdi := $fx_td_out
        $fx_td_soft_bdi := $fx_td_soft
    else
    if ($mix_bdo_sel=1)
        $help1 := $instr_bus_bdo
        $fx_td_in_bdo := $fx_td_in
        $fx_td_atk_bdo := $fx_td_atk
        $fx_td_rel_bdo := $fx_td_rel
        $fx_td_out_bdo := $fx_td_out
        $fx_td_soft_bdo := $fx_td_soft
    else
    if ($mix_sntop_sel=1)
        $help1 := $instr_bus_sntop
        $fx_td_in_sntop := $fx_td_in
        $fx_td_atk_sntop := $fx_td_atk
        $fx_td_rel_sntop := $fx_td_rel
        $fx_td_out_sntop := $fx_td_out
        $fx_td_soft_sntop := $fx_td_soft
    else
    if ($mix_snbt_sel=1)
        $help1 := $instr_bus_snbt
        $fx_td_in_snbt := $fx_td_in
        $fx_td_atk_snbt := $fx_td_atk
        $fx_td_rel_snbt := $fx_td_rel
        $fx_td_out_snbt := $fx_td_out
        $fx_td_soft_snbt := $fx_td_soft
    else
    if ($mix_tomhi_sel=1)
        $help1 := $instr_bus_tomhi
        $fx_td_in_tomhi := $fx_td_in
        $fx_td_atk_tomhi := $fx_td_atk
        $fx_td_rel_tomhi := $fx_td_rel
        $fx_td_out_tomhi := $fx_td_out
        $fx_td_soft_tomhi := $fx_td_soft
    else
    if ($mix_tommid_sel=1)
        $help1 := $instr_bus_tommid
        $fx_td_in_tommid := $fx_td_in
        $fx_td_atk_tommid := $fx_td_atk
        $fx_td_rel_tommid := $fx_td_rel
        $fx_td_out_tommid := $fx_td_out
        $fx_td_soft_tommid := $fx_td_soft
    else
    if ($mix_tomlow_sel=1)
        $help1 := $instr_bus_tomlow
        $fx_td_in_tomlow := $fx_td_in
        $fx_td_atk_tomlow := $fx_td_atk
        $fx_td_rel_tomlow := $fx_td_rel
        $fx_td_out_tomlow := $fx_td_out
        $fx_td_soft_tomlow := $fx_td_soft
    else
    if ($mix_ov_sel=1)
        $help1 := $instr_bus_ov
        $fx_td_in_ov := $fx_td_in
        $fx_td_atk_ov := $fx_td_atk
        $fx_td_rel_ov := $fx_td_rel
        $fx_td_out_ov := $fx_td_out
        $fx_td_soft_ov := $fx_td_soft
    else
    if ($mix_master_select=1)
        $help1 := -1
        $fx_td_in_master := $fx_td_in
        $fx_td_atk_master := $fx_td_atk
        $fx_td_rel_master := $fx_td_rel
        $fx_td_out_master := $fx_td_out
        $fx_td_soft_master := $fx_td_soft
    end if
    end if
    end if
    end if
    end if
    end if
    end if
    end if
    end if
    end if

    if ($fx_td_soft=1)
        $help3 := 0
        $help2 := 1
    else
    if ($fx_td_soft=0)
        $help3 := 1
        $help2 := 0
    end if
    end if

    if ($help1=-1)
        set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_TR_INPUT,$fx_td_in*250,-1,2,-1)
         @fx_td_in_str := get_engine_par_disp($ENGINE_PAR_TR_INPUT,-1,2,-1)
        set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_TR_ATTACK,$fx_td_atk*250,-1,2,-1)
        @fx_td_atk_str := get_engine_par_disp($ENGINE_PAR_TR_ATTACK,-1,2,-1)
        set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_TR_SUSTAIN,$fx_td_rel*250,-1,2,-1)
        @fx_td_rel_str := get_engine_par_disp($ENGINE_PAR_TR_SUSTAIN,-1,2,-1)
        set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_TR_SMOOTH,$fx_td_soft,-1,2,-1)
        set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_INSERT_EFFECT_OUTPUT_GAIN,$fx_td_out*250,-1,2,-1)
        @fx_td_out_str := get_engine_par_disp($ENGINE_PAR_INSERT_EFFECT_OUTPUT_GAIN,-1,2,-1)
    else
    if ($help1 # -1)
        set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_TR_INPUT,$fx_td_in*250,-1,2,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+$help1)
        @fx_td_in_str := get_engine_par_disp($ENGINE_PAR_TR_INPUT,-1,2,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+$help1)
        set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_TR_ATTACK,$fx_td_atk*250,-1,2,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+$help1)
        @fx_td_atk_str := get_engine_par_disp($ENGINE_PAR_TR_ATTACK,-1,2,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+$help1)
        set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_TR_SUSTAIN,$fx_td_rel*250,-1,2,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+$help1)
        @fx_td_rel_str := get_engine_par_disp($ENGINE_PAR_TR_SUSTAIN,-1,2,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+$help1)
        set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_TR_SMOOTH,$fx_td_soft,-1,2,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+$help1)
        set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_INSERT_EFFECT_OUTPUT_GAIN,$fx_td_out*250,-1,2,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+$help1)
        @fx_td_out_str := get_engine_par_disp($ENGINE_PAR_INSERT_EFFECT_OUTPUT_GAIN,-1,2,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+$help1)
    end if
    end if

    set_text($fx_td_in_val,@fx_td_in_str)
    set_text($fx_td_atk_val,@fx_td_atk_str)
    set_text($fx_td_rel_val,@fx_td_rel_str)
    set_text($fx_td_out_val,@fx_td_out_str)

end on

on ui_control($fx_comp_reset)

    set_control_par_str(get_ui_id($mix_edit_light),$CONTROL_PAR_PICTURE,"edit_light_active")

    if ($fx_comp_reset=1)
        %fx_comp_vals[0] := $fx_comp_tres
        %fx_comp_vals[1] := $fx_comp_rat
        %fx_comp_vals[2] := $fx_comp_atk
        %fx_comp_vals[3] := $fx_comp_rel
        %fx_comp_vals[4] := $fx_comp_makeup
        %fx_comp_vals[5] := $fx_comp_mix
        $fx_comp_tres := 2000
        $fx_comp_rat := 0
        $fx_comp_atk := 0
        $fx_comp_rel := 127
        $fx_comp_makeup := 800
        $fx_comp_mix := 0
    else
    if ($fx_comp_reset=0)
        set_control_par_str(get_ui_id($mix_comp),$CONTROL_PAR_PICTURE,"Btn_td_co")
        $fx_comp_tres := %fx_comp_vals[0]
        $fx_comp_rat := %fx_comp_vals[1]
        $fx_comp_atk := %fx_comp_vals[2]
        $fx_comp_rel := %fx_comp_vals[3]
        $fx_comp_makeup := %fx_comp_vals[4]
        $fx_comp_mix := %fx_comp_vals[5]
    end if
    end if

    if ($mix_hh_sel=1)
        $help1 := $instr_bus_hh
        $fx_comp_tres_hh := $fx_comp_tres
        $fx_comp_rat_hh := $fx_comp_rat
        $fx_comp_atk_hh := $fx_comp_atk
        $fx_comp_rel_hh := $fx_comp_rel
        $fx_comp_makeup_hh := $fx_comp_makeup
        $fx_comp_mix_hh := $fx_comp_mix
    else
    if ($mix_bdi_sel=1)
        $help1 := $instr_bus_bdi
        $fx_comp_tres_bdi := $fx_comp_tres
        $fx_comp_rat_bdi := $fx_comp_rat
        $fx_comp_atk_bdi := $fx_comp_atk
        $fx_comp_rel_bdi := $fx_comp_rel
        $fx_comp_makeup_bdi := $fx_comp_makeup
        $fx_comp_mix_bdi := $fx_comp_mix
    else
    if ($mix_bdo_sel=1)
        $help1 := $instr_bus_bdo
        $fx_comp_tres_bdo := $fx_comp_tres
        $fx_comp_rat_bdo := $fx_comp_rat
        $fx_comp_atk_bdo := $fx_comp_atk
        $fx_comp_rel_bdo := $fx_comp_rel
        $fx_comp_makeup_bdo := $fx_comp_makeup
        $fx_comp_mix_bdo := $fx_comp_mix
    else
    if ($mix_sntop_sel=1)
        $help1 := $instr_bus_sntop
        $fx_comp_tres_sntop := $fx_comp_tres
        $fx_comp_rat_sntop := $fx_comp_rat
        $fx_comp_atk_sntop := $fx_comp_atk
        $fx_comp_rel_sntop := $fx_comp_rel
        $fx_comp_makeup_sntop := $fx_comp_makeup
        $fx_comp_mix_sntop := $fx_comp_mix
    else
    if ($mix_snbt_sel=1)
        $help1 := $instr_bus_snbt
        $fx_comp_tres_snbt := $fx_comp_tres
        $fx_comp_rat_snbt := $fx_comp_rat
        $fx_comp_atk_snbt := $fx_comp_atk
        $fx_comp_rel_snbt := $fx_comp_rel
        $fx_comp_makeup_snbt := $fx_comp_makeup
        $fx_comp_mix_snbt := $fx_comp_mix
    else
    if ($mix_tomhi_sel=1)
        $help1 := $instr_bus_tomhi
        $fx_comp_tres_tomhi := $fx_comp_tres
        $fx_comp_rat_tomhi := $fx_comp_rat
        $fx_comp_atk_tomhi := $fx_comp_atk
        $fx_comp_rel_tomhi := $fx_comp_rel
        $fx_comp_makeup_tomhi := $fx_comp_makeup
        $fx_comp_mix_tomhi := $fx_comp_mix
    else
    if ($mix_tommid_sel=1)
        $help1 := $instr_bus_tommid
        $fx_comp_tres_tommid := $fx_comp_tres
        $fx_comp_rat_tommid := $fx_comp_rat
        $fx_comp_atk_tommid := $fx_comp_atk
        $fx_comp_rel_tommid := $fx_comp_rel
        $fx_comp_makeup_tommid := $fx_comp_makeup
        $fx_comp_mix_tommid := $fx_comp_mix
    else
    if ($mix_tomlow_sel=1)
        $help1 := $instr_bus_tomlow
        $fx_comp_tres_tomlow := $fx_comp_tres
        $fx_comp_rat_tomlow := $fx_comp_rat
        $fx_comp_atk_tomlow := $fx_comp_atk
        $fx_comp_rel_tomlow := $fx_comp_rel
        $fx_comp_makeup_tomlow := $fx_comp_makeup
        $fx_comp_mix_tomlow := $fx_comp_mix
    else
    if ($mix_ov_sel=1)
        $help1 := $instr_bus_ov
        $fx_comp_tres_ov := $fx_comp_tres
        $fx_comp_rat_ov := $fx_comp_rat
        $fx_comp_atk_ov := $fx_comp_atk
        $fx_comp_rel_ov := $fx_comp_rel
        $fx_comp_makeup_ov := $fx_comp_makeup
        $fx_comp_mix_ov := $fx_comp_mix
    else
    if ($mix_master_select=1)
        $help1 := -1
        $fx_comp_tres_master := $fx_comp_tres
        $fx_comp_rat_master := $fx_comp_rat
        $fx_comp_atk_master := $fx_comp_atk
        $fx_comp_rel_master := $fx_comp_rel
        $fx_comp_makeup_master := $fx_comp_makeup
        $fx_comp_mix_master := $fx_comp_mix
    end if
    end if
    end if
    end if
    end if
    end if
    end if
    end if
    end if
    end if

    if ($help1=-1)
        set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_SCOMP_THRESHOLD,$fx_comp_tres*250,-1,4,-1)
        @fx_comp_tres_str := get_engine_par_disp($ENGINE_PAR_SCOMP_THRESHOLD,-1,4,-1)
        set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_SCOMP_RATIO,$fx_comp_rat*7874,-1,4,-1)
        @fx_comp_rat_str := get_engine_par_disp($ENGINE_PAR_SCOMP_RATIO,-1,4,-1)
        set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_SCOMP_ATTACK,$fx_comp_atk*7874,-1,4,-1)
        @fx_comp_atk_str := get_engine_par_disp($ENGINE_PAR_SCOMP_ATTACK,-1,4,-1)
        set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_SCOMP_RELEASE,$fx_comp_rel*7874,-1,4,-1)
        @fx_comp_rel_str := get_engine_par_disp($ENGINE_PAR_SCOMP_RELEASE,-1,4,-1)
        set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_SCOMP_MAKEUP,$fx_comp_makeup*250,-1,4,-1)
        @fx_comp_makeup_str := get_engine_par_disp($ENGINE_PAR_SCOMP_MAKEUP,-1,4,-1)
        set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_SCOMP_MIX,$fx_comp_mix*7874,-1,4,-1)
        @fx_comp_mix_str := get_engine_par_disp($ENGINE_PAR_SCOMP_MIX,-1,4,-1)
    else
    if ($help1 # -1)
        set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_SCOMP_THRESHOLD,$fx_comp_tres*250,-1,4,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+$help1)
        @fx_comp_tres_str := get_engine_par_disp($ENGINE_PAR_SCOMP_THRESHOLD,-1,4,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+$help1)
        set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_SCOMP_RATIO,$fx_comp_rat*7874,-1,4,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+$help1)
        @fx_comp_rat_str := get_engine_par_disp($ENGINE_PAR_SCOMP_RATIO,-1,4,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+$help1)
        set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_SCOMP_ATTACK,$fx_comp_atk*7874,-1,4,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+$help1)
        @fx_comp_atk_str := get_engine_par_disp($ENGINE_PAR_SCOMP_ATTACK,-1,4,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+$help1)
        set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_SCOMP_RELEASE,$fx_comp_rel*7874,-1,4,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+$help1)
        @fx_comp_rel_str := get_engine_par_disp($ENGINE_PAR_SCOMP_RELEASE,-1,4,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+$help1)
        set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_SCOMP_MAKEUP,$fx_comp_makeup*250,-1,4,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+$help1)
        @fx_comp_makeup_str := get_engine_par_disp($ENGINE_PAR_SCOMP_MAKEUP,-1,4,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+$help1)
        set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_SCOMP_MIX,$fx_comp_mix*7874,-1,4,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+$help1)
        @fx_comp_mix_str := get_engine_par_disp($ENGINE_PAR_SCOMP_MIX,-1,4,$NI_BUS_OFFSET+$help1)
    end if
    end if

    set_text($fx_comp_tres_val,@fx_comp_tres_str)
    set_text($fx_comp_rat_val,"1:" & @fx_comp_rat_str)
    set_text($fx_comp_atk_val,@fx_comp_atk_str)
    set_text($fx_comp_rel_val,@fx_comp_rel_str)
    set_text($fx_comp_makeup_val,@fx_comp_makeup_str)
    set_text($fx_comp_mix_val,@fx_comp_mix_str)

end on

on ui_control(%options_table_vel)
    $i := 0
    while ($i<=127)
        pgs_set_key_val(KEY_VELOCITY,$i,%options_table_vel[$i])
        inc($i)
    end while
end on

on ui_control($options_velcurve_linear)
    $options_velcurve_linear := 0
    $i := 0
    while ($i<=127)
        %options_table_vel[$i] := $i
        pgs_set_key_val(KEY_VELOCITY,$i,%options_table_vel[$i])
        inc($i)
    end while
end on

on ui_control($options_velcurve_degressive)
    $options_velcurve_degressive := 0
    $i := 0
    while ($i<=127)
        $help1 := $i*$i*$i/16000
        if ($help1>127)
            $help1 := 127
        else
        if ($help1<0)
            $help1 := 0
        end if
        end if
        %options_table_vel[$i] := $help1
        pgs_set_key_val(KEY_VELOCITY,$i,%options_table_vel[$i])
        inc($i)
    end while
end on

on ui_control($options_velcurve_progressive)
    $options_velcurve_progressive := 0
    $i := 0
    while ($i<=127)
        $help1 := 127-($i*$i*$i/16000)
        if ($help1>127)
            $help1 := 127
        else
        if ($help1<0)
            $help1 := 0
        end if
        end if
        %options_table_vel[127-$i] := $help1
        pgs_set_key_val(KEY_VELOCITY,127-$i,%options_table_vel[127-$i])
        inc($i)
    end while
end on

on ui_control($options_wires_snbtm)
    message($options_wires_snbtm)
    set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_VOLUME,$options_wires_snbtm*7874,97,-1,-1)
    set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_VOLUME,$options_wires_snbtm*6174,98,-1,-1)
    if ($options_wires_snbtm>60)
        pgs_set_key_val(MICS,9,1)
        pgs_set_key_val(MICS,10,1)
        if ($wire_purge_status = 0)
            $i := 0
            while($i < 30)
                purge_group(%nowire_groups[$i], 0)
                inc($i)
            end while
            $i := 0
            while($i < 38)
                purge_group(%wire_groups[$i], 1)
                inc($i)
            end while
            $wire_purge_status := 1
        end if
    else
    if ($options_wires_snbtm<=60)
        pgs_set_key_val(MICS,9,0)
        pgs_set_key_val(MICS,10,0)
        if ($wire_purge_status = 1)
            $i := 0
            while($i < 38)
                purge_group(%wire_groups[$i], 0)
                inc($i)
            end while
            $i := 0
            while($i < 30)
                purge_group(%nowire_groups[$i], 1)
                inc($i)
            end while
            $wire_purge_status := 0
        end if
    end if
    end if
end on

on ui_control($options_credits)
    $options_credits := 0
    call hide_all_controls
    set_skin_offset(0)
    set_control_par(get_ui_id($credits),$CONTROL_PAR_HIDE,$HIDE_PART_NOTHING)
    play_note(120,125,0,0)
end on

on ui_control($options_mapping_gm)
    $new_mapping := 1
    call change_mapping
end on
on ui_control($options_mapping_vdrum1)
    $new_mapping := 2
    call change_mapping
end on
on ui_control($options_mapping_vdrum2)
    $new_mapping := 3
    call change_mapping
end on
on ui_control($options_mapping_ez)
    $new_mapping := 4
    call change_mapping
end on
on ui_control($options_mapping_superior)
    $new_mapping := 5
    call change_mapping
end on
on ui_control($options_mapping_addictive)
    $new_mapping := 6
    call change_mapping
end on
on ui_control($options_mapping_bfd)
    $new_mapping := 7
    call change_mapping
end on

on ui_control($credits)
    call hide_all_controls
    set_skin_offset(1806)
    $i := 1
    while ($i<=$id5)
        set_control_par(%ui_id5[$i],$CONTROL_PAR_HIDE,$HIDE_PART_NOTHING)
        inc($i)
    end while
    set_control_par(get_ui_id($credits),$CONTROL_PAR_HIDE,$HIDE_WHOLE_CONTROL)
end on

on ui_control($fsMIDISelector)
    $MIDISyncID := load_midi_file(fs_get_filename(get_ui_id($fsMIDISelector),2))
    while ($MIDISyncID # -1)
        wait(100)
    end while
    message("MIDI File loaded")
    @file_path := fs_get_filename(get_ui_id($fsMIDISelector),2)
    @file_name := fs_get_filename(get_ui_id($fsMIDISelector),0)
    set_text($label_beat,@file_name)
    call load_file
    call init_event_array
end on

on ui_control($menu_play)
    if ($menu_play=0)
        pgs_set_key_val(MAPPINGS,0,$new_mapping)
        fade_out($ALL_EVENTS,5000,1)
        $i := 0
        while ($i<=103)
            set_engine_par($ENGINE_PAR_EFFECT_BYPASS,1,$i,4,1)
            inc($i)
        end while
    end if
    if ($menu_play=1)
        pgs_set_key_val(MICS,0,$drums_hh_mic_current)
        pgs_set_key_val(MICS,1,$drums_bdi_mic_current)
        pgs_set_key_val(MICS,2,$drums_bdo_mic_current)
        pgs_set_key_val(MICS,3,$drums_sntop_mic_current)
        pgs_set_key_val(MICS,4,$drums_snbt_mic_current)
        pgs_set_key_val(MICS,5,$drums_tomhi_mic_current)
        pgs_set_key_val(MICS,6,$drums_tommid_mic_current)
        pgs_set_key_val(MICS,7,$drums_tomlow_mic_current)
        pgs_set_key_val(MICS,8,$drums_ov_mic_current)
    end if
end on

on listener
    $cur_listener_id := $NI_CALLBACK_ID
    if ($menu_play=1)
        if ($play_flag=1)
        wait(1)
        end if
        $play_flag := 1
        if ($NI_TRANSPORT_RUNNING=0)
            $cur_song_pos := $cur_song_pos+960
        else
            $cur_song_pos := $NI_SONG_POSITION
        end if
        $prev_ext_song_pos := $NI_SONG_POSITION
        $beat_start_time := $ENGINE_UPTIME
        mf_get_next_at(0,$cur_song_pos mod $mf_length_2)
        $start_of_beat := $cur_song_pos mod $mf_length_2
        $end_of_beat := $cur_song_pos mod $mf_length_2+960
        while (mf_get_pos()<$end_of_beat and ($menu_play=1) and ($cur_listener_id=$NI_CALLBACK_ID))
            $diff := ticks_to_ms(mf_get_pos()+($wrap_flag*$mf_length_2)-$start_of_beat)-(($ENGINE_UPTIME-$beat_start_time)*1000)
            if ($diff>0)
                wait($diff)
            end if
            if (mf_get_command()=$MIDI_COMMAND_NOTE_ON and (mf_get_byte_two() # 0))
                $note_mapped := mf_get_byte_one()
                if ($processing_flag # 1)
                    %event_ids_per_note[mf_get_byte_one()*10+%num_events_per_note[mf_get_byte_one()]] := play_note(mf_get_byte_one(),mf_get_byte_two(),0,0)
                    $played_note_id := %event_ids_per_note[mf_get_byte_one()*10+%num_events_per_note[mf_get_byte_one()]]
                end if
                pgs_set_key_val(playnoteflag,0,0)
                inc(%num_events_per_note[mf_get_byte_one()])
            else
                if (mf_get_command()=$MIDI_COMMAND_NOTE_OFF or (mf_get_command()=$MIDI_COMMAND_NOTE_ON and (mf_get_byte_two()=0)))
                    dec(%num_events_per_note[mf_get_byte_one()])
                    note_off(%event_ids_per_note[mf_get_byte_one()*10+%num_events_per_note[mf_get_byte_one()]])
                end if
            end if
            mf_get_next(0)
            if (mf_get_command()=0)
                if ($end_of_beat>$mf_length_2)
                    mf_get_first(0)
                    $end_of_beat := $end_of_beat mod $mf_length_2
                    $start_of_beat := $end_of_beat-960
                else
                    exit
                end if
            end if
        end while
    end if
    $play_flag := 0
end on

on async_complete
    if ($NI_ASYNC_ID=$sync_id)
        $sync_id := -1
    end if
    if ($NI_ASYNC_ID=$load_ir_id)
        $load_ir_id := -1
    end if
    if ($load_mf_id=$NI_ASYNC_ID)
        $load_mf_id := -1
    end if
    if ($NI_ASYNC_ID=$MIDISyncID)
        $MIDISyncID := -1
    end if
    if ($NI_ASYNC_ID=$load_arr_id)
        $load_arr_id := -1 - $NI_ASYNC_EXIT_STATUS
        $mix_load := 0
    end if {($NI_ASYNC_ID=$load_arr_id)}
end on

on pgs_changed
end on

on note
    if ($menu_play=0)
        $played_note_id := $EVENT_ID
    end if
    pgs_set_key_val(MICS,0,$drums_hh_mic_current)
    pgs_set_key_val(MICS,1,$drums_bdi_mic_current)
    pgs_set_key_val(MICS,2,$drums_bdo_mic_current)
    pgs_set_key_val(MICS,3,$drums_sntop_mic_current)
    pgs_set_key_val(MICS,4,$drums_snbt_mic_current)
    pgs_set_key_val(MICS,5,$drums_tomhi_mic_current)
    pgs_set_key_val(MICS,6,$drums_tommid_mic_current)
    pgs_set_key_val(MICS,7,$drums_tomlow_mic_current)
    pgs_set_key_val(MICS,8,$drums_ov_mic_current)
end on
